description.hltext_display: Police: Thousands of tons of wild animals smuggled through Vietnam to China in past year
description.content:
Published on December 22nd, 2010
Topics :
Department of Environmental Police , Vietnam , China , HANOI
HANOI, Vietnam - Police in Vietnam say an estimated 4,500 tons of wild animals — mostly snakes, turtles and pangolins — have been smuggled through the Southeast Asian country during the past year.
Lt. Col. Vu Duyen Hai of the Department of Environmental Police says the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines.
Hai says the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials. He says he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals.
He said Wednesday that the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

event_or_fact.property: he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals
the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines
the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials
the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

description.hltext_display: Letiště Praha kvůli počasí dnes zatím zrušilo tři lety do Londýna
description.content:
Praha - Aerolinky pro dnešek z pražského ruzyňského letiště zrušily kvůli přetrvávajícím potížím se sněhem v Evropě tři lety na londýnské letiště Heathrow, jeden večerní přílet z tohoto letiště prozatím zrušen není. Problémy ve spojení s jinými destinacemi zatím nejsou hlášeny, řekla ČTK mluvčí Letiště Praha Michaela Lagronová.
Mluvčí upozornila, že situace se během dne může měnit. Na samotném ruzyňském letišti je provoz plynulý.
V úterý ruzyňské letiště kvůli potížím se sněhem na jiných evropských letištích zrušilo 25 až 30 letů ze zhruba 400. Dotklo se to spojů na Heathrow, problémy měla i letiště ve Frankfurtu nad Mohanem, Dublinu, Lyonu a v Bruselu.
Problémy na letištích způsobuje sníh a také námraza, která se musí z letadel odstraňovat, dodala mluvčí.

description.hltext_display: 朴贊浩每投1局 歐力士捐2600元
description.content:
朴贊浩加盟日本職棒歐力士隊，簽約金120萬美元(約台幣3598萬元)，再加激勵獎金100萬美元，和今年初和洋基隊簽朴贊浩的簽約金相同，如果再加獎金，歐力士提供條件超過洋基，並且擔任先發投手。
歐力士出價 超過洋基
朴贊浩這份合約還有附帶條款，而這份附帶條款應該是史上難得一見的附帶條款，註明他在明年新季只要上場投球，每投一局歐力士就要捐出10萬韓圓 (相當於台幣2600元)的基金，給韓國的社會福利基金會，另外再對韓國青少年棒球發展基金會捐款，以及協助基層教練到歐力士進修。
朴贊浩閃電加盟歐力士，除了找到自己想要發揮的空間，並且得到相當大程度的禮遇，更重要是藉由這個機會，帶給韓國社福團體和基層棒球一些資源。
過去朴贊浩只要每年季後回到南韓，他就會以自己為名掏腰包主辦基層棒球賽，鼓勵韓國打棒球小朋友努力向上，除了棒球，他非常喜歡做社會公益活動，都是自己解囊相助，加上他始終願意效力國家隊，因此長年以來，個人大聯盟生涯不論是起還是落，他在韓國人心目中都是永遠的民族英雄。
不捨離開大聯盟 盼回韓職畫句點
朴贊浩表示，歐力士在上個月和他第一次接觸時，表明願意讓他擔任先發投手，再度擔任先發是他這幾年來夢寐以求之事，能在日本職棒新環境先發，挑戰全新的任務，是他選擇加盟歐力士最重要主因。
朴贊浩表示，非常不捨離開奮鬥長達17年的大聯盟，他很感謝美國和韓國球迷的長期支持，但他為了累積更多經驗，決定挑戰日本職棒，由於他只簽1年約，明年球季結束後他會重新考慮下一步，或許回到韓國職棒結束生涯是最好選擇。

description.hltext_display: Microsoft Plans New Version of Windows
description.author: Joseph Woelfel
description.content:
REDMOND, Washington (TheStreet) -- Microsoft(MSFT) plans to demonstrate next month a new Windows operating system that relies less on chip technology from Intel(INTC) and more on chips based on designs from ARM Holdings (ARMH) of the U.K., reports say. More on MSFT Sell Microsoft!: Market Activity | ARMH Microsoft Corporation| MSFT Intel Corporation| INTC Microsoft's new version of Windows targets low-power devices and adds support for chips based on designs from ARM as well as x86 chip technology offered by Intel and Advanced Micro Devices(AMD) the Wall Street Journal reports, citing people briefed on Microsoft's plans.
Microsoft's software would be tailored for battery-powered devices, such as tablet computers from Apple(AAPL) and other handhelds, people familiar with the company's plans told Bloomberg.
Microsoft will debut the software at the Consumer Electronics Show next month, the Journal and Bloomberg report. The new software, however, isn't expected to be available for two years.
Microsoft, Intel and ARM declined to comment.
-- Written by Joseph Woelfel
To contact the writer of this article, click here: Joseph Woelfel To submit a news tip, send an email to: tips@thestreet.com.

description.hltext_display: 丝路SUV与燕赵古城的邂逅(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
“海马骑士?发现中国之美”河北站的烽火已经在石家庄点燃了！！！顺着燎原之势已经来到了古城邯郸。
东风裕隆联姻 SUV外的后续车型纳智捷CEO 转载(图) (2010-12-22)
SUV车型GPS导航仪车友的最爱(图) (2010-12-16)

骑士团丝路归来，DK登基(图) (2010-12-13)
丝路凯旋 海马骑士天津港回归(图) (2010-12-10)
探访丝路边塞：一路风沙一路关(图) (2010-12-07)
扬子江畔的希冀 荆州古城游玩攻略(图) (2010-12-17)
青海丹葛尔古城―日月山―青海湖―两弹基地旅游(图) (2010-12-17)
凤凰古城北门夜景(图) (2010-12-12)
三次不经意的烂漫邂逅，算不算缘分？ (2010-12-22)
开封一日游 邂逅历史沧桑沉淀之约(图) (2010-12-21)
三里屯soho无意地邂逅亚运微笑姐妹花 有图有真相 (2010-12-11)
嘿嘿，今天上午没课，天助我也！背上相机去文化广场，正巧碰上活动。不解释！看了就知道啦！
邯郸的文化广场，虽然不及周围的现代建筑高耸，但是绝对气势逼人，历史积淀的气场啊！“海马骑士?发现中国之美”的活动今天就在这里开始。
距离活动开始还有段时间，看到舞台上摆着一辆被蓝布蒙着的车，看到四下无人，我就上去打量了一番：兄台，我看你步履沉稳，身材震烁，是块习武的好料……我猜你应该是一辆SUV吧？
正打算把把脉，看看阁下经络如何，不想却闯入四个美女在舞台上花枝乱颤。何方妖孽！冬天大秀惊艳舞蹈，也不怕冻着了！
经历了美女四忍众的舞姿凌虐后，西装革履的主持人上场了。
呃，心里平静了许多，不过你们为啥不上个美女主持捏？
再让我心潮澎湃一下吧。
骑士之旅大旗交接。看着那个旗子 ~！OMG，我现在才知道骑士原来是跑过丝绸之路，那是1.5万多公里的路途呀，好远，还到了好多国家，终点是古罗马。还有一个神马非凡马帮的车队名称。
旗帜交接到手中还未捂热，只见两个靓女工作人员迅速把SUV的蓝色蒙布扯下――What’s the hell？居然是传说中从丝绸之路活动中跋涉回来的海马骑士丝路限量纪念版！这前脸大灯，这一脸的国旗！HA-2.0-DVVT系列发动机、EOBD车载诊断技术、轻量化进排气歧管！这样的交火配置绝对堪称是一个地地道道的公路战士！谁开谁拉风！正在我寻思着的时候一个带着豹纹棉帽的车模MM登台倚靠在骑士旁边，向众人展示骑士风采……妖孽哪里逃！速速在我闪光灯下露出媚眼！那是我猴哥的虎皮裙！你以为你偷来蒙到了脑袋上我就认不得了吗？
打算向后退几步找个好镜头，忽觉撞到人了。扭头一看我整个人都湿了，乖乖，好多人在围观啊，邯郸的父老乡亲们听说骑士丝绸之路的巡礼都来捧场啊。
很快进入了有奖回答环节，不过举手好几次都没有被选上，主要是因为在下比较袖珍，举手基本上都被挡住了，至于关于本人的具体数据我就不细说啦，淡定，淡定……。不过后来我发现后面的商场的大屏幕里面的影像和舞台是一样的，而当我和身旁举着摄像机的蜀黍求证得知邯郸几大商业中心的LED大屏幕同步现场直播的时候我又无法淡定了――邯郸的童鞋们好热情高涨啊。
活动渐渐进入尾声，车友会上台同海马骑士丝路限量纪念版。哎，可惜非凡马帮缺席了，特别是那个帮主，据说还是个文人呢！根据他走过的丝绸之路还写了一长诗。
活动结束，拍了满满一内存卡的相片满载而归，满满的都是爱！会场外面是一排的海马骑士丝路限量纪念版。介个……真有点黑客帝国中一大群黑色西装史密斯的感觉。
呐，眼看着就要元旦了，也没什么好东西给大伙，给大伙看看劲爆套图就当是提前给大家预祝元旦啦。反正我这次专业课也没啥指望了，选修课神马的我也无视啦，今年过节不挂科，要挂就挂专业课！大无畏的豪放气势才配的上骑士的气质嘛！
向好友推荐本贴：
标题：《 》
地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2087958c10p1.html
上一贴：玩转广州车展，玩转上海通用(图)
下一贴：百冠王的骄傲，我的骄傲(图)

description.hltext_display: 魔術一盤沙 不敵小牛大團結
description.content:
本季第一支進行「跳樓大拍賣」，大舉交易四名主力球員的奧蘭多魔術，今天在主場以99：105不敵達拉斯小牛，吞下4連敗，也是交易之後2連敗，最近9戰8敗，綽號「恐慌大師」的魔術教練范甘迪，交易之後依然頭很大。
魔術新成員前鋒特庫魯、後衛理查森先發，亞瑞納斯替補，三人30投只有7中，投籃命中率不到2成5，三人合力攻下21分，魔術全新組合默契還沒成熟，內外搭配、前後組合，仍需要時間磨合。
重新回到魔術先發的控球前鋒特庫魯，此役11投2中，傳出8次助攻，摘下9分，他在自己曾經熟悉的位置上，打得很順手，投籃手感稍差，但團隊並沒有因為他的加入，顯得更圓熟、更有爆發力。
從板凳上出發的亞瑞納斯狀況更差，上場18分鐘，6投1中得2分，完全失去他「零號情報員」意氣風發的驕氣和傲骨。
小牛全員皆兵，內外攻守均衡，前鋒巴特勒砍進20分，諾維茨基17分，生涯得分追平柏德，成為史上第25名得分手，現役球員排名第四，排名在歐尼爾、布萊恩和賈奈特之後，後衛基德13分、12助攻。
魔術中鋒 ，他在內線完全被孤立，哈沃德再一次打出26分、23籃板偉大數據與表現，卻還是沒有辦法帶領魔術打出團隊籃球，鞏固防守，贏得魔術渴盼的勝利，哈沃德已經連續三場至少抓下20個籃板球。小牛戰績23勝5負，西區排第二，最近4連勝。
亞瑞納斯一直未能在奧蘭多找回打球節奏與信心，與隊友之間的聯繫也還處於短線狀況，讓魔術大換血重建工程，更為艱辛。
哈沃德現在在內線與隊友幾乎完全斷線，兩名主力後衛尼爾森19分，瑞迪克21分，個人發揮不錯，但兩人對團隊磨合與聯繫，完全使不上力。
開季曾經譏諷熱火打不出狀況的魔術教練范甘迪和中鋒哈沃德，現在也同樣面臨重建、新舊磨合、控球權分配和以建立防守為核心的難題，也讓熱火、魔術之間的恩怨情仇更添話題。

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content: Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires. The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out."The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Zapatero subraya que España cumplirá las previsiones de déficit
description.content:
Foto: EP MA
MADRID, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) - El presidente del Gobierno, , ha asegurado que España cumplirá en 2010 las previsiones de déficit público, que pasan por situar el saldo negativo de las cuentas públicas en el 9,3%, y las de PIB por segundo año consecutivo, que prevén una caída de la economía del 0,3%.
Durante su comparecencia en el pleno del Congreso para dar cuenta sobre la última cumbre europea, Zapatero ha reconocido que la reacción de los mercados financieros está afectando a España aunque, a su parecer, es una reacción "que no responde" a los fundamentos de la economía española.
El jefe del Ejecutivo ha repasado el actual contexto económico y ha expresado "con claridad y firmeza" el compromiso de la UE de hacer "todo lo necesario" para garantizar la estabilidad del euro en el futuro y ha defendido la acción de la Unión Europea contra la crisis, a pesar de que no estuviera escrito que pudiera hacerlo en un momento en el que muchos de los estados miembros han atravesado "serias dificultades" propias.
"Y ha sido capaz, lo está siendo porque aún el peligro no está conjurado", ha señalado Zapatero, tras destacar la capacidad de la UE para sostener la fortaleza de la moneda común y la capacidad del sistema financiero.
A su parecer, la dirección que hay que seguir es la reforzar la gobernanza europea, la de incentivar la coordinación de las políticas comunes, la de afirmar la solidaridad con los países miembros a partir del compromiso de todos y cada uno de ellos con las exigencias de la Unión. "Éste es el camino que estamos recorriendo y por el que tenemos que seguir avanzando pues aún hay pasos que dar", ha indicado.

description.hltext_display: Sharks edge Oilers
description.content:
Antero Niittymaki was sharp with 26 saves and helped lead San Jose to a 2-1 win over the Edmonton Oilers at the Shark Tank.
Logan Couture and Dan Boyle scored for the Sharks, who have won three straight and four of their last six games overall. San Jose has now captured nine of its last 10 games against the Oilers.
"We talked about putting a string of wins together," Boyle said. "We really want to win this next one."
Dustin Penner scored for Edmonton, which has dropped three of its last four games.
Nikolai Khabibulin allowed two goals on 30 shots in the losing effort.
The Sharks opened the scoring at the 13:15 mark of the second period on Couture's 18th goal. Ryan Clowe held the puck in the lower portion of the right slot and sent a backhand pass into the crease area for a successful tip- in redirection tally by Couture.
Later in the middle stanza, a power-play tally by Boyle gave the Sharks a two-goal edge. After Ryan Whitney was whistled for holding the stick at 14:48, the Sharks went to work in their offensive zone with the extra skater but several scoring attempts were thwarted by Khabibulin.
With time dwindling on the power play, Boyle corralled the puck near the centerpoint, drifted into the high slot and buried a wrist shot that made its way through heavy traffic and into the back of the cage with 3:17 remaining before the second intermission.
Penner's 11th goal cut Edmonton's deficit in half with 1:59 to play in regulation -- with an extra attacker on the ice in favor of Khabibulin -- with a deflection goal from in close, but the Sharks used several late clears and held on for the win.
"It's just one of those special teams games that's been killing us for awhile now," Whitney said.
Game Notes
San Jose was 1-for-4 on the power play, while Edmonton failed to score on either of its power-play chances...It was Boyle's fourth goal...Couture continued his lead atop the rookie list for goal scoring. He also now holds sole possession of the top spot for points among rookies with 25.

description.hltext_display: iDT providing Data Analysis on Digital Media Research Results were used by 2010 Digital Media Merit
description.content:
DT Communications Asia Pacific officially announced today that its unique social media monitoring and research platform - iDT is providing data and analysis for 2010 Digital Media Merit Award Asia which was held in Expo 2010, Shanghai, China.
Director General of International Development Information Network Association (DEVNET), Mr. Daniel Barrios expressed his gratitude towards iDT for the data analysis that was widely used by the jury to accurately review the nominees and decided on the final winners for 2010 Digital Media Merit Award Asia. Mr. Daniel Barrios has said that he hoped the future will hold more opportunities for cooperation between iDT and DEVNET as ¡§the development of digital media is reaching beyond its peak because of the reliance on social media by the modern generation, whether for work, leisure or social networking¡¨.
General Manager of DT Communications Asia Pacific Miss Alice Fok Ka-yee (Huo Jiayi) also highlighted the desire for future cooperation and said: "I am grateful to the International Development Information Network Association (DEVNET) and their partners such as United Nations for this cooperation experience, where we both worked on development, promotion and popularization of digital media in Asia and positioning it as the world leader in digital media development. Many Chinese and International companies were awarded or invited to attend, including American Express, MasterCard, Ctrip.com, Harbour City Estates Limited (of The Wharf (Holdings) Limited), Huawei, HC E-Commerce and other well-known companies that have fully proven the success of the congress hosted by International Development Information Network Association (DEVNET)."Research Consultant of iDT, Mr. Gary Tong Chi-wa (Tang Zhihua) said: "With booming popularity of the Internet, dissemination of information on both the depth and breadth will develop more rapidly. In this era, besides iDT - our existing comprehensive digital monitoring and analysis platform, we are taking the initiative to research more information on market value, together with developing integrated unified communications platforms, aiming to start a new page in Digital Marketing. "iDT set up a special research team with International Development Information Network Association (DEVNET) to analyze many of Asia's most influential digital media companies and its campaigns. One unique element of iDT is its ability to track and monitor the entire progression and results of different social media campaigns, therefore offering effective solutions for monitoring marketing efforts and spendings. This particular tracking aspect of iDT has helped organizers and judges of 2010 Digital Media Merit Award Asia better evaluate and reflect the latest trends in the digital media sector.
- END - "Devnet, which was entrusted by the United Nations Development Programme with the implementation and execution of the Technological and Trade Information Promotion System (TIPS), has played a significant role, both at the technical and practical levels, in the support of developing countries by promoting the exchange of technological, business and investment information and fostering this way their inclusion and participation in the regional and international economies" -- Boutros Boutros-Ghali (former United Nations General Secretary)
About iDT
iDT, the premier digital media monitoring and research platform is a subsidiary under DT Communications Asia Pacific (DT Asia). iDT provides data mining and analysis for clients on various digital media channels in Asia. iDT¡¦s 4 steps of iTrendz, iAnalyz, iTeamz and iExplorz use scientific techniques in gathering, analyzing, monitoring and evaluating digital data that allow clients to effectively strategize measure and manage their marketing efforts. http://www.dt-asia.com

description.hltext_display: 百冠王的骄傲，我的骄傲(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
“骄傲”一词在某种程度上并不算一个贬义词，前提是你得有值得炫耀的资本。
樊少华vs张航琪 - 爱是你我的骄傲 Dj (2010-12-20)
身为亚运会微笑姐妹花的专属摄影师，我骄傲 多图 (2010-12-11)
不要拿无知当资本，拿无耻当骄傲 (2010-11-21)
陆风百冠王，太给力了(图) (2010-11-17)
陆风车队百冠王战车解密(图) (2010-11-17)
《李宇春》无线实体双冠王 周六签售谢歌迷 图 (2010-01-20)
对于陆风来说，它恰恰就拥有这样的资本，而且分量很足，那就是“百冠王”的荣誉。
短短9年时间，陆风车队便获得了100个越野赛事的冠军，创造了国内厂商的记录。更重要的是参与这些赛事的车型并不是陆风特制的改装车，陆风不需要这些幌子来撑门面，它拿出来的是实实在在的量产车。这点更为弥足珍贵，它意味着消费者开回家中的正是实至名归的“百冠王”，陆风的车主便是实实在在的“百冠王”的主人
而偶在一年前便有幸成为了“百冠王”的主人!
从当初精挑细选、全方位对比后确定入手X8以后，偶便开始享受起了“百冠”的荣誉生活。这一年来，X8陪我在城市的车流里闲逛过，陪我在险峻的山路上奔跑过，更是陪我在荒凉的野外爬山涉水过。对于它的表现，我只有一句话，那就是非常对得起“百冠王“的称号。
骄傲得从外观说起：霸气的前脸，圆润的PP这些我们都常见，然而X8最迷人的角度便是侧45度角。从这个角度看上去，整车流畅的曲线与高高的姿态完美的展现了出来，并且蕴含着一股蓄势待发的劲道
在公路上时，偶家的X8就是一台暴力机器。迅猛的动力，流畅的加速，行驶中那一阵阵的推背感就是偶的最爱……
对于X8来说，这个世界上没有走不了的路。不得不说陆风“百冠王”的荣誉是实实在在的，而这些荣誉大部分来自于陆风超强的越野能力。扎实的底盘、无敌的通过性已经纯正的越野血统让X8轻松的面对任何复杂的路况
底盘的全貌，干净吧！其实偶刚洗了车。粗壮的传动轴尽收眼底，还有扎实的悬挂结构以及连杆，怪不得这车这能跑呢！
当然让我对X8这么着迷的除了它独树一帜的越野性能以外，精细的做工品质也是很大一个原因。对于一般国产车来说，车身的接缝不均匀，内饰的粗糙，用材的低劣基本上是通病。但X8绝对不是这样，“百冠王”的荣誉同样来自于对细节的追求，不管是材质用料还是做工品质，X8都是绝对的让人满意，让偶开得不仅开心，而且更加的放心。
身为陆风车主，百冠王的骄傲，就是我的骄傲。希望偶们陆风的车主能够多多的互相交流，大家一起分享属于我们共同的骄傲！

description.hltext_display: 山貓持續探底 喬丹霸氣哪去了？
description.content:
不管是當球隊總管，還是當球隊老闆，飛人喬丹總是很容易被打上「不及格」分數。
正式接手夏洛特山貓，山貓老闆喬丹幾乎事必躬親，他經常出現在場邊看球，他習慣去看看球員練球情況，他也經常和球員深談，了解球員的心和球隊情況，他也積極參與經營管理，希望可以改造山貓，把這支上季季後賽第七，第一次嘗到季後賽滋味的菜鳥球隊，提升為聯盟A咖。
對喬丹來說，山貓本季在他總攬下，戰績滑落到9勝19負，東區暫居第12，得分少4分，失分多4分，最近10戰只有3勝，所有的一切都變得很不對勁。
喬丹2001、02年球季擔任華盛頓巫師總管，他為巫師欽定高中狀元前鋒布朗成為巫師隊史的笑話，他極力推薦的「未來賈奈特」邁爾斯，早就不知去向，消失在NBA視線裡，喬丹最終決定自己下海拯救巫師，結果還是失敗收場。
當總管的喬丹不行，可以拿球團老闆的決策與建隊思維不同當藉口，自己當山貓老闆兼總管的喬丹，現在是一點藉口都沒有。
ESPN指出，山貓現在不但失去他們賴以維生的防守與迫使對手失誤、降低投籃命中率，在進攻上山貓也失去上個賽季的爆發力，本季平均每場進攻91.8分，聯盟墊底，排名最後一名，失分97.6，前12名都擠不進去。
進攻乏力，更失去防守強度，喬丹手中經營的球隊跟喬丹當年打球的霸氣、主宰力，全然不同。
山貓昨天輸給巫師，還慘敗33分，山貓教練拉瑞布朗說：「我們一點都不像是一支NBA球隊，我們打得毫無章法，根本就沒有資格打NBA。」
山貓今年季前失去主控費爾頓，全隊宛如失去靈魂，更妙的是，2001年巫師選秀狀元，喬丹欽點的布朗，如今也在山貓陣中，這一組01年選秀會上最令人「驚奇」的組合，現在卻在山貓聯手，球隊也持續探底，向下沈淪，令人不勝唏噓。喬丹想要證明自己是個出色的老闆，他需要努力和突破的困難還很多，路更漫長。

description.hltext_display: 车展刚看过，更纠结了(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
今天和弟弟一家去看广州车展，本来目的是去看科鲁兹的，看完后发现别克展区就在旁边，顺便去看了一下英朗GT，早先弟弟就做了不少功课了，比较的几款车型里就有英朗GT，还有个什么车型的,忘记了，结果现场看下来弟弟又犹豫了，诶~买车难，选车更难！
放些图上来，有懂行的兄弟来说说，买啥好呢~？
科鲁兹1.6T
大气拉风的外型，充满着年轻的气息。
CNNIC正在给员工发放股票，跳槽的心更纠结了 (2009-09-02)
比流行菜园里花泽雷同学更纠结扭曲销魂的牛B发型(图) (2009-05-09)
更纠结的处女座。。。 (2009-04-20)
玩转广州车展，玩转上海通用(图) (2010-12-22)
抢先曝光 广州车展那些让人热血沸腾事儿，不容错(图) (2010-12-22)
车展上的那些精兵猛将(图) (2010-12-22)
《暮光之城3：月食》：在纠结中做出选择(图) (2010-12-22)
一对情侣在当众热吻，哥一纠结就给抓拍了(图) (2010-12-20)
顿悟 记住点位 -写在大盘纠结时， (2010-12-20)
我相信 所有北京人看过这张图都想放声大哭 图 (2010-12-21)
99句互联网上暴强语录 你以前没看过的 第三季 转载 (2010-12-20)
吴宗宪整人 -我看过最搞笑的综艺节目 腹肌抽筋ing Flash (2010-12-17)
幽默不笑话 刚看篇新闻 不感独享 史上最冷最离奇的杀人案 转载 (2010-12-21)
转载一个刚看过的视频 ，高人指点 (2010-11-29)
我刚看完《盗梦空间》，想问问大家，到底什么才是现实，什么才是梦境？ (2010-11-27)
当然喽，外型方面估计个人的标准不一样，不过我弟弟蛮中意小科的，说是有点极品飞车的味道。
英朗GT
外型饱满圆润，流畅的外型略带些儒雅的风范。
这车我比较看好，或许是年龄的关系，略保守些。
科鲁兹讲究全黑内饰，从驾驶侧车门~仪表盘~中控台~手套箱~副驾驶车门一气呵成，这种延伸的设计感和中控的运动感更强。
英朗GT是浅灰色基调，车内大量使用镀铬和拉丝装饰，尤其是中控这一块，闪亮闪亮的，感觉很好看，也很显档次。
科鲁兹的1.6T涡轮增压发动机在同级中算得上是上乘，百公里加速8.7。
感觉因为英朗GT体型更饱满的关系，所以车重是不是会比科鲁兹重一些？假设确实轻一些的话，那么这就将直接影响到加速的效果了，百公里11.9略不给力。
科鲁兹配置有ABS+EBD、弯道控制系统CBC、发动机阻力矩控系统EDC和最高6个安全气囊，还标配了安吉星Onstar全时在线助理，不过缺少了ESC车身电子稳定控制系统，这个系统的具体作用目前还不明确，有懂的兄弟来解释下。
在科鲁兹车上缺失的ESC在英朗GT可是标配，而且英朗GT是第一款配备安吉星系统的中级车型。安吉星借助GPS全球卫星定位系统和无线通信技术，为车主提供“碰撞自动求助”、“紧急救援”、“安全保障”、“导航”、“车况检测”和“全音控免提电话”共六大类14项随车服务，是世界最先进的车载通信服务系统。
写在最后：
同为通用旗下同平台车型，英朗GT和科鲁兹的外形设计走了完全不同的路线，给人感觉英朗GT圆润饱满，科鲁兹刚劲有力，相信这与它们的定位有关，相比科鲁兹的年轻化，英朗GT或许更适合年龄大一点的消费群体吧，有说错的地方还望车友们包涵哈~
多多指教，同事也祝我老弟早日新车入手！

下一贴：长沙车展遭遇百台豪车场外踢馆

description.hltext_display: 去哪儿遭遇“400”欺诈风波 试推控制平台
description.content:
因“400”开头的航空购票电话涉嫌欺诈而深陷 “网络欺诈”漩涡的去哪儿网，昨日（12月21日）有了新回应。该网站联合创始人及总裁庄辰超对《每日经济新闻》记者表示，近日通过和北京市工商局及公安局调查相关投诉资料，可以确认在过去18个月内，有关“400”电话诈骗投诉没有一起是针对去哪儿官方网站的。已有的投诉案例主要是消费者在查询去哪儿网时被一些山寨或者钓鱼网站的私人电话所骗。
庄辰超透露，通过“400欺诈”事件，去哪儿网将出台措施进一步保证消费者消费的安全性。目前，去哪儿网预订机票有关“去哪儿本身对票的真伪不作保障”的提示已取消。
去哪儿网创立于2005年2月，是目前全球最大的中文在线旅行网站之一，专为旅游者提供国内外机票、酒店、度假和签证服务的深度搜索。此前，北京市工商局机场分局接到多起消费者投诉，反映通过网络购买电子机票后无法正常拿到机票。经调查，这些消费者均是通过名叫“去哪儿”的网站搜索到以“400”开头的购票电话，在低价的诱惑下，未经确认便付款。
去哪儿网曾发表声明，工商局提及的投诉发生在今年10月中旬，是由于谷歌对在去哪儿网上投放的广告审查不严，造成欺诈事件的发生。公司已联系消费者，进行全额赔付，同时屏蔽谷歌的机票类广告投放，阻止了“400”电话诈骗的再次发生。
“工商局那儿的投诉是针对消费者使用百度、谷歌等通用搜索网站时，被一些山寨的去哪儿网或钓鱼网站的私人电话所骗。通过此次‘400欺诈’事件，可见问题的本质是搜索引擎究竟应该怎样服务，才能保证消费者的消费安全性。”庄辰超表示，去哪儿网目前正在试运行推出一个类似支付宝的支付流程控制功能的“去哪儿通行证”，消费者使用该通行证预定机票时，资金首先将被冻结，只有代理商给出合法的票号后，公司才会把资金划拨到代理商账号上。此外，公司在12月28号将有大规模的服务升级，同时将推出三项承诺：百分之百保证支付后可以出票；百分之百保证不会加价出票；保证所有的票务真实。

description.hltext_display: Oil above $90 a barrel in Asia as US crude supply drop suggests demand improving
description.content:
TSX , Energy Information Administration , NYSE , U.S. , Asia , SINGAPORE
SINGAPORE - Oil prices rose above US$90 a barrel Wednesday in Asia after a report showed U.S. crude supplies dropped more than expected for a second week, which suggests demand is improving.
Benchmark oil for February delivery was up 19 cents to $90.01 a barrel at late afternoon Singapore time in electronic trading on the New York Mercantile Exchange. The contract rose 45 cents to settle at $89.82 on Tuesday.
The American Petroleum Institute said late Tuesday that crude inventories fell 5.8 million barrels last week while analysts surveyed by Platts, the energy information arm of McGraw-Hill Cos., had forecast a drop of 2.4 million barrels. Inventories of gasoline decreased 2.9 million barrels and distillates rose slightly, the API said.
The Energy Department's Energy Information Administration reports its weekly supply data later Wednesday. The EIA said last week that supplies dropped 9.9 million barrels the previous week, the biggest drop in eight years.
Oil prices, which rose to a two-year high above $90 earlier this month, have been supported by rallying stock markets. Meanwhile, a strengthening U.S. dollar, which makes crude more expensive for investors with other currencies, has weighed on oil.
"A steady-higher stock market continues to provide a major counter against a likely renewed weakening in the euro," Ritterbusch and Associates said in a report. "A choppy, sideways trade could persist through the balance of this year."
In other Nymex trading in January contracts, heating oil rose 0.4 cent to $2.52 a gallon, gasoline futures added 1.5 cents to $2.41 a gallon and natural gas advanced 0.9 cent to $4.07 per 1,000 cubic feet.
In London, Brent crude rose 30 cents to $93.50 a barrel on the ICE Futures exchange.
(TSX:ECA, TSX:IMO, TSX:SU, TSX:HSE, NYSE:BP, NYSE:COP, NYSE:XOM, NYSE:CVX, TSX:CNQ, TSX:TLM, TSX:COS.UN, TSX:CVE)

description.hltext_display: HBO's presentation of The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway will air in the upcoming year
description.content:
Cartoon Network will premiere its new animated series Young Justice on Friday, January 7, 2011 at 7p. Last month the network debuted a Young Justice hour-long special that introduced the series team of super heroes, which is comprised of Robin, Aqualad, Kid Flash, Superboy, Miss Martian and Artemis. Young Justice is produced by Warner Bros. Animation and based on characters from DC Comics. Brandon Vietti (Batman: Under the Red Hood, Superman Doomsday, The Batman) and Greg Weisman (Gargoyles, The Spectacular Spider-Man, W.I.T.C.H.) serve as producers on the series.
MORE KIDS STUFF
CBeebies, BBC's preschool brand, will premiere its new Let's Celebrate series in the US Hispanic market on Christmas Day, Saturday, December 25, at 4p. All this week leading up to the debut of Let's Celebrate, CBeebies will feature its Christmas Special block, daily 11a-1p, featuring holiday-themed episodes of its many preschool series. Then, on Christmas Day, Cbeebies will feature a Christmas marathon, 11a-4p, culminating with the launch of Let's Celebrate. Each episode of Let's Celebrate explores different stories and customs behind religious and cultural festivals as it visits kids and their families in different communities. Festivals featured in the series include, Vaisakhi, Eid-ul-Fitr, Holi, Wesak, Purim, Diwali, Easter, St Patrick's Day, St David's Day, St George's Day, St Andrew's Day and Norouz.
The third season of The Electric Company ( www.pbskidsgo.org/electriccompany ) will launch on Monday, February 7, 2011 on PBS Kids Go! (check local listings). The new season of The Electric Company is comprised of 12 new episodes, which will debut each Monday. Building on the series goal of developing literacy skills, the theme for the new season of The Electric Company is math vocabulary. Additionally, season three will introduce new segments and two new characters Coy Stewart (Are We There Yet?) will play Marcus Barnes, who inherits a math superpower, and Carly Sonenclar (Les Miserables) will play Gilda Flip, a prankster in training. Also, special guest appearances this season include Alan Cumming, Benji and Joel Madden (Good Charlotte), music producer/rapper Swizz Beats, comedians Jenny Slate and Sherrod Small, and Wyatt Cenac (The Daily Show), as well as music's Doug E. Fresh.
HBO will debut the new HBO presentation The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway in 2011. HBO will record the special presentation of the current Broadway show at the Stephen Sondheim Theatre in NYC, following its run that ends January 2, 2011. While not specifically targeted to kids, The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway, like the Paul Reubens' Pee-wee's Playhouse TV series, works on many levels for different age groups. Reubens' first Pee-Wee Herman special debuted three decades ago. The new special, like the first, will be directed by Marty Callner, who has directed a range of HBO comedy specials. Reubens is also working with writer/director/producer Judd Apatow to develop a new Pee-Wee feature film.
MTV Networks International inks deals in Latin America for Nickelodeon's series True Jackson, VP. Channels acquiring the live-action comedy include UCV TV (Chile) takes season one of the series, with Monte Carlo TV (Uruguay) picking up the first 25 episodes. TeleTica (Costa Rica) signs on for additional episodes of True Jackson, VP (episodes 114-125 from season 1 and episodes 201-210 from season 2). Viewers of Venevision (Venezuela) and Teleamazonas (Ecuador) will be able to watch the series on the new Nickelodeon blocks that will be featured on those channels under newly complete deals.
DHX Media is launching a new iPad app based on its CBeebies TV series Grandpa in My Pocket. The new Grandpa in my Pocket: Horatio Heave Ho! eBook app will be available initially in the UK via UK iTunes, and will rollout later in other territories. The app will be available for iPhone and iPod Touch in spring 2011. Narrated by Jason Mason, the ebook features Horatio Heave Ho!, the Sunnysands Bank Manager that really wants to be a pirate. When he decides to search for treasure at the beach, Grandpa dons his shrinking cap to help teach him there's more to life than treasure. The app includes features such as tapping the little Grandpa on each page to make him run and then try to catch him and make him sparkle, tap Horatio and play pirate, and take part in the word and actions of the pirate song. The Grandpa in My Pocket TV series can be seen around the world and is produced with participation from Finance Wales and produced by Adastra Creative.
Spain's Zinkia Entertainment is releasing its second Pocoyo app, Coloring with Pocoyo and Friends, worldwide specifically for the iPad but also available for the iPhone and iPod Touch. The app can be purchased and downloaded in English and Spanish. New coloring pages will be available on demand via the app. Downloading the app provides the user with seven days premium access to the Premium Club at pocoyoworld.com ( www.pocoyoworld.com ), Pocoyo's virtual world online destination. The app is based on the Pocoyo CGI animated preschool TV series, which is co-produced by Zinkia and ITV Studios Global Entertainment. Bandai America, the master toy licensee for the property in the US and Canada, recently released a line of Pocoyo toys. The series airs in the US on the Nick Jr. channel, PBS, Univision and Discovery Familia.
Program Call: Cynopsis Media will be producing our annual NATPE Shopping Guide sent to all Cynopsis and Cynopsis Kids subscribers on Thursday, January 20, the week before NATPE 2011 in Miami. If you would like to have your programming included, please send us only the following info for your top 5 shows: title, availability date, number of episodes, length, type (i.e., movie, series, special, etc.), genre and your terms (barter, cash, etc.) as well as your company's stand/booth location. To be included in this free and highly-viewed special edition, please send your submission to lisa@cynopsis.com no later than Friday, January 14, 2011. A confirmation email will be sent following each submission from Lisa (if you don't receive a confirmation email, please resubmit).

description.hltext_display: Two killed after inhaling gas at Dr Reddy's Lab in Hyderabad
description.content:
Two workers of the drug firm Dr Reddy's Laboratories lost their lives and two others fell unconscious in an accidental gas leak this morning at its manufacturing plant at Bollaram on the outskirts of Hyderabad. "Only after examination by the medical experts, we can know the name of the chemical which leaked," police said adding further details were awaited.
In a statement, Dr Reddy's Laboratories said an employee of the company and a contract staff had died in the accident. "The authorities are currently investigating the unfortunate deaths of an employee and a contract staff working at our manufacturing facility in Bollaram, Hyderabad," it said. "No other persons were injured. We will advise on further details once the investigations are complete," the company's statement added. The firm's Bollaram manufacturing facility produces active pharmaceutical ingredients (API).
Police said the victims at the company's facility that is located in Medak district of Andhra Pradesh were on night duty.
There was a chemical leakage from a unit at Bollaram village of Dr Reddy's Laboratories which resulted in two deaths and two falling ill, it said.
Reacting to the news, shares of Dr Reddy's tanked 4.13% to a month-low of Rs1,618 per piece on the Bombay Stock Exchange in early morning trade.
The scrip saw a similar fall on the National Stock Exchange, and quoted at Rs1,616.10, down 4.18% in the morning session.

description.hltext_display: SBL拚好球 國父搭公車代言
description.content:
圖╱ESPN提供
第八季SBL超籃 (2010-2011年)本周六12月25日在北縣新莊體育館開打，衛冕裕隆將迎戰上季奪冠失手達欣，為新球季揭開序幕。今年SBL最特別的行銷手法是請出國父孫中山代言，讓國父坐著公車車廂和捷運廣告，台北縣市滿街跑。
打「國父牌」，迎建國百年，請孫中山先生手持籃球，換上籃球鞋，坐上捷運和現代化公車，在台北縣市、地上地下、人潮洶潮的街頭宣傳SBL賽事和籃球，請所有籃球迷和非籃球迷一起享受SBL，百年看好球，讓今年SBL季前的宣傳充滿新鮮感。
為了讓今年SBL賽季有耳目一新的感覺，中華籃協和轉播單位ESPN都盡力表演。
ESPN部分除了在頻道上不斷倒數、放送SBL精華影片和球星魅力，今年球季特別把SBL宣傳、形象、廣告打上公車車廂，在兩大主場館台北體育館、新莊體育館的公車沿線，請國父幫忙大肆宣傳SBL精采賽事。
在大眾運輸工具上進行視覺設計創意，是SBL七年來最大突破行銷手法，民眾可以在包括46、232、262、299、306等五路行駛新莊體育館沿線、台北體育館沿線公車車體上，看見熟悉的國父銅像，只是這個熱愛籃球的國父，右手多抓了顆籃球，雙腳也換上帥氣運動球鞋。
ESPN為了賽事轉播與行銷大打創意牌，中華籃協也全力整頓過去七季幾近失落的SBL攻守數據。在中華籃協官網上，已經開始提供SBL相關攻守紀錄資訊和新聞（http://www.basketball-tpe.org/front/bin/ptlist.phtml?Category=326093）對球迷無疑是更大的福音。
SBL本周開幕戰在周六晚上七時上檔，下午4時30分由璞園迎戰台灣大，同日下午三時起進行三場比賽，ESPN、愛爾達體育台直播。
有國父加持，今年失去李學林、陳信安、林志傑和曾文鼎四大球星的SBL，希望可以挽救收視和票房。

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content: Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce. The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought."If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun."As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam."We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement."I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.; Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?

description.hltext_display: 张朝阳：搜狐微博用户数曾“不堪入目”
description.content:
微博的娱乐基因
“搜狐有搜狐的基因，在这个土壤上成长出的微博跟新浪是不同的。我们还是坚持名人战略不变，先从娱乐入手。”
在娱乐圈深耕已久的搜狐，正在微博上尝试一条差异化道路，领路人是和两岸文娱名人打成一片的 “狐总”张朝阳。
从11月份开始，搜狐CEO张朝阳亲自上阵拉人的报道频频见诸报端，赵本山、孙红雷、李连杰、安以轩等好友在他的召唤下纷纷开通搜狐微博。11月中旬，张朝阳登门拜访了上海海派清口演员周立波，并成功邀请到对方入驻。
目前看来，两人的关系不错。12月20日，张朝阳特地赶到上海参加了周的婚礼，给足面子。明星云集的婚礼过后，搜狐微博又迎来了主持界的“常青树”敬一丹。
“是崔永元把敬一丹拉过来的，他跟她宣传我们，教她怎么用。这就是‘群体效应’，通过名人间的互动，把用户量迅速拉上去。”
张朝阳透露，从11月至今的一个多月内，搜狐微博的用户量已经翻了三番，但他没有透露其他数据。“能翻三番是因为本身的基数还比较小。最开始的时候用户数字‘不堪入目’，接下来就看发展态势了。”
开放平台并非必须
张朝阳说，在整天泡在微博的这段时间，对其独特生长形态的认识又多了一些。

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks: Bangladeshi security force accused of rights abuse
description.author: Raman Iyer
description.content:
London, Dec 22 - A leaked US diplomatic cable has mentioned "alleged human rights violations" by a Bangladeshi paramilitary force, the Rapid Action Battalion (RAB), that Britain has trained.
The Guardian, citing US diplomatic cables put out by WikiLeaks, reported that the British government has been training RAB which has been termed by human rights organisations as a "government death squad".
RAB personnel have received British training in "investigative interviewing techniques" and "rules of engagement", the media report said.
A cable said that the US would not offer any assistance other than human rights training to the RAB.
The US ambassador said in the cables that the US government is "constrained by RAB's alleged human rights violations, which have rendered the organisation ineligible to receive training or assistance" under laws which prohibit American funding or training for overseas military units which abuse human rights with impunity.
Some human rights activists have alleged that since the RAB was established six years ago it has been responsible for more than 1,000 extra-judicial killings. In September last year, the RAB director general said his men had killed 577 people in "cross-fire". In March this year he updated the figure, saying they had killed 622 people.
However, the cables also state that both the British and the Americans were in favour of bolstering the force and argued that the "RAB enjoys a great deal of respect and admiration from a population scarred by decreasing law and order over the last decade".
The US ambassador to Dhaka, James Moriarty, in a cable said that the RAB is the "enforcement organisation best positioned to one day become a Bangladeshi version of the US Federal Bureau of Investigation".
In another cable, Moriarty quotes British officials as saying they have been "training RAB for 18 months in areas such as investigative interviewing techniques and rules of engagement". (IANS)

description.hltext_display: 58同城完成第三轮融资 融资额超6000万美元
description.content:
继网络视频和电子商务纷纷上市之后，信息分类网站越来越受风投们青睐。昨天，国内分类信息网站58同城创始人兼CEO姚劲波(微博)发出邮件透露，58同城宣布完成了第三轮融资，融资金额是此前两轮融资总和的4倍，据推算,这笔融资金额超过6000万美元。
据悉，58同城此轮融资由美国著名的投资机构华平投资集团(WarburgPincus)领投，华平将持有58同城超过30%的股权。同时，58同城还和华平、赛富、DCM等投资人拟定了未来两年内再投入1亿美元的框架协议，确保公司成为分类信息领域的领导者。
姚劲波透露，此轮融资中他个人也跟投了500万美元，且保留了再次投资的权利，目的是确保创始人和管理层最大股东位置，确保公司发展的方向和节奏。
对于质疑58同城融资是因为面临资金压力，姚劲波回应称，虽然公司尚未实现盈利，但现金流状况良好，毫无资金压力。融资用途方面，姚劲波表示，本轮融资的成功将进一步巩固58同城长期为客户提供免费服务的信心，将在人才引进和市场推广方面加大投入力度，同时加强宣传。

description.hltext_display: Schwarzenegger holt mit virtuellem Marstrip bis zu 5,3 % Marktanteil für TELE 5
description.content:
292271 PresseMitteilungen online
Über firmenpresse| Mobile | Google News | Twitter | Presseportal | Werbung / Mediadaten | Statistiken | Kontakt | Sitemap | Impressum
PresseMitteilungen/ Medien und Unterhaltung vorherige PM| nächste PM
PresseMitteilung von Tele 5
(ots) - 4,3 % MA bei 14-49 für 'Total Recall - Die totale
Erinnerung'
5,3 % MA in der "TELE 5-Zielgruppe" der 35 bis 65-Jährigen
Schwarzenegger fährt in seiner Spitzenrolle auch Spitzenwerte für
den Sender ein
Er kann eben nur in Superlativen: Arnold Schwarzenegger hat es zum
Gouverneur Kaliforniens gebracht. Bei TELE 5 war er gestern in einer
seiner Paraderollen zu sehen und lief auch hier zu Höchstleistungen
auf.
Um sich den sehnlichen Wunsch zu erfüllen, den Mars zu besuchen,
lässt sich ein Bauarbeiter ein Hirnimplantat einpflanzen, das ihm die
Erinnerung an den Ausflug dorthin suggeriert. Es entwickelt jedoch
ein Eigenleben und Realität und Fiktion verschmelzen zu einem
Horrortrip. 'Total Recall - Die totale Erinnerung' ist ein
Sci-Fi-Thriller, den die erwachsenen Zuschauer sich nicht entgehen
lassen wollten: 4,33 % Marktanteil bei den 14 bis 49-jährigen
Zuschauern gab es für Arnie. Noch besser sah es bei der Zielgruppe
der 35 bis 65-Jährigen aus. Hier blieben 5,3 % bis zum Schluss vor
dem Bildschirm.
Der Anschlussfilm 'Invincible - Die Krieger des Lichts' setzte den
Trend noch fort. 4,9 % erreichte das Fantasy-Abenteuer bei den 14 bis
49-Jährigen, und sogar 5,5 % in der TELE 5-Zielgruppe 35 bis 65
Jahre.
Bereits um 20.15 Uhr hatte Sylvester Stallone in seinem ersten
Rocky-Abenteuer 1,8 % Marktanteil bei den 14-49-Jährigen erzielt und
rundete den Tagesmarktanteil in der Zielgruppe der 14- bis
49-Jährigen wie auch der TELE 5-Zielgruppe 35 bis 65 Jahre auf 1,7 %
ab.
(Quelle: AGF/GfK-Fernsehforschung; TV Scope, Fernsehp.(D+EU),
personengewichtet, zeitversetzte Nutzung: produktbezogen (r,v,z),
vorläufig gewichtet), Zuschauer 14-49 Jahre, sofern nicht anders
angegeben)
Informationen und Bilder zum Programm auch unter www.tele5.de in
der Presselounge

description.hltext_display: Leonard Cohen inspires scalping law
description.content:
TORONTO (Hollywood Reporter) - Canada’s most populous province is cracking down on scalpers, passing a new law that forbids Ticketmaster and other ticket vendors from selling and reselling seats to the same sporting and entertainment events in Ontario through related websites.
The Ticket Speculation Act aims to stop Ticketmaster from overcharging on event tickets purchased on resale sites.
Ontario first took Ticketmaster to task in April 2009 when Leonard Cohen fans complained that tickets to his Canadian concerts were being sold at inflated prices through a Ticketmaster subsidiary, TicketsNow.
Provincial attorney general Chris Bentley complained that sellers were taking tickets for Ontario events available on the primary market and were reselling them on the secondary market at inflated prices. The new Ontario law means anyone caught selling tickets at above their face value can now be slapped with fines.

description.hltext_display: Breaking News: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: 送蠻牛1盤聖誕禮 費德勒義賽搶頭彩
description.content:
雖是慈善表演賽，不過，當今網壇兩大天王納達爾與費德勒，還是貢獻給網球迷一場最精采的比賽，特別當被問及第一盤是否放水時，費德勒說，「其實不是，每次和納達爾的比賽都是艱難的。」
這場「為非洲而戰」網球賽，於今天凌晨在瑞士蘇黎士舉行，當今「球王」納達爾與世界排名第二的費德勒，兩人延續今年競爭的戰火，在場上揮汗賣力演出，身為地主的費德勒，最終以4：6、6：3、6：3拉下「西班牙蠻牛」。
這一場比賽結果，使得費德勒今年與納達爾交手以2勝1負領先，今年先前兩人在馬德里名人賽及年終男網賽，各有一次勝利，不過，納達爾可以尋求台北時間明天凌晨在西班牙馬德里的第二場義賽，來扳回一城。
今天在瑞士的比賽，費德勒賽前曾開玩笑說過，「要先讓一盤給納達爾做為耶誕節禮物。」果然第一盤就被納達爾所拿下，然而賽後費德勒說，「看起來雖好像我在送禮，但其實打得很辛苦。」
不過，費德勒還是說，「這是一場很特殊的比賽，我會永遠記住，我很驕傲及高興，我們做到了這些。」這場比賽現場1萬500張門票，早在9月就銷售一空，而今天比賽也有瑞士運動明星協助募款，預計希望募到100萬美元，幫助非洲貧苦兒童。
納達爾則說，「這是一次令人難忘的經驗，很高興能參與其中。」他並說，「即使我們兩人擁有生活上的一切，但我們時時刻刻都要想到那些生活陷入困難的人。」

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Snow heroes of North Wales battle big freeze
description.content:
Uwchaled first responders help an OAP in the snow
A NURSE walked nearly nine miles in blizzard conditions to work his hospital shift in one of hundreds of acts of dedication and kindness to beat the snow and ice.
Chest ward nurse Tom Gash trudged in the snow from the village of Llangoed on Anglesey to Ysbyty Gwynedd in Bangor as roads were closed after the island was hit by eight inches of snow.
In another act of resilience coastguard officers went on a 100-mile round trip from Ceredigion to take a doctor from Ysbyty Bronglais, Aberystwyth, to Dolgellau so he could work an out-of-hours shift.
On Anglesey care home workers slept at work for an entire weekend to ensure they would not miss their shifts.
In Conwy first responders from the Cerrigydrudion and Pentrefoelas area came to the aid of elderly people trapped in their homes because of snow.
A Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Trust spokesman said: "The dedication of Tom Gash is a wonderful example of the commitment shown by staff to get to work over the past few days.
"We want to thank Tom and all the staff for their commitment and thank all those who have helped get our staff into work with 4x4 vehicles. We had 18 members of the public volunteer their vehicles and had support from the coastguard, Red Cross and mountain rescue services. These have helped dozens of staff reach work.”
As well as dealing with emergency calls, first responders in the Uwchaled area of the Conwy Valley sprang into action after becoming concerned for vulnerable people.
Tomos Hughes, team coordinator, said: "Through our work with the ambulance service we are well aware of the vulnerable people living in the community. On Saturday morning four of the team toured round Cerrig and Pentrefoelas to check on people and make sure they could get out of their homes. We spent the day clearing snow.”
The teams also responded to five emergency calls over the weekend using a 4x4 to reach homes. They were planning to go out again last night to help residents after further snow.
Five care staff at Garreglwyd residential home in Holyhead stayed at work for more than 70 hours to help look after pensioners over fears they would not be able to get back to work if they went home.
Kathy Williams, Susan Morris, Elen Owen, Carol Williams and Velia Tucker all sacrificed their weekends for the elderly residents.
Rona Humphreys, manager of the council-run home, said: "They have shown dedication beyond the call of duty and we are very grateful.
"The elderly people here will not know the dedication shown by staff as they just know that they are here to start their shifts. We are very grateful to them for what they have done.”
Staff at Plas Crigyll, Bryngwran, Haulfre in Llangoed, and Plas Mona in Llanfair have also been commended for their commitment after a number of staff worked 24 hour shifts.
Meanwhile Anglesey Council's building maintenance unit have responded to record levels of emergency calls to heating system breakdowns. They had 150 calls over 12 hours on Monday – and responded to every call.
In Gwynedd, home carer Brenda Evans has been using a tractor to reach clients on the Llyn Peninsula.

It converts files and create shortcut menus for USB flash drives. To handle single and massive download with download managers, a freeware tool FlashGot designed. Task coach is a simple freeware tool designed to deal personal tasks and to-do lists. Inscriptio a popular recording solution is a fast and reliable CD and DVD recording tool. This handy application used to save all the collections of music, movies, games and documents safety on DVDs or CDs. For dual-layer DVD it supports drag and drop features. Sweet Home 3D is a freeware tool used to design interior application with a 3D preview. Furniture of 50 pieces comes with Sweet Home 3D.

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
description.content:
For a few weeks this month, Los Angeles' arugula-munching set confronted a threat that seemed as potent as any malicious insect, pathogen or pesticide-tainted produce.
Where would they get their lovingly grown, locally sourced fruits, vegetables and artisanal edibles if a parking dispute with an adjacent film school forced the Hollywood Farmers Market to move or close?
The Los Angeles Film School, which has held classes in its nine-story Sunset Boulevard building since 1999, had refused to sign off on a permit for the Sunday farmers market because it blocks an entryway into a lot where the school's growing number of students park.
At the root of the conflict were some of the city's sacred mainstays: deep agricultural ties, the entertainment business and a lack of parking in a town dominated by cars.
Even as a temporary accord last week put the threat on hold, the foodie furor offered a peek at how dependent some have become on the Hollywood market, among the largest in the region, and the smaller markets it supports in low-income communities.
While consumer demand has encouraged farmers markets to sprout like Portobello mushrooms across the U.S., the attachment to just-picked produce and those who grow it appears particularly intense in Los Angeles, seated in a county that less than a century ago was the nation's leading agricultural producer.
"When you're talking about growers and shoppers being able to complete the exchange directly, it has a lot of resonance," cookbook author and food writer Amelia Saltsman said.
The Los Angeles Film School recently added computer animation and video game production to its curricula of film and recording arts, more than doubling the size of its student body from 750 to 1,700, spokesman Antoine Ibrahim said.
The growing population has increased demand for parking spots on Sundays, when throngs of students flood the school's labs and studios, Ibrahim said. The school also plans to begin holding classes on Sundays to relieve increasing weekday class sizes, he said.
Ibrahim insisted that the school never meant for the market to be shut down. It just wanted the vendors blocking the lot to be shifted to another part of the market.
"We've always worked with them to compromise and coexist," Ibrahim said. "We don't want them to move."
But the nonprofit Sustainable Economic Enterprises of Los Angeles, which organizes the market, said the configuration being pushed by the school meant it would lose half of its 100 farmers because there wouldn't be enough space for their stalls.
Shoppers say that would diminish their experience and make them less likely to schlep from far-flung neighborhoods to the produce bazaar that draws some 10,000 customers each weekend.
"It's really sad if they were to have to close or reduce the size," said Vanessa Lee, 27, who journeys from her east Los Angeles home at least once a month to buy apples, peaches or persimmons _ depending on the season _ from the market. "I couldn't imagine losing any of the vendors. They're all great."
Shrinking the market would also hurt SEE-LA's ability to subsidize markets that provide fruits and vegetables to as many 2,200 people each week in poor areas such as Watts and south Los Angeles, manager Alexandra Agajanian said.
"The success of the Hollywood Farmers Market has made it possible for us to do that," SEE-LA chief executive Pompea Smith said. "It really is a well-loved institution."
SEE-LA learned in early November that it was losing its permit because it lacked the school's endorsement, although extensions have kept the market open since then.
As word spread that the market's days were numbered, the dispute drew concern even among those who couldn't see the Hollywood sign.
TV and radio news outlets aired stories. The Los Angeles Times editorialized that "the market must be saved." City Councilman Eric Garcetti, whose district includes the market, received e-mails, calls and office visits from concerned shoppers and constituents.
Word came Thursday evening that a meeting between the market, the school and Garcetti's office had yielded an agreement that would keep the market open until April 12 while its organizers and the film school seek a permanent solution to the parking problem.
The school will look at building another way into the lot. SEE-LA, meanwhile, will hire a planner to see if there's a way to move the stalls to create access into the lot and still fit in all the farmers.
"I think this is a fair approach," Smith said. "As long as it doesn't decrease the connectivity among the blocks of the market and doesn't decrease the number of farmers and doesn't decrease the safety of the market customers, I think it will be fine."
___
(

description.hltext_display: B2C三国混战惊动亚马逊 供应商价格体系失控
description.content:
这是一场充满趣味的大战。
年末，欲搭建B2C百货平台的三位竞争者京东、当当、卓越来了一场价格混战。京东、当当先后穿插进攻对方的优势垂直领域，卓越在被迫加入战团后连启三波价格攻势，辅以微博上诸多口水仗，使得一场以营销为目的的比拼，混入了偷袭、挑衅、封杀、报复等诸多元素，让原本就“资本躁动”的B2C业更显热闹。
尽管京东被认为占便宜最多，但这是一场没有输家的战争。在共享巨大公关价值的同时，一场长期战役也正式全面展开。
价格战喧嚣
12月20日傍晚17时30分，卓越亚马逊总裁王汉华从会议中匆匆抽身与《每日经济新闻》记者会面。数小时前，他们刚扣动了年末B2C行业最大促销战的扳机。
卓越亚马逊宣布，斥资1亿元进行史无前例的大规模让利，28大类商品均参与此次促销活动。在价格战“重灾区”图书领域，卓越宣布图书全场消费满100元返20元无限制图书券，还推出了全场近10万种少儿图书5折封顶特促活动。
“价格战显然是不健康的，但我们没有选择，不得不跟进。”王汉华对《每日经济新闻》表示，不然消费者会流失，多年创造的低价形象就会打折扣。
自12月8日起，京东、当当之间的图书价格屠杀战已延续近10多日。14日，在开战一周后，卓越就已坐不住了，开始了跟进降价。周一动用1亿资金继续扩大战线，已是他们的第三波动作。
京东开战，当当反击，卓越跟进，至此中国综合B2C商城三大巨头均卷入不断升级的战团。

description.hltext_display: 衣服就是一种高明的汽车，汽车就是一种高明的的服装，即兴创作进行时(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
吼，吼，吼。。。。期待已久的广州车展，总算是不枉我蓄谋已久了，终于见证了开幕式。
九友访即兴 (2010-09-23)
……冯小刚痛斥娱乐圈，张砚钧即兴作漫画 (2010-09-22)
即兴而记-贺鹧鸪园闭幕 (2010-07-01)
生平史实即兴记小令5 (2010-04-14)
即兴小令 (2010-04-12)
。。
不同品牌，不同款型的车以最闪耀的方式展现，如那五彩绚烂的烟花，让人眼花缭乱，亭亭玉立的车模更是争相斗艳，与车交相辉映。。。嘿嘿。。。
台湾意识形态广告公司曾经为中兴百货做过一个很经典的广告，衣服就是一种高明的政治，政治就是一种高明的服装。其实，个人认为，衣服就是一种高明的汽车，汽车就是一种高明的的服装。 嘿嘿，今天很兴奋，小意识流一下，大家可以当作浮云。。。。。。
迈腾，是西服，是精致的，是有形的，是一丝不苟的；
帕萨特，是中山装，是正统的，是老派的，是非常严肃的；
君威，是休闲装，是前卫的，是时髦的， 是拉风的；
捷达，是工作服，是版版的，是厚厚的，是经脏的。
C5，是燕尾服，是优雅的，是绅士的，是不拘一格的。
C5的外形大气、优雅、还有点小神秘和梦幻。。。
很兴奋，狂拍ING………..
看内饰做工精致，车内大部分表面做了蒙皮处理，并且恰到好处的应用了镀铬件处理，显得比较有档次，这才像一位优雅的绅士（当然，优雅的绅士肯定要配得上的高雅的女士的，那些的胭脂水粉庸俗不堪）
仪表台上的塑料装饰片淘汰了业界广泛使用的仿桃木风格，让人觉得更舒服，视觉效果和旁边的这气质更是符合。。。。
c5的多功能方向盘做工厚实、精致，手感不错，不知道驾驶起来手感如何，会不会比较舒服，那么到位？

地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2088070c10p1.html

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Tributes paid to young boys found dead in Trawsfynydd house
description.content:
Police at the Trawsfynydd house where the bodies of a woman and two children were found
TWO young boys found dead in their bedrooms were murdered, a senior detective said last night.
The bodies of Philip Stevens, five, and his brother Isaak, two, were found after police officers forced their way into the house in Trawsfynydd.
Their mum, Melanie Stevens, 36, was found hanging in the bedroom.
Detective Chief Inspector John Hanson said Ms Stevens’ death is not being treated as suspicious.
Officers were sent to Ty Capel in Trawsfynydd at around 8pm on Sunday after calls from frantic family members unable to get into the house.
Mr Hanson said: "We are conducting forensic examination of the home address in Trawsfynydd and are keen to establish what has happened at the address not just on Saturday and Sunday but in the weeks leading up to the incident.
"The two boys were murdered having been found suffocated at the address. The mother was found hanging in the bedroom.”
He said police were not looking for anyone else in connection with the deaths.
He added family liaison officers are working closely with other family members and contact has been made with victim support groups.
Yesterday flowers were laid outside the house where the family had lived for about 18 months as villagers tried to come to terms with the tragedy.
One said: "This is dreadful. Death is tragic at any time of year but being Christmas makes it more poignant.
"Rest in peace little ones, and mother too.”
Philip, known as Pip, attended primary school at Ysgol Edmwnd Prys three miles away in Gellilydan and was well liked by other pupils.
Isaak, called Zak by his family, would often be carried by his mum in a harness around the village.
Ms Stevens’ ex-husband, Peter Akister, 41, who lives in Penrhyndeudraeth, said: "This is just a terrible thing. My main concern now is for the children who have been left behind without a mother.”
The couple, who married in 1996, had three children – Rebekah, 16, Adam, 14 and Ryan, 12, before they split up and divorced.
The father of the two dead children has not been identified but is believed to live in the Midlands.
Ms Stevens, who was brought up in Blaenau Ffestiniog and went to secondary schools in the former slate quarrying town and Harlech, had lived in the Wolverhampton area until early last year when she and her young children moved to Trawsfynydd.
Writing on a social networking website Vicky Anthony, who was at Ysgol Ardudwy, Harlech with Ms Stevens, said simply: "RIP Melanie and your two children.”
Another school friend, Sarah Laura Jones, said: "She was always smiling.”
Adding her comments another friend, Awen Tudor, said: "Such a shame.”
Sarah Crowley said: "I remember Melanie. We used to go to the Sundancer (nightclub in Barmouth) together. How very sad.”
North west Wales coroner, Dewi Pritchard Jones said inquests would be opened and adjourned to a later date as soon as possible.

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Robbery at mid Wales building society
description.content:
DETECTIVES in mid Wales are hunting robbers who stole cash from a building society late on Monday evening.
Police at Newtown were alerted to the robbery at the Nationwide Building Society in the High Street, Newtown shortly after 10pm.
A Dyfed Powys Police spokeswoman said: "Shortly after 10pm two men wearing reflective jackets attacked security staff making a delivery to the premises and smashed the front door with a sledge hammer.Š
"Access was gained to the ATM machine and a large amount of cash was taken.Š
"The offenders quickly left the scene and got into a vehicle before driving away at speed.”
No one was injured in the incident.
Yesterday morning an area on the town’s High St was cordoned off as forensic experts swept the scene.
Uniformed officers were making door to door enquiries in the area and are studying footage taken from CCTV cameras in the area.
Dyfed Powys Police have also issued an appeal for anyone with information about the incident to contact detectives.
"Police would like to speak to any person who was in the High St area at the time or who saw any suspicious activity,” the spokeswoman added.
ANYONE with information about the incident should contact Newtown CID on 0845 330 2000 or Crimestoppers Cymru, anonymously and in confidence, on 0800 555 111.

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: 1,700 census jobs up for grabs in North Wales
description.content:
1,700 census jobs up for grabs in 2011
A DECADE ago, Wales’ biggest employer was the manufacturing industry.
According to statistics from the 2001 census, almost one in six (17.3%) of residents were employed in manufacturing.
Ten years ago, other popular industries for Wales’ workers were repairing motor vehicles and working in the wholesale and retail trade (16.3%), education (8.1%) and health and social work (13%). The least popular jobs in Wales included mining and quarrying (0.33%) and fishing (0.03%)
On March 27 next year, this snapshot of working life will be updated, as the 2011 Census takes place.
The Office for National Statistics (ONS) is recruiting 1,700 people in Wales to carry out the census locally.
People can apply for a range of full and part time roles by visiting www.censusjobs.co.uk.
Census area manager for the Isle of Anglesey and Gwynedd, Mici Jones, said: "I hope people will continue to apply for the 1,700 local census jobs available to help us capture these changes.
"These jobs offer local people a chance to earn some extra cash and get involved in an important project that will benefit their community.”

description.hltext_display: 雷恩失球 全法甲最少
description.content:
今日推薦：康城vs.雷恩──小分、艾文農vs.尼斯──小分
經過今天的法國甲級聯賽九場比賽後，歐洲五大聯賽除了英超外，將進入冬歇期（即放寒假），要到一月初才陸續恢復，希望在今天的推薦，能在冬歇期前幫到大家。
雖然今天的比賽還有德國盃、西班牙國王盃等比賽，但戰意難明，還是推薦法甲會比較好。
今天推薦兩場的法甲都會開出小分的比賽，首先介紹的是由康城對雷恩。康城本賽季表現相當差，已十一場比賽未能取勝，目前只得15分排在第十八位，雖然本賽季只獲得三場勝仗，但有趣的是，他們當中曾擊敗了冠軍級的球隊里昂與馬賽。不過他們最近三場比賽卻一球未進。
至於雷恩，表現平穩，目前以31分排在第三位，僅以球差比不上第一與第二名。不過雷恩有兩個特別，一是主強客弱明顯，其二是守強攻弱，最近五場比賽只進了兩球，而失球卻是全法甲最低的，預計本場比賽雷恩應可小勝對手，但預防和局的出現，還是選擇小分會較好。
另一場比賽由艾文農對尼斯，艾文農是升級球隊，實力與法甲有一段距離，目前只得1勝4和13負的成績敬陪末席，並且只得10個進球，至於排在第十四位的尼斯也好不到那裡，作客也只曾一勝的他們，進球能力同樣不佳，本場也看好小分。

description.hltext_display: 转 山城本溪连续两场暴雪后EMT1.4优逸的表现让我吃惊(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
从开始漫无边际的看，到选车、比较，今年7月底终于买了OO1.4EMT优逸。
转 ：工科毕业男爆料HP金牌服务(图) (2010-12-22)
2010款新景程在雪天发生的故障 转(图) (2010-12-22)
玩转广州车展，玩转上海通用(图) (2010-12-22)
开酷搏，游车河系列第二弹 高速跑起来(图) (2010-12-22)
转个笑话，郑重提示 女生看一半，男生全看完 转载 (2010-12-21)
请大家把这段话捎给清华博士王进文 转自老马的博客 (2010-12-21)
有了车后，本来不想再看汽车之家了，但已经养成了习惯，每天工作之余，下意识地打开网页，看看论坛。也是想看看别人的经验、体会，尤其想看看遇到问题的处理。本来这种浏览方式想一直这样下去，但连续两场暴雪，EMT的惊人表现，让我不得不说几句。
我居住在山城本溪（辽宁省），去过的朋友都知道城市依山而建，到处是坡路、弯道，而且不是一般的“陡”和“弯”，有老师傅说“能在本溪开车，到全国各地开都没问题”。尤其是冬天，头一场雪还没化透，第二场雪又来了，路跟“镜子面”似的。当时买OO时，有朋友劝我买个大排量的，说1.4到冬天不行，心里真忐忑，尤其是我没有什么经验。7月底到入冬，天天上下班，接送老婆、孩子，感觉挺好，不少人都说这车样子好看，不像这个价位的车，心里感受挺好。
12月10日、12、13日，本溪连降两场大雪转暴雪，本来不想开车了，尤其我家门口就是一个“大
坡”，担心车到晚上上不来，但孩子太小，早晚高峰不好打车，咬咬牙，开车。
早上还好，顺着坡慢慢下去，自己尝试踩了几下刹车，居然能停住，放心了不少。
最担心的晚上，开到坡下时，犹豫半天，上还是不上，看到有一台起亚赛拉图、一台捷达出租车、一台日产轩逸先后上去了，我也跟着上。前半段坡还行，到后半段4台车全都开始打滑，赛拉图的前轮飞转，车头左右摆动，就是不走道。捷达出租车挺有经验，走“之”字，走了一会儿也不动了，乘客下车，出租车靠边倒着下来。我前面的轩逸，也亮起了倒车灯。我一直踩着刹车，没敢动，原准备靠边倒车，没想到脚刚抬起，车自己缓缓往上开，劲还挺大。我以前开过AT档的车，绝对没
有这么大的劲。
就靠爬行的这个劲，其他车眼睁睁看我一点一点上去了！其实这期间，我只是调整方向，脚既没踩油门，也没踩刹车。上了坡，我的第一个想法就是，把这件事告诉大家。因为晚上黑，没法照相，第二天早上用手机照的。
一些停了几天的车
向好友推荐本贴：
标题：《 》
地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2088125c10p1.html

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: ‘Champs’ to fly flag for tourism in North Wales
description.content:
ONE of North Wales’ biggest office equipment and services firms has appointed a leading document specialist.
Martin Buglass, 39, has joined B2 Business Systems, bringing with him more than 12 years of experience in the industry, including working with global brand leaders.
B2 Business Systems has offices in Deeside and Bangor, and was earlier this year named Concessionaire of the Year by international market leader Xerox.
Martin has previously worked as a business partner of B2, and as part of an expansion plan to enhance its document solutions services he has now joined the company in a permanent role.
B2 Business Systems managing director Paul Rutt said: "We are delighted to welcome Martin to our team. His breadth of experience will be an added benefit to our own operations and those of our customers. He is greatly respected throughout the industry and has an unrivalled grasp of the document solutions needs of businesses of all sizes, across all sectors.”
Martin added: "Document solutions are a key part of the business and my role will be to expand on this, offering customers even more added value, by advising them on how they can work more efficiently and cost-effectively with their documents, centralise company information and better manage the flow of documents.”

event_or_fact.property: We are delighted to welcome Martin to our team.

Document solutions are a key part of the business and my role will be to expand on this, offering customers even more added value, by advising them on how they can work more efficiently and cost-effectively with their documents, centralise company informa

description.hltext_display: 'Fockers' a winning time-waster
description.content:
Stars: Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Teri Polo, Jessica Alba
Time: 1 hour, 38 minutes.
Jack Byrnes and Gaylord Focker are back at each other's throats.
Little Fockers, the latest sequel in a franchise created for those who think a surname like 'Focker' is hilarious, steps up the friction between Robert De Niro as the disapproving father-in-law and Ben Stiller as his accident-prone son-in-law. Resuming their comedy roles are Teri Polo as Stiller's long-suffering wife, Blythe Danner as De Niro's long-suffering wife, Barbra Streisand and Dustin Hoffman as Stiller's parents and Owen Wilson as Stiller's insufferable rich friend.
Along for the ride in this third installment are scene-stealers Jessica Alba as a dippy drug rep and Laura Dern as an enlightened school headmistress; Harvey Keitel turns up in a cameo as a contractor. Add a couple of decent laughs to that hefty cast and you've got a winning time-waster. Stupid, but winning.
Time has passed at the Focker household. Gaylord/Greg (Stiller) has a good job, he and his wife have cute twins, and they're ready to move into a house they've been renovating. The twins' fifth birthday is coming up, which means grandparents and friends will soon be arriving in Chicago.
Before that happens, however, Jack (De Niro) has a minor heart attack and confides only in Greg. The time has come to hand over the role of family patriarch, and Jack thinks Greg would be good in the role. Of course, first Jack will have to test Greg, which is the basis of the story.
Once everyone is in the same place at the same time, Greg's suitability for family leader is scrutinized. Can he carve a turkey? Can he get his kids into the right school? Can he be faithful to his wife? Can he back up a truck without almost killing his father-in-law? Above all, can he get involved in selling a Viagra-like drug in order to add penises to the comedy mix? We'll let you guess.
While Stiller and De Niro duke it out at the centre of the story, the rest of the cast provide some of the better laughs in Little Fockers. Jessica Alba is completely over the top -- and utterly in the spirit of the thing -- in her role as the huggy-happy drug rep from hell. Owen Wilson is in his element as the nonsense-spouting metrosexual man-of-the-world, and Laura Dern will reduce you to tears of laughter with a tiny, perfect performance in which she appears to be channeling Dale Carnegie.
Little Fockers is not everybody's idea of comedy, but fans of the franchise will not be disappointed. Also, watching A-list actors behave like morons is not a bad way to offset the dreadful false cheer of the season.

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Business link vital for tourism firms in mid Wales
description.content:
Business link vital for tourism firms
PARTNERSHIP working to promote the holiday industry was highlighted at the annual meeting of an independent tourism organisation.
Mid Wales Tourism (MWT), based in Machynlleth, has around 500 members covering all sectors of the tourism and hospitality industry in Powys, Ceredigion and Meirionnydd.
Chair Anne Lloyd-Jones said: "A good working relationship with public sector partners is important, providing added value to the work that we do with groups and associations.
"The tourism sector in Wales contributes £3 billion annually to the visitor economy. As a business-led organisation, we are committed to delivering activities which support the growth and development of a strong and sustainable tourism industry in Wales.”
Online marketing is a key part of MWT’s work as the company has invested in an e-business platform. The company also manages two regional websites, a national events website and supports e-commerce services through the award-winning Guestlink system.

event_or_fact.property: A good working relationship with public sector partners is important, providing added value to the work that we do with groups and associations.

description.hltext_display: 网络成揭贪利剑 专家:双刃剑效应不容回避
description.content:
由虚拟的网络到活生生的现实，由网民围观到进入调查机关视野……似乎每一起网络揭贪事件都遵循着这样一条轨迹。无论结果是确有其事，还是无中生有，2010年的网络揭贪事件再次证明：网络监督的力量正在放大。有专家指出，网络巨大的能量既为揭贪提供了新的出口，但其“双刃剑”效应也日渐显现，监督权和隐私权之间如何做到平衡正成为一道考量人们的课题。
今年年初，“广西这个局长日记啥都写”的帖子出现在天涯社区。这份帖子以第一人称、日记体的形式记录了广西烟草系统一名干部疑似受贿、发生不正当男女关系的情况。
帖子一经发布，就受到不少网民关注。一些网民除跟帖关注此事外，不少网民还对这份帖子内容的真实性进行比对核实。网络上形成的舆论漩涡很快在现实中得到回应。2月22日，广西壮族自治区烟草专卖局党组决定由纪检监察部门介入调查此事。
后经调查，这名广西烟草系统干部利用职务之便，在发包办公大楼、办公网络建设等工程中，多次收受承建商贿赂款以及商品房等物品，经由检察院立案侦查，这名干部于3月13日被批捕。并于近日被法院以受贿罪判处有期徒刑。
今年9月，一封针对广东省茂名市副市长的举报信疯传网络。发帖者自称是一名北京女记者，受这名副市长欺骗达7年之久，在发布的帖子中，她将这名副市长称为“大骗子、流氓、大贪污犯”。随后，广东省纪委证实，这名副市长因涉嫌严重违纪问题接受组织审查。
网络揭贪背后的民意力量

description.hltext_display: Find the Best Computer Repair Service Available in Austin
description.content: The computer is one of the most used devices in any home, office or establishment. Some offices or businesses cannot function smoothly without the computer. The use of the computer is now an essential part of the daily living activities. But what happens when your trusty computer catches a bug? What do you do when it's not functioning properly? Some opt to just dispose of the computer and just buy a brand new computer. But what if the problem was only minor and easily repairable? You may have just departed with a computer in need of some simple fine tuning. To save money, it is most advisable to have your computer checked up to see the cause of the problems. Some computer repair facilities offer free consultation to have your PC checked up for probable causes of its inability to function properly.It is best to search for quality computer repair shops in Austin that can give you quality service for a fair price. Computer Repair in Austin can speed up the performance of your laptop or desktop. They also offer installation of home and office networks. Hardware upgrades is also a service they specialize in. Even if you're in need of a search engine friendly website, computer repair shops in Austin can offer this service. The computer repair shop in Austin offers the service of virus detection and removal. If you notice that your desktop or laptop has suddenly lessened its performance level, then it may be the result of a Trojan, Malware or worm. Your browser can be hijacked by Malwares and direct you to which sites to go to. Your system resources can be greatly affected by the Trojans/worms and may even cause your system to slow down and eventually stop. Removal of these unwanted viruses is crucial. Hardware problems should be detected early on by being conscious of the noises that the hard drive makes. It's better to solve the issue with the hardware early on while the problems are minimal and at the stage where it is easily repairable. Some computer owners are faced with the horror of the 'black screen' when the computer is no longer booting. This is often the result a corrupt master boot record or a faulty device trying to load. Or this may even be the case of a hard disk failure. At this point, the best computer repair shop in Austin can assist you to back up your files to avoid losing valuable data, and then load it to a new hard disk.This is just but some of the basic complexities faced by computer owners. There are many other issues that arise with computers, and so it's best to find a quality computer repair service in Austin that can offer fair and reasonable rates for top repair services.

description.hltext_display: 解决北京交通拥堵，要先“治标”后“治本”
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
[font=宋体][size=14pt]今天的新闻刊登了一条重大的消息，备受关注的北京治堵新政将于明天上午对外正式公布，与之前这些年陆续发布的治堵措施对比而言，无论从前期的影响、社会关注度还是大众的期待值都达到了历史最高点。
由交通拥堵看北京的发展 (2010-12-20)
控制不住机动车增长，解决交通拥堵就成为空话 (2010-12-20)
新车船税政策是治标不治本，只杀大排量不公平 (2010-10-28)
不仅治标，更要兼顾治本 ―评“闽晋渔5179号”渔船事件 (2010-09-11)
糖尿病人要先吃蔬菜后喝汤 (2010-11-06)
哪里唱K最尽兴 北京KTV大推荐(图) (2010-12-22)
北京“怀柔影视过大年”开启冬季旅游季 图 (2010-12-22)
我们一起想办法解决皮肤发暗发黄 (2010-12-22)
对于汽车常见小问题的解决方法 (2010-12-22)
燕郊业主为维权堵国道 进京交通严重受阻(图) (2010-12-22)
车辆杀人罪解密：真有国家撞了白撞吗？看看美国怎么严惩交通肇事者 (2010-12-22)
解决交通拥堵决不可离开中国特色 (2010-12-19)
北京交通控制在人民手中 (2010-12-22)
北京交通限行根本不够，自我限行才重要 (2010-12-21)
之前的征求意见稿虽然已经体现了新政策的**，但作为普通老百姓，相信更多人还是在等待着庐山真面目的揭开。[/size][/font]
[font=宋体][size=14pt]刚刚又看到交管局对外公布的最新数据，上周北京又新增机动车3万辆，再次创造销售纪录，原本汽车市场的火爆预示着经济形势的强势，说明老百姓生活水平提高了，生活质量改善了，可是，对于年底这段时间出现的盲目性购车需求，却着实让人高兴不起来。专业人士分析，北京现在的汽车消费市场出现了严重的恐慌性现象，不仅在新车市场，连一直不温不火的二手车市场都出现了前所未有的断货现象，不禁让人为未来的汽车市场捏把汗。在我看来，现在的形势更像那句话说的“有枣没枣，打两杆子再说”，身边的人最近频繁传出买车的消息，甚至出现连驾照都没有的人也买车先屯着的事情发生。[/size][/font]
[font=宋体][size=14pt]说得严重些，北京的交通问题已经到了一个十分关键的瓶颈期，就好比一个人得了一种怪病，死不了但也浑身感觉不舒服，这现有的476万辆机动车如何去规范，引导和管理，是件十分棘手的大课题。之所以治堵新政引来全国范围内的广泛议论，根本的原因还在于老百姓对现实的交通状况和交通环境是不满意的，大家都在期盼着政府能拿出一个有效、实用的办法来治理，哪怕是缓解现在的拥堵状况也好。说句实在话，我一直期望政府能够出台更严格的措施来应对交通拥堵问题。[/size][/font]
[font=宋体][size=14pt]原因再简单不过，随着经济收入的提高和汽车消费的门槛越来越低，买车对于大多数家庭来说不再是什么天方夜谭的神话，反倒是中国老百姓骨子里那种对车的传统认识坏了事，以为有车就是富裕与身份的象征，有事没事开着车出去办事多拉风，渐渐的就会发现，越来越多的人都有这种心态与习惯，也由此造就了私家车盲目出行和不合理使用的比例越来越高，路也就自然越来越堵。[/size][/font]
[font=宋体][size=14pt] 所以说，北京如果采取限购政策，能对未来的交通拥堵起到极大的抑制作用，道理很简单，买的车少了，上路跑的车自然就少了，路也就通了。除此之外，如果再配合其它科学、合理的限行措施，比如新政意见稿里提到的什么尾号限行、单双号、征收拥堵费、提高停车费等等，引导大家真正懂得合理使用车辆，这治标的效果基本也就出来了。至于治本嘛，还需要一个更科学、更长久的规划，也涉及到方方面面的诸多环节，不可能一蹴而就，对于北京交通这个已病入肌体的病号来说，就好比先把命救活了，再谈如何调理，如何保养的事，是不是更现实一些。[/size][/font]
向好友推荐本贴：
标题：《 》
地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2088175c10p1.html

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: David Rosser, CBI Wales: The Long View - Looking back on 2010, and what will 2011 bring for Wales’ economy?
description.content:
LOOKING back at 2010, the pace of recovery in the UK economy has been slightly stronger over the past year than many had expected, and somewhat faster than typical during the first year out of a recession.
As we battle with the snow to get those last minute presents, what might 2011 have in store for us? Despite many risks to the future growth of the Welsh economy and official predictions of fragile growth, latest research from the CBI predicts recovery to be maintained and the risk of a double dip to be low with the recovery remaining on track.
Good news you may say. However, the new year may begin slowly as the pace of recovery is expected to slow to a very sluggish rate of only 0.2% between January and April, when consumer spending falls slightly in response to higher VAT and we begin to feel the effect of lower government spending. Steady but fairly modest growth of about 0.4% is predicted.
The persistent strength of energy and commodity prices is a growing concern, as it is likely to mean that inflation does not fall back quite as sharply as many hope. This makes it more likely that the Bank of England will need to start pulling back from record low interest rates earlier, rather than later, next year.
Unemployment is forecast to edge higher over the course of 2011, with a peak close to 2.6 million by the end of the year. Thereafter the recovery in the labour market is expected to be slow during 2012, and unemployment does not dip below 2.5 million until the fourth quarter.
Meanwhile, pay growth is expected to strengthen somewhat over the next two years, following the period of pay freezes and muted pay rises seen in 2009 and 2010.
However, despite slightly higher earnings growth, the outlook for consumption is fairly subdued, as personal spending is forecast to rise by only 0.9% in 2011. This reflects further erosion to real disposable incomes next year.
UK exports are predicted to grow next year by 6.9% in 2011 with trade expected to make a positive contribution to growth over the next two years, as exporters benefit from a competitive level of sterling.
I hope this gallop through the research can give you a more enjoyable festive period. While growth in 2011 may be sluggish it will be steady, allowing us to think less about ‘double dips’ and focus more on opportunities.

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Rhiwlas postman’s crazy 4,000-mile motorbike trek
description.content:
Rhiwlas postman’s crazy 4,000-mile motorbike trek
A POSTMAN is gearing up for a 4,000 mile charity motorbike journey around Britain – despite not yet having a licence, or a working bike.
Justin Williams, from Rhiwlas, has decided to ride his prized 1987 Honda VFR-400 around the coast roads of mainland Britain this summer, but there’s just one problem... it’s not built yet.
"I have passed my theory and aim to take the practical in February but that’s just five months before I leave,” said 39-year-old Justin.
"I have always enjoyed restoring cars, but having recently got into biking I decided to find a bike that I could work on as a project.
"I found the Honda on eBay in Carmarthen.
"When I went to collect it I was presented with a frame and lots of bits, essentially a whole bike but in many pieces.”
Justin’s no stranger to travelling the UK, having toured the country with his heavy metal band for years.
"We did a bit of touring which involved travelling a lot of the UK and parts of Europe,” he said.
"It may sound a little cliche but I miss the whole open road thing and want to see the parts of the UK which I missed the first time around.
"I’m approaching 40 so now is as good a time as any to do this” he added.
"However some people have suggested that maybe this is the start of a mid-life crisis.
"I don’t think it is but can see why people may say it.”
Justin’s chosen the NSPCC as the charity in what he hopes will be an annual event.
"My wife and I have supported this charity for years so it was an obvious choice when deciding which cause would benefit,” he said.
"I hope that this will become an annual event. First it will be the UK, then next time Europe and in the future, America.”
And despite his mad trek, wife Gabriella is 100% behind him.
"I am used to his crazy ideas by now, I just hope he passes his test in time to make the journey,” she joked.
To support Justin and help follow his progress visit his Facebook page "The Bumble Bee Charity Ride”.
"When I got the bike some panels were painted bright yellow and I remember seeing an old hot rod painted in a similar colour,” added Justin.
"There were also black stripes painted on it so I copied that when respraying the Honda.
"It resembled a bumblebee, hence the name”
ANYONE wishing to donate to Justin, keep checking the

description.hltext_display: 优酷诉酷6诋毁一审胜诉 获赔10万元
description.content:
14:01 来源：中国企业家网 作者：中国企业家网
因南非世界杯足球赛的转播惹出纠纷，视频网站优酷和酷6之间因“流量”之争再次对簿公堂。据《新京报》报道，昨日(21日)，优酷网状告酷6网发表不实言论一案在海淀法院开庭审理，一审判定酷6网赔10万元并删帖道歉。
《新京报》文章称，优酷网诉酷6借不实言论大肆炒作，攻击优酷公司及其负责人，导致优酷网的社会评价降低，并造成了巨大经济损失。 酷6网的行为已构成了诋毁商誉的嫌疑。
对于优酷网的指控，酷6公司辩称，这是其正当防卫。优酷网首先散布不实言论，诽谤自身世界杯流量造假，侵犯了公司的名誉权，酷6才会“愤而反抗”。
法院在听取双方的申辩后，审理认为，酷6公司在其网站首页专门开辟专栏对原告展开集中批判，行为“过度”，不符合正当防卫的构成要件。因此，判决酷6公司立即断开相关侵权网址链接，删除相关图文内容，并发布声明向优酷网公开赔礼道歉，道歉声明需保留三十天，同时赔偿优酷网包括公证费等各项损失共计10万元。
据《京华日报》文章披露，酷6网在其直播南非世界杯的揭幕战后，公布的浏览量最高值达到每天3.99亿次。而这一数字遭到优酷网的质疑，称“字不实”。酷6网对此反驳，称优酷是“嫉妒才诽谤”。双方就此展开的口水战被网友戏称为“流量门”。随后，优酷网一纸诉讼将酷6网告上了法庭。
该“流量门”事件在今年9月份就曾公开审理。优酷网在诉讼中向酷6网索赔100万，并要求其公开赔礼道歉30天，但该诉求遭到酷6网的拒绝。酷6称优酷此举是“恶意诉讼”，酷6的行为是“正当防卫”。因为案情复杂，双方又各执一词，此次开庭未作出宣判。
对于双方因“流量”之争引起的名誉权大战，分析人士称，双方纷争，其潜在用意是为证明自身在内容、品牌等方面的优势。这种“互掐”的做法不仅对品牌提升无益，还可能造成两败俱伤的结果。
同时，该人士还称，双方之间的频繁诉讼凸现了监管层在行业引导方面的缺位。互联网相关行业所出现的无序竞争，背后是现行法律法规的不同步以及行业监管的缺失。
