description.hltext_display: 'True Grit' hits bull's-eye
description.content:
Stars: Jeff Bridges (picture), Hailee Steinfeld, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin
Directed by: Joel and Ethan Coen
Running time: 1 hour, 49 min.
Straight shooters, the Coens are not.
Droll, sardonic, arch, wiseacre -- most of their oeuvre suggests they'd view the western genre as seriously as, say, Bugs Bunny views Yosemite Sam.
After all, for their adaptation of the Charles Portis novel True Grit, brothers Joel and Ethan even cast The Big Lebowski's Jeff Bridges -- aka "The Dude" -- as Rooster Cogburn, a role originated by "The Duke" John Wayne more than four decades ago.
So it will come as a shock to no one to learn this gorgeously grungy Grit is also as funny as it is fierce, more macabre than melancholy. The familiar sign posts are here -- blazing revolvers, outlaws, galloping horses, even rattlesnakes -- but so is the Coens' poker-faced wit, wedded to the book's period verbiage. What does surprise? That their film, for all its black humour and visual style, is also gratifyingly suspenseful and emotionally sound; simply put, it's no joke.
In many ways, 1969's True Grit was already an old fogey when it rode into theatres, coming well after the traditional Hollywood western's best-before date. Consider that the same year saw the release of Sam Peckinpah's landmark The Wild Bunch (also about the sun setting on aging cowboys). That in turn led to the western revisionism of the 1970s, epitomized by, among others, Arthur Penn's Little Big Man and Robert Altman's McCabe and Mrs. Miller.
In the decades since then, when the genre's been dusted off, it's tended to be with a contemplative, dirt-filled grimace.
Give it to the Coens then: for all the mayhem and marble-mouthed exchanges about morality and machismo, their film is also remarkably appealing, populated by characters who are lacerating, loopy and defiantly capable of surprising each other.
The retribution-themed plot, more faithfully lifted here, could hardly be simpler: Hell-bent on avenging the murder of her father, a 14-year-old Arkansas girl named Mattie Ross (Hailee Steinfeld) hires drunken, mean-spirited, one-eyed U.S. marshal Cogburn (Jeff Bridges) to help her track down the cowardly hired hand who was responsible. In Cogburn, she's convinced she has discovered a bounty hunter with "true grit."
In interviews, Bridges has said he was attracted to the part because, while most western anti-heroes are stern, silent types, Cogburn is abrasive, ornery and boorish. And Bridges clearly relishes every Rooster-ism. Scowling from behind an unkempt beard, surly and soused, the Oscar winner makes mangled mince-meat of his lines without steering into caricature.
You'd expect he might do the same to his young co-star. But he's matched note for note by Steinfeld as the driven, unflappable Mattie. Steinfeld was just 13 when she was cast for the role (Kim Darby, who played the role opposite Wayne, was 21), but she more than holds her ground despite being surrounded by A-list alpha males.
In addition to Bridges, there's Josh Brolin as killer Tom Chaney and, most amusingly, Matt Damon as LaBoeuf, a swaggering Texas Ranger, also searching for Chaney, who quickly finds himself in over his cowlick-sporting head. Damon, over-dressed and brandishing a pipe, is haughty and hilarious, sparing spur-for-spur with Cogburn.
By comparison, Brolin has little to do, but nevertheless makes Chaney far less a towering menace than a doltish, directionless knuckle-dragger.
In a Coens' movie, he's right at home.

event_or_fact.property: he was attracted to the part because, while most western anti-heroes are stern, silent types, Cogburn is abrasive, ornery and boorish

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: North Wales author appeals for information over extinct dog
description.content:
AN author is appealing for information about the long extinct North Wales cattle dog, Y Ci Coch – The Red Dog.
Idris Evans is fascinated by the dog, details of which he uncovered when he researched the graphic account of the lives of the Welsh drovers.
His first book "Hard Road to London" has sold 5,000 copies worldwide, and alerted Idris to a fascinating new area of research.
But very little is known about Y Ci Coch, which was a very large dog used by the drovers to herd their cattle across country.
Idris from Llangollen says there is nothing on the internet about the dog and he is now challenging the people of Wales, particularly the elderly or those with an interest in Welsh history, to provide him with information.
"It's a fascinating story,” he said: "Y Ci Coch was a very large cattle dog which was bred here in North Wales.
Anyone with information can contact Idris 01824 705268.

event_or_fact.property: Y Ci Coch was a very large cattle dog which was bred here in North Wales.
there is nothing on the internet about the dog and he is now challenging the people of Wales, particularly the elderly or those with an interest in Welsh history, to provide him with information

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Welsh couple stopped from returning to Bethlehem
description.content:
A WELSH couple have spoken of how Israeli authorities stopped them from returning to the Church of Nativity in Bethlehem where they were married.
Susan and Tony Diek and their children Adam, 27 and Natalie, 24 recently travelled from Porthmadog, Gwynedd to Bethlehem to meet their relatives for the first time since fleeing the Palestinian West Bank 15 years ago.
Born and bred in Porthmadog, Susan, 48, went to live and work in Palestine 30 years ago where she met and married Tony, 49, a Christian Palestinian.
But because of the tensions between Israel and Palestine, the Dieks fled to Gwynedd in 1996 while work was being started on building the iron and concrete wall by Israel around the West Bank.
But nothing quite prepared them or an accompanying S4C film crew for what they would witness on their return.
Susan said: "We were treated terribly – we all had British passports but that counted for nothing in the eyes of the Israelis.
"As Tony had been born there, he was a Palestinian in their eyes.
"His UK passport was thrown to the floor in contempt by Israeli soldiers in the airport and he was just given a three-hour visa to travel from Tel Aviv, Israel, to Bethlehem in the West Bank.
"He was warned not to leave Bethlehem until he had a Palestinian ID and passport.”
Tony has two brothers in Bethlehem and a sister who lives beyond the wall in Jerusalem, Israel.
But he was refused permission to travel to her home without a Palestinian ID.
Susan and the children had to make the difficult journey through the checkpoints to Jerusalem without him.
Jerusalem, a city important to Jews, Muslims and Christians, is the focal point of the conflict between Palestinians and Israelis.
Susan said: "We had also hoped to go together to the Church of Nativity in Bethlehem where we were married 30 years ago.
"But because of the difficulties Tony wasn’t able to come with us and yet again, 15 years on, events had separated us as a family.”
It was an emotional experience for them to see their family and friends once again – and realise how difficult life is for all the people living in the shadow of the wall which will encircle the West Bank once it’s completed.
Susan said: "The people there feel as if they’re in prison and the wall divides families and friends.
"All the ordinary people want is peace and a country they can call their own.
"But extremists on both sides are making this impossible at the moment.
"You would expect the Jews with their history to be sympathetic after all they’ve suffered. But the Palestinians are treated like second-class citizens."

description.hltext_display: Birkenstock sandals Foot Care at Home Your Guide to a Home Pedicure
description.content:
A pedicure doesn
't cost all that much; but still, it can add up over time, especially if you add in all the extras that they offer you at the salon, that you often fall for. As a DIY project, a pedicure can be a very satisfying one. Not only will you end up saving quite a bit if you add it all up, you
'll end up getting one done far more often, and get compliments for your really pretty feet. As a foot care project, this will probably not need you to take out more than a half hour each time even if you follow all the steps. So make sure that you pamper your feet, and that you don
't skip any steps.
Any foot care project starts with a great foot soak. The thing is, this does more than to just soften the dead skin on your feet and get you ready for a pedicure, there a few things on earth that can get you feeling this happy this easily. Prepare a foot bath with warm water; to get rid of any malodorous bacteria, put in a spoon of tea tree oil; a bit of a witch hazel should help clear out your pores, and a measure of Epsom salts should help you get your feet feeling clean. And it couldn
't hurt to throw in a bit of peppermint to get your feet feeling all tingly. If all of this seems like a lot, they sell packaged footsoak bags at any skin care outlet.
Once you
've soaked your feet for a good ten minutes, your next step on would be to scrub off all the dead skin that the soak has loosened up. But you don
't believe that you need to get any special exfoliants off-the-shelf do you? You just need sugar, and perhaps a little almond oil to smooth the action. If you do wish to go buy ready-made though, that
's a way to go too. Whichever product you choose, begin at the tough skin around your heels, and scrub all the way up to your toes with a gentle circular action. Make sure you cover your entire foot and go all the way up to your calves.
Any foot care you need done will require a pumice stone to help you grind down any tough spots like calluses. Coat the area you wish to work on with a little shower gel, and get to work with the stone. Remember that you
're not trying to get your skin raw - be gentle with the stone, remembering that you only need to get rid of the dead skin, not the live stuff. Use a gentle to-and-fro motion to scrape all the right places off.
For the next step, which would be to take care of the toenails, I especially like the affordable-and-yet-high -quality Sally Hansen LaCross Comfort Curve toenail clippers that you can get at any drugstore for a couple of dollars. The first cut can be somewhat angular; and you can around your nails out beautifully with a nice glass nail file after that. Make sure that you get them nicely shaped so that there are no issues with ingrown nails later on. That should break the back of the project; to seal in all the freshness, use a nice pampering foot treatment cream, and massage it in taking your time. The massage helps with the circulation, and gets you feeling really like you are walking on air.
A final coat of polish should get you really ready for the dance floor. Used a nail polish remover that doesn
't contain acetone, to clean off any of the lotion from your massage. Once you
've got your toes nicely sticking out and held apart with toe separators, use a protein formula base coat to help strengthen your nails. The colors in vogue this year are real bright ones - pink, orange, you get the idea. Your nail painting action should typically start at the cuticle and sweep up towards the tip. Once you
're done and nearly dry, round out your footcare program with a little cuticle oil to help keep things glossy.

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Abigail’s Disney dream wrecked by late setbacks
description.content:
A LITTLE girl’s dream trip to Disneyland Paris was shattered after she fell ill and got taken twice to hospital instead.
Five-year-old Abigail Williams, of Llandudno, had been due to take a four-day holiday to the French capital but was treated for a very high temperature and later an eye injury from a fall at home.
Dad Kevin Williams was disappointed but reflected that they would have been caught up in travel chaos at St Pancras Station if they had been returning on Eurostar as planned on Monday.
Abigail has the debilitating condition variant Batten’s disease and was due to visit the theme park with the When You Wish Upon A Star charity which grants the wishes of children suffering from a life threatening illness.
Kevin and Abigail’s mum Christine Whitley were about to set off from home in Hospital Road with Abigail and her sister Lauren on Thursday at 1pm for a London hotel en route to Paris.
But Abigail developed an alarmingly high temperature of 40.ºC which, at its peak went up to 40.8ºC. They phoned her GP then an ambulance which took her to Ysbyby Glan Clwyd in Bodelwyddan.
She improved over 48 hours after being given antibiotics in an intravenous drip. Kevin said: "She picked up and started playing with her sister. But she had a little seizure, fell and suffered a nasty gash on her right eye.”
Her dad took the Ysgol y Gogarth pupil back to Ysbyty Glan Clwyd to have several butterfly stitches.
Kevin said: "Even though it was bad that she was in hospital, we would have come back through St Pancras so we avoided all that.
"She was looking forward to seeing Mickey Mouse so much. But I’ve spoken to When You Wish Upon a Star. They say it’s not the first time there has been a cancellation when you consider the children that they help.
"They say I can give them a ring in the New Year to re-arrange the trip. So fair play to them.”

event_or_fact.property: She picked up and started playing with her sister.
Even though it was bad that she was in hospital, we would have come back through St Pancras so we avoided all that.

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Schools shake-up in Bala
description.content:
PLANS to reorganise schools in the Bala area have gone out to public consultation.
Gwynedd Council chiefs have suggested creating a "lifelong school” providing both primary and secondary education in the town.
Ysgol Bro Tegid and Ysgol Beuno Sant would amalgamate with the secondary school, Ysgol y Berwyn.
The plans also would see Ysgol y Parc close and its 18 pupils transferred to Llanuwchllyn.
A meeting of the full council appoved the plans last July.
A Gwynedd Council spokesman said: "As part of the process, a review of the Berwyn catchment area was completed recently.
"A series of meetings were held in the area and detailed research was carried out into the effect of various options on the Welsh language and the area’s communities.”
A proposal was also supported to promote collaboration between Ysgol O M Edwards, Ysgol Ffridd y Llyn and Ysgol Bro Tryweryn and to develop ways of enabling the schools to utilise the facilities and specialisation of the Lifelong Campus. This proposal has no statutory implications.
The consultation process ends on Febryary 4 next year.
The reorganisation in Bala follows a shake-up of schools in the Tywyn area with five schools being closed and a new area school built.

description.hltext_display: Off Da Rock Tattoos delivers a spot for locals to get safe and creative skin art
description.content:
“Off Da Rock Tattoos” is owned by a brother and sister team — Joseph and Upu Ioane. Located on the 2nd floor of Tedi’s in Fagatogo, it offers to create tattoos or skin art in a clean and sterile environment, while also being the only tattoo shop on island. [photo: J. Hayner]
Everyone likes to read and hear stories about young entrepreneurs, especially ones that are here in the territory. Samoa News had a chance to speak with one of those young entrepreneurs, who owns ‘Off Da Rock Tattoos’...
located on the 2nd floor of Tedi’s in Fagatogo.
His name is Joseph Ioane, and at the young age of only 23, speaks, and carries himself like a seasoned businessman.
“I was born in California, but raised right here in American Samoa. I have only been tattooing for four years, and my main focus is on the traditional style, and along with my sister, Upu, we own and run ‘Off Da Rock Tattoos,” said Ioane.
“We only started this business right after the tattoo festival last month. We have not been here that long. I like the spot here in Fagatogo, it is centrally located, and I am pretty sure, that this is the only tattoo shop in the territory. If I can keep my rent up, then I will be fine, that is the main thing,” he explained.
“I know that there are a lot of talented artists out there that are out of work, and if they want to try their hand at tattooing, I am willing to talk to them. Just stop on by and bring a portfolio of your work with you, and we will see. Like I said before, there are a lot of talented artists here in the territory, that will charge cheap prices, ‘but’ you have to ask yourself one question, and that is, how clean and sterile is their equipment?”
“You can get an infection, that can spread throughout your whole body, and make you real sick. I only use disposable needles, and I wear gloves, and I sterilize everything. It only takes one person getting an infection, or sick, that can ruin a business. Being clean and sterile is a main priority,” explained Ioane.
“I am just doing what I love. If you want to be successful in anything you do, you have to have a love for it,” Ioane stated.
Tisa’s Tattoo Festival is a yearly event in American Samoa. Bringing together skin artists, or tattooists from around the world, the festival focuses on the traditional Samoan tatau and the malu as inspiration.
This year many young Samoan tattooists were seen to participate in the annual event — more than before — and their work included the latest as well as the traditional.
Samoa News is one of the major sponsors of the annual tattoo fest, and we wish Ioane and Upu a successful endeavor.

event_or_fact.property: Being clean and sterile is a main priority,?

description.hltext_display: 卓越称降价定超当当京东 B2C行业竞争激烈
description.content:
由京东商城和当当网挑起的网购价格战还没有结束。对于另一个竞争对手卓越亚马逊来说，这仅仅是年底促销大戏的开始。
卓越亚马逊昨日宣布，本轮促销的让利额度超过1亿元，高于此前京东和当当网分别宣布的8000万元和4000万元。“为了实现天天低价的策略，我们是不计成本的。”卓越亚马逊总裁王汉华昨日对北京晨报记者表示，“我不赞成价格战，但卓越有能力积极应对。”
卓越亚马逊的应对措施看上去有详尽的计划。卓越上周曾宣布，图书在全网最低价基础上打折20%再返券。卓越昨天又宣布，图书返券力度上升为满100返20元，另有10万种少儿图书5折封顶，服装、日用百货、食品和数码等产品也被纳入促销范围。“具体方式包括打折和返券。”王汉华如是说。
国内电子商务B2C（企业对个人）行业正陷入比拼降价的残酷竞争之中。“在目前的竞争环境中，降价对于卓越来说是不可避免的，我们必须保证卓越在全网的价格竞争力。”王汉华说：“年底本来就是打折季，我们在财务上已经做好了准备。”
■专家观点
当当上市成价格战导火索
正望咨询总裁、资深分析师吕伯望昨日分析说，B2C行业之所以在年底掀起猛烈的降价攻势，一个重要的原因是电子商务应用的不断普及。他指出，一个网站的营收现在可以达到或超过全国连锁的百货商场，中国零售行业传统的商战模式很自然就出现在网上了。
“另一个重要原因是当当网上市了。”吕伯望认为，京东对图书产品的出击选择在当当上市的时间，很有营销宣传的价值，而当京东和当当都有所动作后，卓越不可能再保持沉默。“我甚至认为，卓越行动得应该更早一些。”
这场价格战将持续多久？此前多位出版商和分析师均表示，以营销为目的的价格战不可能坚持太久。在促销大战中，记者还发现了有网站号称价格最低而实际悄悄调价的“水分”。针对价格战只是营销大战的说法，王汉华昨日表示，建议消费者别急着下单，货比三家后就可以知道谁在真打折。

description.hltext_display: North Wales News: Knife amnesty on Anglesey is launched
description.content:
A KNIFE amnesty launches next month on Anglesey after the success of a similar anti-knife drive in memory of murdered mechanic Leon Jones.
Leon, 21, was stabbed to death last November in Holyhead, in a murder that traumatised the close knit community.
It saw the launch of the Dump a Knife, Save a Life campaign, aimed at educating people on the dangers of carrying a weapon.
It included a two month knife amnesty on the island, which led to 210 knives being handed in at police stations.
Now a new month long amnesty will run from January 1, with further enforcement operations and education projects carrying on until April.
Leon’s father Gerallt said the family fully supported the new campaign.
He said: "Anything that can stop this happening again is good.
"Anything that takes knives off the streets should be supported.”
Over the last 12 months there have been seven recorded incidents involving knives on Anglesey, including wounding and going equipped for stealing, whereby people have been charged.
Neighbourhood Policing Sergeant, Andrew McGregor said: "This is the second such amnesty we’ve held on Anglesey.
"Although we know knife crime is low on the island we know there are public concerns.
"This particular campaign is aimed at educating people about the consequences of carrying knives and it includes a number of different strands – including a presentation to youngsters, community engagement work and working closely with licensees to ensure knives are not taken into licensed premises.”
He added: "Carrying a knife is not acceptable and it does not keep you safe.
"It is an offence and you are actually putting yourself in danger of your weapon being used against you.
"Running such a campaign will allow us to remove knives from circulation, further reducing the risk to the public.”
Red disposal bins for the amnesty are being located at Holyhead and Llangefni police stations; however people can also take their unwanted knives to other stations in Menai Bridge, Gaerwen, Benllech, Valley and Amlwch.
Dave Hughes, who started the Dump a Knife campaign, said: "We would like to thank all those who took advantage of the last knife amnesty, however we are asking for your support once again. Leon’s family have taken comfort from the campaign, let not Leon’s death be in vain.”
If you know of somebody carrying a knife report it to North Wales Police on 101 or in an emergency always dial 999.

description.hltext_display: 赛格车圣三大系统详细对比：谁更适合车载后市场?
description.content:
在AVN机大势流行的时候，科技服务和享用者又看到了不满。
赛格车圣GPS 引爆亚运促销活动 (2010-12-15)
赛格车圣仅15分钟找回失车 (2010-12-14)
在车上也能听流行小说―车载有声书(图) (2010-12-21)
女子莫名成通缉犯被警方带走 丈夫车载记者跟随 (2010-12-15)
轿车防滑制动系统故障诊断方法解析 (2010-12-22)
公司门卫藏报警系统 法官乔装业务员暗访治老赖(图) (2010-12-21)
大众杨美虹重视华南市场畅谈广州车展 (2010-12-22)
科鲁兹 小包围改装,ABG燕尾双排四出,详细改装流程(图) (2010-12-22)
问一下北大青鸟佳音旗舰学士后的详细课程安排，具体 (2010-12-21)
在看到车载电子，特别是车载后市场蛋糕无比巨大的时候，有实力的品牌商，带着他们的“高新技术”，挤进这正在升温的汽车后市场――汽车影音领域。Telematics(应用无线通信技术的车载智能系统)便出现了，于是，我们又有了新的平台叫法：AVNT(A：音频、V：视频、N：导航、T：无线通讯)。
AVNT，着重当然在于“T”，T的出现，让孤独的一辆车能与外界连接起来;T的出现，让汽车生活更加精彩。
目前，在整车领域炒得热闹的G-Book、OnStar(安吉星)，都是通过T，拓展出很多实用的功能，为车主带来了安全和便利。而在我们汽车后市场影音领域，也有“明星”，拥有强大后台服务的赛格车圣，加入T后，也可以实现G-Book、OnStar一样的功能和服务。甚至，配合后市场的灵活性，更优于前两者。
下面我们就来对比一下G-Book、OnStar、赛格车圣三大系统。笔者找到了装有G-Book系统的凯美瑞、装有OnStar系统的凯迪拉克、装有赛格车圣系统的卡罗拉。重点不在于车，而在于上面提到的三大系统。
G-Book VS OnStar VS 赛格车圣，赚了一个漂亮MM。
一、三大平台系统的构成
G-Book智能副驾的系统构成
车主通过操作安装在车辆上的G-Book智能副驾车载机，经无线网络连接G-Book智能副驾报务中心，然后由中心话务员直接联系广汽TOYOTA销售店、警方、医疗急救机构等相关机构，从而向车主提供更及时、更安心的服务。
OnStar安吉星系统构成
通过应用全球卫星定位系统(GPS)和无线通信技术来为消费者提供广泛的汽车安全信息服务，包括碰撞自动求助、路边救援协助、全音控免提电话、实时按需检测和全程音控领航等十多项车主贴心服务。
赛格车圣智能车载辅助系统构成
通过应用全球卫星定位系统(GPS)和无线通信技术为汽车驾乘人员提供安全、导航及信息娱乐等多方位的保障与支持综合性的服务。主要功能有一键导航、联网救援、酒后接送、汽车诊断、丢车必赔、路况实时资讯、车载多媒体影音、智能防盗、远程车辆监控、倒车摄像、IPOD链接等增值服务。让车主在用车安全的同时，享受便捷、贴心、娱乐的服务。
主要功能呈现
主要功能 G-Book OnStar 赛格车圣
1、话务服务 有 有 有
2、一键导航 有(语音与地图导航) 有(语音导航) 有(语音与地图导航)
3、新闻资讯 有(导读) ―― 有(显示并导读)
4、天气预告 有(显示并导读) ―― 有(显示并导读)
5、电子邮件 有(显示并导读) ―― ――
6、车辆远程诊断 有 有 有
7、紧急通报 有 有 有
8、道路救援 有 有 有
9、被盗通知 有 有 有
10、被盗车辆定位 有 有 有
11、被盗远程监控 ―― ―― 有(报警、断油、断电)
12、远程维护 有 有 有
13、碰撞自动求助 ―― 有 ――
14、免提通话 有 有(语音拨号) 有
15、实时按需检测 ―― 有 ――
16、醉酒代驾 ―― ―― 有
各功能平台注释：
1、话务服务 通过与话务员连接，可以导航、查询天气、新闻、股票、酒店(兴趣点)等信息资讯。
2、一键导航 通过与话务员连接，设定目的地，并检索路径，系统会自动导航。
3、新闻资讯 通过特定选项进入，可以查看体育、社会、娱乐、股票等相关新闻，并导读。
4、天气预告 通过特定选项进入，可以查看当天和未来几天天气情况，并导读。
5、电子邮件 收看并导读邮件(目前不支持发送)。
6、车辆远程诊断 及时提供实时的车辆制动、引擎、胎压等车辆信息，异常时发起警报。
7、紧急通报 身体不适，或遇到犯罪情况时，可以通过紧急按钮发送紧急情况。
8、道路救援 车辆出现故障时，可以通过话务服务进行道路救援，定位并实施救援。
9、被盗通知 车辆被非法启动时，车辆会发出警报，并通知车主和相关部门。
10、被盗车辆定位 发现被盗后，可以实施车辆定位。
11、被盗远程监控 发现被盗后，还可以远程监控，对车辆进行断油、断电，使车辆不能开动。
12、远程维护 到特定时候，如车辆需要保养时，会发起提醒，并告知相关4S店或维修站。
13、碰撞自动求助 车辆碰撞后，会自动发出求助警报。
14、免提通话 解除驾驶中手持电话通话的安全隐患，实现免提可与对方对话。
15、实时按需检测 随时可以呼叫服务中心，查询车辆相关安全信息，并伴有相应的解决建议。
16、醉酒代驾 驾车人喝酒或醉酒时，可以通过服务中心安排代驾。
注释：
在功能上，从上面的表格中较容易看出来，值得说明的一点是：在技术上，三个平台系统还存在一些差异。如安吉星是不带导航功能的，在后视镜上有三个键，遇紧急情况通过按相应的三个键来发出警报。
而G-book则在中控台上装有导航仪，可以通过话务中心，帮车主设定导航目的地，并规划出路径。由于系统属于完全前装，G-book要想通过原厂认证，需要一个很长的过程，原车认证规定的时间为18～36个月，也就是说最短要一年半，最长可达三年。我们知道，对于电子技术和产品来说，更新周期是日新月异的。所以，目前车载专用机大家都使用数字屏，而G-book还是沿用模拟屏，以及运算速度和相关的配置上，可能会低于主流的相关产品，如目前市场上都使用高清屏，G-BOOK依然使用模拟屏，清晰度和视觉舒适度相对较差。这是丰田前期战略目标所制定的，制定了就不能变更的，也就是说，丰田推出G-book时，已经是两三年前的方案。
三、功能展示
G-Book功能展示
G-Book功能展示
G-Book功能展示
OnStar功能展示
OnStar功能展示
白色电话按钮：按下该按钮，全音控免提电话功能启动。
蓝色安吉星按钮：按下该按钮，解决日常驾车过程中遇到的问题。
红色紧急按钮：在紧急情况下，按下该按钮。
OnStar功能展示
OnStar功能展示
OnStar功能展示，还是沿用点阵式的小屏，在娱乐功能及人机交互方面会逊色一些。
赛格车圣功能主菜单
赛格车圣功能主菜单
赛格车圣7大功夫
赛格车圣功能实现展示
四、产品价格及服务收费
系统品牌 G-Book OnStar 赛格车圣
产品价格 随车销售，有此功能的一般贵1.5～2.0万元。 随车销售，有此功能的一般贵1.5～2.0万元。 专车专用(适合各种车辆)，0.8～1.5万元。
服务收费 消费者购买配有G-Book新车，两年内G-Book均为免费提供服务，免费期过后将如何收费目前还在商讨中。 OnStar的服务费用是18.95美元/月(约合人民币129.4元/月)，199美元/年(约合人民币1360元/年)。引入中国市场后将如何收费要到年底发布时才知道。 赛格车圣收费标准分为三个等级：经典套餐、卓越套餐、尊荣套餐，分别收费为：68元/月、98元/月、118元/月，所服务的项目有所不同(请查看附图)。
附“赛格车圣服务收费图”
赛格车圣服务收费图
五、部分功能实测
1、一键导航
说明：
在一键导航上，G-Book、OnStar和赛格车圣，都是通过话务员服务来实现，连通服务中心，远程设定目的地和规划路线，自动导航，车主无需操作。不同的时，OnStar只有语音导航，没有地图图画导航，笔者在测试时，重点对比了G-Book和赛格车圣的“一键导航”功能。
首先都是拨通服务中心，G-Book是点击“话务员服务”，赛格车圣是点击“一键通”(据了解，赛格车圣的“一键通”已经申请了专利)。同样的始发地，我们选择相同的目的地，始发地是测试地点：深圳南山高新科技园，目的地是：宝安机场。
接通G-Book话务员服务
接通赛格车圣一键通
G-Book导航定位就绪
赛格车圣导航定位就绪
测试结果：
两者都通顺利找到目的地，并规划好路径行程(话务mm的声音都很好听)。但笔者注意到两个平台在话务员答复和导航完全定位上的时间不同。从测试人员报出目的地时计，到对方话务员答复，再到导航完全定位。G-Book需要的时间为：33秒和63秒，则赛格车圣需要的时间为：6秒和24秒。也就是说，从话务员了解车主想要去的目的地时计起，到车上导航定好位，两者需要的时间分别为：63秒和24秒，赛格车圣在这方面的反应相对快些。这与，话务员处理事务的动作、系统运算速度和地图软件都有关联。
项目 G-BOOK 赛格车圣
话务员确认目的地 33秒 6秒
中心下发导航地图成功 63秒 24秒
2、紧急通报
说明：
这方面没有进行实测，因为这是紧急情况才按的，一是怕重复“狼来了”的故事，二是这不是闹着玩的，一不小心会牵动警方、医疗或消防等。G-Book一旦按下紧急通报键，在30分钟内都处于紧急状态，G-BOOK的其他服务无法正常使用。赛格车圣系统，车主点击一键通接通服务中心，客服人员会询问车主当前的情况，情急状况下会直接联系110、119或者救援机构等，对车辆以及车主进行应急服务。
3、被盗远程监控
说明：
在测试赛格车圣系统之前，我们就做了一个小小的实验。装载有赛格车圣系统的丰田卡罗拉，已经处于防盗状态，我们模拟了非法启动车辆。即在没有解除防盗监控的情况下，用车匙(即使是原车钥匙也不行)打开车门。
打开车门后，车辆随即发出报警声响。大约40秒后，车主接到服务中心打来的电话，告知车辆出现异常情况，配合车主作出相应处理……
当测试人员在没有解除防盗警报时，用车钥匙去开车门，同样会引起报警，随后车主就接到服务中心打来的服务电话。
随后，我们还演示了远程监控功能。测试人员(即车主)打电话告诉服务中心，说车辆不见了，在取得密码验证成功后，话务员作出了车主提出的处理建议操作：首先给车辆断油处理，然后找出车辆的具体位置。而我们测试人员均在车上，并启动着车辆。眼睁睁地看着车辆熄火，并接到话务员传送的车辆位置信息。
我们在车上看着车辆熄火，车辆不能再启动。
通过远程服务，赛格车圣可以实现很多功能和一些贴心服务。
目前导航有个定位追踪的功能，在车上如果要去哪个目的地，可以较简单地实现。如果我们在楼上开会，车在楼下，如果发生了盗窃，我们一般是无能为力的，最多打110报警。而装了赛格车圣的产品，就可以在车辆被盗后，首先，赛格车圣服务中心就会接到报警(只要是非法启动车辆，均会自动报警。)报警后，车主可以实施远程监控，监听车内的情况，并可以远程断油断电，让车辆无法行驶。
远程锁住车辆，必须通过与车主确认身份，核对服务密码后进行远程控制。如果出现车主在车上被劫持、绑架等情况，服务中心会监听车内情况，作出相应的处理措施。
六、编辑手记
同为汽车上的智能辅助系统，从提供的服务上来看G-Book和OnStar的侧重点还是有所不同。G-Book在导航和人工服务方面较出色，侧重于智能副驾，相当于提供了一个副驾助手。而OnStar更侧重于安全，主动求助方面更细致，会自动地把警情发到服务中心去，从而提供实施救援。而赛格车圣系统，则是取两者的优点，在注重安全的同时，利用国内最大的运营网络、真正本地化的服务，给车主带来更便捷和贴心的服务。同时，在汽车影音娱乐方面更适合车载后市场消费者。
笔者在了解赛格车圣平台产品
笔者在了解赛格车圣平台产品
G-Book平台界面
OnStar平台界面
赛格车圣平台界面

赛格车圣系统，正在接通服务中心。

description.hltext_display: Maximizing your Alliance Character in World of Warcraft Cataclysm
description.content: Alliance leveling from 80 to 85December 2010 a new expansion was released, and fans all over the world, pikc up this exciting new expansion. This new expansion is called Cataclysm and this time instead of the Lich King, undead and the cold of the north it's the firey destruction of Deathwing and is the new threat to azeroth. Like all the expansion to world of warcraft the leveling cap has been risen to 85. The previous cap was level 80 so going from level 80 to level 85 is going to be the challenge for dedicated players. Leveling up is the same has it has been in prevision expansions but with new instances and increased leveling times you will find your self challanged again. Using an Alliance character is no exception either so continue using your Alliance character build that made you successful in leveling up to 80 and grind away. The new dungeons in World of Warcraft Cataclysm are very exciting and serve as enjoyable ways to power up your character's experience. Leveling in instances is a great way to level becuase you will not only be able to learn all of the boss fights and incounters but it is also one of the quickest ways to level especially when you first run them and your able to pick up the quests. Leveling up the normal way by questing and grinding on creep, is always the best way to level and gain allot of gold at the same time. There are plenty of Alliance quests that you can take part of with important quests being the "To the Depths", "Sea Legs", and "Call of Duty" quests. You can do all of these three quests once you reach level 80 so get these out of the way so you can enjoy the extra experience and rewards that make it easier to complete future quests. As you go through the new story line you will find different quest that will allow and show you how to explore new zones and area's. If you explore these area's in order then you will have no trouble leveling up, but be prepared to encounter new foes. Many of the quests in World of Warcraft Cataclysm require a higher level so continue to slay mobs in these new areas and adapt to the environment so you won't find this task to be too tedious. Be sure to participate in any other Alliance quests in these areas so you can progress even deeper in the game. If you have purchased a leveling guide to hit 80 then I would highly recommend picking up the extended version and continuing to level to 85. Make sure you follow these guides as they are very good and will level you to 85 quickly.

description.hltext_display: 快递业全国性“爆仓” 淘宝超1/3店铺出问题
description.content:
“全国快递‘爆仓’，收货时间延迟，希望亲们谅解”“浙、苏、沪等地发货延迟2至3天，各位不要催了”“近期停止发货，暂定恢复时间为21日”……各电子商务网站的店主和宅男宅女们，好不容易盼到了年底促销狂潮，结果快递的“短腿”让他们饱受摧残。除了快递费涨价之外，各地“爆仓”现象频发，服务质量也成了投诉热点。
现象：快递难堪重负
据了解，本轮“爆仓”起自11月，源头是各电子商务网站的商户。“最近出现了下单子以后一周后店家才发货的现象，我在论坛里一问，发现这种情况非常多。”刚在网上购买了过冬鞋子和衣服的孙小姐表示，进入12月之后，11月出现的快递延迟问题并未缓解，反而越来越严重。
记者随机在淘宝网的店铺中询问发现，超过三分之一以上的店铺出现了这一问题，不少店铺注明“因各地物流仓库爆满，派件有所延迟，望见谅”。有一些店铺虽然没有做这类说明，但销售人员会向下单客户的解释说：“由于订单量太大，付款后3至7天才开能发货。”
一些消费者反映说，不少网店的销售人员濒临崩溃，对于一些利润率较低的小单非常不耐烦，往往说了几句话之后就不愿搭理小客户。对于投诉快递问题的客户，他们更是懒得回答。
实际上，不只是电子商务客户，一些普通用户也受到了影响。近期一些居民向记者反映，上门取件的业务以前基本是电话下单后一两个小时内业务员就会上门，但是近期往往半天内都来不了。
争论：“爆仓”只是借口？
各地区情况参差不齐
“现在是全国性的‘爆仓’，南方比北方更严重些，尤其是江浙一带。”一些网络商户如是说。前几天，韵达快递发出公告称，由于江、浙、沪、皖等地突降大雪，该区域的快件全线延误。
上海一家快递公司的负责人表示，从前两个月开始，全国性的柴油供应紧张给他们造成了很大的影响。“我们的货车一般都是烧柴油的，在不少地方送货车都加不到油了，周转速度自然就放慢了。”
“今年10月以来，申通快递迎来了快递业务量‘井喷’行情，每天的快件量达210多万件，比去年同期增加35%。”申通快递方面表示，为了应对这一状况，他们除了增加人力和物力的投资，还不得不在部分地区“适当增加快件派送费”。
除了申通之外，记者采访的几家快递公司基本都表示，业务量放大的态势十分明显，其中，顺丰和圆通均表示增长量在三分之一以上。这也增强了电子商务网站商户“全国性爆仓”的说法的可信度，但快递公司显然并不完全认同。顺丰快递相关人士强调说：“具体情况要具体分析。一些商家说快递‘爆仓’了将责任推向快递，消费者还是得核实一下，因为不是所有地区都出现这种情况。”

description.hltext_display: Husband attacks BPO employee with a glass shard
description.content:
After her husband attacked her with a glass shard, she managed to convince him to take to a hospital, where the doctors called the cops
A 26-year-old BPO employee narrowly escaped from getting killed by her husband by using her presence of mind.
Suman (name changed) who works as an operation executive with a city-based BPO, had married her
colleague R Ravindra despite opposition from her parents in April.
The relationship soured soon, as Ravindra used to have frequent fights with Suman over trivial issues. When the problem becomes unbearable, Suman moved to her parents' house.
On December 13, while Suman was waiting for her office cab, Ravindra approached her and forced her into an autorikshaw stating that he need to talk to her. With much resistance, Suman agreed to accompany him to their house in Wilson garden.
The shocker
Ravindra began crying and creating a fuss, and accused her of dumping him, and asking her to give him a chance. Shocked with the development, Suman tried to escape with some excuse. Ravindra became wild and gulped a few tablets saying he wanted to commit suicide.
He ransacked the house and broke a few bottles. Suddenly, he stabbed Suman 's neck with a glass shard, and said that he would kill her and then kill himself.
Ravindra stabbed her a second time on the neck, for which Suman began to plead and said that she would live with him.
Her words had a calming effect on Ravindra, who agreed to take her to the hospital. He took Suman to the Agadi hospital for first aid and then to the Commando Hospital where she reported the incident to the doctor. Based on the information, the Wilson garden police rushed to the hospital and rescued her.
Suman was later sent to her parent's house. The police are on the lookout for Ravindra who is said to be absconding. "We have taken up a case against Ravindra for wrongful restrain and assault, and are investigating," said an official from the Wilson Garden police station. Suman was not available for comment.
New headways in Surekha murder
The South division police who are investigating the murder case of a BPO employee are on the lookout of a man who visited Payal Surekha on the day of her murder.
According to the police, the man who is middle aged, had gone to the previous flat to meet Payal and then came to her apartment where she had shifted recently.
The man confirmed it was her apartment with the security and even with the neighbors before knocking the door, said the police.
The police who questioned the security staff said that he managed to obtain a photo album from Payal's residence. "This means the visitor who is suspected to have slit Payal's throat, is known to the family," said a police officer adding that even there was no forceful entry.
"We have begun questioning a few people, including her (victim's) husband," Sonia Narang, DCP, South Division. Payal was found murdered with her throat slit in her one-bedroom apartment on Friday.
JCP (Crime) Alok Kumar said, "We are verifying all relevant data. We believe we are on the right track and will crack the case."
Surekha's laptop has been seized to scrutinise her e-mails, sources said, adding the mobile phone of Mishra, a native of Orissa and who still holds a Cuttack number, has also been confiscated.
Surekha, a resident of Assam, had married Mishra about five years ago after falling in love with him. Mishra, a gym instructor, is currently unemployed.

event_or_fact.property: We are verifying all relevant data.; We believe we are on the right track and will crack the case.

description.hltext_display: 一粒石子引发的“血案”，玻璃险能买就买了吧(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
郁闷！杯具！上周在高速上，被一块小石头把前挡风玻璃击中了！还好宝马的玻璃比较结实，没有穿洞。
一张购物卡引发的血案 真是的，能早点说 (2010-12-14)
陕西西安建筑科技大学发生血案 一男生被捅死(图) (2010-12-08)
高校频发杀人血案是谎言教育惹的祸 (2010-12-08)
暴强 机长：“靠，强龙压不过地头蛇，不拉他给你飞机玻璃砸喽 ” (2010-12-17)
钦州市区内小学玻璃让人大吃一惊(图) (2010-12-14)
俄罗斯圣彼得堡列宁像被不明身份人士炸毁 附近房屋的玻璃被震碎 (2010-12-08)
像小石子一样活着 (2010-11-09)
一颗小石子，激起翻天浪 (2010-09-23)
郑西高铁揭秘：监测系统可见6公里外石子(图) (2010-01-30)
我都搞不清楚是哪里来的小石子，吓了一大跳，幸亏驾驶经验比较丰富，否则要出大事。真是一粒石子引发的“血案”，飞来横祸啊！
1.jpg (53.99 KB)
描述：1.jpg
还好我当时在平安的官网买车险的时候，随手把玻璃单独破损险也买了，否则不知道要自己掏多少大洋，平安的“资料齐全，万元以内，一天赔付”还不是徒有虚名，这个小case一天时间就把钱打到我账户了。
有车的同志们，不要以为玻璃险上不上无所谓，现在高速路上神马都有，小石子碎玻璃大石块是常有的事情，一旦遇上就是一场杯具，万事都要未雨绸缪，有条件的话就上一个玻璃险，也没多少钱，用平安网上的车险报价器看一下，普通家用轿车的玻璃险也就一百多，当然玻璃也分国产还是进口，看自己车子定吧。比起原厂玻璃动辄几百上千的价格，哪个合算，一看便知。

description.hltext_display: Software Escrow Service Costs - What Is It?
description.content: The software escrow costs are usually depending on the size and involvedness on the transaction, also about the responsibility assumed plus the cost of providing the service. Because there are a great deal of escrows service types, as well as every transaction is unique, there aren't set software escrow costs. It could be expected to charge additional software escrow costs for additional services performed through the escrow course.Some escrow agents provide escrow plan to their publishers without the need of software escrow costs or no cost, so there isn't a initial setup fees, no product submission fees with out monthly or annual fees. They share the annual escrow source code license fees 50/50 together with the customer, in case their customer gets annual for $2,500 - the agent can pay $1,250 and keep the other $1,250 because of their costs in running the escrow service.Software escrow costs are different among states as well as from the county with a county and dependant upon customers' local area. Generally, the bigger the areas, the bigger the software escrow costs are. In particular, the fees a great escrow service in Southern California are minimum $550.00 to get a refinance transaction with regards to the complexity of your transaction. Typically, as software escrow agent charges both software's developer company along with the customer for utilizing their services, the software escrow costs are usually diversified so that it isn't an excessive amount of for every party who involve from the contract.Upon request, your escrow agent can provide a quote of software escrow costs and also other costs charged by others. Usually the software escrow costs are divided in conformity while using the agreement on the parties. Although many people complain concerning the software escrow costs involved in the transaction, it is a necessary key to protect the two of you during a high-end business arrangement.Many individuals believe the software escrow costs are set by law, but are not. The cost of software escrow service is set by each escrow company or escrow agent, and not by regulated by law or by state statues; however, you'd better look at your state statue for regulation on software escrow costs. For detail information about Software Escrow here at: http://topsoftwareescrow.com They present you a lot of useful tips and explanation for free!

description.hltext_display: Police: Thousands of tons of wild animals smuggled through Vietnam to China in past year
description.content:
Published on December 22nd, 2010
Topics :
Department of Environmental Police , Vietnam , China , HANOI
HANOI, Vietnam - Police in Vietnam say an estimated 4,500 tons of wild animals — mostly snakes, turtles and pangolins — have been smuggled through the Southeast Asian country during the past year.
Lt. Col. Vu Duyen Hai of the Department of Environmental Police says the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines.
Hai says the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials. He says he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals.
He said Wednesday that the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

event_or_fact.property: he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals
the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines
the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials
the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

description.hltext_display: Fenton man dies in snowmobile accident
description.content:
Indian River, Mich. —
Few details are available concerning the death of a mid-Michigan man who police say died in a snowmobile accident early Sunday in Tuscarora Township.
Matthew Ray Corey, 23, was killed after he lost control of the snowmobile he was driving and ran into a driveway post. Police say that Corey took a ride on a friend’s snowmobile and was not wearing a helmet when the accident occurred.
According to police Corey is from the Fenton, Mich., area. They believe alcohol was a factor in the accident.

description.hltext_display: 淘宝网购每小时超过1亿 刷新网络零售纪录
description.content:
昨日零点，淘宝“全民疯抢”年度大促销正式开抢，仅第一分钟淘宝网就成交了1万多笔。火爆场面持续升温，截至昨日记者发稿，周围还有不少朋友趴在电脑前抢购商品。
在人们就要叹息着告别“涨”声连连的2010年时，淘宝网推出了“满100减50”的“全民疯抢”活动，再次引发了中国网民的一次集体围抢。
上午10点后
每小时卖出1个亿
1分钟，淘宝网成交笔数超过1万笔，1500件圣诞主题的小礼裙瞬间被“秒”光，不过这个火爆的场面仅仅是淘宝“全民疯抢”活动的一个序幕；5分钟， “可乐惠”卖出了705个拉杆箱，“503号仓库”的成交纪录已经达到了23页；10分钟后，一家名为“粉红大布娃娃”的淘宝女装店成交额超过了百万元；1小时后，一款九分裤卖了近3000条，包括粉红大布娃娃、七格格、天使之城在内的三家淘宝店销量破百万元……
“我们又一次领略了淘宝买家的集体疯狂，我们上下架更新产品的速度根本跟不上买家拍的速度！”淘宝网女装品牌七格格TOP潮店掌柜曹青对记者表示，到下午三点，其销量已经突破400万元。“但以我们的经验来看，真正的高潮还没来临，下午和晚上进行网购的人更多！”
淘宝网相关负责人表示，从21日上午10时开始，淘宝网的成交金额已经实现单个小时成交额超过1亿。
据悉，在中国网络零售史上目前还没有每小时实现1亿销量的先例。“估计这个量将继续保持下去，如果说21号凌晨到上午10时只是序幕的话，那之后网民的狂欢才刚刚开始，真正的高潮还没有来临。”

description.hltext_display: The Electric Company's third season debuts February 7th
description.content:
Cartoon Network will premiere its new animated series Young Justice on Friday, January 7, 2011 at 7p. Last month the network debuted a Young Justice hour-long special that introduced the series team of super heroes, which is comprised of Robin, Aqualad, Kid Flash, Superboy, Miss Martian and Artemis. Young Justice is produced by Warner Bros. Animation and based on characters from DC Comics. Brandon Vietti (Batman: Under the Red Hood, Superman Doomsday, The Batman) and Greg Weisman (Gargoyles, The Spectacular Spider-Man, W.I.T.C.H.) serve as producers on the series.
MORE KIDS STUFF
CBeebies, BBC's preschool brand, will premiere its new Let's Celebrate series in the US Hispanic market on Christmas Day, Saturday, December 25, at 4p. All this week leading up to the debut of Let's Celebrate, CBeebies will feature its Christmas Special block, daily 11a-1p, featuring holiday-themed episodes of its many preschool series. Then, on Christmas Day, Cbeebies will feature a Christmas marathon, 11a-4p, culminating with the launch of Let's Celebrate. Each episode of Let's Celebrate explores different stories and customs behind religious and cultural festivals as it visits kids and their families in different communities. Festivals featured in the series include, Vaisakhi, Eid-ul-Fitr, Holi, Wesak, Purim, Diwali, Easter, St Patrick's Day, St David's Day, St George's Day, St Andrew's Day and Norouz.
The third season of The Electric Company ( www.pbskidsgo.org/electriccompany ) will launch on Monday, February 7, 2011 on PBS Kids Go! (check local listings). The new season of The Electric Company is comprised of 12 new episodes, which will debut each Monday. Building on the series goal of developing literacy skills, the theme for the new season of The Electric Company is math vocabulary. Additionally, season three will introduce new segments and two new characters Coy Stewart (Are We There Yet?) will play Marcus Barnes, who inherits a math superpower, and Carly Sonenclar (Les Miserables) will play Gilda Flip, a prankster in training. Also, special guest appearances this season include Alan Cumming, Benji and Joel Madden (Good Charlotte), music producer/rapper Swizz Beats, comedians Jenny Slate and Sherrod Small, and Wyatt Cenac (The Daily Show), as well as music's Doug E. Fresh.
HBO will debut the new HBO presentation The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway in 2011. HBO will record the special presentation of the current Broadway show at the Stephen Sondheim Theatre in NYC, following its run that ends January 2, 2011. While not specifically targeted to kids, The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway, like the Paul Reubens' Pee-wee's Playhouse TV series, works on many levels for different age groups. Reubens' first Pee-Wee Herman special debuted three decades ago. The new special, like the first, will be directed by Marty Callner, who has directed a range of HBO comedy specials. Reubens is also working with writer/director/producer Judd Apatow to develop a new Pee-Wee feature film.
MTV Networks International inks deals in Latin America for Nickelodeon's series True Jackson, VP. Channels acquiring the live-action comedy include UCV TV (Chile) takes season one of the series, with Monte Carlo TV (Uruguay) picking up the first 25 episodes. TeleTica (Costa Rica) signs on for additional episodes of True Jackson, VP (episodes 114-125 from season 1 and episodes 201-210 from season 2). Viewers of Venevision (Venezuela) and Teleamazonas (Ecuador) will be able to watch the series on the new Nickelodeon blocks that will be featured on those channels under newly complete deals.
DHX Media is launching a new iPad app based on its CBeebies TV series Grandpa in My Pocket. The new Grandpa in my Pocket: Horatio Heave Ho! eBook app will be available initially in the UK via UK iTunes, and will rollout later in other territories. The app will be available for iPhone and iPod Touch in spring 2011. Narrated by Jason Mason, the ebook features Horatio Heave Ho!, the Sunnysands Bank Manager that really wants to be a pirate. When he decides to search for treasure at the beach, Grandpa dons his shrinking cap to help teach him there's more to life than treasure. The app includes features such as tapping the little Grandpa on each page to make him run and then try to catch him and make him sparkle, tap Horatio and play pirate, and take part in the word and actions of the pirate song. The Grandpa in My Pocket TV series can be seen around the world and is produced with participation from Finance Wales and produced by Adastra Creative.
Spain's Zinkia Entertainment is releasing its second Pocoyo app, Coloring with Pocoyo and Friends, worldwide specifically for the iPad but also available for the iPhone and iPod Touch. The app can be purchased and downloaded in English and Spanish. New coloring pages will be available on demand via the app. Downloading the app provides the user with seven days premium access to the Premium Club at pocoyoworld.com ( www.pocoyoworld.com ), Pocoyo's virtual world online destination. The app is based on the Pocoyo CGI animated preschool TV series, which is co-produced by Zinkia and ITV Studios Global Entertainment. Bandai America, the master toy licensee for the property in the US and Canada, recently released a line of Pocoyo toys. The series airs in the US on the Nick Jr. channel, PBS, Univision and Discovery Familia.
Program Call: Cynopsis Media will be producing our annual NATPE Shopping Guide sent to all Cynopsis and Cynopsis Kids subscribers on Thursday, January 20, the week before NATPE 2011 in Miami. If you would like to have your programming included, please send us only the following info for your top 5 shows: title, availability date, number of episodes, length, type (i.e., movie, series, special, etc.), genre and your terms (barter, cash, etc.) as well as your company's stand/booth location. To be included in this free and highly-viewed special edition, please send your submission to lisa@cynopsis.com no later than Friday, January 14, 2011. A confirmation email will be sent following each submission from Lisa (if you don't receive a confirmation email, please resubmit).

description.hltext_display: University archaeologist fined $5,000 and allowed to leave in marijuana transport case
description.content:
A university archaeologist, whom a court pre sentence report says was a “mule” meant to transport marijuana from Ofu to Tutuila, has been sentenced to pay a fine and is allowed to depart American Samoa — his temporary home for the last six months.
Daniel R. Welch was initially charged with one count of unlawful possession of a controlled substance — marijuana — with intent to distribute, a felony punishable by not more than 20 years imprisonment and a fine of not more than $20,000.
Under the plea agreement with the government, the 26-year old Welch pled guilty to aiding and abetting to sell the illegal substance, a crime punishable by 5 years in jail, a $5,000 fine or both.
Welch, an archaeologist with the University of Texas A&M was in Manu’a in July studying ancient pottery and was returning to Tutuila on the MV Sili when he was caught with the contraband, following a joint search by the local customs and the U.S. Coast Guard, who received an anonymous tip about the marijuana.
Welch, who has been out on a $20,000 bond, has been in the territory several times for his work. He appeared in High Court yesterday for sentencing, where his attorney Assistant Public Defender Stephanie Berrens asked the court for a sentence of paying the $5,000 fine.
She says it “makes economic sense” to pay the fine, especially the fact that Welch is not a resident of American Samoa, does not pay taxes to the local government and sentencing him to jail will only cost the government more money.
She recalled a previous testimony in court by a TCF warden who stated that it costs more than $100 a day per inmate in expenses including meals, to which Chief Justice Kruse interjected for the defense, to stick to the case and sentencing.
Berrens says Welch has been in the territory for six months and therefore cannot continue his work and education for his doctorate degree.
According to the defense, paying a fine of $5,000 makes economic sense and allows Welch to return to the U.S. to continue his education and work.
She also stated that Welch loves the territory and the people of American Samoa and he was under pressure to help people. Additionally, Welch has devoted his research to Samoan culture and has been in the territory eight times to study ancient Samoan.
Berrens also informed the judges that Welch’s supervisor has stated that if Welch does not return to the U.S. the supervisor would lose grant funding for the study of ancient Samoan culture.
According to a profile of Dr. Suzanne L. Eckert of the Department of Anthropology at Texas A&M University, Welch and Eckert worked on a project last year for the U.S. National Park Service and American Samoa Historic Preservation Office.
The same profile for Eckert also states that Welch earned his MA in 2008 and since 2009 was a PhD student at Texas A&M. The profile lists several Samoan culture projects spearheaded by Eckert, who is Welch’s supervisor.
At yesterday’s court hearing, Berrens urged the court to review the probation and pre-sentence reports, adding that the appropriate sentence is for her client to pay the $5,000 fine.
When asked by Chief Justice Michael Kruse if the defendant wants to address the court, Welch said no. As for the government, Assistant Attorney General Ralph Guerra left sentencing up to the discretion of the court.
Kruse says that the pre-sentence report called the defendant a “mule” who transported the illegal substance to a certain person in Tutuila for people he knew in Ofu. The Chief Justice pointed out that he would not publicly identify the individual in the event there is an investigation by the government.
Kruse ordered Welch to a pay a $5,000 fine and he was also to serve one year in jail, but the execution of the jail term is suspended and Welch was placed on five years probation.
He also imposed several conditions of probation which include being subject to random searches of his body and belongings when he is in the territory doing his doctorate thesis. Welch is also to be a law abiding citizen and not to get involved in any drugs — while in the territory.
“The court has no objections if he departs the territory”, said Kruse, who says there is an “interesting” issue in the pre-sentence report, which is that Welch believed palagis were not searched when they’re on the inter-island ferry.
Kruse said he hopes this serves as a lesson that even palagis get searched.
He then questioned the government as to the whereabouts of the marijuana in this case, to which Guerra said he believes it has not yet been returned from the U.S. where it was sent to be tested.
The Chief Justice has set a Jan. 7 hearing to receive the evidence and decide on its deposition, if the evidence is back on island. The disposition of the evidence is also dependent on the government if it’s needed in the future, in the event the government does carry out an investigation into the person who was supposed to receive the marijuana on Tutuila.
Berrens informed the court that Welch is out on a $20,000 bail and requested the $5,000 fine be deducted from the bail money to which Kruse granted the request.

description.hltext_display: 2010款新景程在雪天发生的故障 转(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
上周二车辆送4S店钣金油漆，周三傍晚4S来电通知周四可以取车，周四一早前往4S店取车。
新景程自动豪华 1个月感受(图) (2010-11-05)
新景程改装成跑车 注意车头下面位置的不同(图) (2010-08-11)
转 山城本溪连续两场暴雪后EMT1.4优逸的表现让我吃惊(图) (2010-12-22)
玩转广州车展，玩转上海通用(图) (2010-12-22)
雪天驾驶技巧全功略 (2010-12-21)
下雪天行车需要注意些什么危险点 (2010-12-20)
轿车防滑制动系统故障诊断方法解析 (2010-12-22)
怎样判断和挤除汽车转弯时后桥异声故障 (2010-12-17)
股市是个提款机 2010年 设好止损，万事大吉 (2010-12-22)
广电总急，2010的最后一急(图) (2010-12-22)
报一报刚才发生的巨?的事 (2010-12-22)
二战时发生的超级搞笑的事情 (2010-12-21)
我所感受的2010款标致307手动豪华 三箱 (2010-12-03)
2010款A3动力和油耗 (2010-11-18)
由于周三恰逢上海降雪，虽然此次降雪不是很大，但由于是直接降雪，属于干雪的那种，因此还是很多地方积雪了，同时，周三晚上的气温也骤降到了零下2度，积雪一个晚上没有化，周四早上取车的时候车子是这个样子的。。
1.jpg (36.59 KB)
用车上自己准备的在IKEA买的刮窗器去除了前档的积雪，然后驾车出发，途中车顶有部分积雪从前档风落下，于是使用了雨刮器刮除，返回家里拿取了一下东西，返回车内后再次发动就再也无法发动起来了。仔细回忆，并未发现什么操作上的不妥。经过数次的发动尝试，不敢再试，车子肯定是出问题了，由于车辆发动启动电机的声音正常，因此初步判定为供油问题，第一时间想到的是否保险丝熔断。同时发现车辆如下电器发生故障：
1、雨刮器喷水档及第一档(有间歇调整的那档)不工作
2、电子可调后视镜无法调整
3、四扇电动门窗无反应
4、钥匙开启状态下方向灯无法启动(双跳灯开启正常)
以上问题更加确认了电路方面的问题
打开两处保险丝(车内及引擎盖内)，有点晕了，原来赛欧的时候没有那么多的保险丝啊，而且那么多的电气系统同时故障，很难排查，咋办呢？只能地毯式了。
引擎盖里的保险丝盒(电池的右侧，大灯的后面)
2.jpg (56.21 KB)
保险丝盒打开的状态
3.jpg (48.48 KB)
前保险丝盒近景:
4.jpg (57.89 KB)
前部各保险丝说明(在盒盖背后)
5.jpg (40.18 KB)

description.hltext_display: 网购货物爆仓 快递公司被迫给员工加薪
description.content:
某快递公司到港的快件堆满仓库
年关逼近，各家网购商家开始大力促销，网购交易量大增，各家快递爆仓严重。记者昨日获悉，为应对爆仓，快递公司不得不给员工加薪；邮政为快递开通绿色通道；甚至有电子商务网站开始与部分快递公司合作，确保快递畅通，帮商户减压。
网商促销成交暴增
百度乐酷天人士介绍，该商城内各类目商品的销售均有一定程度的增长，食品、服装、3C类最明显。其中，服装和3C类产品的销售增幅接近50%。来自京东商城统计显示，12月前两周相比11月前两周各类产品销售额增长超过150%，图书类商品销售额增长近300%。
在淘宝网，“全国快递爆仓，收货时间延迟”、“江浙沪等地发货延迟2至3天”、“近期停止发货，暂定恢复时间为21日”等店铺公告屡见不鲜。
记者近日调查发现，以往上门取件，电话下单后一般一两个小时内业务员就会上门，但近期往往半天都来不了，其客服热线，几十分钟都打不通已是常事。
“我们基本没有发不完货或者派不完件的现象，但其他公司发货量更大，一个派件员一天只能派100多票，根本忙不过来。”韵达快递江北公司一业务人员说，一天发一百多票货物的淘宝商家在重庆并不鲜见。据他所知，重庆红旗河沟附近有个卖家一天的发货量是300~400票。

description.hltext_display: Distressed Together With Your PC's Efficiency? Understand Exactly How Registry Purifiers Will Aid!
description.content: Just like an automobile your PC wants normal upkeep to maintain it working smoothly. One of the most critical items to test is the Windows registry. What is a registry? The registry is a database which has the information about your PC. For instance it comprises information about what kind of hardware is inside the PC or attached to your PC. Also it has details about operating method settings and settings you produced towards the software program you installed. Changes to these settings are stored as keys inside the registry. These settings are examine and modified from your second you begin till you shut down your PC. When you uninstall software the keys are possibly altered or removed through the registry. Sadly the software program doesn't generally remove all the facts through the registry.Problems happen because these settings are not correctly removed after deleting plans from your pc. Apart from leading to program mistakes you may also knowledge performance loss. Properly known errors that may occur are blue screens or program mistakes when starting your PC. Windows registry cleaners can repair these problems for you personally and make your pc operating smoothly again. There is an additional solution to resolve these issues: a complete reinstall of the operating method and all of the packages you put in! This drastic solution will take you far more time and energy, simply because you've got to backup your information of every plan and also conserve all of the settings you made. I suggest utilizing Windows registry cleaners to solve the complications as opposed to doing a total reinstall.What would be the features you should search for in Windows Registry Cleaner software?You ought to search for the option to backup your current registry. This can be in circumstance anything goes incorrect with the registry repairs, the computer software can restore the outdated settings. Most registry cleansing computer software supply this option these days. Does the software offer the option to do automatic scanning? You'll be able to generally scan manually but it's nice to have the program do it for you personally. Apart from saving you time and let you concentrate on other more essential issues inside your existence you won't overlook to do it frequently! Another alternative I suggest using is the defragment or compress alternative. If the registry is more compact is size it'll load faster in memory. You'll discover this inside the efficiency of one's PC.If you are suffering from these issues with your PC, I'd recommend downloading a free trail. Most software vendors offer a totally free computer software trial model. It'll ordinarily perform a complete system scan and get rid of some of the issues. If you like the computer software you are able to buy it later trough their internet site.

description.hltext_display: Arrests made in Wolverine home invasion
description.content:
Indian River, Mich. —
Four suspects from Wolverine are being held in the Cheboygan County Jail on charges in connection with a home invasion that took place last spring.
Arraigned Tuesday in 89th District Court are Johnny A. Lanning, 20; Rebecca L. James, 19; Christopher A. Miller, 20; and 36-year-old Jessica J. Crandall. All were arrested Monday on multiple counts of home invasion, conspiracy to commit home invasion and receiving and concealing stolen property.
Read more HERE in Wednesday's edition of the Daily Tribune

description.content: Many of you are asking what to do if you get pulled over for dui [Drive Under the Influence]Dui Attorney Many of you are asking what to do if you get pulled over for dui [Drive Under the Influence]There is only one answer for this: Call your DUI attorney. You must know also that the fees for a DUI attorney will be lower if this is your first time been accused. description.hltext_display: Quo vadis, Augusta Vindelicum? - Teil 2
description.content:
Gestern stand in der AA ja folgender Artikel: Unterm Pfärrle liegt eine riesige Markthalle. Grundsätzlich ist die Existenz dieser Markthalle ja eigentlich ein alter Hut. Der wohlbekannte Augsburger "Maulwurf" Ohlenroth hatte bereits in seinem in den 50er Jahren erstellten Augsburger Stadtplan auf die Existenz der Halle hingewiesen. Desweiteren fand das Thema desöfteren Eingang in die nachfolgende Forschungsliteratur - zuletzt in der Dissertation von Bettina Tremmel im Jahr 2001 (Bettina Tremmel, Die Holzbauten des 1. Jahrhunderts n. Chr. im Kastellvicus von Augusta Vindelicum/Augsburg). Es wäre daher interessant gewesen, aus dem Artikel herauslesen zu können, warum gerade jetzt dieses Thema wieder "ausgegraben" worden ist.
Dies ist jedoch nur ein kleines Malheur und nicht weiter schlimm. Letztendlich muss man Frau Ute Krogull ja dankbar sein, dass sie ein römisches Thema wieder aufgegriffen hatte, um die historische Vergangenheit dieser schönen Stadt ins Gedächtnis zu rufen. Denn wie ich hier in meinem früheren Blog Quo vadis, Augusta Vindelicum? - Teil 1 bereits geschrieben habe: In keiner anderen deutschen Stadt wird das römische Erbe so stiefkindlich behandelt wie in Augsburg. Wenn man dazu im Vergleich Städte wie Xanten, Trier, Köln, Mainz oder Regensburg betrachtet, kommen einem die Tränen. Selbst die kleine Allgäuer Stadt Kempten liefert mit dem Archäologischen Park Cambodunum ein Musterbeispiel, wie es eigentlich auch in Augsburg (zwingend) laufen müsste!
Und das war der Trauer noch lange nicht letzter Schluss: Finden bereits die Ausgrabungsbefunde kaum bis gar keine Beachtung, dann gilt dies für das Fundmaterial ganz genauso. Den Verantwortlichen in der Stadtverwaltung (Gribl, Grab, Trepesch) geht das Thema ganz offensichtlich an der rechten Gesäßhälfte vorbei. Anders ist die einfach nur desaströs zu bezeichnende Depotsituation nicht zu bezeichnen. Die Stadtarchäologie sucht seit Jahrzehnten (!!!) ein vernünftiges Depot für ihre Funde. Zwar ist es nicht so, dass überhaupt keine Depots vorhanden wären - jedoch sind der Kieserkeller (bei Kongresshalle), der AZ-Keller (Ludwigspassage) und die Kälberhalle (Schlachthof) bis oben hin gestopft voll. Und in eiskalten, dunklen Räumen, in denen sich Schimmel und Spinnweben gegenseitig die Hand geben, ist es doch nicht verwunderlich, dass Koriphäen von internationalem Rang nicht nach Augsburg kommen wollen. Tja Augsburg, das ist nicht mehr nur traurig, das ist erbärmlich. Wieder eine tolle Chance verpasst...
Hiermit äußere ich einen Weihnachtswunsch an das Christkind: Lieber Herr Gribl, lieber Herr Grab, machen Sie doch in den Weihnachtsferien einen Ausflug nach Kempten - ist ja von Augsburg aus nicht so weit weg. Schauen Sie sich einmal an, wie woanders mit weniger Substanz mehr getan wird. Das mag Ihnen als Beispiel dienen. Vergessen Sie aber bitte nicht, den Herrn Trepesch mitzunehmen - der kann da auch noch was lernen (außer Silberputzen).

description.hltext_display: 晒晒我的开车经历
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
您知道吗，现如今在北京，这开车上下班已经不流行了。
买车一步到位，今儿牵出来晒晒(图) (2010-12-22)
请高手帮忙介绍一款家用打印机 顺便晒晒新买的东东 (2010-12-21)
我第一次开车经历 现在想来害怕 (2006-04-18)
无知者无畏：我最初的开车经历 真实 (2006-02-03)
走自己的路，让别人开车去吧 (2010-12-22)
开车要讲车德 车德体现在每一细节 (2010-12-21)
一次奇怪而又愉快的论文答辩经历 (2010-12-22)
中国人很感慨：回想当初只身到越南娶妻的真实经历 (2010-12-21)
上下班高峰时候开车在人多拥挤的道路上，看见满眼的红灯心就凉了半截，一进入车海就被蜂拥着挤来挤去，这样进退两难的处境如果您曾经经历过肯定心有余悸。
以我自己为例吧，当初是因为家离单位比较远才买的车车。后来，单位搬到了离单位较近的上地软件园旁，我家在清河，我看过里程表，加上在小区里的路程，从我们家到单位的历程10公里，够近的吧。可要是开车，通过小营桥往经过二炮路，到上地环岛再到单位，最快的时候要四十分钟，稍微堵一点车要一个小时。有一次赶上周一早上大爆堵，不瞒您说，我从小区出来，堵了四十分钟刚到清河桥，连主路都还没上呢。当时我看着前后左右无处不是车，而且那些车动都不动，当时心里那个绝望劲就别提了。不怕您笑话，当时我就把车停路边了，看了看地图后，楞是后来从五道口绕到圆明园西路，最后才到的单位。迟到了挨领导训不说，自己也是一肚子委屈一肚子气。

description.hltext_display: WoW Gold Guide Secrets That No One Else Knows About
description.content: World of Warcraft is currently leading MMORPGs. Gamers should understand how important collecting gold is for maximizing your character. When you have gold, your character can buy needed items and level up quickly. Gold can also be utilized for other purposes, such as for training your character and for learning different skills which can be used for fighting mobs and completing quests. This is the reason you need an easy method to locate World of Warcraft gold. If you play World of Warcraft you can now buy guides that help you find gold. There are guides for all of the different professions. You cannot use the same guide for all of the professions. Getting the perfect character guide is important if you want to make a lot of gold. It is helpful to understand that each character uses different strategies to level up and quickly find gold. How to find gold for your character class should be contained in the guide with specific instructions. With the help of the right guide the entire process from finding gold to making it, will be easier. You may not be willing to forget that a guide is a guide and a cheat is a cheat and you should not mix up the two. You are not allowed to use bots or any other form of cheating in Wold of Warcraft. Getting caught doing that will get Blizzard's World of Warcraft police very angry with you. Your wow account will be banned due to the cheats you use in the World of Warcraft game. The time and money you invested for the game will be gone. You should buy a good gold guide so you can increase your time successfully playing the game. Looking for a guide that has instructions specifically catered to finding gold with your specific character will help. A character specific guide will tell everything you need to know in order to drastically increase the speed at which your character finds gold. If you use the right guides it will make getting gold easier. To insure your status in the World of Warcraft, you must understand the various methods to accumulate gold, which are included in your character's gold guide. If you want a quick way to make gold in World of Warcraft, these guides are not the answer. The only information that it will give you are details on how to be more efficient when making gold, in the game.

description.hltext_display: 优酷上市引视频收获期 传搜狐分拆视频上市
description.content:
尽管尚未盈利，但一周前优酷在美国的“强势”登陆已经让人们看到国内视频行业的潜力与前景，收获期在即，传统门户代表自然也不会放过视频蛋糕。现身广州的搜狐联席总裁兼首席运营官王昕日前表示，“搜狐在2010年已经凭借以影视与综艺节目为主的正版、高清、长视频模式，用一年时间就跻身行业三强。”
据悉，2010年搜狐在采买视频版权方面的投资就已经达到一亿元以上，而同年搜狐视频又拨出超过版权采购总额两倍的专项资金，针对全国的带宽节点进行了大范围调整，在全国架设五十多个节点，CD N架构调整策略，使不同地区的用户均能实现在搜狐视频高清流畅观看，并已经全面实现iP ad、iP hone以及G pad、G phone等多终端布局。公司方面更表示，将与同行一道全面提速2011中国视频市场。
与此同时，业界也传出搜狐可能拆分视频业务、仿效之前网游分公司畅游(N A SD A Q：CY O U )而独立上市的计划，不过公司高层表示，对这一传言不予置评。
视频竞争强调“媒体影响力”
搜狐视频资深主编于涛在接受记者采访时透露，公司2011年共采买了三百部的首播新剧，其中约40部为独家剧，“亿元级的影视剧视频版权投入在行业可以说是首屈一指。”据了解，目前视频行业电视剧独家播放版权的售价大概在二三百万人民币。
不过，此前一周优酷IPO募资了2.03亿美元，一跃从此前的创业公司成长为手中有大笔资金储备的上市公司，优酷方面表示，也会用这笔资金在技术、内容方面进行大量的储备，再加上之前借壳上市的酷6网，以及随后可能即将上市的土豆网，而这是否意味着视频行业会再度掀起“水涨船高”的版权竞价？

description.hltext_display: 车展看过，更纠结了(图)
description.content:
.*发贴时间：2010-12-22【复制本帖地址】[必看]
今天和弟弟一家去看广州车展，本来目的是去看科鲁兹的，看完后发现别克展区就在旁边，顺便去看了一下英朗GT，早先弟弟就做了不少功课了，比较的几款车型里就有英朗GT，还有个什么车型的,忘记了，结果现场看下来弟弟又犹豫了，诶~买车难，选车更难！
放些图上来，有懂行的兄弟来说说，买啥好呢~？
科鲁兹1.6T
大气拉风的外型，充满着年轻的气息。
今年成都车展看啥子? 美女和靓车好多哦(图) (2010-09-20)
逛车展看香车美女(图) (2010-08-30)
车展刚看过，更纠结了(图) (2010-12-22)
CNNIC正在给员工发放股票，跳槽的心更纠结了 (2009-09-02)
2010年广州车展 美女集锦 2(图) (2010-12-22)
小偷车展被抓现行惨遭群众爆头(图) (2010-12-22)
《暮光之城3：月食》：在纠结中做出选择(图) (2010-12-22)
神州数码网络创新中国行 我看行 (2010-12-22)
广府现在这么火，我看只有一个词，定位 (2010-12-22)
淡看车展上车模与车之外那些不起眼的关键部分(图) (2010-12-22)
看车展，看大片(图) (2010-12-20)
当然喽，外型方面估计个人的标准不一样，不过我弟弟蛮中意小科的，说是有点极品飞车的味道。
英朗GT
外型饱满圆润，流畅的外型略带些儒雅的风范。
这车我比较看好，或许是年龄的关系，略保守些。
科鲁兹讲究全黑内饰，从驾驶侧车门~仪表盘~中控台~手套箱~副驾驶车门一气呵成，这种延伸的设计感和中控的运动感更强。
英朗GT是浅灰色基调，车内大量使用镀铬和拉丝装饰，尤其是中控这一块，闪亮闪亮的，感觉很好看，也很显档次。
科鲁兹的1.6T涡轮增压发动机在同级中算得上是上乘，百公里加速8.7。
感觉因为英朗GT体型更饱满的关系，所以车重是不是会比科鲁兹重一些？假设确实轻一些的话，那么这就将直接影响到加速的效果了，百公里11.9略不给力。
科鲁兹配置有ABS+EBD、弯道控制系统CBC、发动机阻力矩控系统EDC和最高6个安全气囊，还标配了安吉星Onstar全时在线助理，不过缺少了ESC车身电子稳定控制系统，这个系统的具体作用目前还不明确，有懂的兄弟来解释下。
在科鲁兹车上缺失的ESC在英朗GT可是标配，而且英朗GT是第一款配备安吉星系统的中级车型。安吉星借助GPS全球卫星定位系统和无线通信技术，为车主提供“碰撞自动求助”、“紧急救援”、“安全保障”、“导航”、“车况检测”和“全音控免提电话”共六大类14项随车服务，是世界最先进的车载通信服务系统。
写在最后：
同为通用旗下同平台车型，英朗GT和科鲁兹的外形设计走了完全不同的路线，给人感觉英朗GT圆润饱满，科鲁兹刚劲有力，相信这与它们的定位有关，相比科鲁兹的年轻化，英朗GT或许更适合年龄大一点的消费群体吧，有说错的地方还望车友们包涵哈~
多多指教，同事也祝我老弟早日新车入手！
向好友推荐本贴：
标题：《 》
地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2088250c10p1.html

description.hltext_display: Boston use "flash mob" dance to promote reading
description.content:
BOSTONHundreds of Boston elementary school students and teachers are expected to participate in a "flash mob" dance to encourage teenagers to read.
Such events typically involves a mob of participants that suddenly materializes in a public place, engages in a seemingly spontaneous dance and then disperses. They are often promoted through Web sites and word of mouth.
About 340 people from Gardner Pilot Academy in Allston are scheduled to participate in a "flash mob" dance Wednesday morning at the public school. Participants include students and teachers from kindergarten through grade 5.
Organizers say the event was inspired by students at the Ocoee Middle School in central Florida who used a similar approach to promote reading. The event was featured on "The Oprah Winfrey Show".

description.hltext_display: In Mantralaya... working days: 580, attendance: zero
description.content:
In Mantralaya... Working days: 580 Attendance: Zero
MiD DAY's RTI response reveals some employees in the seat of power have not reported to work for even a single day in two years; departmental inquiries are still pending
IT pays to be a government servant. For, where else would you not be sacked if you did not report to duty for even one day in almost two years?
That, unfortunately, is the state of affairs in Mantralaya where action is still pending against such employees, as was revealed in the Law and Judiciary department's reply to an RTI by MiD DAY.
However, despite filing the RTI application on absenteeism in Mantralaya almost a month back, the 34 other departments have not replied to it at all.
The RTI was sent to the Public Information Officer, General Administration Department (GAD), on November 25, 2010.
It sought information on Mantralaya staffers who remained away from duty and the action that was taken against them by the government.
On December 6, S B Dalvi, information officer from the Law and Judiciary department, replied to the RTI and stated that 5 out of the 300-plus employees in the department have been irregular at work and have not been reporting to duty for more than 18 months. Here are the stars:
Sanjay Sudam Gangurde
Description: Employed as a desk officer with the Law and Judiciary department for the last 20 years, Gangurde, a Virar resident, has not been reporting to work since January 2009.
Number of offs: Out of 309 working days in 2009 and 271 working days in 2010, Gangurde has not reported to work on a single day.
Reason: This reporter visited Gangurde's residence and was told by an elderly lady that Gangurde was plagued by a personal problem, which was amplified by his brother's death last year. Gangurde's colleagues confirmed this.
Departmental action: Enquiries by MiD DAY revealed that Gangurde was paid his salary till May 2009. His monthly salary of approximately Rs 21,000 has been deposited to the government treasury since then and a departmental inquiry is pending against him.
P V Gite
Description: Gite works as an assistant in the Law and Judiciary department
Number of offs: In 2009, Gite was off duty for 306 days and worked for only 3 days. In 2010, he has been present for 93 days, absent for 142 and has taken 46 leaves.
Reason: In his explanation, Gite said that he was on election duty in 2009 and was hospitalised after contracting viral fever in 2010.
Departmental action: Gite's superiors have put his explanation before the disciplinary committee and necessary action will be taken if he fails to convince the committee with documentary evidence.
Sneha Anilkumar Sonawane
Description: A Kurla resident and a clerk in the same department, Sonawane has also been very irregular in reporting to work.
Number of offs: In 2009, she reported to work on 93 days, remained absent for 142 and her offs were adjusted as leave 46 times. Her performance worsened in 2010, when she reported to work for only 6 days and remained absent for 303.
Reason: Sonawane's office colleagues revealed that she had some personal problems and was finding it difficult to take care of her mentally-challenged child, who needs round-the-clock attention.
Departmental action: Inquiries conducted by
MiD DAY revealed that Sneha was paid her salary till June 2009. A departmental inquiry is pending against her.
Satish Tapase and Prakash Aher
These clerk-cum-typists remained absent for the bulk of 2009 and 2010. Departmental inquiries have been initiated against them and their salaries have been withheld.
Study in Contrasts
On November 24 ('Meet Mantralaya's Mr Hard Working'), MiD DAY had reported about Milind Damodar Choudhary, a bill accountant in the General Administration Department, who has put in the most working hours among all employees in the last one-and-a-half years.
Choudhary, a commerce graduate from Thane, spends around 10 to 12 hours everyday, including on weekends, at Mantralaya.

description.hltext_display: 體現兩岸特色？小英：自我矮化(中央社)
description.content:
討論 (+)
調整字級：
（中央社記者溫貴香台北22日電）民主進步黨主席蔡英文今天表示，投保協議的共識文字，出現「體現兩岸特色」的文字太輕率，等於是自動放棄國際規範的保護傘，也是自我矮化。
蔡英文下午在中常會致詞表示，第6次江陳會有關投資保障協議（簡稱投保協議）不但沒有簽署，且根據21日公布的「階段性共識」看來，未來投保協議的討論，是依中國設定的的方向進行。
蔡英文表示，投保協議的共識文字，出現「體現兩岸特色」。民進黨提醒，與中國交往的最佳途徑，是「從世界走向中國」；台灣不應該輕率地在兩會共識中，接受「兩岸特色」這樣的文字，這等於是自動放棄國際規範的保護傘，也是自我矮化。
她表示，民進黨要求立法院要實質審查與中國簽署的所有協議，協議授權下的工作進行，包括ECFA（經濟合作架構協議）下的「經合會（經濟合作委員會）」、衛生醫藥合作協議下的「工作組」，未來的決議與方案都應送國會審查，以避免空白授權剝奪了政府公權力。
另外，對於八德國中校園霸凌一事，蔡英文說，這顯示會報與通報機制停擺、崩解，整個體系螺絲鬆掉。她說，除了各級首長應負責外，要先對症下藥，就是「建立校園專業輔導體系，設置專業專職的輔導教師」。

description.hltext_display: Best Three Reasons to Upgrade from Managed to Colocation Web Hosting
description.content: Have you noticed that more and more companies of all sizes have moved from managed webhosting to collocation webhosting? What's the reason behind all these great changes made by many companies, not just in the United States but likewise in several companies in Europe, Canada, and all other highly-industrialized countries around the world?Well, numerous experiments have revealed that outsourced datacenters, particularly collocation centers have lined up benefits it could offer to all companies, in spite of its sizes. One of the very appealing offers is the cost savings that companies may get, as well as the scalability and technological freedom. While it's factual that putting up a datacenter is incredibly ideal for small and big companies, however the huge investment it could possibly incur along the way may also make a businessman think twice of his selections.In a collocation hosting, you must set up your own servers, storage and network equipment much like what the other clients are doing. Various other collocation companies, however, provide their own servers for rent, and also other equipment utilized in collocation. They even have their IT specialists which you can also employ for an agreed payment scheme of your choice. What this means is you can rent the servers and IT staff to sustain your webhosting for a cost and also other benefits you can decide on the packages they provide.In a Managed hosting, vendors offer not just the exclusive server but several of the management services it could possibly supply to customers. You simply need to check into the level of provided bandwidth and examine it with your needs to see if it jibe with you want. The bandwidth is often the big problem here since the bandwidth it may possibly give to customers might not be the type of bandwidth your company needs so as to operate the system very effective and reputable.Listed here are the top 3 good reasons why a great deal of today's businesses have decided to upgrade their current managed webhosting to collocation web hosting.1. More control - It is exposed by collocation providers are presenting clients more control of their data and other essential business applications. Even though your data is secured by other companies including the collocation centers, yet you'll still more control of this data. 2. Enhanced uptime - In a collocation you have improved uptime in order that it is really really tempting particularly for small companies. You have to remember that smaller companies simply have very limited budget for technology upgrade. This is why, smaller companies choose to patronize collocation if it can also give the type of quality service they assume.3. Numerous bandwidth at a lower cost - Colocation centers provide clients abundant bandwidth so that it is really really attractive for many companies. It is among the troubles of companies in managed webhosting so that because of constrained bandwidth, they can not maximize their plans and programs. What is more appealing here is the lower cost collocation centers offer despite of the fact they offer considerable bandwidth. Generally, company owners which are updated with today's technological improvements wouldn't actually hesitate to shift providers, when they understand that the new system of controlling crucial data and other business applications can be done by other folks in a very inexpensive cost.

description.hltext_display: Woolworth site plans unveiled
description.content:
Cheboygan, Mich. —
City leaders and residents got a clearer picture Tuesday of the possible plans for the downtown site currently occupied by the F.W. Woolworth building.
The picture is far from crystal-clear as John M. Beckett of Beckett & Raeder, an Ann Arbor-based engineering firm, presented six distinct options for the abandoned site then fielded questions in front of 35 people in attendance at the Cheboygan Public Library. No timetable has been set for deciding the project’s final designs, but the 45-minute presentation clearly impressed members of City Council, the Downtown Development Authority, Recreation Commission and Planning Commissions.
Read more HERE in Wednesday's edition of the Daily Tribune

description.hltext_display: 陳雲林話別 願盡力協商投保(中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者郭玫蘭台北22日電）大陸海峽兩岸關係協會會長陳雲林今天在話別時表示，兩會商談還有很多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。陳雲林說，這次商談簽署了兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議，並為另一個重要協議（兩岸投資保障協議）進行階段性總結，達成共識，雙方將盡最大努力，在不久的將來完成協商。
財團法人海峽交流基金會原訂上午11時50分在台北圓山飯店舉行話別談話會，但因班機時間延後，因此談話會延至12時30分舉行。
海基會董事長江丙坤表示，這次兩會簽署的「海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，是從人道關懷出發，以兩岸人民的健康福祉為依歸。
他說，今年透過兩岸交流，有超過600萬人次往來兩岸從事觀光、商務等活動，透過疫病的通報、緊急救護制度的建立，對兩岸人民的生命安全提供進一步保障。同時，也有機會透過兩岸合作，優勢互補，在醫藥衛生方面發展新商機，共創雙贏。
江丙坤表示，明年在兩會繼續推動協商交流下，繼續完成未完的許多協議，也將推動兩岸民間交流，希望透過這些交流和協商，讓兩岸民眾共享成果。
他說，海基會將在兩會建構的平台上，繼續推動平等協商，循序漸進，擱置爭議、追求雙贏。
陳雲林表示，第6次兩會商談，我們是帶著希望和期待而來，帶著成果而歸，為能夠讓兩岸和平發展寫下新的歷史而感到高興，為讓兩岸民眾身體健康、生命安全做出努力，感到無限欣慰。他說，兩會商談未來還有許多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙只能夠阻止進程的時間，永遠改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林對圓山飯店的熱情接待，以及負責維安的員警表達感激之意。他說，這次到台北的情況與上次有很大不同，員警的敬業精神，給他留下深刻的印象。陳雲林表示，兩會簽署的15項協議和達成兩項共識，得到相當多台灣人民的理解和支持。未來將不辜負兩岸人民期待，繼續為兩岸人民謀福祉。海基會副董事長高孔廉、副秘書長馬紹章，大陸海協會常務副會長鄭立中、執行副會長兼秘書長李亞飛、駐會副會長李炳才、副秘書長張勝林等出席談話會。陳雲林離開飯店前，現場響起陣陣掌聲，飯店人員熱情歡送，高喊「再見！歡迎再來！」。 海峽交流基金會和大陸海峽兩岸關係協會的制度性協商，由海基會董事長江丙坤和海協會會長陳雲林主談，通稱「江陳會」。991222 （中央社記者王飛華攝 99年12月22日）

description.hltext_display: 云服务、移动计算及社交网络开始走向成熟
description.content:
过去几年，转型一直是IDC年度预测的主题。这一次，迫于全球经济衰退的压力，一波颠覆性技术的浪潮已经形成，并在逐渐发展壮大。IDC预计，在2011年及以后的时间里，云服务、移动计算和社交网络等技术将走向成熟并相互交融，从而形成一个全新的主流平台，无论对IT业还是其所服务的其他行业均是如此。
这种平台的变迁将在另一个IT支出得以强势回升的年份飞速发展。IDC预计，2011年全球IT支出将达到1.6万亿元，比2010年增加5.7%。在硬件支出仍然强劲增长的情况下（同比增长7.8%），行业的发展很大程度上将取决于软件支出的提高（增长5.3%）、基于项目相关服务的增长（增长3.5%）以及外包业务的增加（增长4%）。全球IT行业的支出也将得益于新兴市场的加速恢复，它将占到2011年全球所有新增IT净支出的一半以上。
公共IT云服务方面的支出在2011年的增长幅度将达到整个IT行业的5倍以上，较2010年上升30%，因为将有内容更加广泛的业务应用会融入云技术中。中小型企业的云应用将在2011年出现井喷现象，到年底，某些云资源将会被33%的美国中型企业所接受。同时，由于基础架构、软件和服务提供商在一系列新的服务和方案上展开协作，将会有更多新生的自有云模型不断出现。此外，各厂商在两种云“强者地位”方面的争夺也会加入进来，以最终决定哪种云平台会被解决方案所采用，以及由谁来为多种公共云、客户自有云及其旧的IT环境提供一致性解决方案。
使用各种设备以及通过一系列新应用所进行的移动计算，在2011年将继续快速扩张，成为新行业平台中另一个重要的舞台。IDC预计，未来18个月应用型非PC（智能手机、媒体平板设备等）移动设备的出货量将超过个人电脑，且这种趋势将不可逆转。由于传统的PC厂商希望在这个快速扩张的市场中竭力保住自己的地位，因而移动应用市场将会有另一番争斗。这个市场的活跃程度将是令人难以置信的，IDC预计，2011年会达到近250亿次的移动应用程序下载量，而2010年这个数字将略超过100亿次。随着时间的推移，这个依然属于新生事物的应用程序生态体系一定会从根本上重组为客户提供所有数字内容和服务的渠道结构。
同时，过去18个月以来，社交商业软件在企业中的发展势头迅猛，而且这种趋势还将继续，IDC预计其到2014年的年复合增长率将达到38%。社交商业业务已成为主流是显而易见的，IDC预计，2011年将是一个整合年，因为主要的软件厂商会将各社交软件供应商招致麾下，以促进或提高其社交业务的市场影响力。此外，中小企业对社交平台的使用还将加速发展，到年底，将有超过40%的中小企业会使用社交网络进行宣传。
由于新兴的主流IT平台在未来几个月里将会出现相互交融的情况，IDC预计，它将为IT厂商支持各种“智能产业”转型并从中获益奠定坚实的基础。对零售业来说，移动通信和社交网络正在迅速改变客户的购物习惯，因为他们可以带上自己的智能手机到商店现场比较价格，并查看产品推荐。在金融服务方面，移动通信和云正逐步将移动银行和支付变成现实。而对医疗行业来说，IDC预计有14%的美国成年人会在2011年使用移动医疗应用系统。
