description.hltext_display: The reason why collocation different from other webhosting?
description.content: Never before it occur that online entrepreneurs have to evaluate the expense of web hosting services but since the competition is becoming so powerful and new web hosting players sign up for the bandwagon with their own offers and new techniques in webhosting. Before, business people would likely attempt to check out some other vendors by their offers with regards to bandwidth support, disk space and other benefits, and then they sign the contract. It's as simple as that. Yeah, it had been before yet today's webhosting offers have become much more different with so many players showing their very own kind of services. Nowadays, hosting has turned into a too-confusing matter for many entrepreneurs online due to numerous submarkets to determine, which includes service quality and prices, among others.One of the new players in web hosting is collocation. It's a fresh system that numerous people may have yet to understand how collocation functions in your online businesses. Now, let's attempt to differentiate collocation hosting from the others.Colocation Hosting In a collocation hosting, you will need to put in your own servers, storage and network equipment just like what the other clients are performing. Other collocation companies, on the other hand, present their own servers for rent, as well as other equipment used in collocation. They even have their IT specialists which you'll want to as well hire for an agreed payment scheme of your choice. This means you may rent the servers and IT staff to preserve your webhosting for a cost along with other advantages you can pick from the packages they feature.In case you assess cost with the other players in the industry, you need to think about the collocation arrangement and other expenses including the rack size, space rental, physical security support, physical access restrictions, among others. Dedicated HostingUnder a dedicated hosting plan, an exclusive server is presented by the vendor to its customers. Here the vendor also provide the client full control of the server. Should you select this service you need to think about the storage space and bandwidth size, check on the support system and also other additional costs involve in the offer.Managed HostingIn a Managed hosting, vendors supply not only the exclusive server but many of the management services it could possibly offer to clients. You should only need to check on the degree of supplied bandwidth and compare it with your demands to check if it jibe with you really want.Clustered HostingA Clustered hosting service offers of more resources beyond the limits of utilizing just a single server. Simply by spreading site resources to multiple machines, load balancing, and system protection, you will notice that clustering is targeted at increasing security, scalability and availability. If clients desire a server pool they could purchase more computing power.In evaluating costs, you have to think about verifying the support levels, bandwidth, storage, scaling computing power, restrictions, as well the level of security guarantee and availability it supply to customers.

description.hltext_display: Lampenfieber? Ambulanz hilft geplagten Musikern
description.content: Am Universitätsklinikum Bonn ist eine Lampenfieberambulanz speziell für Musiker gegründet worden – es ist die erste in Deutschland. Dort finden jene Musiker Hilfe, die panische Angst vor ihrem Auftritt haben.

妈妈去世前后我经历的一些事情 (2010-12-20)
这几天在自己身上经历的一些事情，也不知道意味着什么…… (2010-12-17)
如果没记错的话，这应该是今年油价的第四次调整了，对于有车族而言，几乎每一次的变化都会带来经济上不小的开支负担，以至于我们平时经济玩笑地说，如果油价再涨就不开车上班了。玩笑归玩笑，可油涨价的背后，也多少引发了我对某些问题的思考，远的不说，就结合现在北京尽人皆知的治理交通拥堵新政来说，如果大家都有我这样的想法，似乎问题就迎刃而解了。
交通拥堵应该是社会发展到一定程度的必然结果，城市化的程度越高，机动车的拥有量就越高，车多路少自然就产生矛盾，道路拥堵也就再正常不过。可问题是，任何事物的发展都有其必然规律，交通问题一样，必须得维持在一个相对正常、有序，能被社会大众所接受的程度，如果突破了这个限制，就会发生一系列的社会问题，在我看来，北京现实的交通状况就明显有点过头了，也是政府该出手好好管管的最佳时机。
其实管理与被管理就是一个巴掌的正反面，俗话说“一个巴掌拍不响”，在我看来，治理交通拥堵也逃不开这个道理，绝不能把所有的精力和注意力都集中在政府单方面的管理，而忽视了被管理者?－千千万万的机动车及驾驶者。我不是什么专家，无法准确的计算出北京的道路交通拥堵有多大比例是因为车多和驾驶者的不规范操作和不文明驾驶造成的，但可以肯定的一点是，这两个因素占据了不小的份量。大家应该都留意到，你生活的周围是不是有越来越多的乱停车现象，不管三七二十一，车一横就算停下了，根本不管是不是影响到其它车辆的正常通行。还有，在开车行驶过程中，你是否经常看到随意并线、有空就切、野蛮加塞、压实线、撞红灯等不遵守交通规则的行为，正是有太多的不文明驾车人直接导致原本就不太畅通的道路更加阻塞，可见，这些软件方面的提高与改进不能单靠政府的一项措施来解决，更多的要求开车人真正懂得什么是文明、礼貌和谦让。
作为管理者，我想重点说说执法的环节，现在每天发生在道路上的违章行为实在太多，可是由于警力比较紧张无法全范围内严格监控，比较容易纵容那些喜欢投机钻空子的司机，逃过一次两次可以理解，如果次次都逃避处罚，就是严重的监管不力了，所以，我十分期望交通执法能紧跟形势需要，加大监管处罚力度，狠打那种不文明的、野蛮的、喜欢投机的驾驶者，保障交通的有序、平稳运行。
向好友推荐本贴：

description.hltext_display: 邮箱扩容战再次打响 万网免费增容3-4倍
description.content:
17:03 来源：赛迪网 作者：lilin
时值年末，企业邮箱扩容大战再次轰轰烈烈打响。12月09日网易宣布免费扩容，10日，中国万网高调公布，对商务安全邮、集团邮局S系列免费扩容。据悉，这是中国万网历史上涉及用户数最多，规模最大的一次邮箱大跃进，商务安全邮总空间扩大3倍，集团邮局总空间扩大4倍。因此，吸引了业界的密切关注。
“多操作平台、多信息文件格式、海量数据传输是现今的三大趋势。因此，单一文字的邮件格式已经不能满足用户多变和个性的沟通需求，他们需要包括文字、图像、声音等多格式的沟通方式。在此基础之上，最直接的表象就是对邮箱容量的要求，要求电子邮件具有海量数据传输能力。”中国万网副总裁宋瑛桥告诉记者。
记者了解到，大容量的邮箱空间的好处是一方面可以让企业用户存储更多的邮件，不会出现因邮箱容量不足而收不到邮件的尴尬；另一方面，企业用户可以把大容量邮箱空间当作网络硬盘，上传大文件到邮箱中，比如：视频、图片等等，进行存储和分享，相当于企业用户拥有一个网络上的移动硬盘。不过，记者也发现，近几年，伴随着存储技术的不断发展，众多门户网站以及一些专业企业邮箱运营商纷纷增肥，推出海量邮箱空间产品吸引客户。
尽管，大容量邮箱已经不是什么新概念，但是，业内人士却认为，此次邮箱扩容运动最大亮点是不忽悠，对用户使用价值比较大。本次中国万网的扩容动作，不仅空间扩大，而且在邮件数量方面没有任何限制，对用户来讲颇为实用。以往一些邮箱扩容后，号称空间很大，然而与“大”相悖的是，对邮箱内可存放的邮件数量相对较小，比如仅允许保存5千或者1万封邮件，剩余空间即使再大也无法继续保存邮件，更要命的是用户一旦邮件数量存储达到限制，就会产生丢信等现象。这对于企业用户来说，相当致命，很可能造成严重的损失。
另对此次邮箱扩容运动，有人士认为；此举为2011年企业邮箱市场激烈争夺战的预演，据第三方统计显示，预计2008至2012年，中国企业邮箱的产业规模年复合增长率将达到23%，2012年将达到13亿人民币，目前发达国家企业邮箱的普及率已高达60%以上，而国内市场这一数字仅为10%，发展潜力巨大。由此可见，此次升级行动将给目前的市场留下更多想象空间。

description.hltext_display: No KERS for Virgin, Hispania
How to Efficiently Check If a Collocation Facility is Functional?
description.content: The best thing to do, before a business should try the services offered by collocation centers, is to check carefully if these colo companies can give the benefits as you anticipated them to provide, similar to the other companies which provide the similar service. This is simply because several of these companies different various benefit to entice new clients. How would you be able to obtain the best services if you don't find the best?For those who have any concerns or cobwebs in mind, you ought not be reluctant to ask a colo vendor during a physical tour of solo site. You possibly can ask for security arrangements. The colo vendor need to be able to effectively convince you of their security features, such as the access control systems, the on-site security personnel or the surveillance and also other security measures in case of threats from fires, thunder storms, flood and all other forms of natural disaster which may ruin your colo equipment.How rapid is the link between the colo facility's network and your equipment is also influenced by the capacity of the bandwidth you should use. If your link from the facility is simply one hundred Megabyte per second, essentially, that's all you can obtain, even when the colo facility utilizes numerous OC-X connections.It is also vey important to examine the uptime record of the collocation facility. You ought to be able to obtain the so-called historical data on the frequency of power outages which include its length. Your business should be guaranteed 99.9 % of the uptime result.Because colo centers supply more services, make sure to inquire during the tour when you can access your facility, because some colo offers 24/7, while there's also some who have limits. Hence, make sure you are fully aware of essential matters for your own benefits.Seeing as there are reports of network hacking, you should think about asking this question how far the network security is also made to obstruct cyber criminals. What extent of monitoring services, intrusion-detection systems, sort of firewalls along with other security actions they can supply.You see, there are a variety of things you must think of first before you think of obtaining services of collocation centers. Don't be too trusting of the numerous benefits they shout to attract companies. The most important is to see and check for yourself, how a collocation center could be of true help to your company. Remember that if you acquire the services of a colo center, you'll be incurring a lot of money, whether to pay for the rent of the equipment, salaries of the personnel you will employ to address the maintenance, or to pay the colo employees to get it done for you.

description.hltext_display: Man cuts wife's wrist
description.content:
, engraves his name on it
Date: 2010-12-21
Place: Pune
Four days after woman lodges complaint police yet to register FIR
Seema Lanke (32), lives under constant fear of her husband. She alleges that her husband, Nanabhau Lanke alias Prakash assaulted her often and the proof is the mark of her husband's name (Prakash) on her wrist, which he allegedly carved using a pocketknife. What's worse is that she also accuses the police of not filing an FIR immediately thereby delaying the entire investigation.
Ex-wife involved
Seema, a nurse, was separated from her husband for some months and was staying with her parents. On December 12, she had gone to Yerawada for some work where she happened to meet her husband. He forcibly took her to their home. She also found Lanke's 12-year-old son from his previous marriage and his ex-wife Deepali at her place. She alleged that her 12-year-old stepson handed over a pocketknife to Lanke and also accused Lanke's ex-wife Deepali of holding her hand while Lanke carried on with the assault. The medical certificate by Sassoon General Hospital shows that there are 15 wounds all over her body.
Police unhelpful
After assaulting her, he locked her up inside her house in Vishrantwadi. But she managed to escape on December 16 and returned to her parents' house to tell the tale to her entire family. She approached Vishrantwadi police station and submitted a written application to them the same day. However, she says that the police have not taken adequate action against her husband. She said that she has to live under constant fear as her husband has threatened to kill her. She alleges that her husband assaulted her 15 times with a pocketknife and that the marks on her wrist are a proof of the same. She has also given a written application to DCP's (Zone IV) office.
She met him when she was unemployed and he promised him a job of a nurse. When she got a job, she also nursed him when he was sick.
Later she married him in a temple at Alandi on March 2009. She became aware of her husband's past marriage and criminal activities just three months after her marriage.
Reacting to police inaction against the victim's application DCP Sanjay Jadhav of Zone IV assured that he would look into the matter.
"We will see to it that an FIR is lodged after her statement is recorded," he said. When MiD DAY approached the victim, she said she will approach the Vishrantwadi police station today.

description.hltext_display: Web Conferencing Tips: Three Steps to Better Business
description.content:
Share
If you're a small company interested in web conferencing , then you could be pondering the best way to put it to use to benefit your business and make it easier to proceed to the next stage. Small business owners are applying web conferencing a bit differently than large organizations.
If you want to use web conferencing for your company, then consider these web conferencing tips.
Initial contact
Rather than just thinking of web conferencing as a way to shed all travel permanently-which is probably not an option for a small business that depends on its ability to make and keep associations-use it to reduce pointless trips.
How often have you flipped everything on its head and forked out hundreds to fly across the country to conduct a sales trip, only to have your potential customer cancel at the last second? How often has an initial meeting been a total waste of time simply because the individual sent to meet with you has no authority to make buying decisions? Unfortunately, this happens a great deal when you are meeting with new clients. But small businesses need to pursue new customers since this is how we grow our company.
Having said that, if you use web conferencing to vet new prospects, you could stop those unnecessary flights. You will get a read on a potential prospect's seriousness and motivation to conducting business before stepping on an aircraft, before you decide to ever lay out money to get a plane ticket.
That is time and money saved.
In fact, other small companies like you are trimming their travel expenses and at the same time growing their small business.
Decrease meeting expenses
Gathering everybody in the same place to brainstorm is the old strategy for conducting business. But that is not really the most cost-effective way to do business in today's market.
You can gather all of your employees together on the internet and work through an issue without needing to spend the money to have them travel to your office. If you have sales agents spread out in a variety of areas, you want to limit how long you pull them off area to attend a meeting. Web conferencing lets you accomplish that.
You can easily all view the exact same document. Everyone that is part of the meeting meeting can have the floor and show their screen or perhaps a document on their own computer. Everyone can view and hear the same thing-just as though you are in the exact same room.
Minimize training costs
Training is an integral part of managing your business. Naturally, you need to keep everyone abreast of any changes or new practices and knowledge. How can you accomplish that without incurring huge travel and lodging costs? With web conferencing, naturally. Another benefit of web conferencing for training is that it cuts down on the amount of time your sales staff is off their territory. Which helps boost profits and restrict lost income.
These web conferencing tips just might help you take your business to a higher level of efficiency and productivity. Start using the newest and most convenient technology to better run your company today.

description.hltext_display: 主力未逃后市无虞
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
核心提示：今日主力资金再度转向净流出，昨日大幅流入的地产、煤炭板块在今日也呈现出净流出前列，不过地产今日流出规模仅占昨日流入量的一小部分，这有可能是部分短线资金借机出局所致。那么在主力依然留在场内的情况下，即便市场预期谨慎不会大幅上涨，但是要下跌的可能性也是比较小的，市场维持震荡格局可能性较大。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 1.流行观点与偏差分析
目前市场流行的观点：
1）媒体消息：国土部会议称房地产不应成为重要经济支柱产业；
2）基金：基金首批2011年策略报告：一致看好大消费大装备；
昨日房地产板块突然遭遇主力资金大规模的杀入，而背后并无明显利好消息，今日国土部会议又传出房地产不应成为重要经济支柱产业的提议，昨日杀入的部分资金在今日开始撤出，不过今日地产板块资金流出量大约是昨日流入量的九分之一左右，也就是说大部分资金依然留在场内，似乎并不惧怕国土部方面的利空。
今日一些基金发布的2011策略报告一致看好大消费和大装备，而根据万隆主力资金监测系统数据，近期大消费的医药、酿酒食品等是主要的资金流出板块，似乎有唱多做空的意图。而大装备板块有部分个股确有主力资金布局的迹象，在某种程度上符合十二五规划受益逻辑，这个板块反而是值得投资者关注的。
2.主力数据及行为分析
根据万隆主力资金监测系统数据，基金、社保、QFII、保险四大主力今日出现中等规模的资金净流出，总体流出约36亿。基金、社保、QFII、保险四大主力资金净流量分别为：-12.1亿、-8.6亿、-9亿和-6.3亿。
近期主力们在行为上似乎较为飘忽，进出颇为频繁，在昨日较大规模流入之后今日主力资金再度流出。而昨日流入较为明显的房地产、煤炭石油两个板块今日也是出现较大规模的净流出，在主力们这种谨慎行为之下蓝筹行情似乎是难以持续。
3.主力板块路线图及热点风险点
主力增减持方向
今日主力资金在板块方面流入靠前的是：钢铁、数字电视、运输物流、旅游酒店、核电；而流出靠前的板块主要是：医药、煤炭石油、电力设备、新材料、商业连锁、酿酒食品、房地产等。
4．行为方向总结
今日主力资金再度转向净流出，昨日大幅流入的地产、煤炭板块在今日也呈现出净流出前列，不过地产今日流出规模仅占昨日流入量的一小部分，这有可能是部分短线资金借机出局所致。那么在主力依然留在场内的情况下，即便市场预期谨慎不会大幅上涨，但是要下跌的可能性也是比较小的，市场维持震荡格局可能性较大。
短期（1个月内）机会和风险：短期市场共振情绪指标为50.万隆股票热点跟踪系统提示短期热点板块为：央企重组、高端装备、核电以及实质性重组个股等。
中期（1~3个月）机会和风险：中期市场共振情绪指标显示为45.万隆股票热点跟踪系统提示中期热点板块为：十二五规划受益、农业、低碳经济及资产注入重组预期个股。

description.hltext_display: AKTIE IM FOKUS: Morphosys an TecDax-Spitze - Weitere Meilensteinzahlung
description.content:
Eine weitere Meilensteinzahlung hat die Aktien des Biotechunternehmens Morphosys am Mittwoch an die TecDax-Spitze getrieben. Morphosys-Aktien stiegen bis 9.45 Uhr um 2,47 Prozent auf 18,68 Euro. Mit dem Tageshoch bei 18,95 Euro lagen sie nur knapp unter dem Hoch vom Oktober vergangenen Jahres. Der Auswahlindex für Technologiewerte büßte gleichzeitig 0,35 Prozent ein auf 840,45 Punkte.
Morphosys hatte mit einem Antikörper-Programm den siebten klinischen Meilenstein mit einem Partner erreicht. Die Zahlung kommt von Centocor Ortho Biotech, die erneut einen Antrag für eine klinische Studie gestellt haben. Morphosys hatte bisher für 2010 mit maximal sechs Partnerprogrammen gerechnet, die in die klinische Erprobung gelangen werden.
Equinet-Analyst Martin Possienke kommentierte entsprechend positiv: "Die Geschäftsentwicklung im Bereich Partnered Discovery verläuft weiter sehr zufriedenstellend." Das übertroffene Ziel von sechs Meilensteinzahlungen stütze seine Erwartung, dass die Ergebnisse für das Gesamtjahr am oberen Ende des erst am 10. Dezember aktualisierten Ausblicks liegen dürften. Der Experte beließ seine Einstufung für die Aktien auf "Buy" mit einem Kursziel von 34 Euro.
Morphosys hatte die Umsatzprognose auf 91 bis 94 Millionen Euro (Vorjahr: 81) angehoben. Beim operativen Gewinn werden 13 bis 16 Millionen Euro nach bis dahin 7 bis 9 Millionen Euro erwartet./ag/la

description.hltext_display: “Let Christmas be a celebration of life” says Governor at Arts Council music fest
description.content:
“Let this Christmas be the celebration of life,” declared Gov. Togiola Tulafono in his speech at Sunday nights opening of the 33rd Annual Holiday Music Festival, which ends tonight at the Fagatogo Pavilion, and is sponsored by the American Samoa Council on Arts, Culture and Humanities (ASCACH) — the Arts Council.
“I wish that this Christmas we all remember, as it is a day of remembrance, it is customary in your families, in our homes, that we celebrate birthdays. Young birthdays, old birthdays — all the same,” the Governor says. “The celebration to remember and to remind ourselves of the importance of life.”
“And as we get old, [we] celebrate birthdays to remember with gratitude the love and the blessings of our Lord in that older life,” he said. “And as we grow older… the more important the blessing is and more important the celebration becomes.”
“Because for as many years, as we are granted to live and to do what we have to do, celebration of birthdays becomes a customary to remember that life and to remember all the good things… [the Lord] has done for us in our families, village, churches, our county and our government,” he points out.
As American Samoa prepares to celebrate Jesus Christ’s birth, “let us also remember the great things that our fore-parents have done for us — in your homes, in our country and in our government,” he said.
The Governor called on America Samoa to let this Christmas be a celebration of life, “and the celebration of the blessings we have received from the life of Jesus Christ, as well as the life of our parents and our children who have gone before us,” he said.
“It is also our custom and tradition that when our children or parents die, we stop celebrating birthdays,” he said and relayed to the audience a custom in the U.S. that under its laws, it is “codified that the first 100th birthday of every president of the U.S. there is an official remembrance and an official celebration of that 100th birthday, in order to remember and reflect on the life of a great leader, of a great person, and the great things he has done for his country.
“And that is why we are here today, to celebrate a great life, that has done great things for us, especially our salvation,” he said, referring to the celebration of Jesus’ birth.
“May you all have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year,” he concluded, wishing the people of American Samoa a “very pleasant holiday season” on behalf of the First Lady and their family.
Meanwhile, KVZK-TV will rebroadcast Christmas Eve and Christmas Day all of the choirs who performed during last week’s government sponsored Territorial Christmas Program and the Arts Council holiday musical program.

description.hltext_display: Oil above $90 a barrel in Asia as US crude supply drop suggests demand improving
description.content:
TSX , Energy Information Administration , NYSE , U.S. , Asia , SINGAPORE
SINGAPORE - Oil prices rose above US$90 a barrel Wednesday in Asia after a report showed U.S. crude supplies dropped more than expected for a second week, which suggests demand is improving.
Benchmark oil for February delivery was up 19 cents to $90.01 a barrel at late afternoon Singapore time in electronic trading on the New York Mercantile Exchange. The contract rose 45 cents to settle at $89.82 on Tuesday.
The American Petroleum Institute said late Tuesday that crude inventories fell 5.8 million barrels last week while analysts surveyed by Platts, the energy information arm of McGraw-Hill Cos., had forecast a drop of 2.4 million barrels. Inventories of gasoline decreased 2.9 million barrels and distillates rose slightly, the API said.
The Energy Department's Energy Information Administration reports its weekly supply data later Wednesday. The EIA said last week that supplies dropped 9.9 million barrels the previous week, the biggest drop in eight years.
Oil prices, which rose to a two-year high above $90 earlier this month, have been supported by rallying stock markets. Meanwhile, a strengthening U.S. dollar, which makes crude more expensive for investors with other currencies, has weighed on oil.
"A steady-higher stock market continues to provide a major counter against a likely renewed weakening in the euro," Ritterbusch and Associates said in a report. "A choppy, sideways trade could persist through the balance of this year."
In other Nymex trading in January contracts, heating oil rose 0.4 cent to $2.52 a gallon, gasoline futures added 1.5 cents to $2.41 a gallon and natural gas advanced 0.9 cent to $4.07 per 1,000 cubic feet.
In London, Brent crude rose 30 cents to $93.50 a barrel on the ICE Futures exchange.
(TSX:ECA, TSX:IMO, TSX:SU, TSX:HSE, NYSE:BP, NYSE:COP, NYSE:XOM, NYSE:CVX, TSX:CNQ, TSX:TLM, TSX:COS.UN, TSX:CVE)

description.hltext_display: Helt nye tal: Her får du de største bolig-rabatter
description.author: Trine Steengaard Nielsen
description.content:
Der er stor forskel på, hvor hårdt boligerne er ramt i de forskellige kommuner. (Foto: Colourbox)
Få det komplette overblik - Kan din bolig holde prisen? TRINE STEENGAARD NIELSEN - Onsdag den 22. december 2010, 09:26
På til salg-skiltet står der to mio. kr. for en bolig i Haderslev Kommune. Men glem alt om ejendomsmæglernes priser for en stund. Den rigtige pris er nærmere 1,8 mio. kr. Nye tal fra Boliga viser, hvor meget der typisk bliver slået af på prisen – og der er rabatter alle vegne.
B.T. bringer i samarbejde med Danmarks største uafhængige boligsite, Boliga.dk, et danmarkskort med helt nye tal, der viser, hvilke kommuner der i de 11 første måneder af 2010 har givet de største nedslag i boligpriserne.
Et kig ud over kortet vidner om, at der er rabatter overalt.
Se billederne: Her er Danmarks ti dyreste boliger
De danske hussælgere har i gennemsnit slået 6,2 pct. af på prisen i 2010. Boligrabatterne, forskellen mellem udbudsprisen og salgsprisen, kan give køber og sælger en ide om, hvor meget de skal forvente at få eller give i rabat i en bolighandel.
Men de nye tal kan også give alle boligejere med interesse for op- og nedture på markedet ny viden om, hvordan det går i netop deres kommune.
Se billederne: Her er Danmarks billigste hus
- Boligejerne kan bruge tallene til at få en ide om, hvor gode boligerne er til at holde prisen i ens nærområde. Det kan være et udtryk for, hvor attraktiv ens kommune er, siger Boligas direktør, Ricco Zuschlag.
Hver femte teknisk insolvent
Efter den store nedtur på boligmarkedet, der begyndte midt i 2007, er boligpriserne faldet så meget, at hver femte boligejer i 2010 er teknisk insolvent. Det vil sige, at gælden i boligen overstiger boligens værdi.
Derfor har boligpriserne stor betydning for alle boligejere og ikke kun for dem, der går med salgstanker.
Hussælgerne har i årets første 11 måneder i gennemsnit givet en rabat på 6,2 pct. efter forhandlingen.
På villa-markedet har sælgerne måttet give de største prisnedslag på Langeland (11,9 pct.), Ærø (11 pct.) og Lolland og Samsø (9,8 pct.). Omvendt har villa-sælgerne i Esbjerg, Tårnby og Allerød Kommune været hårde ved forhandlingsbordet med henholdsvis 4,1, 4,3 og 4,6 pct. i rabat.
Overordnet set bliver de største boligrabatter givet i de områder, der ikke er så attraktive, forklarer Ricco Zuschlag. Han mener, ligesom boligøkonom Morten Skak fra Syddansk Universitet, at det er helt naturligt, at der bliver givet rabatter på boligmarkedet.
- Enhver køber bør forsøge at handle om prisen. Generelt er det sådan, at jo længere tid boligen har været til salg, jo mere sandsynligt er det, at sælger vil give nedslag i prisen, siger Morten Skak.
De store boligrabatter bør dog ikke skabe panik hos alle boligejere.
- De boligejere, der ikke har planer om at sælge de nærmeste år, og som kan betale deres ydelser, har ikke grund til bekymring. Men hvis du skal sælge boligen, så er der mere grund til bekymring, for det er stadig købers marked, siger boligøkonom Morten Skak.
I forhold til sidste år er boligrabatterne faldet en smule.
- Det hænger bl.a. sammen med, at der har været en snert af optimisme på boligmarkedet. Udbuddet begyndte at stige rigtig meget, og det betyder, at folk måske igen tror på, at nu kan man godt sælge, siger Ricco Zuschlag.
Et halvt års salgstid
Nye tal fra Boliga viser også, at det i snit har taget 185 dage at sælge villaen – altså omkring et halvt år. Det går to-tre gange hurtigere med salget i kommuner som Rødovre, Lyngby-Taarbæk, København og Gentofte end i Guldborgsund på Sydsjælland og Odsherred på Vestsjælland. Salgstiderne kan give et fingerpeg om, hvor meget gang der er i boligmarkedet i ens lokalområde sammenlignet med andre områder.

description.hltext_display: Japan produces a 'singing mouse'
description.content:
Japanese scientists said yesterday they had produced a mouse that tweets like a bird in a genetically engineered "evolution" which they hope will shed light on the origins of human language.
A team of researchers at the University of Osaka created the animal in their "Evolved Mouse Project", in which they use genetically modified mice that are prone to miscopying DNA and thus to mutations.
"Mutations are the driving force of evolution. We have cross-bred the genetically modified mice for generations to see what would happen," said lead researcher Arikuni Uchimura.
"We checked the newly born mice one by one... One day we found a mouse that was singing like a bird," he said, noting that the singing mouse was born by chance but that the trait will be passed on to future generations.
"I was surprised because I had been expecting mice that are different in physical shape," he said by telephone, adding that in fact the project had also produced a mouse with short limbs and a tail like a dachshund.
The laboratory, directed by professor Takeshi Yagi at the Osaka University's Graduate School of Frontier Bio-sciences in western Japan, now has more than 100 singing mice for further research.
The team hopes they will provide clues on how human language evolved.
Scientists have found that birds use different sound elements, put them together into chunks like words in human languages and then make strings of them to sing songs, that are subject to certain linguistic rules.
"Mice are better than birds to study because they are mammals and much closer to humans in their brain structures and other biological aspects," Uchimura said.
"I know it's a long shot and people would say it's "too absurd" but I'm doing this with hopes of making a Mickey Mouse some day," he said.
100
The number of singing mice produced by scientists of Osaka University's Graduate School of Frontier Bio-sciences

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content:
A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre.
Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".
He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process.
"When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.
Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.
A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.
Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.
Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.
Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: Video: Exclusive: Women Recruited To Fight Taliban
description.content:
Women are for the first time being recruited to the front line of Afghan police to help tackle the threat of suicide bombers.
Previously, they had only been tasked with menial backroom responsibilities.
But, with training from the Ministry of Defence police and the British Army, Afghan women are now involved in the fight against one of the Taliban's most deadly weapons.
Afghan cultural sensitivities forbid policemen from searching women, which can have catastrophic results if they fail to intercept female suicide bombers.
In the past two years, the Taliban has persuaded some women to conceal explosives under their burkas.
With some insurgents also disguising themselves as females to exploit the cultural loophole, policewomen in Afghanistan have been given the power to stop and search - and, where necessary, kill.
At Bost Airport outside Lashkar Gah in Helmand Province, 3rd Lt Nagara Abdul Nabi regularly searches men's bags and burka-clad women - something that has not happened until recently.
She said: "I stopped a car at a checkpoint and a female passenger began acting suspiciously.
"When I began to search her, the woman struggled and bit me badly.
"I discovered she had explosives under her burka. She also had two grenades and an AK-47."
Captain Farid, head of Afghan National Police (ANP) training, said: "The Taliban is afraid of policewomen because if they have a lot of females in the force it means they can search the Taliban everywhere.
"Some members of the Taliban have even tried to pass themselves off as females to pass through security."
PC Catriona McBeath, one of the British police trainers, said: "Women are essential because they can go places that men can't go.
"For example, if a known Taliban runs into a compound that's full of women, then the woman ANP can follow him in... search him and arrest him."

Vom Signalmanagementspezialisten Gefen ist ein neuer Audio-Konverter für HDMI-Signale verfügbar. Der GTV-HDMI-2-HDMIAUD extrahiert das eingehende Audiosignal der angeschlossenen HDMI-Quelle und gibt es entweder über acht RCA-Ausgänge oder den digitalen optischen Ausgang wieder. Das HDMI-Signal wird unverändert an den HDMI-Ausgang zum Anschluss an ein Display oder Projektor weitergeleitet. LPCM-Audiosignale werden über die RCA-Ausgänge und Bitstream-Audiosignale über den digitalen optischen Audioausgang bereitgestellt.
Der Konverter bietet mehrere Möglichkeiten, zwischen verschiedenen Audio-Einstellungen zu wählen, wie zum Beispiel automatischer und manueller Modus, 2-Kanal Audio only, Mehrkanal Bitstream und 7.1 LPCM Audio. Zum Lieferumfang gehören neben dem Konverter inklusive Bedienungsanleitung ein zwei Meter langes HDMI-Kabel und ein verschraubbares 5-Volt-Netzteil.
Der GTV-HDMI-2-HDMIAUD ist ab sofort erhältlich. Die unverbindliche Preisempehlung des Herstellers liegt bei 229 Euro.

description.hltext_display: Video: Concern Over UK Cancer Survival Rates
description.content:
Britain has the worst survival rate for cancer among similarly developed nations, according to scientists.
Research partly funded by the Department of Health took data from England, Wales and Northern Ireland and compared it to five other countries.
In some cases, survival rates in the UK were more than 10% lower than those elsewhere in Europe, Australia and Canada, according to the International Cancer Benchmarking Partnership.
The study authors, including the Government's cancer tsar Professor Sir Michael Richards, said the findings are consistent with differences in time of diagnosis and treatment.
The scientists analysed data on 2.4 million cancer patients in the UK (not including Scotland) along with Australia, Canada, Denmark, Norway and Sweden.
They focused on four of the most important cancers - breast, bowel, lung and ovarian - looking at survival rates at one and five years between 1995 and 2007.
The results showed life expectancy of cancer patients in the UK was consistently shorter than in other countries.
Only Denmark had a similarly poor record, though generally its outcomes were not as bad as the UK's.
The findings were divided across three periods: 1995 to 1999, 2000 to 2002 and 2005 to 2007.
For the most recent period up to 2007, the UK had the worst bowel, lung and breast cancer five-year survival rates of any of the six countries.
During this period, 53.6% of UK bowel cancer patients were alive five years after diagnosis compared with 65.9% in Australia - a difference of 12.3%.
For lung cancer, 8.8% of patients survived five years in the UK and 18.4% in the best performing country, Canada.
The trend was repeated in breast cancer cases. Some 81.6% of women with breast cancer survived five years in the UK compared with 88.5% in Sweden.
Denmark's five-year survival rate for ovarian cancer was marginally lower than the UK's - 36.1% compared with 36.4%
(c) Sky News 2010
More from UK News

description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
中证网讯 2010年12月22日，亚洲三大创业板市场：标普香港创业板指数上涨，日本JASDAQ指数、韩国KOSDAQ指数下跌。

香港创业板指数收报814.64点，上涨7.67点 ，涨幅0.95%， 成交6.40亿港元。

BLUR KOMT MET NIEUW ALBUM ::
description.content:
Blur, de legendarische Britpopband rond Damon Albarn (Gorillaz), duikt
volgende maand de studio in en wil tegen het eind van volgend jaar een
nieuw album uitbrengen. Het laatste album van de voltallige band (Damon Albarn, Alex James, Dave
Rowntree en Graham Coxon) was 13 uit 1999. Gitarist Coxon verliet de band
in 2002 tijdens de opnames voor Think Tank (2003). In de zomer van 2009
speelde Blur nog enkele reünieconcerten. In april 2010 brachten ze de
limited edition one-sided 7-inch vinylsingle Fool's Day uit. Dit nummer is het eerste dat de vier Blur-leden gezamenlijk hebben opgenomen sinds Battery In Your Leg in 2003. Om te kunnen reageren op OOR.nl, moet je jezelf registreren. Dat kan je doen door hier te klikken.
We hopen zo de discussies eerlijker en heftiger te maken!

description.hltext_display: Fagatogo CCCAS Sunday School Christmas Party
description.content:
Share this article
Comments (0)
The Fagatogo CCCAS Sunday School held their Christmas party last week Saturday, Dec. 18 at the church hall. The Sunday School was divided into groups of three with their assigned color white, red and green.
Each group made a presentation based on the spirit of Christmas and each team competed in a variety of Christmas games. The red team won the first prize, white team with second prize and green team with third prize.
The red team is shown here with their team leader Deanna Fuimaono after decorating their Christmas tree during the CCCAS Fagatogo Sunday school Christmas party.

description.hltext_display: اسرائيل تتقدم بشكوى امام الامم المتحدة ردا على اطلاق الصواريخ من غزة
description.author: admin
description.content: تقدمت اسرائيل بشكوى امام الامم المتحدة بعد تزايد اطلاق الصواريخ والقذائف من قطاع غزة على اراضيها الجنوبية في الايام الاخيرة، على ما افادت الاربعاء وزارة الخارجية الاسرائيلية.واكد السفير الاسرائيلي لدى الامم المتحدة ميرون روفن في رسالة وجهها الى مجلس الامن والى الامين العام للمنظمة الدولية بان كي مون ان "حوادث الايام الاخيرة تندرج في سياق تصعيد للهجمات الارهابية انطلاقا من قطاع غزة".واوضحت الرسالة ان ثلاثة صواريخ و18 قذيفة هاون تم اطلاقها باتجاه جنوب اسرائيل منذ 19 كانون الاول/ديسمبر.كما جاء في الرسالة ان "اسرائيل تعتبر ان سلطة الامر الواقع في قطاع غزة (حماس) مسؤولة بالكامل عن كل هذه الحوادث (...). وردا على هذه الهجمات، مارست اسرائيل وستواصل ممارسة حقها في الدفاع عن النفس".

where you can get the xbox kinect
description.content: When I Consider issues in this world that modified the sport for us I would have to say that the unique Nintendo was one of the biggest. It modified the whole means we looked at gaming. When the original Nintendo came out is once we started to see the primary hardcore gamers. Before then they actually didn't exist. I bear in mind enjoying Mario for the primary time and not stopping for days. Since then video gaming has come a great distance however there has by no means been such an enormous shift in gaming as there was with the Nintendo. For probably the most part gaming has stayed the same. The graphics have gotten higher and the controllers have grow to be more difficult but it surely's still the identical primary principles. One console with video games which are played with controllers linked to a console. That's it, til now.For the very first time since the release of the Nintendo, a company has fully changed the way we'll strategy video games. The Xbox 360 Kinect is the mo st revolutionary gaming console that I have ever had the privilege of playing. Overlook the controllers and sitting on the sofa for hours on end. This console puts you into the game. What's going to all of the moms across America complain about now? They absolutely gained't be capable of say that we aren't getting our train and we have gotten zombies. After I performed the xbox kinect for the primary time I was sore for several days' afterwords. That is some severely exhausting gaming. This is not jus t gaming for teenagers any more though. There are several games on here designed that can assist you workout. With its potential to track your progress and measure it towards your friends there isn't any question that you would be able to drop some severe weight. What else can this technology do for us? That's a very robust question to answer. Not as a result of it's easy but because it's hard. In the event you sort in 'xbox kinect hacks' into google you will note a few of the issues that individuals have already accomplished to it and it hasn't even been out for two months. Talks of interactive tvs and digital remotes are a number of the attainable uses. Integrating it with a 3D tv to have three dimensional, totally interactive video games is one other possibility. I have even seen how MIT hacked the Xbox 360 Kinect and created an analogous platform to that which was used in the movie 'Minority Report.' When you recall that film than you'll bear in mind Tom Cruise shifting via packages and information, dashing up and slowing down video etc. all together with his hands. The chances are truly endless.

description.hltext_display: CBeebies will premiere its new Lets Celebrate on 12/25
description.content:
Cartoon Network will premiere its new animated series Young Justice on Friday, January 7, 2011 at 7p. Last month the network debuted a Young Justice hour-long special that introduced the series team of super heroes, which is comprised of Robin, Aqualad, Kid Flash, Superboy, Miss Martian and Artemis. Young Justice is produced by Warner Bros. Animation and based on characters from DC Comics. Brandon Vietti (Batman: Under the Red Hood, Superman Doomsday, The Batman) and Greg Weisman (Gargoyles, The Spectacular Spider-Man, W.I.T.C.H.) serve as producers on the series.
MORE KIDS STUFF
CBeebies, BBC's preschool brand, will premiere its new Let's Celebrate series in the US Hispanic market on Christmas Day, Saturday, December 25, at 4p. All this week leading up to the debut of Let's Celebrate, CBeebies will feature its Christmas Special block, daily 11a-1p, featuring holiday-themed episodes of its many preschool series. Then, on Christmas Day, Cbeebies will feature a Christmas marathon, 11a-4p, culminating with the launch of Let's Celebrate. Each episode of Let's Celebrate explores different stories and customs behind religious and cultural festivals as it visits kids and their families in different communities. Festivals featured in the series include, Vaisakhi, Eid-ul-Fitr, Holi, Wesak, Purim, Diwali, Easter, St Patrick's Day, St David's Day, St George's Day, St Andrew's Day and Norouz.
The third season of The Electric Company ( www.pbskidsgo.org/electriccompany ) will launch on Monday, February 7, 2011 on PBS Kids Go! (check local listings). The new season of The Electric Company is comprised of 12 new episodes, which will debut each Monday. Building on the series goal of developing literacy skills, the theme for the new season of The Electric Company is math vocabulary. Additionally, season three will introduce new segments and two new characters Coy Stewart (Are We There Yet?) will play Marcus Barnes, who inherits a math superpower, and Carly Sonenclar (Les Miserables) will play Gilda Flip, a prankster in training. Also, special guest appearances this season include Alan Cumming, Benji and Joel Madden (Good Charlotte), music producer/rapper Swizz Beats, comedians Jenny Slate and Sherrod Small, and Wyatt Cenac (The Daily Show), as well as music's Doug E. Fresh.
HBO will debut the new HBO presentation The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway in 2011. HBO will record the special presentation of the current Broadway show at the Stephen Sondheim Theatre in NYC, following its run that ends January 2, 2011. While not specifically targeted to kids, The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway, like the Paul Reubens' Pee-wee's Playhouse TV series, works on many levels for different age groups. Reubens' first Pee-Wee Herman special debuted three decades ago. The new special, like the first, will be directed by Marty Callner, who has directed a range of HBO comedy specials. Reubens is also working with writer/director/producer Judd Apatow to develop a new Pee-Wee feature film.
MTV Networks International inks deals in Latin America for Nickelodeon's series True Jackson, VP. Channels acquiring the live-action comedy include UCV TV (Chile) takes season one of the series, with Monte Carlo TV (Uruguay) picking up the first 25 episodes. TeleTica (Costa Rica) signs on for additional episodes of True Jackson, VP (episodes 114-125 from season 1 and episodes 201-210 from season 2). Viewers of Venevision (Venezuela) and Teleamazonas (Ecuador) will be able to watch the series on the new Nickelodeon blocks that will be featured on those channels under newly complete deals.
DHX Media is launching a new iPad app based on its CBeebies TV series Grandpa in My Pocket. The new Grandpa in my Pocket: Horatio Heave Ho! eBook app will be available initially in the UK via UK iTunes, and will rollout later in other territories. The app will be available for iPhone and iPod Touch in spring 2011. Narrated by Jason Mason, the ebook features Horatio Heave Ho!, the Sunnysands Bank Manager that really wants to be a pirate. When he decides to search for treasure at the beach, Grandpa dons his shrinking cap to help teach him there's more to life than treasure. The app includes features such as tapping the little Grandpa on each page to make him run and then try to catch him and make him sparkle, tap Horatio and play pirate, and take part in the word and actions of the pirate song. The Grandpa in My Pocket TV series can be seen around the world and is produced with participation from Finance Wales and produced by Adastra Creative.
Spain's Zinkia Entertainment is releasing its second Pocoyo app, Coloring with Pocoyo and Friends, worldwide specifically for the iPad but also available for the iPhone and iPod Touch. The app can be purchased and downloaded in English and Spanish. New coloring pages will be available on demand via the app. Downloading the app provides the user with seven days premium access to the Premium Club at pocoyoworld.com ( www.pocoyoworld.com ), Pocoyo's virtual world online destination. The app is based on the Pocoyo CGI animated preschool TV series, which is co-produced by Zinkia and ITV Studios Global Entertainment. Bandai America, the master toy licensee for the property in the US and Canada, recently released a line of Pocoyo toys. The series airs in the US on the Nick Jr. channel, PBS, Univision and Discovery Familia.

If you would like to have your programming included, please send us only the following info for your top 5 shows: title, availability date, number of episodes, length, type (i.e., movie, series, special, etc.), genre and your terms (barter, cash, etc.) as well as your company's stand/booth location. A confirmation email will be sent following each submission from Lisa (if you don't receive a confirmation email, please resubmit).

description.hltext_display: Was macht eigentlich das Christkind an Weihnachten?
description.author: dpa
description.content:
Voller Terminplan für Johanna Heller - vor 21 Minuten
Nürnberg - An Heiligabend hat das Christkind alle Hände voll zu tun: Besuche in Gottesdiensten, Wärmestuben und anderen sozialen Einrichtungen stehen von früh bis spät auf dem Programm. „Ich komme erst gegen 20.00 Uhr nach Hause. Da wartet dann meine Familie auf mich, ich ziehe mein Christkindkostüm aus und bin wieder ganz die Johanna“, sagt Johanna Heller, die in diesem Jahr zum zweiten Mal das weltweit bekannte Nürnberger Christkind verkörpert. Am 24. Dezember endet ihre Amtszeit.
Das Nürnberger Christkind begleitet Kinder bei einem Laternenzug durch die Stadt.
Foto: Michael Matejka
Das Nürnberger Christkind begleitet Kinder bei einem Laternenzug durch die Stadt.
Foto: Michael Matejka
Den privaten Teil des Heiligen Abends will Heller traditionell verbringen: Es gibt Raclette und Geschenke, und die Familie musiziert gemeinsam. Das ist ein Muss, schließlich spielt ihr Vater bei den Nürnberger Symphonikern Bratsche, ihre Mutter ist Expertin für Kirchenmusik. Johanna spielt Oboe, während ihre Schwester am Klavier
sitzt.
Was wünscht sich das Christkind selbst zu Weihnachten? „Dieses Jahr bin ich wunschlos glücklich. Ich habe eine tolle Zeit hinter mir, war zwei Monate in Afrika, bin durch Europa gereist und noch total erfüllt“, antwortet die 18-Jährige. Um nach kurzem Nachdenken anzufügen: „Der einzige Wunsch ist vielleicht, vor dem Studium noch mal rauszukommen, nach Indien oder Afrika.“ Doch das wird schwierig, schließlich muss sich die Fachabiturientin auf die Aufnahmeprüfung für das Musikstudium vorbereiten.

description.hltext_display: ISRAELVALLEY CERVEAU - Le Prof. Yadin Dudai du département de neurobiologie de l'Institut Weizmann vient d'identifier une zone du cerveau qui pourrait contrôler la sensation de peur
description.content:
Par IsraelValley Desk Rubrique: Publié le long Partager | Une équipe de chercheurs dirigée par le Prof. Yadin Dudai au département de neurobiologie de l’Institut Weizmann vient d’identifier une zone du cerveau qui pourrait contrôler la sensation de peur. L’expérience mise en place par les chercheurs est remarquable de simplicité et d’ingéniosité. Ils ont commencé par recruter un groupe de volontaires qui ont admis avoir peur des serpents ; une phobie très répandue dans la population générale.
Les volontaires ont ensuite été placés dans un scanner à résonance magnétique (IRM). Cette technique d’imagerie médicale permet d’obtenir une vue précise de l’activité dans le cerveau. Le test de courage se déroule de la manière suivante : en appuyant sur un bouton, les participants confinés à l’intérieur du scanner décident de faire avancer ou reculer un panier contenant soit un ours en peluche soit un serpent long d’environ 1,5 m. Bien que le "serpent des blés” utilisé dans les expériences ne soit pas dangereux, il n’en est pas moins intimidant.
Les scientifiques ont découvert que quand les participants décidaient de défier leur phobie en faisant avancer le serpent vers eux, un acte de courage, une zone bien précise du cerveau s’éclaircissait sur le scan. Dès que la sensation de peur devenait trop grande, les participants faisaient reculer le serpent, cette zone du cerveau (cortex cingulaire) reprenait une activité normale.
L’équipe du Prof. Dudai en a conclu que cette région du cerveau, cruciale dans le contrôle des émotions, pourrait aussi diriger notre capacité à ignorer la peur et exécuter des actes courageux. De plus, les chercheurs ont remarqué que quand cette zone du cerveau s’active, les symptômes habituels par lesquels la peur se manifeste (sueurs, tremblements…) sont en fait réduits.
Ces résultats suggèrent que des interventions thérapeutiques visant à altérer l’activité du cortex cingulaire permettront de développer des remèdes contre des phobies qui peuvent handicaper la vie de certaines personnes. Cette découverte peut aussi se voir sous un autre angle : est-il possible d’effacer la peur du comportement des soldats? Dans tous les cas, il s’agit d’un résultat fascinant qui appelle à de nombreuses années de recherche avant d’envisager des applications pratiques.
BE Israël Pour en savoir plus, contacts : Vous trouverez l’article original publie dans la revue "Neuron” ainsi qu’une interview (en anglais) du Prof. Yadid Dudai en suivant le lien suivant : http://www.cell.com/neuron/abstract/S0896-6273(10)00467-8 Code brève ADIT : 64706
Rédacteur : Laurent BOUE, Volontaire International Chercheur

description.hltext_display: Augmented Reality Makes Reality Easier To Understand
description.content:
There's a phrase used in software all to describe a utility that's so essential, so brilliant, that it simply sells the hardware around it: The Killer Application.
Not as deadly as they sound, it should be pointed out. Windows, in its time, was a killer app. So was the original Netscape browser, so (arguably) was id Software's Doom. Killer Applications don't even have to be applications that launch a new idea as much as they refine an existing one, and if you want proof of that, look at Google. When Google launched, there were a plethora of general purpose search engines on offer. These days, if Microsoft wasn't pouring buckets of money into Bing, there'd only be Google.
One of the big buzzwords that has been labelled as a killer application in recent years has been the concept of Augmented Reality. This is taking a device with an inbuilt camera (typically a smartphone) and often location awareness (usually GPS), and matching the two to enable the screen on the smartphone to display additional information about the location around you. To date, it's largely been used simple games and for navigation-style applications, such as pointing out where nearby restaurants are, or for interacting with Wikipedia entries for local points of interest. Reasonable stuff, although the number of people actually willing to wander around unfamiliar environments holding an expensive smartphone up to their faces is, not surprisingly, rather low.
I've recently been testing out something that could well be the next great killer augmented reality application, even though it's on a platform that's very well established: The iPhone. As with all things iPhone, it's an app, and in this case, it's a translation application called Word Lens. And as with most killer applications, it's not really in what it's doing -- which is essentially just crude machine-based single word translation -- but in how it melds existing technologies with new ones to achieve its purpose.
The use of software to aid in language translation goes back decades, but until relatively recently it was largely limited in use to those in fixed positions. What Word Lens does is use the iPhone's camera to capture text, then translate it on the fly and superimpose it over the onscreen display. The end results can be a little shaky depending on how well you're focusing the camera and whether the font used on the text is easily readable or not, but for basic translations, as long as you're aware of the essential context of what you're looking at, it's surprisingly good. For those with a sense of the impish, it'll also reverse words or blank them out altogether in the free demo version. For now, it'll only support English to Spanish or Spanish To English, but apparently other languages are in the works.
Word Lens isn't the only augmented reality application with utility at its core on the market, even though it's one with immediate impact for any traveller, especially as it works without an active data connection. Google's been slowly improving its Google Goggles application (available for Android and iPhone), which uses the same kind of image recognition for immediate searching as well as simple translation via optical character recognition, although its text-handling capabilities are nowhere near as good as that offered by Word Lens.
Where Augmented Reality applications like Word Lens or Google Goggles get it right is by reducing the need to interface with the application down to a few seconds, rather than a constant connection. You're much more likely to pull out a phone and take a quick snapshot than you are wander around with your phone on prominent display. Equally, by providing a genuinely useful service, such as translation or the display of a quick search to help you understand something, they've got the real ability to provide genuine value.
Alex Kidman

description.hltext_display: "Новая газета" става официален партньор на "Уикилийкс"
央行周四发行10亿元3月期央票
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
中证网讯 央行周三公告，为保持基础货币平稳增长和货币市场利率基本稳定，12月23日（周四）将发行2010年第一百一十二期中央银行票据。
第一百一十二期中央银行票据期限3个月(91天)，发行量10亿元，缴款日为2010年12月24日，起息日为2010年12月24日，到期日为2011年3月25日。本期中央银行票据以贴现方式发行，向全部公开市场业务一级交易商进行价格招标，到期按面值100元兑付，到期日遇节假日顺延。
值得注意的是，从上一期操作暂停的三年期央票，仍然没有出现在发行公告中。

description.hltext_display: Die profitabelsten Schauspieler 2010
description.content:
Das Forbes -Magazin veröffentlichte eine Liste mit Kinostars, die heuer am meisten Geld eingespielt haben. Leonardo DiCaprio ist der unangefochtene Blockbuster-König, aber auch ein paar Newcomer schafften es auf die Liste. Der 36-Jährige, dessen Filme "Inception" und "Shutter Island" in diesem Jahr in die Kinos kamen, konnte durch die beiden Projekte weltweit eine Milliarde Dollar umsetzen und brachte 2010 am meisten Umsatz.
Altbekannte Gesichter und Newcomer Auf Platz zwei der profitabelsten Schauspieler schaffte es überraschend die Newcomerin Mia Wasikowska, die in Tim Burtons Streifen "Alice im Wunderland" die Hauptrolle übernahm - der Film spielte weltweit mehr als eine Milliarde ein - und auch in dem Streifen "The Kids Are All Right" an der Seite von Julianne Moore und Mark Ruffalo zu sehen war. Die Independent-Produktion kostete lediglich vier Millionen Dollar in der Mache, spielte jedoch 29 Millionen ein.
Johnny Depp, der ebenfalls in "Alice im Wunderland" mitspielte und aktuell neben Angelina Jolie in "The Tourist" zu sehen ist, erreichte den dritten Platz auf der Liste. Als erster Nicht-Amerikaner schaffte es Daniel Radcliffe unter die Platzierten und belegt den fünften Platz, den er dem aktuellen "Harry Potter"-Streifen zu verdanken hat.
Kinohit mit 12 Robert Pattinson, Sam Worthington und Jackie Chan schafften ebenfalls den Sprung unter die ersten Zehn, wobei Pattinson seine Freundin Kristen Stewart durch seinen Film-Erfolg "Remember Me" auf Platz sieben verweisen konnte.
Der jüngste Schauspieler unter den Top Ten ist Jaden Smith, süße 12. Der Sohn des "Men in Black"-Stars spielte heuer Jackie Chans Schützling in "Karate Kid".
Die Top Ten-Liste des Forbes -Magazins: 1. Leonardo DiCaprio 2. Mia Wasikowska 3. Johnny Depp 4. Robert Downey Jr. 5. Daniel Radcliffe 6. Robert Pattinson 7. Kristen Stewart 8. Sam Worthington 9. Jaden Smith 10. Jackie Chan

description.hltext_display: 庄原豪雨の災害査定終了
description.content:
中国四国農政局と中国財務局は17日、７月16日の庄原豪雨で被災した農地と、用排水路や農道など農業用施設の災害査定を終えた。農地72カ所、農業用施設１０１カ所が災害復旧事業の対象になる見通しとなった。事業費は概算で約８億円。公共土木施設の災害査定は既に終了しており、広島県や市は本格的な再建の準備に入る。
市が国に申請した農地と農業用施設の復旧事業費は10億３７００万円。土石流被害が集中した川北町や西城町、川西町を中心とした農地73カ所、農業用施設１０１カ所だった。
これを受け、農政局と財務局は10月14日から災害査定を始めた。農政局の査定官と財務局の立会官が、市が被害状況をまとめた査定設計書を基に現地を測量するなどして事業費を決定した。
庄原豪雨の農業被害は激甚災害に指定されたため、災害復旧事業になると事業費の約９割を国が負担する。
県と市が管理する河川や道路などの公共土木施設については中国地方整備局と財務局の査定が９月中に終わった。災害復旧事業は市内約80カ所で実施される予定。

description.hltext_display: Four wives beat Bangladesh man to death
description.content:
A man in Bangladesh who kept his four wives in the dark about his multiple marriages was beaten to death, allegedly by all of them, a media report said Wednesday.
Yunus Bepari, 46, an autorickshaw driver, went to a village fair last Monday with two wives where he was confronted by his third wife. When the women exchanged information, they found that he had a fourth wife too.
The three women learnt that Yunus' fourth wife was living in another village. The three women then took him to the residence of his fourth wife at Kabirpur where the four women together beat him up mercilessly, New Age newspaper reported, quoting local villagers.
He was taken in a critical condition to Faridpur Medical College Hospital where he died.
Islamic Shariah allows a man to take up to four wives, but that should be with the consent of his existing wives, the newspaper said.

description.hltext_display: Team Penske's Power Gets Married in Hawaii
Outpouring over toys theft passes $65k
description.content: More than $65,000 in donations and hundreds of toys have flowed in from companies and private citizens to replace 1,500 gifts stolen from the program Saturday in Burlington, State Police said in a statement. State Police, who partner with the US Marine Corps on the program, had received large donations from Dunkin? Donuts, Whole Foods, local businesses, and hundreds of smaller checks from residents around the state, as of Monday. Clear Channel Outdoor also donated a billboard to the cause. State Police accepted donations of toys and money at their headquarters in Framingham until 6 last night.

description.hltext_display: 石川の老舗温泉旅館が台湾進出 加賀屋が合弁で
description.content:
【台北共同】日本の植民地時代に温泉地として開発された台湾北部の北投温泉で、石川県・和倉温泉の老舗旅館「加賀屋」が台湾の不動産会社との合弁で経営する和風旅館「日勝生加賀屋」が１８日、開業した。加賀屋の小田禎彦会長は「台湾の皆さんに喜んでいただける『おもてなし』を根付かせたい」と話している。開業式では、石川県輪島市の御陣乗太鼓のほか、盆や布巾などの代わりに使う「懐紙」を客室係代表に手渡す儀式を披露。

description.hltext_display: ACM12月22日外汇评论:朝鲜半岛紧张局势令亚洲市场涨跌互现市场重点关注英国央行会议纪要
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
今日汇评
日本出口年比上涨9.1%（预期上涨10.3%），为9个月以来的首次上涨，这主要得益于全球经济复苏帮助抵御日元的升值，尽管其进口年比上涨了14.2%（预期上涨9%）且亚洲股市也有所上涨。摩根士丹利资本国际亚太指数上涨0.2％，至135.06，创2008年以来的最高值；标准普尔500指数昨日上涨0.6％，至1254.60（雷曼兄弟破产之前，该指数曾一度上涨13%）；因投资者信心受新闻的提振，石油加交易价格为90美元/桶。ACM美元对日元上涨至83.85高点，伴随着美国释放的国内生产总值数据以及现房销售数据，预期该货币对将会继续上行势头。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 在撰写本报告时，亚洲市场先前的上涨行情结束，已开始下滑移动，这主要是因为韩国宣布将于明日开战史上最大规模的实弹军事演习，这有可能会激怒朝鲜，从而引发亚洲地区的担忧，为此日经指数下滑0.38%，上证综指下滑0.83%。
欧元兑美元下跌至1.3080低点，这归因于惠誉在未来6周内可能会继续下调希腊的信用评级，因为惠誉看到该国正在努力削减赤字并显示出无力偿还债务的状态。而葡萄牙昨日也被添加进可能下调的观察名单中，欧盟地区的形势看起来较为严峻，因为经济体未能从债务问题中恢复过来，我们可能看到欧元兑美元在跌破1.3000以后可能会继续下滑至1.2725。
随着英国利率决定会议的会议纪要的释放，英国还会释放其国内生产总值数据，而市场的重点依然是美国，因为美国即将释放其所有的重要数据，包括国内生产总值数据、现房销售数据以及个人消费数据等。
2

description.hltext_display: First Indoor Cycling Simulcast in Pittsburgh
description.content: After three years of highly successful indoor Winter Training locally, Cycling Fusion (formerly Global Ride Training Center) is taking the program nationally through the use of todays broadcast technology and the internet. Starting January 15th, fitness facilities across the country from Pittsburgh, PA to Denver, CO will be training together, albeit virtually, to get ready for the Spring season.

description.hltext_display: In Sattelschlepper gerutscht: 20000 Euro Schaden
description.content:
rg - Auf Höhe des Forsthauses sind am Dienstag auf der Bundesstraße 3 zwischen Jesberg und Hofgut Richerode ein Sattelschlepper und ein Auto zusammengestoßen.
Wie die Polizei mitteilte, geriet ein 45-jähriger Kasseler von Jesberg kommend in Richtung Hofgut mit seinem Auto ins Rutschen und kam auf die Gegenfahrbahn. Dort stieß er mit dem Sattelschlepper eines 30-Jährigen aus Neustadt/ Westerwald zusammen. Beim Unfall verletzte sich der Pkw-Fahrer leicht und wurde mit einem Krankenwagen ins Klinikum nach Fritzlar gebracht. Am Pkw entstand Sachschaden in Höhe von 2000 Euro, am Sattelschlepper in Höhe von 20 000 Euro. (joc)

description.hltext_display: Nutzung der EZB-Einlagenfazilität kaum unverändert
description.content:
DJ FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Die Nutzung der Einlagenfazilität der Europäischen Zentralbank (EZB) hat sich per 21. Dezember kaum verändert. Wie die EZB am Mittwoch mitteilte, deponierten Banken in der mit 0,25% verzinsten Fazilität 61,191 (zuvor: 61,359) Mrd EUR. Die Ausleihungen aus der mit 1,75% verzinsten Spitzenrefinanzierungsfazilität beliefen sich auf 3,577 (1,251) Mrd EUR.
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
December 22, 2010 03:24 ET (08:24 GMT)
Copyright (c) 2010 Dow Jones&Company, Inc.

description.hltext_display: Ditch this family and its tacky gags
description.content:
Meet Little Fockers, the latest in Robert De Niro and Ben Stillers comedy franchise. Grit your teeth through the fairly short though agonizing duration of its stay.
Then wave goodbye in relief as its huge cast of characters departs like the annoying in-laws they are. Meet the Parents (2000) was a tolerable trifle, and Meet the Fockers (2004) was a bloated bore. Little Fockers is tasteless trash, filled with abysmally unfunny gags involving vomit, enemas and erectile dysfunction as De Niros Byrnes clan and Stillers Focker family stumble through another mindless reunion.
The only positive thing De Niro, Stiller and such co-stars as Barbra Streisand, Dustin Hoffman, Jessica Alba and Owen Wilson honestly could say about Little Fockers is that they were paid well.
Jay Roach, who directed the first two movies, only produces this time, with Paul Weitz filling in as director on Little Fockers. Weitzs past work ranges from sweet and sharp (About a Boy) to gross but edgy (American Pie). Hes delivered an awful mess here, working from a witless screenplay credited to John Hamburg, co-writer of the first two movies and a producer on this one, and Larry Stuckey, an associate producer on Meet the Fockers. A string of dumb episodes, Little Fockers strains to find new reasons for De Niros father-in-law from hell Jack Byrnes to revive his suspicions about Stillers Greg Focker, the male nurse his darling daughter Pam (Teri Polo) has chosen for a mate.
It all goes down as Jack and his wife (Blythe Danner) visit Greg and Pam for the birthday bash of the couples twins. Ex-CIA agent Jack resumes his surveillance of Greg, who has an innocent flirtation with a gorgeous pharmaceutical rep (Alba) peddling Sustengo, a new drug to treat impotence.
Really. This is what the filmmakers expect you to pay to see.
Laura Dern joins the cast in a pointless role as head of a school that Greg and Pam are considering for their kids. A confrontation between De Niro and Harvey Keitel as Gregs housing contractor could have been a real hoot given the long history between the two actors, pals since their early days in Martin Scorsese films. But its just stiff, awkward and humorless, like the rest of the movie.

description.hltext_display: Fed court records allege Matau mother/daughter diverted funds to enrich themselves
description.content:
Instead of hiring additional employees to provide legal services for U’una’i Legal Service Corporation (ULSC) in accordance with grant funding, federal prosecution alleges that Julie Matau and her daughter Andrea diverted these funds to themselves in order for the defendants to enrich themselves.
The pair, who currently reside in San Francisco, Calif., were indicted last Thursday by a federal grand jury in Oakland under a 20-count indictment accusing the former ULSC employees of participating in a scheme resulting in the theft of approximately $150,000 in federal grant funds awarded to ULSC.
Co-conspirator of the scheme, David Wagner, is the former acting Executive Director of the non-profit group, who is now awaiting sentencing from the federal court in Missouri. Wagner, 47, resides in Maryland Heights, Mo.
According to the indictment, Julie Matau and Wagner applied for federal grants to provide certain legal services and the money was to be used to pay various full-time employees to perform the work — including two full-time lawyers, one of whom would also be the executive director, a grant administrator and an investigator/process server.
However, Julie Matau and Wagner failed to hire employees to fill all of the positions for which they received grant funds, the indictment alleges and noted that the pair, along with the investigator/process server did work on matters covered under the grants, but did not work on a full time basis.
Additionally, Julie Matau and Wagner, who were aided and abetted by Andrea, did fraudulently divert to themselves the grant money intended for additional employees to provide legal services through checks drawn on the grant funds made payable to themselves, and to other members of Julie and Andrea Matau’s families for their personal use and benefit.
Moreover, it is alleged that payments were made that were in excess of salaries allowed under the grant funding. For example, between Aug. 24, 2005 to Sept. 30, 2007, Julie Matau received around $65,649 in payment; between Sept. 2005 and Sept. 30, 2007 Wagner got $31,292; and between Aug. 24, 2005 and Sept. 30, 2007, Andrea Matau got $24,634 in payments.
The indictment also alleges that between May 2006 and August 2007, Julie Matau and Wagner issued check payments for services which were not authorized under any federal grant, such as:
• $16,288 to one of Julie Matau’s daughter, who was a minor; and,
• $13,500 to Julie Matau’s daughter-in-law;
The indictment also claims that some time between 2006 and 2007, Julie Matau and Wagner issued payments totaling $8,400 to Andrea Matau’s husband purportedly to lease a car which was in fact owned and controlled by Julie Matau but registered in the name of Andrea Matau’s husband.
“The proceeds of the check payments were returned to Julie Matau for her personal use and benefit,” the indictment alleges.
The indictment went on to say that when the federal Legal Service Corporation (LSC) terminated funding for ULSC around December 2006, Julie Matau and Wagner used U.S. Department of Justice grant funds to cover expenses generated for legal representation on cases and matters under the LSC grant.
Also alleged in the indictment was that sometime around March 2007, Julie Matau, assisted by another person working at her direction, and Wagner created an accounting manual for ULSC in which Julie Matau inserted a provision which purported to allow employees to earn “comp time” which could be converted at the employee’s option into pay at their regular rates.
The following month, the government alleges, Julie Matau, assisted by another person working at her direction, created false time sheets and summaries of time worked for employees, including all three defendants, which purported to claim that each employee had worked large amounts of what was described as “comp time”.
In May, Julie Matau and Wagner, represented to the ULSC’s board of directors that the proposed accounting manual for ULSC contained provisions which mirrored LSC-approved manuals, but didn’t tell the board about the “comp time” provision.
The indictment also revealed problems with how the grants were spent that first surfaced five years ago.
The indictment states that in August 2005, an independent auditor retained by ULSC, to conduct an audit for the year ended Dec. 31, 2004, found among other things, a number of reportable conditions, including a lack of internal controls and missing documentation.
These were also the same findings in 2007 by the independent auditor, who conducted three other audits for years ending 2005, 2006, and the first three months of 2007.
Samoa News is still unable to obtain from the U.S. Justice Department the status of Julie and Andrea Matau, whether or not they are in custody, or if they have made a court appearance since the indictment was handed down.

description.hltext_display: [교육CEO 비전을 말한다] ⑪ 최진..
description.content:
"인터넷 강의 사업에 역량 집중"마
마이맥과 합병 매출 150억 목표… '인강'서 3~5년내 괄목상대 자신N스쿨 등 리뉴얼·한계사업 정리… 유아·성인시장 진출도 적극 검토
초ㆍ중ㆍ고 대상의 프랜차이즈학원을 운영하는 디지털대성이 지난달 온라인 교육 전문업체인 대성마이맥과의 합병을 선언했다. 대성마이맥은 대입 중심의 온라인 교육 사업과 재수 종합반학원 사업을 영위하는 회사로 지난 2006년 디지털대성에서 분사했다가 4년 만에 다시 합쳤다. 이번 합병은 디지털대성이 앞으로 온라인 교육사업을 크게 강화하겠다는 의지를 표현한 것으로 읽혀진다. 두 회사는 이달 말 합병 절차를 완료한다. 최진영(40) 디지털대성 대표는 "정부의 사교육 경감 정책 강화, 학령인구 감소, 입시제도 변화 등 교육사업을 둘러싼 환경이 크게 바뀌면서 오프라인 학원 사업은 성장성에 한계를 드러내고 있다"면서 "대성마이맥과 합병하면 온라인 분야에 투자를 크게 늘릴 것"이라고 말했다.◇인터넷 강의 사업에 핵심역량 집중=디지털대성은 2000년 재수 종합학원인 대성학원의 자회사로 설립됐다. 회사 이름에서 알 수 있듯이 디지털대성은 설립 당시 오프라인 교육시장의 절대강자였던 대성학원의 교육 콘텐츠를 활용한 인터넷 비즈니스를 주력으로 하고 초ㆍ중등학생을 대상으로 한 학원 프랜차이즈 사업을 병행하는 사업 구조였다. 10년이 지난 지금 후발주자였던 중ㆍ고등학생 대상 학원 프랜차이즈 'N스쿨'은 업계 1위가 됐지만 메가스터디와 같은 시기에 진출한 인터넷강의(인강) 사업은 열세를 면하지 못하고 있다. 최 대표는 "투자비가 한계가 있어 일단 현금성이 좋은 프랜차이즈부터 집중 투자했다"면서 "대성학원의 우수한 강사진을 제대로 활용하지도, 스타강사도 영입하지 않다 보니 인강 사업을 키우지 못했다"고 설명했다.대성마이맥의 올해 인강 매출은 80억원. 업계 5위권 밖이다. 최 대표는 합병 이후 인강 매출을 120억~150억원으로 늘릴 계획이다. 메가스터디는 물론 업계 2~5위권 업체와도 격차가 여전히 크지만 최 대표는 3~5년 뒤면 인강 분야에서 디지털대성을 '괄목상대'하게 될 것이라고 자신했다.그는 "250여명의 대성학원 강사진을 적극 활용해 양질의 강의 콘텐츠를 제공하고 이를 통해 탄탄한 매출을 확보하게 되면 우수 강사의 외부 유출을 최소화할 수 있을 것"이라면서 "몇몇 스타강사에 의존하지 않고 지금까지 내실을 다져온 만큼 합병 첫 해인 내년을 기점으로 본격적으로 성장할 수 있을 것으로 기대한다"고 말했다.◇기존 브랜드 재구조화, 한계사업 정리=디지털대성은 초등학생부터 고등2학년까지를 대상으로 한 종합학원 브랜드인 N스쿨과 초등학생 전과목 브랜드인 '제넥스', 수학학원 '다수인', 영어학원 '하우 투 잉글리쉬' 등 다수의 학원 프랜차이즈를 운영하고 있다. 10개의 직영 학원과 900여개의 가맹 학원을 통해 지난해 334억원의 매출을 올렸지만 올해는 10%가량 역신장이 예상된다. 정부의 사교육 억제 정책의 영향을 받은 탓이다. 실제로 지난 3ㆍ4분기까지 247억원의 매출을 올려 전년 동기 대비 약 12%가량 감소했다.최 대표는 "오프라인 학원 브랜드 상당수가 시장에서 철수하거나 구조조정에 돌입한 상태"라면서 "앞으로 오프라인 브랜드들은 구조조정이나 재구조화하는 단계를 거칠 것"이라고 전망했다. 디지털대성도 다소 복잡하고 한계 상황에 이른 사업을 정리하거나 재구조화하는 방안을 검토하고 있다. 그러나 수학학원인 다수인은 창의성ㆍ논리력을 중시하는 입시환경 변화로 실적이 꾸준히 좋아지고 있는 만큼 내년부터 가맹사업을 본격화하는 등 투자를 더욱 늘릴 계획이다. 업계 1위인 N스쿨도 오프라인 학원에서 배운 내용을 온라인에서 심화시킬 수 있도록 온ㆍ오프라인을 결합한 '블렌디드 러닝'학습 시스템을 강화하는 등 전면적인 리뉴얼을 단행하는 것을 검토하고 있다.
스마트폰과 태블릿PC 보급이 확대되고 있는 추세에 발맞춰 스마트 러닝 사업에도 박차를 가한다. 10월 SK텔레콤과 전략적 제휴를 맺고 모바일 애플리케이션 공동 개발에 착수했다. 최 대표는 "새로운 디바이스(기기)가 나왔기 때문이라기보다는 교육 효과 측면에서 우수하기 때문에 스마트 러닝 트렌드에 적극적으로 대응하는 것"이라면서 "초ㆍ중고교 전과목 콘텐츠를 골고루 가진 곳이 대성이기 때문에 이러한 장점을 적극 활용할 계획"이라고 설명했다.◇유아ㆍ성인ㆍ유학사업 등 신규사업 적극 검토=최 대표는 "한국에서 초ㆍ중고교생을 대상으로 한 교육사업은 지속적으로 위험요소를 안고 가야 한다"고 말했다. 정책 리스크가 너무 크다는 얘기다. 그래서 신규 사업은 이러한 리스크가 없는 분야를 염두에 두고 있다. 이를테면 유아나 성인층을 대상으로 하거나 유학사업에 진출하는 것이다.최 대표는 "평균 수명이 길어지면서 평생교육의 필요성이 점증하고 있고 교육 분야의 국경이 사라지고 있지만 아직 성인교육과 유학시장에서 이렇다 할 대표 브랜드가 없다"면서 "아직 정해진 것은 아무것도 없지만 1년가량 시장조사와 브랜딩 과정을 거쳐 오는 2012년부터 신규사업을 본격화할 계획"이라고 전했다.투자여력은 충분하다. 대성마이맥과의 합병으로 현금성 자산이 200억원으로 늘었고 디지털대성의 수익성도 점차 나아지고 있다. 기존 업체에 대한 인수합병(M&A)도 적극적으로 고려하고 있다.
최 대표의 최종 목표는 디지털대성을 우리나라 교육산업을 대표하는 기업으로 키워내는 것이다. 그는 "시장규모가 3조~4조원대인 게임산업에도 5,000억~1조원의 매출을 올리는 기업이 나오고 있지만 교육산업은 학습지 업체를 제외하고는 기업화에 성공한 업체가 거의 없다. 규모가 작으면 좋은 콘텐츠를 만드는 데 한계가 있다"면서 "긴 안목을 가지고 연구개발(R&D)하면서 해외시장에서도 한국을 대표하는 교육기업이 나와야 하는데 그 역할을 디지털대성이 맡고 싶다"고 강조했다.성행경기자 saint@sed.co.kr
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: [新股]新时达等三中小板公司将于12月24日上市
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
全景网12月22日讯 深圳证券交易所周三公告称，三家中小板公司新时达(002527,股吧)（002527）、英飞拓(002528,股吧)（002528）、海源机械(002529,股吧)（002529）将于2010年12月24日上市，中小板个股数将增加至526只。
新时达发行价为16元/股，对应市盈率59.26倍。公司本次发行股份总数为5000万股，发行后总股本为2亿股，其中网上定价发行的4000万股股票自上市之日起开始上市交易。公司是国内最大的电梯控制系统配套供应商。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股

海源机械发行价为18元/股，对应市盈率48.25倍。公司本次发行股份总数为4000万股，发行后总股本为1.6亿股，其中网上定价发行的3200万股股票自上市之日起开始上市交易。公司是国内领先的液压成型装备专业制造商。（全景网/陈丹蓉）

description.hltext_display: Singapore Discovers DEEP OSCILLATION®: PhysioPod Place DEEP OSCILLATION® with BUFF WHITELEY
description.content: One ordinary Monday morning Buff Whiteley (Lymphatic Drainage Specialist) had a new client in her Singapore clinic talking excitedly about a new machine that had been used on her when home in Scotland. It produced a buzzing sensation and the results were amazing. After much research Buff is now proud to be the first therapist in Singapore to be using this unique, hands on therapy and is very impressed with the results she is attaining for post surgical, sports injuries and Lymphoedema cases.

description.hltext_display: First Epson SurePress Digital Press Installed at Tape & Label Converters
description.content:
Browse Back Issues
This Issue
E-Zine
advertisement
Economic Trends
Related Links
advertisement
advertisement
advertisement LONG BEACH, CA | Epson America announced that the SurePress L-4033A digital label press is now available, and the first North American unit as been installed at Southern California-based label printer Tape & Label Converters. The company plans to use the versatile short-run digital label press to respond to the changing demands of the label printing industry and produce more complex images requiring higher print resolution and multiple spot colors.
“SurePress is a perfect fit for us because it offers the print quality and spot color reproduction our clients demand, as well as allows us to reach out to new clients with greater capability,” said Mas Crawford, VP of sales, Tape & Label Converters. “In addition, smaller quantities and shorter lead-times are a given in our business, and with SurePress our make-ready time is dramatically reduced, operation is simple, and maintenance requirements are reduced, giving us increased productivity from our previous solution.”
Designed for label converters, large scale product manufacturers, and commercial printers, the SurePress digital label press is said to fit easily into existing digital workflows and prints on a range of off-the-shelf substrates with no pre-coating required, according to the company. Printing up to 13-in. wide and at speeds up to 16 fpm, SurePress uses Epson’s MicroPiezo ink jet technology and newly-developed SurePress AQ six-color, industrial-quality, water-based pigment ink that produces a wide range of colors for impressive and consistent results, the company reports.

description.hltext_display: NHRA drivers on radio tonight
Teachers hear of governor’s exemption but still want it in writing
description.content:
FASE organizers said yesterday that it wants the teachers exemption “in writing”, but has since opted to take the Governor’s word that teachers will be exempt. [photo: F. Sagapolutele]
Federation of American Samoa Educators (FASE) president Ben Te’o will have a new sign this morning along the road at Utulei Beach thanking Gov. Togiola Togiola for exempting teachers from reduction of working hours, if such a plan goes into effect next month.
The new sign with be replacing the one put up yesterday morning — in the same area — which states: “Exempt teachers in writing from pay cut policy” and the sign was part of a planned rally called by FASE to bring attention to Te’o’s open letter last week to the Governor, calling upon him to exempt teachers from the reduction.
Before 8:30 a.m yesterday, Te’o, along with two other teachers were at Utulei Beach for the rally, until Education Department director Dr. Claire Poumele stopped by to let the FASE president know that the Governor did announce during last week’s cohort graduation about teachers being exempted.
Poumele “stopped by here and said that teachers are exempt by the government and wanted to know if we could pull back,” Te’o said at Utulei beach, adding that he didn’t know about the announcement made by the Governor at the Cohort graduation.
“But what I’m pulling for, is that I want something in writing. I don’t want hear-say and then comes January when the policy goes into effect, the hours are cut for teachers,” said Te’o.
According to the organization’s president, he was also informed by Poumele that she was looking into funding to cover pay for school counselors and principals in order for them to be exempted as well.
A DOE source told Samoa News on Sunday that Poumele was to hold a meeting yesterday with DOE management to look at possible solutions whereby DOE principals and school counselors could also be exempted from the reduction of working hours by identifying a revenue source.
Te’o said yesterday that he would like a written policy from the governor, the DOE director and the Human Resources department director, exempting teachers from the reduction in hours.
Asked why he wants teachers’ exempted, Te’o said that teachers are 10-month employees and their pay is spread out over 26-pay periods (which covers June and July during the summer break).
“So they should be exempted,” said Te’o, adding that he has not received an official reply to his open letter of last week.
As to the reason for the low turnout yesterday, Te’o said it was probably after news spread yesterday morning that the Governor had stated the teacher’s exemption at the Cohort graduation.
Te’o says the organization will be back today, “to reverse the sign… We are professionals and we need to do a thank you to the Governor… for answering our request to exempt the teachers,” said Te’o, adding that he and other teachers will also hand out candies today in the spirit of Christmas.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank muss Millionen zahlen
description.content: New York/Frankfurt - Die USA haben die Deutsche Bank für ihre Beteiligung an illegalen Steuersparmodellen zur Rechenschaft gezogen. Das Frankfurter Geldhaus willigte ein, knapp 554 Millionen Dollar an den amerikanischen Fiskus zu zahlen. Im Gegenzug würde der Fall nicht weiter verfolgt, teilte die US-Bundesstaatsanwaltschaft in Manhattan am Dienstag mit. Die Deutsche Bank habe kriminelles Fehlverhalten eingestanden, hieß es in der gemeinsamen Mitteilung der Staatsanwaltschaft und der Steuerbehörde IRS. Die illegalen Steuersparmodelle für Kunden, in die das Kreditinstitut verwickelt gewesen sei, hätten zu milliardenschweren Ausfällen für den Staat beigetragen. Die Fälle liegen nach Angaben der Deutschen Bank allerdings schon Jahre zurück - von 1996 bis 2002. Die Bank habe ihre Richtlinien und Verfahren seitdem wesentlich verschärft, teilte das Kreditinstitut mit. Im Rahmen der sogenannten Nichtverfolgungsvereinbarung muss sie ihre internen Mechanismen weiter verfeinern. Ein unabhängiger Experte überwacht, dass sich die Deutsche Bank nichts mehr zuschulden kommen lässt. Zudem muss die Bank von Zeit zu Zeit Bericht an die US-Behörden erstatten. Steuersparmodelle, die den kritisierten ähnlich sind, sind für die Frankfurter künftig komplett tabu. Finanziell hat die Deutsche Bank vorgesorgt. Sie bildete nach eigenen Angaben in der Vergangenheit ausreichende Rückstellungen, «so dass der zu zahlende Betrag keine Auswirkungen auf das laufende Ergebnis nach Steuern haben wird». Immer wieder hatte die Deutsche Bank in ihren Finanzberichten vage auf Steuerermittlungsverfahren in den USA hingewiesen.
