description.hltext_display: 복·예습 8대2 비율로 개념정리 주..
description.content:
"2012 입시 이미 시작"… 예비 수험생 고2 겨울방학 학습법은?
언 어 - 어휘력 강화 중점 · 수 리 - 원리·법칙 숙지를외국어 - 매일'듣기' 연습 · 탐 구 - 교과서 핵심 파악현 고2 학생들은 아직 '고2 겨울방학'을 보내고 있지만 2012학년도 입시를 치러야 한다는 부담감은 이미 고3 수험생의 마음과 다를 바 없다.전문가들은 "고2 겨울방학부터 실질적인 고3 일정이 시작된다"며 "새학기가 시작되면 시간상 소홀해질 수 있는 부분에 대한 투자가 1~2월 방학 동안 집중적으로 이뤄져야 한다"고 강조한다.◇개념정리에 주력할 것=겨울방학에는 문제풀이보다 복습과 예습을 8대2의 비율로 할당해 개념정리를 하는 것이 좋다. 입시가 아직 머나먼 얘기처럼 들릴 수 있지만 3월부터 학기가 시작되면 내신 관리와 대학별고사 등 준비해야 할 것들이 많아져 시간적 여유가 없다. 김희동 진학사 입시분석실장은 "이 기간은 개념정리를 명확히 하되 암기식 정독보다는 핵심을 찾고 흐름을 이해하는 방식으로 과목 또는 단원별로 학습 시간을 줄여나가도록 해야 한다"고 조언했다.◇언어, 고득점 토대는 어휘력=언어영역에서 어휘력은 어휘ㆍ어법 관련 문제들에만 국한되지 않고 지문의 독해 및 정보의 해석 과정에서도 막대한 영향력을 발휘한다. 그런데 어휘력은 단기간 내에 향상될 수 없다. 추경문 비상에듀 언어 강사는 "수능이 아직 멀었다고 여유를 부릴 것이 아니라 바로 지금부터 미리미리 어휘력을 구축해나가는 것이 현명한 학습자세"라며 "다양한 제재의 글을 읽거나 문제를 풀면서 다양한 어휘를 익힐 것"을 주문했다. 한자성어나 속담ㆍ관용표현은 따로 노트를 만들어 정리하면 좋은 '개념 노트'가 된다.문학과 비문학 독해에 대한 꾸준한 연습도 필수다. 이종서 이투스청솔 교육평가연구소장은 "생소한 지문 또는 내용에 대한 독해경험을 쌓으면서 최대한 다양한 지문을 접하는 것이 좋다"며 "정보의 적용 및 자료 해석문제, 어휘ㆍ어법 관련 문제에 대한 정답률이 낮은 편이므로 대비를 해야 한다"고 말했다.◇수리, 개념ㆍ원리ㆍ법칙 마스터에 중점=수리영역은 성적의 상중하를 막론하고 개념이 매우 중요한 영역이다. 단원별 개념에 대한 숙지가 잘 돼 있을 테지만 꾸준히 개념을 복습해주고 고난도의 문제풀이를 통해 문제 해결 능력을 키워나가야 한다.
매일 소단원 2~3개 정도를 목표로 잡고 공부하면서 개념을 정리한 다음 그 단원의 개념이 적용될 수 있는 문제의 풀이를 암기하는 게 좋다. 틀린 문제는 반드시 정확하게 이해한 뒤 넘어가야 한다. 고1, 고2 모의고사 기출문제를 통해 자신의 약점을 찾아서 보완하는 것도 좋다.◇외국어, 매일 '듣고', 핵심어휘 '익히고'=학기가 시작되면 문제풀이만으로도 시간이 부족한 경우가 많다. 겨울방학 동안 매일 듣기 연습을 하면서 스크립트를 보지 않고 귀에 들리는 것에만 집중해 내용을 이해하는 훈련을 하는 것이 좋다. 그 이후 다시 들으면서 받아 적어보고 여러번 소리 내어 말해보는 것이 궁극적인 듣기 능력 향상에 도움이 된다.
문법과 어휘라는 퍼즐로 구성된 독해의 경우 방학 동안 많은 문제를 풀기보다는 탄탄한 기초 공사에 주력해야 한다. 이 기초만 제대로 쌓아도 단어의 조합만으로 '행간의 의미'를 유추해 문제를 풀 수 있다. 휴대가 가능하면서 쉽게 외울 수 있는 분량의 단어장을 만들거나 이미 학습한 교재를 복습하며 어휘력을 키우는 것도 좋은 방법이다.
◇탐구, 교과서 개념 새롭게 접근=탐구영역은 최근 수능에서 피상적으로 교과 개념을 암기하는 학생들에게는 불리하게 출제되고 있다. 새로운 각도에서 개념ㆍ원리에 접근하거나 기존의 익숙한 표현이 아닌 새로운 서술로 답지를 구성하고 있기 때문에 정확하게 개념을 이해하지 못한 학생들은 아는 문제라고 생각하면서도 실제 답을 고르지 못하는 경우가 많다. 따라서 교과서에서 중요하게 다루는 핵심 개념이나 원리를 완벽하게 이해하고 개념 간의 관계파악 및 다른 사례에 적용하는 연습을 꾸준히 해야 한다.
◇수능 외 부분도 미리미리=대입에서 중요한 전형 축이 된 입학사정관제도는 크게 '자기소개서+논술ㆍ면접+내신'이라는 세 가지 요소를 요구한다. 여기서 자기소개서나 논술ㆍ면접은 단기간 내실이나 실력을 높이기 어려운 부분이다. 따라서 자신의 관심사와 전공의 연관성을 보여줄 수 있는 자료나 활동 내역, 구체적인 학업 계획서를 틈틈이 준비해두는 것이 좋다. 남영식 스카이에듀 입시전략연구소 본부장은 "자기가 가고 싶은 대학의 자기소개서를 다운 받아 지금까지의 일로 작성해보면서 부족한 부분을 체크하고 보완할 수 있을 것"이라고 조언했다.도움말 비상에듀ㆍ스카이에듀ㆍ이투스청솔
송주희기자 ssong@sed.co.kr
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Omicidio a Francavilla Fontana, ucciso 28enne in un agguato
description.content: Agguato mortale a Francavilla Fontana, in provincia di Brindisi. La vittima è un ventottenne con piccoli precedenti penali, Fabio Parisi. L'uomo è stato affrontato dai killer in via Regina Elena, in pieno centro cittadino e freddato a colpi di pistola. Sul grave fatto di sangue indagano i carabinieri. Quello di Parisi è il terzo omicidio messo a segno a Francavilla Fontana nel giro di tre mesi. Lo scorso 11 novembre sotto i colpi dei sicari finì per errore Francesco Ligorio, un 18enne incensurato. A ottobre fu ucciso a colpi di pistola un imprenditore di 42 anni, Vincenzo Della Corte. Xta-Cro-ClaE' il terzo omicidio in tre mesi nel comune del brindisino. La vittima, Fabio Parisi, ha precedenti penali

description.hltext_display: Tricky conditions set to test fleet
description.content:
Sydney to Hobart racers can expect rough conditions this year but there will be no repeat of the horrendous weather conditions that led to the 1998 tragedy, according to the Bureau of Meteorology (BOM).
Light winds are set to ease sailors out of Sydney Harbour when the race starts on Boxing Day, but a strong southerly front is forecast to hit the fleet as they begin the long trek down the east coast.
However, BOM spokesman Barry Hanstrum was confident of avoiding a similar scenario to that witnessed in 1998 when brutal winds wreaked havoc on the field of 115 boats.
In that race, six sailors died and just 44 yachts completed the race, but Hanstrum said this year's competitors are not in danger.
'There's certainly nothing in the weather pattern that is indicative of the ferocity of the winds in the 1998 race,' Hanstrum told reporters.
'That was a very small intense low that actually moved through the race course.'
On Boxing Day evening the winds are expected to pick up, with a 20-30 knot southerly set to cause some trouble for the leading crews.
The forecast headwinds will dampen any hopes that pre-race favourite Wild Oats XI may have had of breaking her own race record of one day, 18 hours, 40 minutes and 10 seconds set in 2005.
'When you're on the boat you're really just focussed on making the right decisions at the right time to get down there as best you can,' said Wild Oats XI's navigator Ian Burns.
'The real challenge I think is (going to be) the first couple of nights and keeping the boat together.
'We'll be slowing down rather than trying to break any record, or even necessarily breaking our competition.
'For us it won't be a record-breaking year, I don't think, but it

event_or_fact.property: There's certainly nothing in the weather pattern that is indicative of the ferocity of the winds in the 1998 race; That was a very small intense low that actually moved through the race course.

description.hltext_display: Kiss rocker Gene Simmons has bedded nearly 5,000 women!
description.content:
Kiss rocker Gene Simmons has revealed that he slept with about 5,000 women during his 37 years of touring.
In a radio interview with 'Woody and The Wake-Up Call', Simmons said that the he even took a picture of nearly every single women he slept with, reports Fox News.
Moreover, the 61-year-old doesn't believe in monogamy-or marriage.
"The only thing wrong with marriage is that one of the persons involved is a man," he often says.
A make-up artist sued Simmons for 500,000 dollars over claims of sexual assault and battery in May this year.

description.hltext_display: Finaliza el pago de aguinaldo, quincenita y plus especial de fin de año
description.content:
Este martes 21 de diciembre, cobrarán los agentes de la Función Judicial que incluye a la Procuración y Defensoría General.
Comentarios 0 | | | | |
Compatir
De esta manera termina el pago de la segunda cuota del Aguinaldo, el adicional no remunerativo denominado Quincenita y el plus especial de 350 pesos de fin de año a los agentes de la APP y municipios.

description.hltext_display: 资金流出五类板块银行股拖累大盘
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
今日资金净流入较大的板块:钢铁、期货概念、运输物流、节能环保、电子信息。
今日资金净流出较大的板块:医药、中小板、银行、新能源、有色金属。
2、 大盘后市观点及预期分析
两市今日的总成交金额为2524.24亿元,和前一交易日相比减少181亿元,资金净流出约93亿。昨日中阳反弹后,资金今日无法进一步流入,银行、煤炭、医药、中小板板块的资金反而开始流出,绝大多数板块出现调整,上证指数跌0.9%,收在2877.9.今日指数再回2800-2900区间震荡,而后市上行的关键在于资金的持续净流入,目前仍未看到明确的信号。由于前期有明显资金进场,因此指数下跌的空间也不大。
3、相关热点板块及个股如下:
房地产,净流入较大的个股有:首开股份(600376,股吧)、阳光城、世茂股份(600823,股吧)、中茵股份(600745,股吧)、栖霞建设(600533,股吧)、鑫茂科技(000836,股吧)。
钢铁,净流入较大的个股有:*ST钒钛 、方大特钢(600507,股吧)、西宁特钢(600117,股吧)。
期货概念,净流入较大的个股有:大恒科技(600288,股吧)、创元科技(000551,股吧)、中国中期(000996,股吧)。
电子信息,净流入较大的个股有:大恒科技、北矿磁材(600980,股吧)、天通股份(600330,股吧)、有研硅股(600206,股吧)、福晶科技(002222,股吧)。
4、两市各板块资金流向全景表:
重视
比率 ％
「注释」
资金流向全景图中星号说明:重视程度由低向高依次分别以1-2颗星表示,1颗星表示关注,2颗星表示高度关注。
资金流向全景图说明:表中数值为正表示资金净流入,数值为负表示资金净流出。

description.hltext_display: Cartoon Network will premiere Young Justice on Friday, January 7
description.content:
Cartoon Network will premiere its new animated series Young Justice on Friday, January 7, 2011 at 7p. Last month the network debuted a Young Justice hour-long special that introduced the series team of super heroes, which is comprised of Robin, Aqualad, Kid Flash, Superboy, Miss Martian and Artemis. Young Justice is produced by Warner Bros. Animation and based on characters from DC Comics. Brandon Vietti (Batman: Under the Red Hood, Superman Doomsday, The Batman) and Greg Weisman (Gargoyles, The Spectacular Spider-Man, W.I.T.C.H.) serve as producers on the series.
MORE KIDS STUFF
CBeebies, BBC's preschool brand, will premiere its new Let's Celebrate series in the US Hispanic market on Christmas Day, Saturday, December 25, at 4p. All this week leading up to the debut of Let's Celebrate, CBeebies will feature its Christmas Special block, daily 11a-1p, featuring holiday-themed episodes of its many preschool series. Then, on Christmas Day, Cbeebies will feature a Christmas marathon, 11a-4p, culminating with the launch of Let's Celebrate. Each episode of Let's Celebrate explores different stories and customs behind religious and cultural festivals as it visits kids and their families in different communities. Festivals featured in the series include, Vaisakhi, Eid-ul-Fitr, Holi, Wesak, Purim, Diwali, Easter, St Patrick's Day, St David's Day, St George's Day, St Andrew's Day and Norouz.
The third season of The Electric Company ( www.pbskidsgo.org/electriccompany ) will launch on Monday, February 7, 2011 on PBS Kids Go! (check local listings). The new season of The Electric Company is comprised of 12 new episodes, which will debut each Monday. Building on the series goal of developing literacy skills, the theme for the new season of The Electric Company is math vocabulary. Additionally, season three will introduce new segments and two new characters Coy Stewart (Are We There Yet?) will play Marcus Barnes, who inherits a math superpower, and Carly Sonenclar (Les Miserables) will play Gilda Flip, a prankster in training. Also, special guest appearances this season include Alan Cumming, Benji and Joel Madden (Good Charlotte), music producer/rapper Swizz Beats, comedians Jenny Slate and Sherrod Small, and Wyatt Cenac (The Daily Show), as well as music's Doug E. Fresh.
HBO will debut the new HBO presentation The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway in 2011. HBO will record the special presentation of the current Broadway show at the Stephen Sondheim Theatre in NYC, following its run that ends January 2, 2011. While not specifically targeted to kids, The Pee-Wee Herman Show on Broadway, like the Paul Reubens' Pee-wee's Playhouse TV series, works on many levels for different age groups. Reubens' first Pee-Wee Herman special debuted three decades ago. The new special, like the first, will be directed by Marty Callner, who has directed a range of HBO comedy specials. Reubens is also working with writer/director/producer Judd Apatow to develop a new Pee-Wee feature film.
MTV Networks International inks deals in Latin America for Nickelodeon's series True Jackson, VP. Channels acquiring the live-action comedy include UCV TV (Chile) takes season one of the series, with Monte Carlo TV (Uruguay) picking up the first 25 episodes. TeleTica (Costa Rica) signs on for additional episodes of True Jackson, VP (episodes 114-125 from season 1 and episodes 201-210 from season 2). Viewers of Venevision (Venezuela) and Teleamazonas (Ecuador) will be able to watch the series on the new Nickelodeon blocks that will be featured on those channels under newly complete deals.
DHX Media is launching a new iPad app based on its CBeebies TV series Grandpa in My Pocket. The new Grandpa in my Pocket: Horatio Heave Ho! eBook app will be available initially in the UK via UK iTunes, and will rollout later in other territories. The app will be available for iPhone and iPod Touch in spring 2011. Narrated by Jason Mason, the ebook features Horatio Heave Ho!, the Sunnysands Bank Manager that really wants to be a pirate. When he decides to search for treasure at the beach, Grandpa dons his shrinking cap to help teach him there's more to life than treasure. The app includes features such as tapping the little Grandpa on each page to make him run and then try to catch him and make him sparkle, tap Horatio and play pirate, and take part in the word and actions of the pirate song. The Grandpa in My Pocket TV series can be seen around the world and is produced with participation from Finance Wales and produced by Adastra Creative.
Spain's Zinkia Entertainment is releasing its second Pocoyo app, Coloring with Pocoyo and Friends, worldwide specifically for the iPad but also available for the iPhone and iPod Touch. The app can be purchased and downloaded in English and Spanish. New coloring pages will be available on demand via the app. Downloading the app provides the user with seven days premium access to the Premium Club at pocoyoworld.com ( www.pocoyoworld.com ), Pocoyo's virtual world online destination. The app is based on the Pocoyo CGI animated preschool TV series, which is co-produced by Zinkia and ITV Studios Global Entertainment. Bandai America, the master toy licensee for the property in the US and Canada, recently released a line of Pocoyo toys. The series airs in the US on the Nick Jr. channel, PBS, Univision and Discovery Familia.
Program Call: Cynopsis Media will be producing our annual NATPE Shopping Guide sent to all Cynopsis and Cynopsis Kids subscribers on Thursday, January 20, the week before NATPE 2011 in Miami. If you would like to have your programming included, please send us only the following info for your top 5 shows: title, availability date, number of episodes, length, type (i.e., movie, series, special, etc.), genre and your terms (barter, cash, etc.) as well as your company's stand/booth location. To be included in this free and highly-viewed special edition, please send your submission to lisa@cynopsis.com no later than Friday, January 14, 2011. A confirmation email will be sent following each submission from Lisa (if you don't receive a confirmation email, please resubmit).

Answer to Yesterday's Trivia: This pair first appeared in a book published in 1918, later dolls were made and a television show first aired in 1988. The girl was first inspired by the author's daughter who found an old faceless and well loved rag doll that belonged to her grandmother. Who were this pair? RAGGEDY ANN AND ANDY Kudos to: Danielle Larson-Hasbro Inc./Pawtucket; Monica Lenti-MTV Networks/NY; Ellen Wall-Disney FamilyFun/Northampton; Mara Anastas-Simon & Schuster/NY; Leah Broeders-Target/Minneapolis; Heather Floore-KDAF/Dallas; Michael Ross-The Hub/Burbank; Katherine Kaufman-Televix Entertainment/Beverly Hills; Randy Barrios-CBS/LA; Chip Beaman-Soundelux Design Music Group/Hollywood; Daniel Wineman-Disney/London; David Hiltz-HBC/Toronto

description.hltext_display: 杨千?婚礼接亲场面热闹 “老公十大家规”曝光[组图]
description.content:
杨千?与丁子高在湾仔君悦酒店补摆婚宴，筵开48席，邀请了580个宾客。回礼礼物是新人一本88页的巴黎结婚相册、法国茶叶及紫色环保袋。早上丁子高接过新娘之后，下午一对新人举行记者会招待传媒，逾百记者到场采访，场面十分热闹。婚宴现场以千?最喜爱的紫色为主，布景板以他们去年结婚时的拉斯韦加斯作主题。下午四点，丁生丁太十指紧扣会晤传媒，千?穿着价值12万的低裁白色婚纱，佩戴800万钻饰亮相，十分漂亮。期间丁子高多次不小心踩到太太的婚纱，千?也忍不住当场闹老公。

description.hltext_display: Angelababy露肩上镜 新年月历清纯性感集一身[组图]
description.content:
新生代性感女神Angelababy从出道以来就势头猛烈，成为众多少男少女心中的偶像。不仅长相甜美，身材瘦高而且气质颇佳总能让她成为各大媒体追逐的焦点。尽管与国产帅哥黄晓明恋情传得热闹非凡，但女神的地位没有受到丝毫动摇。
友人微博大秀Angelababy 为时尚杂志拍照花絮
Angelababy 拍摄的2011年月历造型多变
时近圣诞，本来就为了工作经常在周遭飞的Baby显得更加繁忙，早前她在澳洲拍摄2011年月历，尝试了高雅、清纯、狂野等各种style，友人KimChou在微博大方曝光baby这一系列的月历照。日前，友人再次秀出她为时尚杂志拍照的花絮，baby身穿黑色连衣裙香肩微露，脚穿黑色高筒皮靴，性感和狂野集于一身非常养眼。

description.hltext_display: Russian spy Anna Chapman nude in Jan issue of Playboy
description.content:
She has been exposed yet again, but this time in a way that would appeal to her fans worldwide - Russian spy Anna Chapman will be seen naked in the January issue of Playboy.
The naked pictures are from an ex-boyfriend and were part of a batch of nude photos, which appeared online in July. Her ex-husband, Alex had also given the world a peek into their sex life and shared several semi-nude pictures of her.
"I found her Russian accent such a turn-on. We were having so much fun. We also experimented with sex toys," the New York Daily News quoted him as telling the News of the World.
Chapman did pose for the Russian edition of Maxim magazine in October.
"Seduction, like love and friendship are the same everywhere," she told Maxim in Russian.
"Most men are divided in three categories: primitive, those that only want sex; smarter, those that want to be loved, and [the] last group -- those that not only want to be loved, they also need that this love will be the biggest and most amazing feeling in your life," she said.

description.hltext_display: 港交所委任蓝博文出任上市推广部主管
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
香港交易所（00388.HK）12月22日宣布，委任蓝博文（Eric Landheer）出任市场发展科高级总监暨上市推广部主管，将于2011年2月1日履新，并向港交所市场发展科主管罗力汇报。
据港交所介绍，蓝博文能讲普通话，过去三年被派驻香港，为NASDAQ OMX的亚太区总负责人，主理该所一切有关上市推广及发行人关系的工作。而此前他亦曾驻伦敦一年，担任NASDAQ International的亚太区总负责人。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 在派驻伦敦及亚洲前，蓝博文原为NASDAQ驻美国加州的新上市董事总经理，主责推动美国西部企业到NASDAQ证券市场上市。
蓝博文早年也曾任职不同的经纪行及证券公司，参与股本融资及以大型美资互惠基金及对冲基金为对象的机构销售工作。

description.hltext_display: How to Increase Sex Drive in Women Fast and Naturally?
description.content: Low sex drive in women is a pretty common problem and it has a wide variety of causes. It can be determined by both physical and psychological. Medical conditions like diabetes can interfere with a woman's desire for having sex, as well as other conditions like pregnancy or post-partum. Other physical causes of low sex drive in women include anemia, abuse of drugs, smoking, hormonal imbalances or taking certain prescribed drugs. Psychological causes of low libido are more difficult to be determined than physical one. Usually women that have had unpleasant sexual experiences or that have been abused need to increase their sex drive. Anxiety and stress are one of the most fearful enemies of a normal sex life. In order to increase sex drive in women it is recommended to first figure out what is the root cause of the problem. If, for instance, it is about prescribed medication, changing them or stop taking them might solve the problem instantly. However, the safest method to increase sex drive in women is to use herbal supplements. They address a great majority of the underlying causes of low libido and they naturally stimulate the desire for sex, without interfering with other body functions or medical conditions. Herbal supplements to increase sex drive in women contain a combination of herbs with aphrodisiac effects that not only give a boost to the libido, but also increase pleasure during sex. All along history women have been using herbs for increasing their sex drive and for keeping their partners happy. Damiana, ginseng, wild yam, kava kava and muira pauma are one of the most renowned ones that were used from ancient times. Herbal supplements like Fantasy or Kamni capsules made of potent herbs are highly effective in treating low libido in women. In order to naturally increase sex drive in women, besides taking natural supplements, you can also put in practice some other helpful tips. Try to eliminate stress from your life and if you find it too difficult to take care of your career, your house and your family in the same time, consider hiring someone to help you, either at work or at home. Take some time for yourself and do whatever you enjoy most and don't forget to keep yourself attractive for your partner. Don't neglect the difference that a healthy diet will have on your sex life. A woman's body needs plenty of vitamins and minerals for working properly and ensuring the all can improve your overall health condition and also your mental state.

description.hltext_display: Raised in Dover, dog dies a war hero
description.content:
Cole was born to be a champion. He died a hero.
The black Labrador retriever once owned by a Dover family gave his life for his country, saving a U.S. Marine on the killing fields of Afghanistan.
In Cole's last moments on earth, as Cpl. Brian Holm's three-man unit searched for mines along a dangerous road in Helmand Province, the black Lab looked over his shoulder at Holm, his handler.
Holm later told his wife, Brittany, that he will never forget the look on Cole's face. It seemed to say, "I won't let them hurt you."
Then came the explosion.
Bo's King Cole JH was born Aug. 1, 2007, in Iowa, one of the sought-after pups of two field-trial champions.
Had he taken the course of his litter mates, Cole might have spent his life training and competing in field trials, in which dogs make complicated retrievals in competition with one another.
But Cole followed a different path, one that led to Dover, North Carolina and, eventually, Afghanistan.
Steve Tull, a Dover hunter and dog handler, bought the $3,000 puppy because he wanted to try his hand at field trials with a dog bred for the task.
Training can be costly, but Tull had a friend who took it on. When the friend moved away, Tull was left with a partially trained dog and a decision to make about what to do with him.
Tull hunted ducks with Cole and trained him as best he could, but he could not spend the $600 or $700 a month it would take to send Cole to a professional trainer. Tull could see Cole was getting bored: He was a working dog without a job.
One day, Tull spoke with Bob Agnor, a friend from the Delmar Waterfowl Club, a Dover hunt club. Agnor works for K2 Solutions Inc., a North Carolina firm that trains dogs to sniff out IEDs, the improvised explosive devices that claim lives and limbs on today's battlefields.
Tull and his wife learned that military handlers form a deep bond with their dogs and treat them well, which is what they wanted for Cole. So Cole shipped out for North Carolina, where he met Holm, the man who would become his handler and comrade in arms.

event_or_fact.property: Brittany, that he will never forget the look on Cole's face

description.hltext_display: Samoa has high efficiency undersea cable planned for 2013
description.content:
The Samoa government is moving forward with another undersea fiber optic cable connecting the Independent State with Australia, New Zealand and California, which may mean competition for the American Samoa Hawaii Cable LLC (ASH-Cable), whose major shareholder has reported an increase in revenues.
However, there are no other specific details of how much the Samoa government will pay or the role it will play in the “high speed undersea cable” for the Pacific, a project of the Pacific Fibre Company.
According to a weekly news release by the Samoa government, on Thursday, the cabinet approved the signing of a memorandum of understanding for the fiber optic cable provided by Pacific Fibre Company and the MOU is to be signed by Safuneituuga Paaga Neri, the Minister of Communication.
No date was given as to when it will be signed.
A regional news release in July states that the “high-efficiency”, 13,600km (around 8,500 miles) Pacific Fibre cable will be built jointly by Pacific Fibre Ltd and Asian telecommunication services provider Pacnet.
The cable will land in Sydney, Auckland and Los Angeles and will be ready for service in 2013.
The companies will co-own the cable and share responsibility for the cable supply contract, operations and maintenance costs.
This new cable will deliver the enhanced international connectivity that is essential to support these broadband initiatives, it says.
Bloomberg Businessweek wire service reported in March this year that Pacific Fibre Ltd, a New Zealand investor group, plans to build a NZ$900 million (US$628 million) fiber-optic cable linking New Zealand, Australia and the U.S. to improve Internet speeds between the three nations. The cable is expected to be operational in 2013.
ASH-Cable currently provides fiber optic cable connection between Samoa and American Samoa to Hawai’i, under the link American Samoa-Samoa in which the Samoa government is a subscriber to the ASH-Cable, which is 33% owned by the American Samoa Government.
Meanwhile, ASH-Cable’s major shareholder Florida-based eLandia International in its quarterly filing with the U.S. Security and Exchange Commission (SEC) for the three months ending Sept. 30, 2010 has increased revenues compared to the same period last year.
“Revenue from the provision of professional services for the three months ended September 30, 2010 increased compared with the same period in 2009 primarily as a result of the provision of communication services through our undersea cable operations, as well as revenues generated from our cable television operations, both of which began generating revenues during the second quarter of 2009,” according to the company, who is also the owner of Moana TV.
“Service revenue also increased as a result of securing and activating additional fiber capacity for our existing customers and leased capacity for new broadband and fiber customers,” it says but didn’t provide specific details.
The Samoa government-owned Samoa Telco and locally based American Samoa TeleCommunications and Blue Sky Communications — which is owned by eLandia, are the known major customers for ASH-Cable.
“Our service gross margin increased from 59% for the three months ended September 30, 2009 to 69% for the three months ended September 30, 2010. The increase is primarily attributable to the higher margin revenues related to the communication services provided by our undersea cable operations and our data services provided to our large broadband customers. The increase in our service margin was offset by our cable television service offerings, which carry a lower overall margin than some of our other services,” said eLandia in its SEC filing last month.
For expenses, eLandia says that general and administrative expenses were higher for the three months ended September 30, 2010 than for the same period in 2009 and the increase is mainly due to legal, professional and management fees incurred for the undersea cable operations related to the broadband stimulus funding application process.
(It was announced locally in August of this year that the application had been approved and a $16.7 million loan guarantee on a loan the company has with the ANZ Bank from the US Department of Agriculture was granted. With this guarantee, a “slightly better interest rate” was attained, according to the local CEO of Blue Sky Communications, who is also the CEO of ASH-Cable — as the bank loan was now ‘safely’ secured.)
Additionally, expenses related to the depreciation of property, plant and equipment for the three months ended September 30, 2010 were lower than for the same period in 2009 mainly due to the full depreciation of certain assets, offset by the depreciation on network equipment installed to support our undersea cable operations.
“Other income, net for the three months ended September 30, 2010 and 2009, is mainly comprised of the non-controlling interest on the American Samoan Hawaii Cable segment of our operations, representing the 33.33% ownership of the American Samoa Government,” it says.
(There were no details of what exactly this “other income” comprises in reference to “…representing the 33.33% ownership of the American Samoa Government.”)

description.hltext_display: How to Increase Libido and Sexual Desire in Women With Herbal Supplements?
description.content: Low libido in women in a very common problem couples have. It usually comes with age and it is perpetuated by the fact that women are always busy both at work and in the family. Sometimes the household chores, the children and the deadline from her boss might stress her and she might put physical pleasure last on her priority list. In more serious cases, low libido in women can be determined by a medical condition, prescribed pills or depression. In order to increase libido in women the first thing that is required is for the woman to be aware that she has a problem and she needs to act immediately in order to solve. Otherwise, the situation will keep going and aggravate as time passes. Once this is acknowledged, the root cause of a low libido needs to be determined. If it's a treatment that she's following, maybe this could be changed or if it's depression maybe counseling would help. However, in most of the cases the cause is the fact that women are nowadays very busy and have lots of things going on in their lives. They simply don't find the time to indulge in pleasure because there is always something on their mind. If you easy recognize yourself in this picture, the first thing you need to do in order to increase your libido is to eliminate stress and anxiety. Think about yourself for a minute and you'll realize it's not fair to deprive you and your partner of pleasure just because you are busy and stressed. Start by putting everything aside for a while and take care of yourself. Spoil yourself and do whatever makes you feel great. Take a hot bath, put some make up on and some daring clothes and you'll feel more like having sex. Take some time to do things that you like: go shopping, eat out, meet some friends and gossip or whatever sound good to you. If you have done all this and still need a little help, consider taking herbal supplement Kamni capsules or Fantasy capsules. They are safe for you and they naturally increase your libido. Herbs do wonder for your body and they can turn you into the women you used to be before work, kids and chores took over your life. You can be a career woman, a mother and a loving wife all in the same time and herbal supplements can help you achieve this goal. They provide you the energy you need for doing everything and still feel lovable and they balance your hormones so that you can handle stress and anxiety easier. Balanced hormones mean a peaceful life and the desire for offering and receiving pleasure more often.

description.hltext_display: 경춘전철 "노년층을 위한 배..
description.content:
경춘선 복선전철이 21일 개통한 가운데 첫날 승객의 상당수인 노년층이 무인발권기 사용법을 몰라 우왕좌왕하는 등 불편을 겪었다는 지적이 나왔다.
이날 새벽 경춘선 첫차를 타려고 남춘천역으로 몰린 노인 승객들은 표를 사기 전 한참을 헤맸다. 사람이 승차권을 판매하는 창구 대신 생소한 무인발권기만 덩그러니 놓여 있었기 때문.
춘천 운교동에 사는 이경자(67.여)씨는 "오전에 남편이랑 같이 전철을 타봤는데 생전 처음 이용하는 전철이라 어디가 상행이고 하행인지 헷갈렸다"면서 "노인들을 위한 안내가 필요하다"고 말했다.이 밖에 오전 중 상행선 열차들은 매우 복잡해 승객들이 불편을 겪기도 했다. 복선전철을 타고 서울 구경에 나선 승객들과 경춘선 마지막 무궁화호를 타고 춘천을 찾았다가 집으로 돌아가는 승객들이 더해져 발 디딜 틈 없었기 때문이다.
어제인 20일 춘천에 내려왔다가 서울 상도동의 집으로 돌아간다는 김영복(65) 씨는 "상봉 가는 열차에 빈 자리가 하나도 없어 1시간 이상을 꼬박 서 있어야 했다"며 "경춘선 낭만을 즐기기가 이렇게 어려울 줄 몰랐다"고 혀를 내둘렀다.[뉴스속보부]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: 陈好穿皮草华贵内蒙亮相 研究生身份受关注[组图]
description.content:
陈好华丽出席腕表活动。
陈好与主办方交流。
陈好身着皮草现身。
日前，忙于读研的陈好亮相鄂尔多斯，出席某国际顶级腕表活动。正帮导师排演毕业大戏的陈好看上去气色不错，一身皮草尽显华贵风范。
陈好自9月新生入学以来，除了认真专注于研究生学业，并未将本职工作搁浅。除了出演人艺大戏《日出》外，还担任全国第十次人口普查代言人，热心于公益事业。此次更获主办方看重其研究生和艺人的双重身份，认为陈好除了美丽、优雅外，更有难得的知性美，符合其对高端女性的诉求，因此力邀陈好出席本次活动。活动当天，陈好一袭皮草盛装出席，尽显华贵风范。一举一动、一颦一笑都引来场外观众阵阵高呼。台下更是聚集许多媒体，影响力之大可见一斑。
陈好先是在台上与观众分享了自己服饰搭配的心得，更应记者和观众要求大方摆POSE拍照。随后，该品牌北亚区行政总裁等品牌领导邀请陈好进店参观，陈好更与对方全程英语对话。结束活动后，陈好随即赶回北京。日前，陈好帮忙自己导师排演的中戏2004级毕业大戏《世阿弥》正在中戏逸夫剧场上演。对于自己有份参与帮学生排练，陈好表示：自己是从那个时期过来的，看到学弟学妹的努力仿佛就看到了当年的自己。希望他们的表演能够得到关注和认可。

description.hltext_display: Lotería.- La primera tabla se cierra con el primer premio del sorteo, el 75.869 dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie
description.content:
Añadir a favoritos

Enviar

Introduce el texto de la imagen
* Es un código para evitar envios automáticos
Introduce tu nombre
Introduce tu crítica sobre esta noticia
El primer premio del Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad, el número 75.869 dotado con un quinto premio de 50.000 euros a la serie, ha aparecido un poco más tarde que el año pasado, a las 09.33, en el octavo alambre de la primera tabla.
La tabla se ha cerrado a las 9.40 horas, veintiún minutos después de que comenzara el sorteo. Alba Corbacho y Alison Calderón, los niños de San Ildefonso encargados de cantar los números y los premios de la tabla han marcado un buen ritmo desde el principio y han conseguido acabar la tabla en el tiempo medio previsto.
La anécdota de la tabla se ha producido nada más comenzar, cuando a la niña encargada de cantar los números, Alba Corbacho, le ha entrado la risa al leer el primer número extraído del bombo, premiado con mil euros.
Después de eso, las dos niños han ido cantando una tras otras las pedreas con tranquilidad hasta que ha aparecido el único premio de la tabla. La alegría de ser las primeras en cantar premio se ha podido ver reflejada en las caras de las niñas, que sonreían al presentar las bolas a la mesa.
Los números y premios de esta primera tabla han sido extraídas respectivamente por Johan Fernández y Miguel Gonzaga, un niño de una familia ya tocada por la suerte de la la Lotería de Navidad, ya que es hermano de la niña que el año pasado cantó el premio 'Gordo' Yahaira Gonzaga.

description.hltext_display: Toy shop puts smiles within reach of all
description.content:
Two rooms of the mission's new family shelter hold the toys and another has coats and winterwear. From them, needy parents get to pick two toys or a toy and coat for each child.
Janice Laymon, who directs special projects and the new shelter, said hundreds of parents she registered for free toys would have had no gifts to give their children without the toy shop.
As families filed in this week for their appointed shopping times, she said, "We've been really busy."
Repeat toy shop customer Deborah Brown of Wilmington said she appreciates the chance to pick gifts for her daughter, NyiRay, 9, and granddaughter, Jasmine, 13.
Brown, who said she enjoys shopping, picked out games and dolls for the girls in no time. She said the choices were easy because "that's what they like."
Shopping took longer for first-time guest Gabriel Avilla of Wilmington. He picked a basketball, football, two Barbies, a Wacky Words game and a game with a decorated cup used to catch a ball bearing an image of an eyeball. He said the toys will make Christmas "better, much better" for his children -- Josue, 9, Monsarat, 7, and Jeslly, 4.
Without them, the mushroom-farm worker said all they would get is "something cheap."
The situation of every shopper is different, Goldner said, including shelter residents. "So many are trying to mend fences and get back with their families," she said.
Resident Harry Zayas said, "I was on the street for two years doing heroin and now I'm here. Now I'm clean and getting closer to my family. ... I really appreciate all they do for us here."
When he was homeless and on drugs, Zayas didn't see his daughter, Jaisha Marie, whose name is tattooed on his arm.
On Monday, he picked out a soft Baby Bella doll and a Dora the Explorer memory game for her.
Zayas fought tears, saying he barely believed it when mission staff said he could have two gifts for her. "I was so happy," he said, "I was crying all day."

description.hltext_display: 赵本山小沈阳现身央视跨年 宋祖英挽刘欢上阵[组图]
description.content:
“2010――2011央视群星跨年盛典星光大道”12月21日在深圳华侨城录制，众明星一一走上红毯，星光璀璨。宋祖英身穿一袭黑色裙挽着刘欢上阵，一出场就引起阵阵尖叫。赵本山身穿黑色西装率领众徒弟现身，颇具派头。新晋金马影后吕丽萍和孙海英手挽手现身，大秀恩爱，夫妇档还有罗嘉良和苏岩。导演王晶则挽着韩国女星张瑞希微笑现身。“飞人”刘翔一身黑色西装帅气现身。另外，郎朗、小沈阳、潘长江、斯琴高娃、蒋雯丽、许志安、薛凯琪等多名内地及港台一线演员也一一现身。
这台跨年晚会围绕环保与文化主题展开，共有“群星璀璨・星光大道”、“群星话题・新年舞会”、“群星狂欢・跨年盛典”三大环节。每一环节的内容各有侧重，其中的“星光大道”就专为参加本次盛典的所有重要嘉宾而设，在他们走过红地毯的同时，还设有“采访台”、“感言台”、“签名板”等内容。最后的“跨年盛典”则是整场晚会高潮，在能够容纳八千观众，并拥有大型人造沙滩和造浪泳池的大侠谷天机剧场，主持人和众明星的精彩表演都将在水中表演区完成。这台“2010・2011CCTV跨年盛典”将于2010年12月31日晚9时30分与电视机前的观众们见面，在中央一台连续3小时播出。图为宋祖英挽刘欢现身

description.content: Robert Sève, 64 ans, chef d'entreprise demeurant au hameau Les Jacquets à Bény a du mal à s’en remettre. Lundi 13 décembre, vers 16 h 30, son épouse, Paule, accompagnée de son petit-fils, Quentin, âgé de 3 ans et de cannelle, sa chienne Yorshire, s’est retrouvée en mauvaise posture face à un sanglier...

description.hltext_display: Polytech gets leg up in South
description.content:
However, that's exactly what the Polytech and Seaford High boys basketball teams found themselves embroiled in on Tuesday night.
Polytech junior forward Eric Laster stepped up and scored 27 points and pulled down 15 rebounds to spark the second-ranked Panthers to a 64-60 win over No. 4 ranked Seaford in a key Henlopen Conference Southern Division game.
"We both wanted this because we both know that this is probably going to be the game for the Southern championship," said Laster, who sank 12 of 24 shots from the field. "We felt like whoever wins this will basically win the South."
Polytech (5-0 overall and in conference play) was able to pull out the victory by playing tighter defense in the second half and making clutch shots down the stretch.
Laster gave the Panthers a 60-58 lead when he scored off a driving layup and completed a three-point play with a free throw with 1:46 remaining.
James Mosley sank a pair of free throws following a Seaford turnover to extend Polytech's margin to four points with 1:35 left.
Mosley went on to sink 2 of 4 free throws on one-and-one opportunities over the final 26 seconds to keep the Blue Jays at bay. His final free throw gave the Panthers the final 64-60 margin with 10.5 seconds to play.
"That was a good game," said Mosley, who scored 11 points. "It felt good. It felt like all of our shots were going in."
Senior center Jason Owens scored 17 points, senior guard Andre Allen chipped in 12 points and senior forward Rashawn Church came off the bench to score 11 points for Seaford (4-1, 3-1), which sparkled at times.
The Blue Jays opened a 20-12 lead on Allen's putback early in the second quarter.
However, Polytech finished the first half on a 20-10 run to take a 32-30 halftime lead.
From there, it was a closely fought game between a couple of teams with very similar, scrappy styles. The teams exchanged the lead seven times, and it was tied five times.
Seaford held a 48-43 advantage heading into the fourth quarter before Laster and Mosley took charge as the Panthers outscored the Blue Jays 21-12.
"In the first half we did not play defense at all, and then in the second half we had to gut it out and pulled out the victory," Laster said.
It was a huge victory for Polytech, considering it has already defeated Laurel (63-39), Delmar (66-28), Indian River (69-46) and Lake Forest (68-27) in the Southern Division.
For Seaford coach Art Doakes and his players, it was a tough loss to swallow. Polytech coach John Pierce knew his team had managed to overcome a huge obstacle.
"I'm glad we finally played somebody that challenged us, and the guys really fought and I'm really proud of them," Pierce said. "It's a blessing to get a win. Our motto this year is we're going to win any way we can."

We both wanted this because we both know that this is probably going to be the game for the Southern championship; We felt like whoever wins this will basically win the South.

I'm glad we finally played somebody that challenged us, and the guys really fought and I'm really proud of them; It's a blessing to get a win. Our motto this year is we're going to win any way we can.

description.hltext_display: Pilot program to reopen clamming areas
description.content: Clam fishing areas off New England that have been closed for more than 20 years will be reopened as part of a pilot program. The areas of Georges Banks where Atlantic surf clams are found had been closed because of a lack of testing for paralytic shellfish poisoning, often associated with red tide. But as part of the one-year, $175,000 pilot program beginning next month, the New Bedford based-Sea Watch International can fish the areas. The clams will be tested at sea, then again by the Massachusetts Division of Marine Fisheries. The company is expected to make up to two trips weekly and bring in about 600,000 pounds of clams per trip.

description.hltext_display: Christina teachers put brakes on plans
description.content: The Christina School District teachers union has not signed on to plans due today to resurrect two failing schools as part of the state's Race to the Top reform.

description.hltext_display: 陈慧琳谈老公秃顶表无奈 称还不算很难看[组图]
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 8:33:00 来源：雅虎娱乐
陈慧琳(Kelly)、谢婷婷及安志杰(Andy)、黄伟文、周柏豪、连诗雅等，昨晚出席时装活动。
已为人母的Kelly以Hello Kitty造型亮相，展现出可爱一面。她表示未入行时也是Hello Kitty迷，儿子刘升同样喜欢它。有报道指丈夫Alex因要接管家族生意出现“压力秃”， Kelly透露其实丈夫未有压力前也一样有脱发的情况，他早于几年前已经接管父亲的生意，所以脱发与此无关，他没压力也已经秃头。

description.hltext_display: 한국천문연구원, 21일 개기월식 일..
description.content:
한국천문연구원은 21일 달이 지구의 그림자에 완전히 들어가는 개기월식현상이 일어난다고 예보했다.
이번 월식은 달이 뜨기 전인 14시 27분부터 시작되므로 해 진 후 동쪽하늘을 바라보면 평소보다 어두워진 달이 뜨는 모습을 볼 수 있을 전망이다.
달이 뜨는 시각은 17시 12분, 41분 동안 개기월식이 진행되어 17시 53분에 개기월식은 종료된다. 이후 19시1분까지 달의 일부분만 밝아지는 부분월식이 진행된다.
달은 평소의 밝기를 서서히 되찾으며 20시 6분 반영식의 종료와 함께 평소 보름달 밝기로 되돌아온다.
[뉴스속보부]

description.hltext_display: Delaware grows 15 percent, remains in 45th spot overall
description.content:
Delaware's population has grown by almost 15 percent since 2000, ending the decade with just over 900,000 people, the U.S. Census Bureau announced Tuesday.
The state grew from 785,068 people in 2000 to 900,877 this year, an increase of 115,809 people. It still ranks 45th in population.
Its growth rate, though, was the 13th-highest in the nation over the past decade.
Delaware's population density ranks eighth in the nation, with 460.8 people per square mile.
The population figures come from the census conducted earlier this year. The numbers are used to apportion the 435 seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
The figures includes military, federal civilian workers and their families who live overseas but are assigned to Delaware for congressional apportionment -- 2,943 people in 2010.
Delaware will still have just one representative in the House. It would have needed another 155,000 people to match Rhode Island, which is the smallest state with two representatives.
Six other states -- Alaska, Montana, North Dakota, South Dakota, Vermont and Wyoming -- also have only one representative.
Elsewhere in the region:
• Maryland's population grew 9.1 percent to 5,789,929. It will still have eight representatives.
• New Jersey grew 4.5 percent to 8,807,501. It will lose one representative, leaving it with 12.
• Pennsylvania grew 3.5 percent to 12,734,905. It will have 18 representatives, down one.
Official census data used to redraw Delaware's General Assembly districts will be released in the spring.
Estimates released last week show that most of the state's growth occurred in eastern Sussex County and parts of Kent County. Those areas will likely gain seats in the General Assembly at the expense of northern New Castle County, where the population did not grow significantly.

description.hltext_display: مقال صالح السليمان ليوم الاربعاء الهـ(جولة).. في (لاين سبورت)
description.content:
السهل الممتنع الهـ(جولة).. في (لاين سبورت) صالح السليمان
(الهجولة) لفظ يكثر تداوله بين شريحة من الشباب.. وربما يقصد به الحركة والدوران دون هُدى أو هدف.. وبالعودة للقاموس المحيط (للفيروز آبادي).. قدَّم شرحاً موسعاً لمصدر هجولة (هجل).. منها.. هجل عرضه تهجيلاً (وقع فيه)..
والأخ وليد الفراج مسؤول برنامج الجولة رجل محترم.. ولكن صديقك من صدقك.. وأخشى القول إن قناة لاين سبورت من خلال (الجولة) كشفت أوراقها مبكراً.. وأتمنى أن الإسقاطات التي ظهرت في الجولة تجاه الهلال أتت عفوية.. وليست ممنهجة.. أو لن تكون سياسة البرنامج المنتظرة..
فأربأ بإعلامي ومهني كبير مثل الأخ وليد أن يفتعل ويصنع قضية من لا شيء عندما يتحدث عن وجود حملات إعلامية متبادلة بين الهلاليين والاتحاديين بشأن قضية إيقاف لاعب الاتحاد أسامة المولد.. وأن الهلاليين يضغطون على لجنة الانضباط لإيقاف المولد!..
فلم أر هذه الحملات التي يزعمها من الجانب الهلالي لا رسمياً ولا حتى صحفياً.. ولكن ربما هدف الأستاذ وليد.. استباق قرار لجنة الانضباط وممارسة ضغوط وقائية على أعضاء اللجنة.. لعل المولد ينجو من الوقف..
وفي حال لم تنجح الضغوط وصدر القرار المتوقع بإيقاف المولد.. يظهر وكأنه أتى نتيجة لضغوط الهلاليين.. مع أن المولد لم يدع أي فرصة للجنة لغض الطرف عنه بحركته الصريحة ودون كرة..
ومن إسقاطاته قوله رداً على حديث حمود الغبيني عن شعبية الهلال.. إنه لا أحد تجرأ من قبل وأصدر تقريراً ملغماً عن الشعبية!!.. وأن تصريحه سيثير اعتراضات وجدلاً كبيرين.. رغم أن ما قاله الأستاذ حمود تحصيل حاصل.. ولم يتجاوز خطاً أحمر.. ولم يرتكب محذوراً.. فالشواهد والأحداث أثبتت شعبية الهلال الكاسحة.. وأنه الأول بفارق شاسع عن الثاني.. ويبقى الاختلاف حول نسبة الهلال.. ومن يكون الثاني؟..
فالأرقام القياسية في المدرجات والاستطلاعات الجماهيرية من مؤسسة زغبي الأمريكية ومن إيبسوس العالمية والعقود الاستثمارية وجوالات الأندية والمنتديات واشتراكات art باعتراف محيي الدين كامل ومبيعات المنتجات الرياضية للأندية عن طريق هيئة دوري المحترفين.. وغيرها.. كل هذه تشهد على أولوية الهلال.. وأنه في القمة الجماهيرية لوحده.. وأستثني فقط فئة الحكام.. فالهلال شعبيته فيها بالحضيض.. وأحد الأندية يملك النسبة الكاسحة في هذه الفئة..
ومن الإسقاطات العناوين التهيجية ضد الهلال ورئيسه عقب مباراة الهلال والفتح والمستخلصة من تصريحات فتحاوية انفعالية.. مع أن محمد فودة المحلل التحكيمي للقناة أثبت أنه لا توجد ضربة جزاء للفتح.. وأن قرارات الحكم كانت صحيحة..
ومع هذا كرر العناوين المهيجة والمضللة.. ولم يضع عنواناً مقابلاً لها يشير إلى أن محلل القناة أثبت عدم صحتها.. كما ركز في العناوين أن الحكام يخافون تصريحات رئيس الهلال رغم أنه تصريح صحفي معتاد لحماية فريقه من أخطاء تحكيمية.. في أن حين غيره يصرح فضائياً ضد الحكام.. ولا أحد يتطرق له..
والأستاذ وليد لما فشل في الحصول على إقرار بوجود ركلة جزائية على الهلال.. تدخَّل قائلاً: لا يمكن الجزم باللمس.. ولا الجزم بعدم اللمس.. فإذا كان سيفرض رأيه ويرد على محلل القناة.. لماذا إذن الاستعانة به!!..
والمجاملات تظهر في الجولة كالقول إن الفريق الفلاني أجرى تدريباته اليومية.. وخبر آخر مدرب الفريق طلب من لاعبيه الفوز على الفريق.. وكأنه كان سيطلب منهم الخسارة.. فهذه نشاطات روتينية كل الأندية تتفق فيها.. فلماذا إذن التركيز على نادٍ واحدٍ وتجاهل البقية!؟.. هل هي الرغبة في تلميع نادٍ واحد إعلامياً وفرض حضوره.. ولو لم يُوجد خبرٌ ذو قيمة..
الأخ وليد مهني إعلامي كبير وبرنامجه سيضفي مسحة من الإثارة والحيوية على المشهد الرياضي.. لكن أتمنى من أبي بدر الوقوف على مسافة واحدة من جميع الأندية.. فالقناة تسعى لكسب أكبر عدد من المشاهدين.. فلا يستبعد مستقبلاً تشفيرها.. وليس من مصلحتها خسارة شريحة جماهيرية ضخمة..
مادة مستترة!!
هل تُوجد مادة مكتوبة بالحبر السري في لائحة الانضباط تمنع إيقاف لاعب إذا كان القرار سيغيبه عن مباراة لفريقه مع الهلال.. ولأحدد بدقة.. هل هناك ما يمنع إيقاف لاعب من الاتحاد أو النصر ويتم غض النظر عنه إذا كان لفريقه مباراة مع الهلال؟!..
لماذا الاتحاد والنصر يستفيدان من الإيقافات للاعبي الهلال ولأكثر من مرة.. بل تصدر قرارات إيقاف لاعبي الهلال بشكل عاجل كما حدث لطارق التايب الذي غيّبته لجنة الانضباط مباراتين عن الاتحاد.. في حين إذا كان الهلال سيستفيد من الإيقاف.. تحدث أزمة للجنة الانضباط وتتعصر وتتلوى.. وكأنها في مرحلة الطلق أو عسر ولادة..!!.. ثم تسقط مولوداً ميتاً.. بل البعض إذا أراد حماية لاعبه من الانضباط يروِّج أن الهلال سيستفيد من الإيقاف!..
في الموسم المنصرم أرجأت لجنة الانضباط إيقاف لاعب الأهلي الجيزاوي حتى لعب أمام الهلال.. ثم صدر قرار إيقافه.. مع صمت إدارة الهلال وسلبيتها وعدم احتجاجها على هذه الحركة الخطيرة من لجنة الانضباط..
وفي نفس الموسم نجا فيجاروا النصر لأن للنصر مباراة مع الهلال.. أيضاً حسام غالي ارتكب خطأ سلوكياً تجاه أحد اللاعبين.. وتم التغاضي عنه لأن النصر سيلعب مع الهلال.. وعقب مباراة الهلال لعب مباراة وارتكب خطأ سلوكياً أقل من السابق فتم إيقافه!!..
الآن لاعب الاتحاد أسامة المولد ما فعله يستحق الإيقاف عليه عدة مباريات خصوصاً مع تكرر أخطائه.. الآن يتم عمل زوبعة إعلامية مفتعلة في محاولة لمنع صدور قرار إيقاف.. والسبب أن للاتحاد مباراة مع الهلال..
حتى العفو عن الموقوفين لا تأتي الجرأة في تنفيذه إلا قبل مباريات الهلال.. فمحمد نور صدر العفو عنه في أحد المواسم.. ولم ينفذ إلا قبل مباراة الهلال.. ما يعني أن الهلال جدار قصير لا هيبة له ولا وزن..
جدارة الفيصلي.. وفوبيا الهلال
المحللون لمباراة الاتحاد والفيصلي جعلوا من الكروت الحمراء الثلاثة في واجهة تعليقاتهم أو تنظيراتهم عن المباراة ونتيجتها.. مع أن هذه الكروت غير مؤثرة ولا علاقة لها بالنتيجة.. ولم يستفد منها الفيصلي.. الذي لعب كامل وقت المباراة أمام فريق اتحادي مكتمل..
فلم يكن هناك مبرر للتقليل من جدارة الفيصلي بالتعادل بحجة تضرر الاتحاد.. كما حدث مثلاً من الأستاذ نايف العنزي.. وهو بالمناسبة محلل جيد ومتزن.. ولكن لكل جواد كبوة ولكل سيف نبوة..
فالكرت الأحمر لمبروك زايد حدث بعد المباراة.. وكرت السعيد وهو كرت اختياري أخذه من على الدكة.. وكرت النمري ناله في الوقت بدل الضائع..
إذن لا بد من مناقشة الكروت بعيداً عن نتيجة المباراة.. فالاتحاد وتوتر لاعبيه وبحثهم عن الكروت أصبح ظاهرة ملحوظة.. ويبدو أن فوبيا مباراة الهلال أربكت بعض لاعبي الاتحاد وإدارييه.. حتى إنهم أوعزوا لمشعل السعيد أخذ الكرت الأحمر ليلغي الأصفر حتى يتمكن من المشاركة ضد الهلال.. مع أن اللائحة تغيَّرت.. وهذا ما جعل منصور البلوي ينتقد إدارة الاتحاد وجهلها باللوائح..
هل الفتحاوية يستهدفون الأهلي؟
مارس مدير كرة الفتح.. وأيضاً لاعبه فيصل سيف انتقاداً للتحكيم بحجة أن الفتح لم يحتسب له أي ضربة جزاء طوال الدوري.. وتوقيت الاحتجاج يدعو للاندهاش.. لماذا الآن ينتقدون التحكيم؟.. هل هي ضغوط مبكرة يستهدفون بها حكم مباراة الفريق القادمة ضد الأهلي.. خصوصاً أن للفتح مواقف جيدة مع الأهلي.. ومع الضغط على الحكم يكون الفتح في وضع قد يجعله يسقط الأهلي مجدداً ويعيده إلى الدوامة؟!..
ربما السؤال أين هذه الاحتجاجات الفتحاوية سابقاً إذا كان الفتح حقيقة تضرر من التحكيم..؟!.. لماذا ظهرت بعد الهلال وقبل مباراتهم مع الأهلي.. هل كانوا ينتظرون هدايا تحكيمية لم يجدوها مع الهلال.. ويبحثون عنها في مباراتهم مع الأهلي؟!.. أم أنه احتجاج عفوي وغير مرتب له؟!
ضربات حرة
عندما احتسب الحكم فهد العريني ضربتي جزاء ضد الهلال وطرد المرشدي.. أشادوا به وصفقوا له.. والآن تغيرت آراءهم عقب أن احتسب ركلة جزاء على الاتحاد.. فأصبح عرضة لسهامهم وتشكيكهم
صدارة الهلال للدوري قد يفقدها.. لكنه لن يفقدها بسهولة.. ستكون صدارة طويلة الأجل.. ولن تكون صدارة لبن.. تنتهي صلاحيتها سريعاً.
فيصل سيف لاعب الفتح حالياً ومنسق النصر والاتحاد سابقاً.. لم يكتف بنقد التحكيم.. بل تمادى في النقد والتشكيك بالذمم..!.. فهل يبحث عن إرضاء إدارة الفتح تعويضاً عن مستواه المتواضع.
رئيس الهلال أشار إلى أخطاء للحكم في مباراة الهلال مع التعاون من خلال تصريح صحفي.. وليس حتى تلفزيوني كحق طبيعي لحماية فريقه.. في حين أن غيره يظهرون في الفضائيات.. وينتقدون الحكام ويتطاولون عليهم.. ولا أحد يتتبعهم ويتصيَّد عليهم.. وتمر تصريحاتهم بشكل عادي جداً.
من خلال مباراة الهلال والنصر (ناشئين) التي أدارها الحكم محمد مسوري.. ومباراة أولمبي الهلال والشباب التي أدارها الحكم محمد آل شيث.. أستطيع أن أتنبأ أن قادم التحكيم قد يكون أسوأ من حاضره.. وربما أتطرق لهذا الموضوع في المقال القادم.
مدير كرة الفتح قال: سأعتذر إذا كان لا تُوجد ضربة جزاء للفتح.. والآن أثبت المحلل التحكيمي محمد فودة عدم وجود ضربة جزاء.. فهل سيعتذر مدير الفتح؟
الفتح فريق متطور.. لكن لاعبيه حاولوا بأسلوب التحايل.. وتصنُّع الإصابة إيقاف المباراة وإضاعة الوقت.. بدليل أنه بعد أن افتتح الهلال التسجيل لم يصب أو يسقط أي لاعب من الفتح!!..
الأستاذ وليد الفراج يحسب عليه قوله: «لأني لا أطلعهم معي يحشوني».. وكأنه يقول من يطلع معي أشتري سكوته عن نقد البرنامج!..

description.hltext_display: Ballet Strength- Partnering Advice for Dancers
description.content:
Question: Hi Nikol! Love your facebook page and hoping to purchase your ebooks soon. I had a question regarding some acting difficulties in Nutcracker. I am Clara and my directors really want a strong "connection" between her and the nephew/nutcracker prince. There are times where I have to really look at him with "affection" and mean it! Its hard! Do you have any advice for connecting with your partner? Thanks! ~ Colleen
Answer: Hello Colleen. First off, I would like to say congratulations to you on landing the part of Clara in The Nutcracker. As a young dancer, performing the role of Clara was one of those times that I remember the most vividly and had the most fun dancing on stage. Now we all know the story of The Nutcracker, but I want you to find the book (if you don't already have it) and really read the story. While you are reading the story, I want you to take careful note of the emotions that Clara is feeling. She is delighted by the gift that Drosselmeyer gives her, overwhelmed at this magical land that she didn't know existed, enchanted by the prince who so bravely battled the Mouse King, etc. Write down a list of these different emotions. Now, think of the different instances in the ballet where you have to convey these emotions through choreography.
If you can immerse yourself completely in the role of Clara and focus on the story you are trying to convey, you shouldn't have any awkward moments with the Prince. What I used to do is imagine the Prince to be a boy that I had a crush on. I know it sounds silly, but it works. So whether it's Justin Bieber or Taylor Lautner, pretend like the "Prince" standing in front of you is him and feel what an honor it is to be led through the Kingdom of the Sweets by such a "superstar." (Just don't tell the prince that you are doing this! lol)
The other thing that can make you feel more comfortable around your partner is getting to know him a little better. If you two can become friends and have an awesome open communication that will also transfer well on stage.
Most of all, don't be shy. Just as you should feel honored to be dancing with the Nutcracker Prince, you should feel even more honored to have been chosen to dance the role of Clara! Cherish the next two months in your "reign" as Clara and most importantly, have fun!

description.hltext_display: Delaware grows 15 percent, remains in 45th spot overall
description.content:
Delaware's population has grown by almost 15 percent since 2000, ending the decade with just over 900,000 people, the U.S. Census Bureau announced Tuesday.
The state grew from 785,068 people in 2000 to 900,877 this year, an increase of 115,809 people. It still ranks 45th in population.
Its growth rate, though, was the 13th-highest in the nation over the past decade.
Delaware's population density ranks eighth in the nation, with 460.8 people per square mile.
The population figures come from the census conducted earlier this year. The numbers are used to apportion the 435 seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
The figures includes military, federal civilian workers and their families who live overseas but are assigned to Delaware for congressional apportionment -- 2,943 people in 2010.
Delaware will still have just one representative in the House. It would have needed another 155,000 people to match Rhode Island, which is the smallest state with two representatives.
Six other states -- Alaska, Montana, North Dakota, South Dakota, Vermont and Wyoming -- also have only one representative.
Elsewhere in the region:
• Maryland's population grew 9.1 percent to 5,789,929. It will still have eight representatives.
• New Jersey grew 4.5 percent to 8,807,501. It will lose one representative, leaving it with 12.
• Pennsylvania grew 3.5 percent to 12,734,905. It will have 18 representatives, down one.
Official census data used to redraw Delaware's General Assembly districts will be released in the spring.
Estimates released last week show that most of the state's growth occurred in eastern Sussex County and parts of Kent County. Those areas will likely gain seats in the General Assembly at the expense of northern New Castle County, where the population did not grow significantly.

description.hltext_display: ESPN Chicago blog: Irish bringing high energy to Sun Bowl
description.content:
According to Notre Dame football coach Brian Kelly, the Fighting Irish did what they were told in Tuesday's final full practice before their trip to the Sun Bowl in El Paso, Texas. Then they added some unexpected pop to a session that satisfied Kelly and his staff.
"Today was a good day," Kelly said. "It was fast, there was high-paced action. It was supposed to be tag-off today and it ended up in tackling. That's a good sign. I've been on teams that didn't want to play the bowl game; they just wanted to get through it, get the season over with and get out of here. These guys want to play the game. They got a lot of gas in the tank."

Teacher booked for raping minor student
description.content:
A 40-year-old teacher from a government high school here has been booked for allegedly raping a minor student repeatedly for a year, police said on Wednesday.
The incident came to light yesterday after a rape case was registered by Gandhinagar police against Suresh Goud, a physical education teacher on the complaint of child rights activists from Mahila Samkhya and Bala Sangham, they said.
The activists said the 14-year-old victim, studying in Bhoiguda government school in Secunderabad is an orphan and was sexually abused by Goud for a year. The minor girl has been sent for medical examination and the accused is absconding, police said.

description.hltext_display: Raiders rally to surge past Jaguars
description.content:
MIDDLETOWN -- Ursuline Academy turned up the defensive pressure in the second quarter to storm past host Appoquinimink and win 61-42 in girls' basketball action Tuesday night.
The Raiders (3-0) trailed 9-0 early in the game and 11-5 entering the second quarter as the Jaguars pounced on Ursuline errors.
"We really didn't do what we were supposed to do. We all played how we wanted to play and didn't work as a team," said Audra Cranston, who led the Raiders with 13 points. "Our coach kind of let us have it and said we had to play like we do in practice every single day."
Ursuline turned it around in the second as the Raiders began to press the ball more, putting two defenders on the ball and leading to several Jaguars turnovers. That led to easy baskets, and Ursuline outscored Appoquinimink 28-4 in the quarter to take a 33-15 lead into halftime.
Ursuline's lead ballooned to 22 early in the second half, but Appoquinimink (3-2) started to claw back into the game, pulling within 11 points on two occasions, but each time it appeared the Jaguars were going to get back in the game, Ursuline went on a run to halt the comeback attempt.
Eleven different Raiders scored in the game.
"We have the greatest depth in the state, and that's what our team tries to do," Cranston said. "We don't have to give the ball to one person. We pass the ball around, and everyone can score."
Ashley Smith scored 14 points to lead Appoquinimink with Amani Clark and Nicole Cwiertniewicz added 10 for the Jaguars.
Ursuline 61, Appoquinimink 42
Ursuline 5 28 7 21 - 61
Appoquinimink 11 4 12 15 - 42
URSULINE - Carter 2 4-4 8, Abram 2 2-4 6, Cranston 4 3-4 13, M. Williams 2 0-0 5, B. Williams 0 1-2 1, Wendel 3 0-0 6, Witt 2 0-0 4, Noonan 1 1-2 3, Garcia 2 0-0 6, Lyons 1 2-3 4, Hahn 1 3-4 5. Totals 20 16-24 61.
APPOQUINIMINK - Wiener 0 0-2 0, Clark 4 2-7 10, Smith 4 4-5 14, Cwiertniewicz 4 2-2 10, Harper 0 0-0 0, Bond 1 2-2 4, Scott 1 2-3 4, Cale 0 0-0 0, Minner 0 0-0 0. Totals 15 10-20 42.
Three-point goals- U 5 (Cranston 2, Garcia 2, M. Williams 1). A- 2 (Smith 2).

description.hltext_display: 서울~춘천 1시간이면 OK…경춘선 ..
description.content:
21일 오전 5시 10분. 서울 상봉역과 강원도 남춘천역에서 첫 전차가 동시에 출발하면서 경춘천 복선전철 시대가 열렸다.
이날 상봉역에서 춘천으로 가는 8301호 전차(운전사 박상필)와 춘천에서 서울로 가는 8302호(운전사 정계영) 전차가 플랫폼을 매끄럽게 빠져나와 한 시간 조금 넘은 시각에 목적지인 남춘천역과 상봉역에 각각 도착했다.
1999년 12월 착공한 경춘천 복선전철이 11년 만에 개통됐다. 서울 상봉동에서 춘천까지 선로 81.3㎞를 달리는 경춘천 복선전철은 서울과 경기도, 강원도 춘천에 이르는 구간에 총 18개 역사가 설치돼 있다.
복선전철 개통으로 서울~춘천 이동 시간도 대폭 단축됐다. 기존 경춘선에서 청량리역~남춘천역까지는 1시간 50분이 소요됐으나 이제는 급행 63분, 일반 79분이면 거뜬하다.
운행 횟수도 하루 38회에서 137회로 증편되고, 1시간마다 운행하던 배차 간격도 출퇴근 시간 12분, 그외 20분으로 짧아져 춘천에서 수도권 출퇴근도 가능해졌다. 전철 요금은 상봉~춘천 2500원으로 종전 무궁화호 요금 5600원의 절반도 안 되는 수준에서 결정됐다. 코레일 관계자는 "상봉역에서는 지하철 7호선ㆍ중앙선(용산~청량리~용문)과 환승할 수 있고 망우역에서도 중앙선 환승이 가능하다"고 말했다.국토해양부는 내년 말 경춘선에 좌석형 고속전동차(EMU-180)를 투입해 서울~춘천 간 운행 시간을 40분대로 단축할 계획이다.
[지홍구 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Cookies say thanks to police 10,000 times
description.content:
Culinary arts students at Delcastle Technical High School are making cookies for every law enforcement officer in Delaware as a token of thanks for their staffing of sobriety checkpoints.
The students involved include Shelby Doyle, Sadé Robertson, Shanté Davis and Sarra Yanacek scooping out dough (middle photo) and Samantha Zimmerman pulling trays out the oven (bottom photo).
Last year, the students produced more than 10,000 cookies by working overnight in a marathon baking session.
The same is planned for this year, taking over for Mothers Against Drunk Driving, which previously conducted the Cookies for Cops campaign.
Children from surrounding elementary schools help by decorating cookie boxes along with students from other career areas at Delcastle.
At 7 this morning, students will load the boxes into vehicles to distribute the cookies throughout the state.

description.hltext_display: Obama’s defense for assassinating a U.S. citizen?
Unhealthy Eating- The Joke is on you
description.content:
Just in time for the New Year I want to discuss a pet-peeve of mine: Unhealthy eating and those who brag about it. I offer nutritional guidelines to all of my San Diego personal training clients and individualized nutrition plans to those who need the extra support. Unfortunately, sometimes the need for help is beyond my realm of expertise.
I look at eating as the classic angel on one shoulder, devil on the other scenario. Before every meal, you have the opportunity to make a wise, healthful decision or a disastrous life-shortening one. Put simply in writing it is obvious which choice you would make, but come meal time impulse can override any good intentions.
The best advice that I can give is to stay true to your beliefs. If you've recently embarked upon a new health and wellness routine you know that it's never going to be easy, but if you keep giving in to unhealthy temptations you will never win the weight loss battle. If you allow yourself to change, it can be as easy as flipping a switch if you choose to eliminate unhealthy foods and patterns from your life. Make a choice and stick with it.
Now on to my pet peeve: reading about a friends unhealthy splurges on Facebook. Do yourself a favor and try not to brag about those moments of weakness. If your friends are part of your support system and know about your fitness and weight loss goals, they will be disapointed.
Food is not an emotional healer. Food can however act as a destructive enabler.

description.hltext_display: Steve Lees letzter Weihnachtsgruss
description.content:
Wie ein Glückwunsch des verstorbenen Gotthard-Sängers: Der Song «Merry Christmas» wird diese Weihnachten wiederentdeckt.
Gotthard-Sänger Steve Lee verunglückte am 5. Oktober tödlich. Doch seine gefühlvolle Stimme wärmt immer noch die Herzen. Der Gotthard-Klassiker «Merry Christmas» von 1999 bringt das Publikum auch 2010 in Weihnachtsstimmung.
Steve Lee im «Samichlaus»-Kostüm
Im «Blick» erinnert sich der Bassist der Band, Marc Lynn: «Steve hätte das gewollt, den Fans auf diese Weise frohe Weihnachten zu wünschen.» Ein Hingucker ist das Video zu «Merry Christmas», in dem die Rocker mal ganz untypisch gekleidet auftreten. Gedreht wurde der Clip in der Zürcher St.-Peters-Kirche. «Es war sauheiss in den Samichlaus-Kostümen» meint Lynn dazu.
Damals sammelte die Band mit dem Song über 20'000 Franken für einen guten Zweck. Das nach Lees Tod erschienene Album «Heaven – Best of Ballads Part 2», auf dem «Merry Christmas» nochmals zu hören ist, führt diese Idee fort. Zwei Franken pro CD gehen an die Stiftung Road Cross. (jos)

If you are expanding, more likely you are opening subsidiary or manufacturing facility somewhere in Latin America, India or China. Lets review the options in you disposition:1. description.hltext_display: Residents get great view of eclipse
description.content:
Share this article
Comments (0)
J.D. Hall caught these images of last night’s lunar eclipse for Samoa News and put together a composite for us. He said, “Picture #8, once the moon was practically fully eclipsed, was taken using a slow shutter and tripod in order to capture the dim, low intensity, muddy red hue of the eclipsed moon.
"The very last photo was taken about when the National Geographic said the moon would be fully and completely eclipsed. I had fun taking these!”
Many residents in American Samoa were outside their homes Monday night to watch the moon eclipse from their front yards. Several households had both adults and children outside to watch as the full moon, in very clear Samoan skies, blocked by the sun just around 9 p.m. (local time).
Even the many stars in the skies didn't deter watchers of the eclipse. It was a lucky evening with clear skies, following cloudy and some times rainy Sunday night.
Sate-run television, broadcasting live a Holiday Music Festival, held at downtown Fagatogo, joined the viewing of the eclipse by turning cameras to the sky frequently.
"The moon is now blocked by the sun for the eclipse," master of ceremonies Fagafaga D. Langkilde announced as the TV camera turns to the sky, so as eyes of the people at Fagatogo watching the music festival.
There were reports from other sectors of the territory were party goers at Christmas parties went outside with their drinks to look at the sky.

description.hltext_display: 陈楚生稳坐“主题曲一哥” 化身空中飞人将开唱[组图]
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 8:44:00 来源：雅虎娱乐
2010年对陈楚生来说可谓是异常忙碌的，各种演出、活动络绎不绝，年底更是化身空中飞人。为了能将明年1月8日的北展演唱会做到最好，楚生拿出全部精力积极努力的为这张交响演唱会准备着。
21日，陈楚生携全新影视专辑《影之传说》在华谊兄弟影院举行发布会。今年，陈楚生担任四部电影、一部偶像剧主题曲的演唱人，无疑成为本年度影视界最为推崇的男歌手。而陈楚生的这张影视大碟《影之传说》，也终于在歌迷影迷们的期盼中，于2010年末隆重发行。

description.hltext_display: Ex- S.C. congressman who figured in Nixon downfall dies
description.author: wire reports
description.content: Former South Carolina Congressman James R. Mann, remembered for his work on articles of impeachment against former President Richard Nixon, died Monday in Greenville, S.C. He was 90. The former lawmaker had Alzheimer's disease, his son, James R. Mann Jr., said. Mann, a Democrat, served two terms in the South Carolina Legislature before he was elected to represent South Carolina's 4th District in Congress from 1969 to 1979. In the middle of his tenure, Mann helped craft articles of impeachment against Nixon, who then resigned. Mann forged a consensus with Republicans and two other Southern Democrats on the House Judiciary Committee, his son said. "At a time of great national anguish, the committee did its work," Mann's son said, noting that his father is often remembered for saying during the hearings, "If there be no accountability, another president will feel free to do as he chooses, but the next time, there may be no watchmen in the night." Opting not to seek a sixth term in Congress, Mann returned to Greenville to open a private law practice, assisting clients with a variety of criminal and civil cases, his son said. Mann also stayed active in his time outside the law office, becoming a senior Olympian and winning dozens of gold medals for high jump, tennis and horseshoes, his son said. To celebrate his 80th birthday, Mann surreptitiously went skydiving, something his relatives only learned about several years later when an acquaintance mentioned it when the family was out to lunch in Greenville. "He didn't tell the family," his son said. "I said, 'Well, I guess it's true, then.' "

event_or_fact.property: The former lawmaker had Alzheimer's disease

description.hltext_display: Toshiba is planning to launch a 12 screen 3D TV in Japan
description.content:
and this is your first early morning digital briefing. If you would like to read this or any other Cynopsis edition online, click here.
The FCC voted along party lines to approve a set of regulations to preserve the open nature of the internet. The rules, which are set to be published later this week and will take effect in early 2011 (the FCC provided key excerpts on Tues.), will prohibit fixed lined ISPs from blocking access to sites and applications they are not affiliated with, including bandwidth-hungry services like Netflix or other over-the-top providers seen as palpable threats to existing pay TV models. But they offer fewer protections for wireless broadband customers. Comcast, the nation's largest cable MSO, welcomed the rules as a "workable balance" between marketplace and individual users' needs. Consumer interest groups and industry guilds such as Public Knowledge and the WGA, East were less receptive. Verizon released a statement suggesting the FCC has overreached its authority, opening the door for a legal challenge.
Hulu has decided to put off its plan for an IPO and may pursue other options to raise additional cash including hitting up its existing network partners, according to the WSJ. The entertainment video site is also considering additional subscription options after rolling out the $8/mo. Hulu Plus service. The company has said it expects to clear $260 million in revenue for 2010.
Foursquare introduced a new feature to its iPhone app that allows users to add photos and comments from the restaurants and shops they check into. The push notification option will alert you when friends leave comments. An Android version of the update is due out later this week while a BlackBerry version is coming in Jan.
~ DIGITAL ADVERTISING ~
The Mobile Marketing Association announced it is developing a series of mobile privacy guidelines to help marketers maintain transparency and adhere to industry accepted standards and practices with their ads. The MMA is forming a Privacy Committee to address the issues and is inviting media companies, mobile carriers, marketers, agencies and media technology providers to participate.
Overall online ad spending will top (print and online) newspaper ad spending in 2010 for the first time and the gap will widen even further next year, according to eMarketer. Total newspaper spending, including ads in print and online editions, will fall to $25.7 billion in 2010, a decline of 6.6%. A rise of 13.9% will push US online ad spending up to $25.8 billion by year's end.
The recently formed Mobile Content Venture plans to upgrade stations to deliver mobile digital TV signals in a total of 20 markets during the second half of 2011 covering 40% of the U.S. population, including LA, Chicago and Orlando, reports the Chicago Tribune. The service is delivered via digital broadcast signals instead of wireless broadband and is currently offered by some 70 stations.
The advent of HTML5 and new tablet devices have increased mobile video viewing significantly, increasing mobile video traffic by 60% overall in 2010, according to new research released by multimedia search engine MeFeedia. iPhone & Android led all mobile platforms in delivering mobile video with a 26% and 21% share, respectively, of the global market. Apple's iOS accounted for around 52% of overall mobile traffic (including the iPod traffic, which was excluded from the rankings,) down from 64% in April. iPad traffic has increased 325% since April.
Video Usage by Mobile Device - Dec. 2010
Platform % of video traffic
iPhone 26%
Android 21%
iPad 17%
Symbian OS 16%
Blackberry 9%
Nokia 4%
Samsung 4%
Sony 2%
Windows 1%
Source: MeFeedia
Although DVR penetration has now reached 38% of U.S. homes, viewers do continue to watch commercials on their DVRs, lifting commercial ratings by 44% among 18-49 year olds when tracking viewing 3 days out, according to a new DVR usage report from Nielsen. DVR playback after 7 days added 2.29 rating points to total day usage levels during the '09-'10 season. Most DVR playback occurs in primetime (34%), peaking at 9p (12%) and 10p (13%). The top ranked time shifted programming genre this season was Sci Fi, receiving a 1.3 ratings lift from +7 day viewing. Predictably, DVR homes are more likely to be upper income and under the age of 45.
~ GADGETS & APPS ~
Look ma, no glasses. Toshiba is planning to launch a 12" screen 3D TV in Japan this week which require no glasses and the company will come out with a 40" model as early as next April, reports the WSJ. A U.S. launch of the TVs, which will be demoed at CES in Jan., are expected later next year.
The newly revamped, hard-drive free Apple TV device will top 1 million units in sales this week, Apple announced. The company recently introduced an update to the iOS operating system that integrates iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch content with the device.
Mobile content provider HipLogic is launching a new real-time personalized mobile portal dubbed "Spark" for Android and Symbian smartphones that aggregates real time content from multiple partners including CBS News, Twitter, Facebook, Sky (UK), Weatherbug and Groupon. The module is currently available for free in 8 languages in beta format at sparkmyphone.com.
Watercolor painting on the iPad is now possible with a new Auryn Ink app that is being offered for free through the holidays. Pigment blending simulates the way wet pigments mix together and separates dry layers from glaze effects. The app also allows you to control the amount of water on the brush, which influences flow effects.
Keep up with the super rich with the new Forbes Lists iPad app, offering access to the magazine's annual ranking of the 400 richest Americans.
History has launched a new Facebook app that allows fans of American Pickers to choose among 3 T-shirt designs to be created and made available for sale exclusively on Facebook. Fans vote by clicking on the "shop" tab on the original series' fan page.
Michael Montgomery has been promoted to VP/Ad Sales for REVShare, the performance-based TV technology company owned by the Carlyle Group. He is based in the company's Temecula, CA headquarters and reports to Brendan Condon, CEO.
As Hulu struggles to come up with a business model that makes sense, its network partners continue to rely on their own websites to help maintain fans' interest in shows when they're on hiatus. NBC.com, which is likely to soon come under the management of Comcast, has done a great job of utilizing clips such as skits from Saturday Night Live to drive traffic but has always limited full episode catch-up viewing to 5 episodes for current shows. For the holiday break once again, season-to-date episodes are being offered for a number of newer shows including "The Event," "Parenthood," "Outsourced" and "Law & Order Los Angeles." (Supporting programming for "The Event" will also include exclusive Deleted Scenes and Commentary from Show Creator Nick Wauters.) The move makes sense, given how tough it is to maintain viewer loyalty after a show goes off the air for weeks. But it would make even more sense if these shows were available on multiple platforms, like a full episode iPad app that NBC once seemed interested in but has since stepped back from. (A source at NBC says there will be a couple of iPad-related announcements after Christmas, so stay tuned.) Maintaining viewer interest means offering access via whatever platform users are most likely to use.
Later -
Wayne Karrfalt for Cynopsis Digital
12.22.10

description.hltext_display: “벌써 다왔어? 춘천 수도권 합류 ..
description.content:
경춘선 복선전철 개통 첫날 표정
출근시간 절반으로 크게 줄어
자리없어 서서가는 승객 많아[세계일보]드디어 전철 타고 출퇴근하는 시대가 됐네요.경춘선 복선전철 개통일인 21일 오전 6시59분. 서울행 급행 전동차는 안개가 자욱하게 깔린 남춘천역을 출발했다. 출근 시간대 마지막 급행 전동차여서인지 자리의 절반 이상이 찼다.전동차에 몸을 실은 승객들은 자리에 앉자마자 책과 신문을 읽거나 태블릿PC 를 꺼내 보는 등 차내 풍경은 서울시내 전철 안 모습과 비슷했다.서울과 춘천을 연결하는 단선 철도가 개설된 지 71년 만에 복선전철 시대가 열리면서 1시간대 출근시간을 맞는 시민들의 첫 출근길 표정은 설렘과 흥분 그 자체였다. 복선전철 개통으로 서울에서 멀게만 느껴졌던 춘천도 이제 수도권에 합류해서인지 다소 상기된 표정이었다.거래처 방문을 위해 전동차를 탔다는 김광식(45련疎돕?석사동)씨는 편도로 2시간 가까이 걸리는 시간이 1시간으로 단축된다는 사실만으로도 엄청난 변화가 올 것 같다며 일 처리하고 느긋하게 저녁식사를 해도 마지막 전동차를 충분히 탈 수 있어 한결 마음의 여유가 생긴다고 말했다.오전 7시35분쯤 경기도 마석역에 도착하자 주위의 어둠이 가시면서 주변 풍경이 보이기 시작했다. 가평역에 이어 세 번째 역에 정차했을 뿐인데, 서서 가는 승객이 생겨날 정도로 전동차 안은 서울로 출근하는 직장인들로 붐비기 시작했다.종착역이 가까워지자 일부 승객들은 휴대전화를 꺼내 가족이나 친구들에게 야 복선전철 진짜 빠르네. 춘천에서 서울까지 1시간밖에 안 걸려. 정말 서울특별시 춘천구가 된 것 같아라며 통화하기 시작했다.남춘천역을 출발한 전동차는 4개 역에서 잠시 정차해 승객을 승렷苟怠쳔?뒤 출발한 지 1시간 정도 걸린 오전 7시57분쯤 서울 상봉역에 도착했다. 전동차에서 내린 승객들은 지하철 7호선 등 환승을 위해 발걸음을 옮겼다.기자는 출입처인 서울시청으로 가기 위해 용산행 열차를 탄 뒤 회기역에서 하차해 지하철 1호선으로 갈아탔다. 2번의 환승을 거쳐 지하철 1호선 시청역에 도착한 시간은 오전 8시39분. 남춘천역을 출발한 지 1시간40분 만이었다.이번 복선전철 개통으로 기존 무궁화 열차로 1시간50분 걸렸던 운행시간이 급행의 경우 60분대로 대폭 단축됐다. 운행 횟수도 1일 38회에서 137회로 크게 늘어나는 등 춘천에서 수도권 출퇴근이 편리해졌다. 하지만 종착역이 기존 청량리역에서 외곽지역인 상봉역으로 정해져 환승시간이 늘어난 것은 복선전철 개통 효과를 반감시키고 있다.승객 윤성훈(38련疎돕쳔臍壅?씨는 오늘 개통된 복선전철 노선도 예전과는 비교가 안 될 정도로 좋아졌지만, 실질적인 수도권 출퇴근 시대가 되려면 내년 말 용산까지 연결되는 노선의 개통시기를 하루 빨리 앞당기는 것이 필요하다고 말했다.박연직 기자 repo21@segye.com
[ⓒ 세계일보 & Segye.com, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

Kristina J Tomlin managed to cure her BV by applying all-natural 3-step holistic methods and techniques that she described in her book.
The secret 3-Step, home remedy that harnesses the power of mother nature to get rid of Bacteria Vaginosis for good Discover the 1 critical factor that stops fishy odor and discharge for good, especial after sex How to avoid common feminine hygiene products that could be literally "rubbing" you the wrong way. description.hltext_display: Nike gana un 22% más en su segundo trimestre fiscal
description.content:
BEAVERTON (ESTADOS UNIDOS), 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
El fabricante estadounidense de calzado y material deportivo Nike obtuvo un beneficio neto de 457 millones de dólares (348 millones de euros) en el segundo trimestre de su ejercicio fiscal, lo que supone una mejora del 22% respecto al mismo periodo del ejercicio precedente.
La cifra de negocio de la multinacional alcanzó los 4.842 millones de dólares (3.687 millones de euros), un 9,9% más, con un aumento del 13% de las ventas en Norteamérica y del 2% en Europa Occidental, mientras que en China la facturación creció un 18% y un 24% en el resto de mercados emergentes. Por contra, la facturación cayó un 21% en Japón.
"Hemos registrado un gran segundo trimestre. Prácticamente cada marca, categoría y región registraron crecimiento", destacó
Mark Parker, presidente y consejero delegado de Nike.
En lo seis primeros meses del ejercicio, Nike obtuvo un beneficio neto de 1.016 millones de dólares (773 millones de euros), un 14% más, mientras que la facturación de la multinacional aumentó un 9%, hasta 10.017 millones de dólares (7.626 millones de euros).

description.hltext_display: Exclusive: Women Recruited To Fight Taliban
description.content:
Women are for the first time being recruited to the front line of Afghan police to help tackle the threat of suicide bombers.
Previously, they had only been tasked with menial backroom responsibilities.
But, with training from the Ministry of Defence police and the British Army, Afghan women are now involved in the fight against one of the Taliban's most deadly weapons.
Afghan cultural sensitivities forbid policemen from searching women, which can have catastrophic results if they fail to intercept female suicide bombers.
In the past two years, the Taliban has persuaded some women to conceal explosives under their burkas.
With some insurgents also disguising themselves as females to exploit the cultural loophole, policewomen in Afghanistan have been given the power to stop and search - and, where necessary, kill.
At Bost Airport outside Lashkar Gah in Helmand Province, 3rd Lt Nagara Abdul Nabi regularly searches men's bags and burka-clad women - something that has not happened until recently.
She said: "I stopped a car at a checkpoint and a female passenger began acting suspiciously.
"When I began to search her, the woman struggled and bit me badly.
"I discovered she had explosives under her burka. She also had two grenades and an AK-47."
Captain Farid, head of Afghan National Police (ANP) training, said: "The Taliban is afraid of policewomen because if they have a lot of females in the force it means they can search the Taliban everywhere.
"Some members of the Taliban have even tried to pass themselves off as females to pass through security."
PC Catriona McBeath, one of the British police trainers, said: "Women are essential because they can go places that men can't go.
"For example, if a known Taliban runs into a compound that's full of women, then the woman ANP can follow him in... search him and arrest him."

event_or_fact.property: The Taliban is afraid of policewomen because if they have a lot of females in the force it means they can search the Taliban everywhere.; Some members of the Taliban have even tried to pass themselves off as females to pass through security.
I stopped a car at a checkpoint and a female passenger began acting suspiciously.

Women are essential because they can go places that men can't go.; For example, if a known Taliban runs into a compound that's full of women, then the woman ANP can follow him in... search him and arrest him.
