description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content:
A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre.
Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".
He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process.
"When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.
Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.
A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.
Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.
Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.
Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: FEATURE: Japanese snacks now part of local favorites at East Village in N.Y.
description.content:
NEW YORK, Dec. 22 -- (Kyodo) _ (EDS: THIS IS ONE OF OUR YEAR-END/NEW YEAR FEATURE/NEWS FOCUS STORIES. ACCOMPANIED BY A PHOTO, ALONG WITH PHOTO CAPTION, FROM KYODO PHOTO DATABASE TREASURE, NUMBERED 2010122100418)
Tradition is not the first word that comes to mind when one plans a visit to Manhattan's East Village, sometimes referred to as New York's counterculture capital known for punk rock, new wave bands, drug dealers and tattoo parlors.
But the area, loosely spreading between First and Third avenues in lower Manhattan, is also a destination to find affordable yet authentic culinary offerings -- including Irish, Italian, Jewish, Ukrainian, Korean and Japanese to name a few -- that have evolved with the passing of different ethnic groups over many years.
The hole-in-the-wall Japanese restaurant Otafuku is one of those authentic eateries, frequented not just by Japanese expatriates but also by students of nearby New York University in search of flavorful cheap eats. The restaurant, opened in 1998, specializes in such down-to-earth Japanese fare as takoyaki (round savory snacks with octopus pieces baked into them), okonomiyaki (savory pancakes) and yakisoba (pan-fried noodles).
A few minutes away, a Japanese supermarket named Sunrise Mart offers everything Japanese, including vegetables such as burdock root and Japanese yam that are not readily available at American supermarkets, along with a range of green teas, snacks, cosmetics and houseware items.
An adjacent Japanese bakery, Panya, is stocked with an array of soft-crumb breads preferred by Asians, Japanese-style filled-buns such as "curry pan" and the spongy strawberry shortcakes so ubiquitous in Japan but rarely found in American bakeries.
Candy Chan, president of New York Food Tours, a firm which specializes in guided tours of ethnic eateries, often takes visitors to the supermarket and lets them taste "onigiri" rice balls. Chan explains to those who are totally new to Japanese cuisine that onigiri is a "traditional Japanese sandwich," as it "fulfills the majority of the characteristics of a sandwich -- it's easy to pack, it's easy to make and easy to eat."
Chan lets visitors pick their onigiri fillings, which are typically cooked salmon, "umeboshi" plum pickle, fried shrimp and chicken cutlets. She says her personal favorite is the plum pickle, partly because she likes to see the "dramatic change" in facial expressions when the visitors experience their first bite of umeboshi.
A few blocks away, an American husband and a Japanese wife team runs a much-raved about "dessert bar," which offers desserts paired with drinks, named Chikalicious. Opened in 2003, the restaurant, which takes its name from the chef Chika Tillman, is the longest-running establishment of its kind in New York, says Angie Dykshorn, its manager.
The bar features a three-course, fixed-price menu that changes daily. For example, one day it offered a "Warm Chocolate Tart with Pink Peppercorn Ice Cream and Red Wine Sauce," served with Churchill Graham Reserve Port.
"Our desserts are French and American flavors but Japanese portions," said Dykshorn. "They are all quality desserts made with the freshest ingredients. But you will have fewer calories because you are satisfied with much smaller portions. And nothing is overly sweet here either -- that's another nice thing," she said.
While Japanese or Japanese-inspired eateries are relatively new additions to the East Village, old favorites whose founding goes back to the 19th century are still up and running.
McSorley's Old Ale House is one such place, sitting near the corner of East Seventh Street and Third Avenue. It was established in 1854 by Irish immigrant John McSorley and is known as the oldest Irish tavern in New York City, and its legendary guests include such historical figures as Abraham Lincoln and Theodore Roosevelt.
Lincoln visited New York City in February 1860, shortly before he won the Republican nomination for the presidency. According to legend, Lincoln dropped in on McSorley's after giving his historic antislavery speech at nearby Cooper Union, which is a free university founded by industrialist and philanthropist Peter Cooper, who was a friend of McSorley.
Despite such a progressive resume, visitors may also be amused to know that McSorley's was a "boys only" establishment until the 1970s. The bar's justification for the policy was that it had always been a blue-collar hangout shunned by women. It was forced to open its door to female customers when it lost a lawsuit, filed by two New York City female lawyers.
An equally seasoned establishment, Veniero's Pasticceria and Caffe, offers authentic Italian pastries such as cannoli, fried shells filled with ricotta, and rum baba, a sponge pastry soaked in rum.
Founded in 1894 by Antonio Veniero, an immigrant from Sorrento in southern Italy, the store originally opened as a billiards hall but grew in reputation for high quality baked goods and coffee drinks served there.
The bakery is still family-owned and now into its fourth generation. It has made cakes for many important public figures, including Franklin D. Roosevelt for his inauguration as New York governor in 1928.
Veniero's owner Robert Zerilli says he often gets requests to open another branch but firmly says, "That's not going to happen."
"There's only one. When something is that old, nobody wants a repeat. It's like movie sequels -- they often don't work. You have to have the original," he said.

event_or_fact.property: to those who are totally new to Japanese cuisine that onigiri is a "traditional Japanese sandwich," as it "fulfills the majority of the characteristics of a sandwich -- it's easy to pack, it's easy to make and easy to eat.
he often gets requests to open another branch but firmly says, "That's not going to happen.

They are all quality desserts made with the freshest ingredients.But you will have fewer calories because you are satisfied with much smaller portions. And nothing is overly sweet here either -- that's another nice thing

description.hltext_display: 서해안 등 짙은 안개…내일부터 추워져
description.content:
23일부터 한기를 동반한 찬 대륙고기압이 확장함에 따라 기온이 큰 폭으로 내려가 추워질 것으로 기상청은 내다봤다.
23일 아침 최저기온이 서울ㆍ대전 영하 2도, 춘천 영하 5도, 광주ㆍ대구 0도, 부산 5도 등으로 관측된다.기상청 관계자는 "24, 25일에는 바람이 강하게 불면서 중부지방 아침 기온이 영하 10도 안팎까지 떨어지고 낮 기온도 영하권에 머무는 등 매우 추울 것으로 보인다"고 말했다.지형적인 영향으로 24일 전라 서해안에, 25일은 충청 이남 서해안 지방과 제주에 눈이 내려 화이트 크리스마스가 될 것으로 예상된다.
[뉴스속보부]

description.hltext_display: Shoes sold at discounted prices as a matter of fact are very high quality shoes
description.content:
It does not take much muscle to locate a sensibly priced Tory burch sale. With today's internet technology locating bargain sales can be done in a few simple steps. Searching through various internet databases will land one on an affordably priced offer from an internet based fashion shop. To land on a good offer outside the internet, word of mouth referrals should be sought.
The continuing global recession is actually responsible for the popularity of bargain shoes. Some celebrities even prefer to go for bargain shoes after realizing that these shoes have the exact qualities present in expensive shoes. Some celebrities may actually have the money to buy expensive shoes but their conscience cannot allow them to spend a lot of money on just shoes. If it is possible to find fashion stuff with high quality priced affordably it is better to opt for it rather than to opt for an expensively priced stuff coming with the same qualities as the fairly priced stuff. . The fact that a particular shoe is sold at a somewhat reduced price does not mean such a shoe is devoid of quality. Quality will not have to be sacrificed if one purchases affordable shoes from well acclaimed stores.
To find easily online outlets with affordable high quality shoes, internet research will be of help. There are many fashion blogs and websites online where one will obtain information on how to find economically priced shoes. Online outlets opted for should be those which are well talked about in many fashion forums and fashion blogs online. To know the credibility of an online store it will be necessary to obtain testimonials of the outlet. If the testimonial of a particular outlet is positive, such an outlet should be opted for. Outlets with positive testimonials are those which are widely reputed for having good customer policy. Good customer policy is a combination of fair pricing and quick delivery of goods.
In the various first class cities of the world like New York, Hong Kong and London there are many offline outlets where designer shoes are sold at very humble prices. Shopping in offline outlets is always a great experience especially if one is shopping with friends. Some people travel from US to Asia or from Asia to US to shop. It is always a fantastic experience to shop in a foreign city. Shopping for Tory burch shoes in a foreign city will be a highly pleasing experience with the right preparations.
To know the outlets in a particular city selling very affordable shoes, word of mouth referrals will be of great help. Word of mouth referrals can be obtained from family members or friends who are fanatics of designer shoes. A good number of local outlets selling affordable shoes are rarely advertised in the press. To know about these outlets it is always recommended to use word of mouth referrals.
Keeping abreast with news will help one know the outlets currently offering a bargain sale for different types of shoes. Most outlets will sell shoes at highly affordable prices during the festive seasons. Some outlets sell shoes at affordable prices during the end of their financial year.
A bargain Tory burch sale can be obtained quite easily. The internet has made it very easy to locate online outlets selling shoes at bargain prices. Word of mouth referrals should be used to locate local outlets stocked with bargain shoes.

description.hltext_display: India twice successfully tests N-capable Prithvi-II missile
description.content:
India on Wednesday successfully conducted two tests of its indigenously developed nuclear-capable Prithvi-II ballistic missile from a military base in Orissa, an official said.
The surface-to-surface missile, which has been inducted into the Indian armed forces, first blasted off from the Integrated Test Range at Chandipur, about 230 km from here, at 8.15 am and then at 9.15 am. This is the second time two Prithvi missiles were successfully tested within a gap of one hour, the official said.
"The tests were done by the armed forces. Both were perfect launches," Integrated Test Range director SP Dash said.
The tests were conducted as part of a user trial in the presence of senior scientists of the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO). The two missiles were taken from a production lot and were test fired by the Army's Strategic Forces Command (SFC), Dash said.
All radars, electro-optical tracking systems and telemetry stations along the coast monitored the trajectory parameters of the missiles throughout the mission, he added.
Prominent among those who witnessed the test were Defence Research and Development Laboratory (Hyderabad) director P Venugopalan, programme director VLN Rao, project directors DS Reddy and Adalat Ali.
VK Saraswat, scientific advisor to the defence minister, congratulated the scientists and armed forces for the successful flight tests.
Prithvi-II has a maximum range of 350 km and can carry a 500 kg payload. The previous test of the missile Sep 24 was unsuccessful. It had, however, been successfully tested June 18.
DRDO has developed the Prithvi range under India's Integrated Guided Missile Development Programme.
"The Prithvi missiles, equipped with state-of-the-art guidance systems have reached the specified targets with very high degree of accuracy," Dash said.

description.hltext_display: 好男儿宋晓波沟通不畅打保安 事后反省不该冲动
description.content:
宋晓波
2006年“加油好男儿”全国亚军、被誉为“无声天使”的宋晓波(右图)，前日被曝在上海一家超市与收银员和保安发生冲突，并将一名保安打倒在地。昨日，成都商报记者联系上宋晓波的经纪人苏老师，对方表示此事已得到解决，当时发生不愉快只是因为沟通不畅造成了误会。而宋晓波也在微博上后悔地表示，当时应该用更好的办法来解问题，用更理智的态度来对待别人的不礼貌。
逛超市被轻视，
宋晓波出手打到保安
据上海媒体报道，20日21时许，2006年“加油好男儿”亚军宋晓波在某大型购物超市购物时，与收银员及保安发生冲突，一名超市保安被宋晓波打倒，所幸伤势并不严重。之后宋晓波和被打的保安均被带至上海市枫林路派出所进行问讯。
据一位目击者说，宋晓波当晚和一名男子在收银台付账时，女收银员似乎没有明白他的意思，之后就看到宋晓波开始动手不断拉拽收银员脖子上的胸卡，作势要投诉，并与同行男子走出收银区。接着两人被在该区域执勤的保安拦住询问到底发生了什么事，不知什么原因两人又推搡了该保安。该保安立即用对讲机向超市保安领班汇报了情况。超市保安领班追上来向宋晓波和他的同伴了解情况，没说几句话，便看到宋晓波和同伴将保安领班推倒。
当时，现场有很多群众围观，保安领班被宋晓波和他的同伴放倒后，超市方面立即报警。待警方赶到后，宋晓波两人及超市保安领班被一起带至枫林路派出所。
昨日上午，3人均已离开派出所。据称，保安领班的鼻子被打出血，身上有不同程度受伤，所幸伤势都不严重。而警方也表示，发生打斗的原因是双方沟通不畅，小事情引发了大争执。
微博反省，
“我应该用更好的办法来解决”
昨日13:42，在打人事件发生16小时后，宋晓波更新微博，讲述了打人事件始末。在微博中，宋晓波说在结账时，收银员对他态度恶劣，其间还做了一个滚的手势，让他觉得自己被轻视，于是才抢了收银员的工作证想投诉。之后，保安又上来用右手抓他的衣领，左手作势要挥拳打他，宋晓波表示，当时只是为了保护自己才打了保安。而他也说，“虽然(自己)听不见，但是(自己)和正常人一样热爱生活，希望有尊严的活着并得到理解和尊重。”成都商报记者为此致电宋晓波经纪人苏老师，对方表示，整件事都是沟通不畅造成的，只是一场误会，现已解决。
昨晚6点半左右，宋晓波再度更新微博，言语间对自己打人的行为很后悔，“昨天因为沟通上的误会，对方对我不尊重，歧视我，我当时很气愤，现在冷静下来想一想，我当时应该用更好的办法来解决，用更理智的态度来对待别人的不礼貌。通过这件事我也长大了，谢谢大家关心。”而微博发表后，不少粉丝也纷纷留言叫宋晓波不要太在意这件事。也有粉丝在微博也呼吁希望社会能更尊重残疾人一些。

description.hltext_display: Artur Mas se saltará la sentencia del Estatut y mantendrá la inmersión lingüística
description.content:
Utiliza una frase del nuevo director de la RAE para defender la imposición del catalán
LVL
Barcelona.- "El catalán tiene que sobrevivir. No se trata de vivir, sino de sobrevivir y la inmersión lingüística es de las pocas cosas que le permite hacerlo. La inmersión es un bien a preservar.” Esta frase del nuevo director de la Real Academia Española, José Manuel Blecua, fue citada por el futuro presidente de la Generalitat de Cataluña, Artur Mas (CiU), durante la segunda jornada del debate de investidura en el Parlamento de Cataluña. De este modo, aseguró que va a mantener la inmersión lingüística en Cataluña.
Va a mantener lo que ha hecho el tripartito dirigido por José Montilla en las escuelas catalanas durante sus dos legislaturas. Impondrá el catalán porque asegura que “una de las pocas posibilidades que tiene mucha gente para identificarse plenamente con la lengua es el ámbito escolar”.
Durante toda la campaña electoral lo defendió y ahora lo ha vuelto a hacer. La sentencia del Tribunal Constitucional sobre el Estatuto catalán, que establece que el catalán no es lengua 'preferente' sobre el castellano, parece que no frenará sus intenciones. No le importa que el Tribunal Supremo ya le haya llamado la atención para asegurarle que el español también es lengua vehicular y de aprendizaje en la enseñanza.
El Supremo, tras estimar el recurso de dos padres, hará públicas en los próximos días sendas sentencias que garantizan la equidad entre el castellano y el catalán como lenguas vehiculares en los colegios e institutos.
Aunque sabe que de su postura nacionalista depende que sea investido como presidente de la Generalitat. El líder convergente necesitaba mayoría absoluta para superar este trámite y, al no conseguirla (62 votos a favor y 73 en contra), tendrá que convencer al menos a un grupo para que se abstenga en la votación final, en la que necesita mayoría simple.
Albert Rivera, presidente de Ciudadanos, tiene muy claro que votará en contra de Artur Mas. Asegura que la propuesta identitaria de Mas “aboca a Cataluña al abismo” y espera que “Mas no se convierta en el Ibarretxe catalán con la transición nacional que defiende”.
Sin embargo, ni PP ni PSC han garantizado su abstención. Mientras la presidenta de los populares catalanes, Alicia Sánchez-Camacho, ha insistido en la amplia sintonía que su partido tiene con CiU en materia económica, la apuesta de Mas por una 'transición nacional' y el pacto fiscal complica su apoyo. Por su parte, el PSC no quiere verse excluido de la estrategia de pactos, aunque todavía está en el aire cuál será su decisión.

description.hltext_display: I'd rather retire than leave Manchester United - Berbatov
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: Dimitar Berbatov has ruled out a move from Manchester United by claiming he would rather retire than leave. Berbatov continues to divide opinion at Old Trafford, having struggled to justify his 30.75m transfer fee since arriving from Tottenham in September 2008.

description.hltext_display: V.Lingio žudiką I.Achremovą teisme užtarė dvasininkas ir kalinių draugijos atstovas
description.content:
BNS ir lrytas.lt inf.
Į laisvę septintą kartą anksčiau laiko besiekiantį išeitį žurnalisto Vito Lingio žudiką Igorį Achremovą trečiadienį teismo posėdyje užtarė dvasininkas ir Lietuvos kalinių globos draugijos atstovas.
I.Achremovas vėl bando ištrūkti į laisvę. P.Lileikis
REKLAMA
Vilniaus miesto 3-iasis apylinkės teismas nagrinėjo I.Achremovo prašymą dėl lygtinio paleidimo iš 2-ųjų pataisos namų.
Stačiatikių kunigas, Šventosios dvasios vienuolyno dvasininkas Vitalijus Mockus teisme sakė, kad nuteistasis pasikeitė kaip žmogus.
„Tai vienas iš retų atvejų, kai žmogus šitaip pasikeičia, ir neatkreipti į tai dėmesio, jo nepaskatinti būtų nehumaniška. Juk visa bausmių sistema yra tam, kad žmogus pasitaisytų,o ne tam, kad būtų izoliuotas kaip žvėris“, - posėdyje tvirtino dvasininkas.
Pasak V.Mockaus, tokio parapijiečio galėtų pavydėti kiekvienas kunigas, o šešerius metus su juo bendraujantis I.Achremovas yra visiškai pasiruošęs į laisvę.
Lietuvos kalinių globos draugijos atstovas Vaidotas Jakubonis kalbėjo, kad jei ne nusikaltimo žinomumas, I.Achremovas jau būtų paleistas - jis yra visiškai pasikeitęs ir į laisvę išėjęs daugiau nenusikalstų.
I.Achremovo advokatė Gitana Šimkutė tvirtino, kad ši lygtinio paleidimo byla jau yra tapusi rezonansinė ir joje yra atsižvelgiama tik į prokurorų nuomonę. Ji taip pat tikino, kad nuteistojo paleidimas nesukeltų neigiamos visuomenės reakcijos.
Pasak advokatės, buvęs generalinis prokuroras, dabar - Lietuvos Aukščiausiojo Teismo teisėjas Antanas Klimavičius rudenį laiške I.Achremovui yra rašęs, kad būtent dėl nuteistojo bendradarbiavimo pavyko išnagrinėti V.Lingio nužudymo bylą, ištirti kitus vadinamosios „Vilniaus brigados“ nusikaltimus.
I.Achremovo teikimą pristatęs Vilniaus 2-ųjų pataisos namų atstovas Pavelas Srebniukas sakė, kad pataisos namų režimą nuteistasis buvo pažeidęs vos vieną kartą, 16 kartų skatintas už gerą elgesį, charakterizuojamas teigiamai, šiuo metu dirba ūkio aptarnavimo brigadoje, daug dėmesio skiria savo lavinimuisi, yra perlaikęs brandos egzaminus, verčia iš anglų ir rusų kalbos, skiria lėšas gyvūnų priežiūros organizacijai, nors yra išsiskyręs, susitinka ir skiria lėšų sūnui.
Vilniaus miesto apylinkės prokuratūros prokurorė Danutė Kisinienė teisme tikino, kad I.Achremovas neturėtų būti paleistas į laisvę, nes jis yra nubaustas už labai sunkius nusikaltimus, jo kalinimo sąlygos buvo ne kartą švelnintos, bausmės laikas trumpintas.
„Iš tikrųjų formalias sąlygas taikyti lyg ir galima būtų, bet reikia vertinti aplinkybių visumą“, - tvirtino prokurorė.
Pasak teisėsaugininkės, išleidus V.Lingio žudiką, būtų neįgyvendinti bausmės tikslai.
Apylinkės teismas verdiktą turėtų skelbti ketvirtadienį.
Už dienraščio „Respublika“ žurnalisto V.Lingio nužudymą, įvykdytą 1993 metų spalio 12 dieną Vilniuje, 1994-ųjų rudenį buvo nuteisti „Vilniaus brigados“ vadeiva Borisas Dekanidzė ir trys jo parankiniai - I.Achremovas, Viačeslavas Slavickis bei Borisas Bobičenka.
B.Dekanidzei teismas skyrė išimtinę mirties bausmę, kuri buvo įvykdyta. I.Achremovui taip pat skirta mirties bausmė, tačiau tuo pačiu nuosprendžiu ji pakeista į laisvės atėmimą iki gyvos galvos.
2004 metų sausį Vilniaus apygardos teismo sprendimu, nuteistajam laisvės atėmimo bausmė sumažinta iki 25 metų. Remiantis šia nutartimi, į laisvę jis turėtų išeiti 2018 metų pabaigoje.

description.hltext_display: In brief: Customs officers seize fake Barbies
description.content:
Thousands of counterfeit Barbie dolls in cargo shipments from Mexico were recently seized by U.S. Customs and Border Protection officers at the Zaragoza Bridge, officials said Tuesday.
CBP officials said the shipments included phony dolls, styling heads and play sets that looked like real Barbie toys by the Mattel company. CBP officers contacted Mattel and determined that the dolls were illegal clones of Barbie.
"The items in questions did not bear the Barbie name or trademark but their overall appearance and packaging was confusingly similar to the genuine item and therefore constituted trademark infringement," Ana Hinojosa, CBP director of field operations in El Paso, said in a statement.
CBP officials said the two shipments were seized Friday and Saturday and had a total worth of more than $30,000 but could be worth 10 times more in retail sales.
Daniel Borunda
Police arrested a woman after she allegedly fled the site of a hit-and-run while drunken driving with her child in the car Tuesday.
Police said Aqueda Valenzuela, 37, was driving a red 1991 Nissan Pathfinder when she struck another vehicle in the 8600 block of Dyer Street about midnight Sunday. They found Valenzuela's car in a parking lot in the 8100 block of Dyer about an hour later, police said.
Police found Valenzuela with a young child inside a nearby business. Investigators allege that she was intoxicated while driving.
Police declined to say how old the
child was, pending a Child Protective Services investigation.
Maggie Ybarra
State investigator among slain males
A Chihuahua state police investigator was one of nine males killed in two attacks Tuesday in Juárez.
The first assault occurred at lunchtime when gunmen fired about 50 rounds at men on a street and inside Tony gorditas shop in colonia Melchor Ocampo, police said.
State investigator Luis Alonso Rojas Garcia, 29, was among the five men slain. Officials said Rojas joined the state prosecutor's office in May 2009. The other victims were Jesus Andres Oreza, Armando Ortiz Luna, Jose Soto Murguia and a man who had not been identified.
The second attack occurred about 1:30 p.m. when shooters with AK-47s killed four people in the garage of a home in colonia Riveras del Bravo. Police identified the dead as Raul Alberto Jimenez Carreon, 16; Luis Daniel Jimenez Carreon, 18; Francisco Perales Bañuelos, 23; and Julio Cesar Barbere Cardenas, 34.
Daniel Borunda
Police ID man killed in motorcycle crash
El Paso police on Tuesday released the name of a man killed Monday afternoon in a motorcycle accident.
Police said Alfonso Ortegon, 50, was riding his 2010 Harley-Davidson north in the 5100 block of Doniphan Drive when Maria Chavez, 47, pulled out of Graphite Drive in front of him in a green Ford Explorer.
Ortegon, of the 2800 block of Penwood Drive, was taken to University Medical Center of El Paso, where he died. He wasn't wearing a helmet, police said.
Police said Chavez, of the 200 block of Cuprite Drive, failed to yield the right of way while turning onto Doniphan. The front of the SUV hit the right side of the motorcycle.
Speed and alcohol were not factors in the collision, police said. The investigation is continuing to determine whether charges will be filed. Chavez and three passengers in the Explorer were not injured.

description.hltext_display: אפלת הגאות והשפל
교통사고 '나이롱 환자' 크게 줄었다
description.content:
국토해양부는 22일 이른바 교통사고 나이롱 환자’가 대폭 감소했다고 말했다.
지난 10월4일부터 11월19일까지 전국 794개 병원을 대상으로 ‘의료기관의 교통사고 입원환자 관리실태’를 점검한 결과, 외출·외박 중인 교통사고 환자 비율이 올 상반기 13.7%에서 3.5%로 크게 줄었다는 것이다.
1인당 입원기간도 지난 9월 7.7일에서 지난 10월 5.0일로 크게 감소했다. 이번 점검은 금융감독원과 지방자치단체, 손해보험협회 등 민관 합동으로 진행했다.부상 정도가 경미한데도 입원하는 '나이롱 환자'가 줄어든 것은 민관 합동으로 점검할 것이라는 점을 사전에 홍보했고, 과태료 부과 권한을 가진 지자체가 점검에 참여했기 때문이라고 국토부는 분석했다.
[김민철 기자 mckim@chosun.com ]

description.hltext_display: 网购比春运还挤 货物堆积部分快递“爆仓”
description.content:
年底物流高峰期，快递员日跑百单都搞不赢，买家收货延迟一两天是常事
以前，成都市民张女士会网购草莓，快递一天多就到，草莓还很新鲜。今年10月以后，快递常常延迟，变成了“慢递”，她再也不敢网购水果了，担心“草莓”变“草霉”。
由于网购市场的迅猛增长，四川快递企业出现“爆仓”现象，遭遇了首次“网络春运”。
结果还是晚到货
邹先生说，3年前，他就开始网购，大部分家用物品都是网购，以前很少遇到“货迟”现象。但今年下半年，他就遇到了几次，“我和网购朋友交流过此事，很多人都遭遇过。”
“12月8日是我女友生日，我提前6天给她网购了一件羽绒服，作为生日礼物。可是礼物迟迟不到，我天天催卖家。对方说早就发
货了，由于近期物流高峰，卖家也没有办法。”成都市民余先生说，直到女友生日第二天，他才拿到礼物。
资深网购者张女士说，去年，她从外省网购了一箱草莓，不到两天就到货了，吃起来还是很新鲜，“现在不敢网购了，我怕‘草莓’变成‘草霉’。”
网店通知
派件可能会延迟
在成都市义学巷，这里集中了数家快递公司办事点。昨日傍晚，记者看到，货车不停进出，货物堆成小山，小仓库满了，就堆在人行道上。快递员不停填写送货单，一派繁忙景象。
“这段时间，我一天要送100多个单，完全跑不过来。”快递员赖师傅说，现在仓库里堆了很多网购货物，延迟一两天是常事，“今天我的货就没送完，只有明天再送了，实在没有办法。”

description.hltext_display: 张国立不评价张默演技 携手牛莉福利院献爱心[组图]
description.content:
12月21日下午，张国立、牛莉携《养父》剧组的演员到南京市儿童福利院献爱心。在电视剧中，张国立饰演的养父在经济拮据的条件下毅然收养三个孩子，此次来到福利院感触颇多，不仅为福利院的孩子带来奶粉、学习用品，更是承诺为两个患有心缺的孩子做手术。一向低调做慈善的张国立解释公布清单的原因是避免事后麻烦，用证据堵上多事人的嘴。现实生活中同样是父亲的他一直对儿子张默要求很严格，当媒体让张国立评价儿子在《让子弹飞》中的表现时，张国立选择了沉默。
电视剧《养父》即将于2011年初登陆江苏卫视，讲述张国立饰演的烤鸭师傅楼志军收养了三个孩子，不幸身患绝症的他在弥留之际让自己的养子、养女回归原来的家庭。在张国立看来，养父所体现的大爱与福利院的宗旨是一样的，所以在电视剧开播之前，他携《养父》剧组的演员来到南京市儿童福利院，把爱传递给更多的孩子。

description.hltext_display: Frank Zapa: Vom Bürgerschreck zum Avantgardisten
description.author: STEFFEN RADLMAIER
description.content:
Genialer Außenseiter: Neue Bücher erinnern an den verstorbenen Rockmusiker - vor 11 Minuten
Der amerikanische Rock-Avantgardist Frank Zappa, der im Dezember 1993 gestorben ist, wäre heuer 70 Jahre alt geworden. Der Einzelgänger gilt als einer der innovativsten und originellsten Musiker seiner Generation.
Von dem Grafiker Cal Schenker, der viele Zappa-Cover gestaltet hat, stammt der Einband des Buches „Grand Zappa, das bei Schwarzkopf & Schwarzkopf erschienen ist. Daraus entnahmen wir auch die beiden Zappa-Cover.
Von dem Grafiker Cal Schenker, der viele Zappa-Cover gestaltet hat, stammt der Einband des Buches „Grand Zappa, das bei Schwarzkopf & Schwarzkopf erschienen ist. Daraus entnahmen wir auch die beiden Zappa-Cover.
In zahllosen Wohngemeinschaften hing in den 70er Jahren des vergangenen Jahrhunderts ein Poster, das den schnauzbärtigen Frank Zappa mit heruntergelassenen Hosen auf dem Klo zeigte. So stellte man sich damals einen Bürgerschreck vor. Dass ausgerechnet dieser schräge Vogel 1991 mit einer Kandidatur für das Amt des US-Präsidenten liebäugelte, war eine ungeheure Provokation für die konservativen Kräfte. Kaum einen anderen Künstler hassten sie derartig wie den Gesellschaftskritiker und Ober-Freak aus Baltimore, der keine Scheu vor sexuellen und politischen Tabus zu haben schien. „Kein Akkord ist hässlich genug, um all die Scheußlichkeiten zu dokumentieren, die von der Regierung in unserem Namen verübt wurden“, lautet ein bekanntes Zappa-Zitat. Heute hat Frank Zappa den Status eines Rock-Klassikers, dessen herausragende Bedeutung unstrittig ist, der aber kaum noch gespielt wird. Als Objekt nostalgischer Heldenverehrung ist er ebenso ungeeignet wie zur musikalischen Nachahmung. Zu individuell, zu widerborstig, zu kompliziert klingt sein Werk: Zappa ist das Gegenteil von Mainstream.
Annäherung an ein Phänomen
Zum 70. Geburtstag von Frank Zappa sind zwei Bücher erschienen, die unterschiedlicher nicht sein könnten: Der Literaturwissenschaftler Ingo Meyer hat ein kritisches Porträt als wohlfeiles Reclam-Heft verfasst, der Schallplatten-Spezialist Frank Wonneberg beglückt die Fangemeinde mit einem großformatigen, akribisch recherchierten Bildband.
Beide Bücher nähern sich Frank Zappa auf ganz verschiedene Weise, doch keines kann das Phänomen tatsächlich erklären. Ingo Meyer stellt bei seiner Analyse von Zappas Leben und Werk die charakterlichen Schwächen des Künstlers in den Vordergrund: Der egomanische Workaholic sei völlig frei von Selbstkritik gewesen, habe alle anderen für geistig minderbemittelt gehalten, seine Musiker tyrannisiert und seine Familie vernachlässigt. Selbst wenn diese Vorwürfe stimmen würden, könnten sie Zappas musikalische Qualität nicht schmälern. Und leider übersieht Meyer zwei wichtige Dinge: Zappa war ein Zyniker und Satiriker, dem nichts heilig war. Humor gehörte für ihn zur Musik wie Rhythmus oder Melodie. Im Laufe seiner Karriere wandte sich der Gitarrist und Komponist immer mehr der instrumentalen Musik zu, die kuriosen, komischen Songtexte traten in den Hintergrund. Es kam zu spektakulären Projekten mit den Stardirigenten Pierre Boulez und Kent Nagano und zur Zusammenarbeit mit dem Frankfurter „Ensemble Modern“.
Auflistung aller Alben
Frank Wonneberg listet in seiner Zappa-Werkschau alle 45 zu seinen Lebzeiten veröffentlichten Alben haarklein auf — von „Freak Out!“ (1966) bis „The Yellow Shark“ (1993). Mit der Besessenheit des Sammlers und der Leidenschaft eines Fans dokumentiert er sämtliche Plattenveröffentlichungen des Meisters an Hand von Schallplattenetiketten aus aller Welt und Cover-Variationen. Dazu liefert er Hintergrundinformationen zum Inhalt und zur Entstehungsgeschichte. Vor allem hartgesottene Zappaisten dürften an dieser ungeheuren Fleißarbeit ihre Freude haben.
Doch die Sekundärliteratur kann die Beschäftigung mit dem Original nicht ersetzen: Frank Zappa ist ein Solitär der Rock-Geschichte – und von der jungen Generation noch zu entdecken.
Zur Lektüre: Ingo Meyer, „Frank Zappa“. Reclams Universal-Bibliothek 11811, 198 Seiten, 6 Euro.
Frank Wonneberg, „Grand Zappa. Internationale Frank Zappa Discology“. Schwarzkopf & Schwarzkopf Verlag, Berlin, 160 Seiten, 69,95 Euro.
Zum Anhören: Frank Zappa, „Hammersmith Odeon. Live in London 1978“, 3 CDs, Barking Pumpkin Records.

description.hltext_display: Woman gets prison for glass claim scam
description.content: A Massachusetts woman has been sentenced to more than four years in prison after she admitted that she and her husband intentionally ate glass particles, then submitted false insurance claims. Mary Evano, 49, was also ordered yesterday to pay more than $340,000 in restitution. In September, she pleaded guilty to a 23-count federal indictment on fraud, conspiracy, and other charges. Federal prosecutors said the couple collected more than $200,000 after filing insurance claims that they had been injured by glass in food from restaurants, hotels, and grocery stores. Evano?s husband, Ronald, is serving a five-year prison term after pleading guilty in 2007.

description.hltext_display: 韩彩英深V黑裙现身秀性感 携手蓝正龙新片冒险[组图]
description.content:
12月21日下午，励志喜剧电影《巨额交易》在京举行开机发布会，导演马俪文率主演蓝正龙、杜汶泽、乔任梁、韩彩英等悉数出席。据马俪文介绍，故事讲述了三位年轻人为了寻找新生活而踏上的冒险旅程，而台湾偶像男星蓝正龙将携手韩国女星韩彩英展开这场疯狂之旅。图为韩彩英
该片是马俪文继《桃花运》之后再执导筒，她表示在休息了两年后，这次将以一场华丽的冒险重出江湖，“影片讲述了三个80后年轻人在生活中寻找新方向的故事，他们踏上了一场既华丽又疯狂的冒险之旅，并将在其中遭遇种种希望和绝望。”马俪文还表示，虽然影片是励志题材，但她拒绝说教，而是通过黑色幽默的方式呈现人物的经历，“故事的取材贴近生活，里面的人物在日常生活中随处可见，相信会是让观众时而捧腹时而会心的黑色幽默。” 最后，马俪文还直言这次的目标是又好看又要有市场，“我停了两年没拍电影，这次的目标就是又要赏心悦目又要有市场。”

description.hltext_display: The Secret to Health
description.content:

Most pharmaceutical drugs list constipation as a major side effect! Unnecessary medical procedures and prescription drug use in the U.S. accounts for over 700,000 deaths annually! description.hltext_display: Des risques d’escalade dans le Sud ?
description.author: Claire Dana-Picard
description.content: D’après les hauts responsables de Tsahal, les tirs d’obus de mortier de ces derniers jours provenant de la bande de Gaza ne signifient pas forcément que la situation risque de se dégrader prochainement dans la région. Selon un commandant militaire de la zone sud, le Hamas aurait profité de l’accalmie relative de ces deux dernières années, après l’opération Plomb Durci, pour se réarmer activement et renforcer son potentiel. Des murs de protection ont été érigés récemment dans les localités les plus exposées et la construction de la nouvelle voie ferrée entre Tel Aviv et Beershéva sera réalisée conformément aux normes de sécurité en vue d’éviter toute atteinte des wagons en cas d’attaques.

description.hltext_display: State's oldest person served tribal elders
description.author: TIM STANLEY
description.content: OKMULGEE - Driving never much suited Martha Berryhill. Although she once owned a car, a 1926 Ford Model T, the lifelong homemaker and Muscogee (Creek) Nation member "didn't like the whole experience. The roads back then were dirt, and there were big ruts," said Geri Johnson, Berryhill's niece. Deciding to give up automobiles for good would never hurt Berryhill's mobility, though. Every Sunday after she attended services at Newtown United Methodist Church, Berryhill set out on foot for a ritual she maintained for nearly 50 years - visiting tribal elders at four nursing homes. Taking them hot homemade dishes and treats, "she wrapped her pots and pans in a big white cotton tea towel, like the Indian women did back then. It made it easier to carry them," Johnson said. While the elders ate, Berryhill talked with them and read Scriptures aloud, all in her native Creek tongue. "She felt that since she didn't have money to purchase what they needed, she would give of her talents, instead," Johnson said. "Whatever she had she would share. They were literally gifts from her heart." Martha May Berryhill, the state's oldest person and the last original allottee of the Muscogee (Creek) Nation listed on the federal Dawes Rolls, died Saturday. She was 110. A wake will be held at 7 p.m. Wednesday in the Creek Nation Mound Building auditorium. A funeral service will begin at 11 a.m. Thursday at the same location under the direction of McClendon-Winters Funeral Home. Berryhill remained as independent as she could. Until two months ago, she still got out of bed every morning, made her own bed and dressed herself, family members said. She continued to sew and make quilts, a lifelong hobby, until her eyesight failed. And she still walked, preferably without any aids, and better still without any admonishment. "Oh, she didn't like to be reminded," Johnson said, laughing. "She would pick her walker up and carry it to the other side of the room and then set it down hard on her wood floor. Then she'd say 'There. I used it.' " One of Berryhill's earliest memories was walking to church with her father, a Methodist minister. He always carried his Bible, and he took along a lantern to light the way because they left very early. The family came to Oklahoma Territory as part of one of the Trail of Tears removals. One of 12 children, Berryhill was 1 when she was added to the federal government's Dawes Commission Rolls, one of 18,712 Creek Indians to be listed on the rolls, which established tribal citizenship and qualified them for land allotments. Berryhill was No. 9,671. Berryhill married John Haynes in 1919, and they raised four children. A widow for more than 40 years, she credited her long life to her faith. "Talk to God, and do his will," she would say. Berryhill continued talking to God till the end of her life. Known to many as Sister Martha, she prayed aloud daily and greeted all good news by raising her hands and proclaiming, "Thank you, Jesus." Berryhill kept up her nursing home visits until she was in her late 80s. She treated the tribal elders to sofkey - a sour cornbread - fried salt pork, chicken and dumplings and her famous fruit cobblers. Berryhill also fulfilled occasional requests for snuff and, for one old woman, chewing tobacco. "She didn't mind their little habits," Johnson said. "She never brought cigarettes, though." Since she became the state's oldest person about three years ago, Berryhill's birthdays had become big celebrations. "I'm not sure it ever registered with her how important everyone thought she was," Johnson said. "She enjoyed the attention but never made a big deal of it." Tribal leaders were happy to do that for her, Principal Chief A.D. Ellis said. "Someday I will be able to tell my grandchildren that I had the pleasure of knowing Martha," Ellis said. "I'll tell them she was a proud Creek woman, one who totally trusted and praised her Lord." Berryhill is survived by one daughter, Ruby Mauk; eight grandchildren; 19 great-grandchildren; 13 great-great-grandchildren; and three great-great-great-grandchildren. Tim Stanley 581-8385 tim.stanley@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Increased exposure and prize money for 2011 Nitto Tires USTCC
올 성탄, 눈 없고 춥다
description.content:
올해 크리스마스엔 기다리던 눈소식은 없이 추위만 찾아오겠다.
기상청은 23일부터 확장하는 찬 대륙성 고기압의 영향으로 크리스마스 이브인 24일부터 성탄절인 25일까지 서울의 아침 기온이 영하 10도까지 떨어지는 등 강추위가 계속될 전망이라고 22일 밝혔다.
24일과 25일 낮 최고기온은 각각 영하 7도와 영하 3도로 한낮에도 추운 날씨가 계속되겠으며, 강풍으로 체감온도는 더욱 떨어질 것으로 기상청은 내다봤다.
수도권 지역에 0.4㎝가량의 눈이 내렸던 지난해 성탄절과 달리 올해는 '화이트 크리스마스'를 기대하기 어렵게 됐다. 24~25일 충청 이남 서해안과 제주 지방을 제외한 전국 대부분의 지역에서 눈은 내리지 않은 채 구름만 조금 낄 전망이기 때문이다.
대신 이 기간 서해상에서 발달한 눈구름대가 유입되면서 성탄절 다음날이자 일요일인 26일 낮부터 27일까지는 서울?경기와 중부 내륙지방에서도 다소 많은 눈이 내릴 것으로 보인다. 26일 아침 최저기온과 낮 최고기온은 각각은 영하 8도, 0도로 추운 날씨는 주말까지 지속되다가 27일부터 풀리겠다.
23일 오후부터 바람이 강하게 불고 물결이 높게 일면서 24일 오전에는 전해상에 풍랑특보가 발표될 가능성도 높다고 기상청은 전했다.기상청 관계자는 "올해 크리스마스는 기온이 낮을 예정이니 외출시 옷차림에 유의해야 한다"고 당부했다.[정석우 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Cowboys' Tony Romo on injured reserve, but Brett Favre is not
description.content:
Redskins' Donovan McNabb feels disrespected by benching. After waiting two months to see if they could get two games out of Tony Romo, the Dallas Cowboys scrapped that plan.
The Cowboys on Tuesday put Romo on injured reserve, which means he's done for the year. He will miss games Saturday night at Arizona and the finale at Philadelphia.
Romo broke his left collarbone Oct. 25. He needed rest, not surgery, for it to heal and all along was targeting this week for his return. The team made it possible by keeping him on the active roster.
Dallas could have freed a roster spot a long time ago, but the Cowboys wanted to give their franchise quarterback every chance to return. It was questionable from the start since the Cowboys were 1-5 coming out of the game he was injured. They dipped to 1-7 and have since been eliminated from the playoffs and guaranteed a losing record.
Favre won't be put on injured reserve
Minnesota Vikings Coach Leslie Frazier is not yet ruling Brett Favre out for the rest of the season.
Frazier says it is unlikely the 41-year-old quarterback will play Sunday at Philadelphia. He says he will not put Favre on season-ending injured reserve after he suffered a concussion in the loss to the Chicago Bears on Monday night.
The Vikings are assured of their first losing season since 2006. As they limp to the finish of this long and crazy year, it is still uncertain if Favre will take the field again ? for them or anyone else.
McNabb unhappy
Donovan McNabb felt disrespected by the way he was benched by Washington Redskins Coach Mike Shanahan. "Everything was handled awkwardly," the quarterback said on his weekly radio show. "Somewhat to a disrespect to me and to the team."
Making his first public comments since his demotion last week, McNabb said he strongly disagreed with the decision, but he has a bigger problem with the way he says the organization leaked the news to the media before informing him.
"Because of the timing and because of all the leaks and everything that was put out there, and no putting out the fire, so to speak," McNabb said, "I'm hearing everything through the media."
Shanahan waited until Thursday evening to tell McNabb that Rex Grossman would be the starter for the rest of the season, even though rumblings of a possible switch had been circulating all week.
"I was pulled back by it. All of a sudden you get this news a couple of days before the game, you do feel somewhat disrespected," McNabb said. "You could have told me earlier or at least prepared me for it. ? The term I did use was professional. You would like to hear it early, and if you hear it late, it kind of throws off the preparation for a lot of guys."
Alexander pleads not guilty
Former Denver Broncos linebacker Kevin Alexander pleaded not guilty to charges of assault and battery stemming from an allegation of a domestic dispute over alleged infidelity.
Alexander entered the pleas in an Aurora court Tuesday, a day after he was arrested and cut from the Broncos.
The 23-year-old Alexander signed with the Broncos in April as an undrafted free agent out of Clemson. He spent five weeks on Denver's practice squad before being promoted to the active roster Oct. 16. He finished with one tackle on defense and three special teams stops.
Owens on injured reserve
The Cincinnati Bengals have put Terrell Owens on season-ending injured reserve a day after the receiver had surgery to repair cartilage in his left knee.
Owens hurt the knee a couple weeks ago but kept playing. He aggravated it on the opening drive of a 19-17 win over Cleveland on Sunday, then hobbled off the field and didn't return. He finishes the season with 72 catches for 983 yards and a team-high nine touchdowns.
Dr. James Andrews operated on the knee Monday in Birmingham, Ala.
Steelers got undeserved first down Pittsburgh Coach Mike Tomlin concedes the Steelers were mistakenly awarded a first down on a nine-yard run by Rashard Mendenhall during their 22-17 loss to the New York Jets on Sunday.
On first-and-10 from the Jets 35 early in the second quarter, Mendenhall gained nine yards to the 26-yard line. After momentary confusion as the chain crew began moving the sticks, referee Peter Morelli's crew put the ball down at the 25 and signaled a first down.
The statistics crew hastily awarded Mendenhall a 10-yard carry ? an extra yard that wound up giving him a 100-yard game. The Steelers went on to score a touchdown on Ben Roethlisberger's nine-yard pass to Matt Spaeth.

description.hltext_display: Hopkins makes way for Young in NZ test squad
description.content:
Gareth Hopkins makes way for Young after failing to impress on the Black Caps' recent tour of India.
Offspinner Jeetan Patel and batsman BJ Watling were also dropped from the squad that will play Pakistan in two tests, New Zealand Cricket (NZC) said in a statement on Wednesday.
"We have kept faith with the majority of the squad who performed well in the test matches against India and are wanting to build on the positive steps the team took in that series," chief selector Mark Greatbatch said.
"One new face is wicketkeeper Reece Young, who gets a chance after performing well over a number of seasons at domestic and NZA level. It's disappointing for Gareth Hopkins who misses out on selection."
Greatbatch was replaced by John Wright as head coach on Monday after the recent poor showing on the tour to India and Bangladesh and was appointed chairman of the Black Caps' selection panel. He also maintains his role of batting coach.
Daniel Vettori was rested for the three-match Twenty20 series against Pakistan, starting on Sunday, and Ross Taylor will lead in his absence. Peter McGlashan is likely to play wicketkeeper with Brendon McCullum still not 100 percent after suffering a back injury, Greatbatch said. "As such, he will not take part in the Twenty20 series to give him time to recover and he is expected to be fully fit for the test series starting on January 7.
"Brendon (McCullum) is keen to play and we are monitoring his recovery closely. He will undergo fitness testing later this week and we will make a call closer to the start of the match."
The new selection panel, made up of Greatbatch, Glen Turner and Lance Cairns, also named a 30-man preliminary squad for next year's World Cup, to be staged in India, Sri Lanka and Bangladesh.
The squad, to be pruned to 15 players by January 19, included seven uncapped one-day players in Young, Brent Arnel, Doug Bracewell, Dean Brownlie, Adam Milne, Rob Nicol and Luke Woodcock.
"A number of uncapped guys who have excelled domestically made the squad. We believe it represents the best one-day cricketers we have in New Zealand," Greatbatch said.
The Black Caps will play six one-day internationals against Pakistan before they travel to the February 19-April 2 World Cup. Dean Brownlie, Ian Butler, James Franklin, Martin Guptill, Brendon McCullum, Nathan McCullum, Peter McGlashan, Kyle Mills, Adam Milne, Jesse Ryder, Tim Southee, Scott Styris, Ross Taylor (captain), Luke Woodcock.
Test Squad: Brent Arnel, James Franklin, Martin Guptill, Chris Martin, Brendon McCulluM, Andy McKay, Tim McIntosh, Jesse Ryder, Tim Southee, Ross Taylor, Daniel Vettori (captain), Kane Williamson, Reece Young. Brent Arnel, Hamish Bennett, Doug Bracewell, Dean Brownlie, Ian Butler, Grant Elliott, Daniel Flynn, Martin Guptill, Jamie How, James Franklin, Kyle Mills, Adam Milne, Brendon McCullum, Nathan McCullum, Peter McGlashan, Andy McKay, Rob Nicol, Jacob Oram, Jeetan Patel, Jesse Ryder, Tim Southee, Shanan Stewart, Scott Styris, Ross Taylor, Daryl Tuffey, Daniel Vettori, BJ Watling, Kane Williamson, Luke Woodcock, Reece Young.

description.hltext_display: Upholstery Care and Maintenance During the High Traffic Holiday Season Doesn't Need To Be a Grind
description.content:
We are all excited to see our friends and family this holiday season, but often our friends and family leave behind them a tornado of mess. Avoid having to spend the days after the holidays cleaning your home for hours. Pam Garner of Speed Cleaning Tips and Secrets at wwww.cleaningsecretsinfo.com advocates the following holiday tips for so that you can spend your time playing with your new toys and relaxing instead of searching for the best upholstery cleaner you can find.
Getting Ready:
Many people put slipcovers on their furniture during the holiday season because of the heavy traffic they receive. This is certainly an option for , but if it doesnt interest you, simply rotate your cushions before or after the event to keep them looking fresh. You should also make sure you dust and vacuum all of your upholstered furniture before your guests arrive. Without this step, the dirt and tiny crumbs from the hoards of people in your home over the holidays will become imbedded into your furniture, possibly putting complete removal beyond the reach of even the best upholstery cleaner.
Another tip -- if you have not applied a stain protector to your furniture in over a year, the holiday season might be the time to do it. A good protector can be bought at retail stores and once dry it will help repel spills and block stains. On leather furniture you should use a leather conditioner.
Tablecloths are must easier to clean that treating damage to your dining table, so pick one that you like and keep it out throughout the holidays.
Be Prepared at the Door:
Have a mat at the front door for people to take off their shoes. If you dont want to make people take off their shoes, at a minimum have a mat for them to wipe their feet. This not only protects your floors, but it also avoids shoe muck from getting on your furniture when people pull their feet up onto the couch after dinner.
Also have a designated spot for coats and other weather paraphernalia. This keeps people from draping their outdoor clothes over the furniture, which can otherwise undo your efforts at . During the Festivities:
Make sure you have plenty of table room around your furniture so that people are not tempted to put their glasses or plates on the furniture or anywhere that could spill. If the table option is there, people will use it. Stock up on coasters and napkins for all the tables, too.
If you are planning to do a gift exchange, have a trash bag on hand to catch the trash as it is ripped from the presents.
After the event:
If you took the preventative measures outlined above, there shouldnt be much to take care of after everyone leaves. Make sure to dust and vacuum all of your furniture again within a few days after the holiday, throw the tablecloth in the laundry. But give yoursef a chance to relax and enjoy the season first.

entity.property: Pam Garner of Speed Cleaning Tips

description.hltext_display: 周冬雨穿透明纱裙现身 携窦骁走红毯内衣隐现[组图]
description.content:
2010“BQ红人榜”颁奖典礼在北京万豪酒店举行。携手现身的窦骁和周冬雨走红毯，“惨遭”主持人调戏，让他们俩做出亲密动作，被这对银幕小情侣害羞地拒绝了。
窦骁和董洁都从《秋之白华》剧组赶来，大会却没有安排他们一起出现，老一辈“谋女郎”董洁则独自走红毯，窦骁仍是和新任“谋女郎”周冬雨携手现身。窦骁的黑色西装和格子衬衫显得阳光又休闲，周冬雨满头卷发，亮粉色嘴唇和黑色波点蓬蓬裙，“萝莉”味道十足。
这对《山楂树之恋》走出的银幕小情侣还遭到了主持人的“调戏”，一起拍照时，主持人不停在旁边提醒：“亲密一点，男生主动一点!搂一下!”让两个年轻人只能尴尬地笑着，主持人还继续起哄：“窦骁你是不是要我过去掰你的手啊!”接着，他们又问起两人有没有可能假戏真做，发展成情侣，周冬雨摸着头发，羞涩地说：“我们只是朋友，我把他(窦骁)当哥哥看。”主持人追问：“那你觉得什么样的大哥哥你会觉得挺好的?”周冬雨说：“内外结合的。”主持人转向窦骁：“你觉得你够内外结合吧?”“老三”仍然笑得爽朗：“我朝这个方向努力吧!” (图文薛建宇)

description.hltext_display: Venezuela Parliament tightens Internet rules: President Chavez approves
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: The Venezuelan parliament in Venezuela has approved a law which tightens the rules regulating Internet contents. President ChavezChavez said, "We aren't eliminating the Internet here, or censoring it.".In his weekly speech, Radio and TV broadcasts on December 19, 2010, President Chavez emphasized the message to his people that his government had an obligation to take a stand against harmful messages to protect everyone from cybercrimes. "What we're doing is protecting ourselves against crimes, against cybercrimes," he added.Under the bill, online messages inciting hatred, political and religious intolerance, are banned.The new law prohibits online messages deemed to disrespect public officials, messages inciting hatred, political and religious intolerance, relatedmessages promoting drug use, prostitution and other crimes are banned. The new power also shield our citizens from messages that promotes drug use and prostitution. Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez says, with the law, our citizens are protected against on-line crimes.The new law helps keep the government stand against harmful messages and a measure 'Fighting cybercrime'. Leaders of the opposition defies against the measure or new Bill, to them signifies a threat to the freedom of speech. Venezuelan Chamber of Electronic Commerce has criticised the measure saying it is a censorship blocking websites. The new bill or measure was passed after the parliament has given President Chavez special powers to pass for 18 months.

event_or_fact.property: with the law, our citizens are protected against on-line crimes

description.hltext_display: Incendiano municipio San Fili, arrestati
description.content: (ANSA) - SAN FILI (COSENZA), 22 DIC - Un incendio e' stato appiccato la notte scorsa nel municipio di San Fili, nel Cosentino, ed ha distrutto la stanza del sindaco ed altri due uffici. I presunti autori, tra i quali un dipendente comunale, sono rimasti gravemente ustionati e sono stati arrestati dai Carabinieri. Franco Talarico, di 44 anni, dipendente dell'ufficio tecnico comunale, e Francesco Belmonte, di 42, commerciante,hanno appiccato il fuoco dopo aver cosparso di liquido infiammabile la stanza del sindaco. I 2 autori si sono anche ustionati, uno e' dipendente comunale

description.hltext_display: Zapatero: el ataque de los mercados no responde a fundamentos
description.content: El presidente del Gobierno, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, ha señalado hoy que los ataques de los mercados financieros que afectan a España no se justifican por los rasgos fundamentales de la economía doméstica."No cabe duda de que la reacción actual de los mercados financieros está afectando a España, una reacción que, en nuestra opinión, no responde a los fundamentos actuales de nuestra economía", ha indicado en el Congreso.Zapatero señaló que la petición de ayuda por parte de Irlanda al fondo europeo de rescate y las dudas sobre las pruebas de resistencia a la banca europea son los factores fundamentales que han generado las renovadas tensiones financieras, aumentando los diferenciales de la deuda soberana en los países de la periferia de la zona euro, entre ellos España.

description.hltext_display: 11월 항공교통량 역대 최고
description.content:
국토해양부는 지난 11월 항공교통센터에서 관제한 항공기가 하루 평균 1380대로 역대 최고 교통량을 기록했다고 22일 밝혔다. 이는 작년 같은 기간보다 8.1% 증가한 것으로, 역대 최고 기록인 올 10월(하루 평균 1377대)보다도 많은 수치다.
공항별로는 인천공항이 하루 평균 616대로 작년 11월과 비교해 10.3% 증가했고, 김포공항과 제주공항은 각각 2.7%, 1.6% 늘었다.
국토부는 겨울방학 및 연말 특수 등으로 연말까지 항공교통량이 지속적으로 늘어 올해의 항공교통량이 역대 최고치를 경신할 것으로 전망했다.
[배한철 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Injury ends Jones' Arsenal dreams
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: Blackburn Rovers defender Phil Jones is set to miss out on a 10m move to Arsenal next month after being ruled out for up to four months following knee surgery. Jones (18) underwent a cartilage operation on Monday after injuring his knee during Saturday's 1-1 draw with West Ham...

description.hltext_display: 吴尊风尘仆仆回上海补拍 女助理被换防止偷拍[组图]
description.content:
吴尊20日撇下飞轮海其他三子独自飞往上海虹桥机场。有十几位粉丝跟机一起飞往上海，一出机场吴尊便与粉丝打招呼。此次来沪是补拍《大武生》的几个镜头，之前剧组安排贴身女助理，由于被拍到与吴尊亲密而被开除，此次来接吴尊的是台湾一直跟随吴尊的女助理。该女助理带吴尊走向停车场，犯晕搞错方向，在机场绕了个大圈子还没有找到，只有求助电话才顺利找到车子。
吴尊

description.hltext_display: Oracle Helps HelpAge India Improve Service
description.content:
HelpAge India, a secular, not-for-profit organisation that protects the rights of India's elderly, is India's first NGO to successfully complete the implementation of Oracle CRM On Demand and Oracle E-Business Suite R12. This will help improve the transparency of its operations, reduce operational costs, and enable the organisation to better serve the needs of its donors, beneficiaries and the elderly.
HelpAge is at the forefront of technology adoption that has enabled it to serve the needs of India's 90 million elders through its various services.
"Our mission is to work for the cause and care of disadvantaged older persons and to improve their quality of life. To do this, it is as important for us to ensure that we serve our beneficiaries and donors equally well," said Anup Khosla, Chief Financial Officer, HelpAge India. "IT has enabled improvements in many of our processes and systems, and that's why it will enable us to serve these important stakeholders more transparently and efficiently. Oracle has played a very crucial role in helping us."
HelpAge expects the following benefits from the Oracle implementation, including:
Operating with complete information transparency by being able to seamlessly share data across various business functions – resource mobilisation, campaign management, service, operations and finance, this being achieved through the tight integration of Oracle CRM On Demand and Oracle E-Business Suite.
An integrated view of donor data that enables effective decision-making by senior management members. Oracle CRM On Demand’s unique pre-built data warehouse capabilities allow users to combine real-time intelligence with deep historical and comparative trend analyses.
Effective donor management with a 360 degree view of each donor that enables better visibility and monitoring of that donor's interactions, activities and transactions utilising Oracle CRM On Demand.
Securing its web-based portal application and safeguarding against accidental or intentional misuse of the system through the robust security and access control features of Oracle CRM On Demand and Oracle E-Business Suite.
Improving its financial and programme management capabilities through Oracle E-Business Suite R12 modules like iExpense, Cash Management and Project Management. These help generate time performance reports of collections, expenses, resource mobilisation, etc. and also increase faster response to donor queries and service requests like receipt generation or income tax exemption certificate to name a few.
"It is our endeavour to serve our customers with complete, secure and integrated solutions and it is gratifying to see how Oracle Applications like Oracle E-Business Suite R12 and Oracle CRM On Demand are helping NGOs like HelpAge become more efficient, robust and effective in meeting their mission for their donors, beneficiaries and the elderly who depend on them," said Sunil Jose, Vice President, Applications, Oracle India.

description.hltext_display: The Security Forces took in custody Shah Zain Bugti
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: The law enforcing agencies took President Baluchistan Jamhuri Watan Party into custody near Quetta this morning. According to F.C. sources, was stopped at 5 am when coming from Chaman. He was leading a convoy of 11 illegal vehicles along with 40 persons. The law enforcing agencies also recovered 43 Kalashnikovs and 50000 rounds from the vehicles, along with 2 anti aircraft guns of 14.5 mm calibres, 2 Grenade launchers, 3 small machine guns and 15 boxes of ammunition of 14.5 mm anti air craft guns.

description.hltext_display: Dalit woman abducted, gangraped for week
description.content:
A 35-year-old Dalit woman was allegedly abducted and gangraped for nearly a week, a senior officer said here on Wednesday.
The woman was abducted on November 6 from Sadar Kanta area in the city by Chottelal Jha and his aide while she was going to her parents' house in Gandhi Nagar locality, Superintendent of Police Akash Kulhari said. The two men then took the woman to Mayaon village where they along with four others raped her for a week, the SP said.
"The woman somehow later managed to escape from their clutches and reached her in-laws house. The couple then informed the police about the incident yesterday after which an FIR had been lodged at Kotwali," he said.

description.hltext_display: Fastest Way To Lose Weight
description.content:
Dallas, Texas : The Diet Solution. Stop Dieting...Start Eating...And Start Living! Find out more information about the 7 fat burning foods you need to know about and much more.
The Diet Solution Program is really a culmination of my search for answers to my own weight loss and health problems. I can remember going on my first diet in the 7th grade. You name the diet and I tried it. Not until I found the true answers to weight loss and how to keep it off was I able to finally reach my own ideal weight and level of health that I enjoy today.
It was also my mothers and my grandmothers struggle with obesity and type 2 Diabetes that led me to research how blood sugar affects our ability to lose and gain fat. As I studied Diabetes more and more, I found that the same principles that could be used to control a diabetics blood sugar were the same principles that all people needed to use to lose fat and keep it off. Once I figured this out, I was almost amazed at how easy the answer was the whole time and couldnt believe all of the past unhealthy plans I had attempted with no success.
My husband cant get over how much better I look. Melinda Marshall
I am a NJ based Holistic Nutritionist and Exercise Specialist. I have a private practice in NJ and when Im not seeing clients in my office I am writing books, newsletters, articles or speaking on the principles of healthy nutrition for weight loss and disease prevention. Basically, doing my best to communicate what true health is to the world.
If you want to know
Which foods you may think are helping you lose weight (but are actually causing you to gain weight)
Which Carbs, Proteins, and Fats are the best to eat for maximum fat loss
How to regulate specific hormones to cause fat burning in your body
Exactly which strategies will never work when it comes to weight loss
Then this is for you! to find out more information about the 7 fat burning foods you need to know about and much more.
Thank you and wishing you great success,
In health and happiness,
Isabel De Los Rios
Certified Nutritionist and Exercise Specialist

description.hltext_display: Consumidores pedirán a Industria que la luz no suba más del 2%
description.content: El Consejo de Consumidores y Usuarios (CCU) pedirá hoy al Ministerio de Industria, Turismo y Comercio que los incrementos globales de la tarifa eléctrica de último recurso (TUR) para el año 2011 no superen el 2%.Esta organización instará al Ministerio a revisar los criterios que fijan los costes eléctricos para garantizar que éstos se adecuen a los costes de producción.Ante los rumores de que el próximo mes de enero las tarifas eléctricas se incrementarán en torno al 10% para los consumidores, el Consejo de Consumidores y Usuarios, presidido por Francisca Sauquillo, ha indicado que "es inaceptable un incremento de la Tarifa de Último Recurso (TUR), que afecta a la mayoría de los hogares españoles, que supere el índice de precios al consumo".

description.hltext_display: Arbejdet genoptaget på slagterier
description.content:
Efter de seneste dages arbejdsnedlæggelser kører slagterierne igen for fuld kraft. Efter de seneste dages arbejdsnedlæggelser kører slagterierne igen for fuld kraft. Efter de seneste dages arbejdsnedlæggelser har de statsansatte tilsynsteknikere på slagterierne genoptaget arbejdet, oplyser Danish Crown på virksomhedens hjemmeside.
Dermed kører slagterierne igen for fuld kraft.
Tilsynsteknikerne på slagterierne nedlagde arbejdet i frustration over, at Fødevarestyrelsen havde opsagt nogle lokalaftaler. Det tvang slagterierne til at slagte på halv kraft.
Af METTE SEHESTED LARSEN

description.hltext_display: Musica online, iTunes meglio di Amazon
description.content:
Secondo una ricerca di NPD, l'offerta musicale di Cupertino sarebbe più competitiva e più remunerativa del diretto concorrente. Critiche sulle offerte del giorno proposte da Amazon
Roma - Buone notizie per Apple in chiusura di 2010. Secondo una ricerca di mercato di NPD, iTunes mantiene il ruolo di leader nelle vendite musicali online, nonostante l'agguerrita concorrenza. Lo store di Cupertino dominerebbe il mercato musicale digitale con una percentuale del 66,2 per cento, seguita da Amazon che registra il 13,3 per cento nei primi tre quarti del 2010.
L'indagine di NPD sottolinea la capacità di Apple di gestire e incrementare il 63,2 per cento delle quote di mercato che iTunes raggiungeva nei primi mesi dell'anno, nonostante gli sforzi del suo concorrente diretto, Amazon, di incidere sulla comunità di utenti e di artisti in forza presso la Mela.
Secondo il Wall Street Journal, l'arretramento di Amazon rispetto ad Apple sarebbe avvenuta con il lancio del catalogo dei Beatles su iTunes Store.
Secondo i ricercatori, il pezzo forte offerto dall'azienda di Seattle sarebbero le promozioni chiamate Daily Deal, capaci, secondo gli addetti ai lavori, di minacciare l'egemonia di Apple al punto da costringere quest'ultima ad aumentare la pressione sui propri artisti temendo che possano cedere alle offerte convenienti del competitor.
Per molti distributori di contenuti, la strategia di Amazon di vendere gli album a prezzi bassi (fino a 3,99 dollari ciascuno) ha avuto un successo modesto dal momento che l'azienda la offre in perdita. Secondo gli esperti, infatti, la società di Jeff Bezos, il più delle volte, pagherebbe a prezzo pieno (circa 7 o dollari) le sue proposte di convenienza quotidiane.
Pete Baltaxe, a capo del negozio di musica digitale di Amazon, difende le scelte della dirigenza e considera il Daily Deal "un'ottima soluzione per rendere gli utenti entusiasti di provare Amazon". I tratti caratteristici e distintivi delle due proposte, secondo Justin Edmund, docente presso la Carnegie Mellon University, sarebbero la maggior ampiezza del catalogo della Mela contrapposta alla convenienza economica delle offerte Amazon.

description.hltext_display: Rotterdam voorbeeld strooibeleid
description.content:
AMSTERDAM/ROTTERDAM - Gemeenten waar fietsers aan n stuk door onderuit glijden en veel auto's betrokken raken bij ongevallen door gladheid, moeten een voorbeeld nemen aan Rotterdam. Een strooiwagen baant zich vrijdag een weg door de sneeuw in Rotterdam. Foto: ANP Rotterdam kent namelijk een strooibeleid waarbij op alle doorgaande wegen en fietspaden gestrooid wordt. Zeker na afgelopen winter zijn de fietspaden in de Maasstad bij de standaard strooiroutes opgenomen, meldt AT5.
Dat is een beleid wat lang niet alle gemeenten voeren. In onze hoofdstad is dat bijvoorbeeld niet het geval. De dienst Infrastructuur Verkeer en Vervoer gaat in Amsterdam over het schoonhouden van de hoofdwegen voor auto's. De fietspaden vallen daarentegen onder de stadsdelen. Een gescheiden beleid dat ze in Rotterdam dus niet kennen.
Voorlopig hebben vooral fietsers in Amsterdam nog te maken met gladde fietspaden, want er zijn nu ijsbrekers en branders nodig om de paden handmatig schoon te krijgen, maar volgens het stadsdeel is daar nu even geen mankracht voor.
Bekijk hier de vergelijking tussen Amsterdam en Rotterdam

description.hltext_display: Kyle Busch on top 50 dirtiest players list
About.me entra nel circuito di AOL
description.content:
Il gigante dei service provider investe sul sito aggregatore di profili individuali online. I maggiori benefici arriverebbero dall'advertising. Ancora segrete le cifre dell'affare
Roma - Dopo l'acquisizione di TechCrunch, AOL mette a segno un altro colpo di mercato in chiusura di 2010. Secondo fonti d'Oltreoceano, il gigante di Internet avrebbe concluso l'acquisizione di about.me, aggregatore dei diversi profili personali sparsi tra i vari social network.
Oltre a riunire i profili individuali creati sulle diverse piattaforme online (Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin ecc), about.me permette agli utenti di tracciare le visite sulle proprie pagine personali e capire, nello specifico, quali social network sono utilizzati per accedere agli account. L'azienda afferma di "fornire agli utenti un'idea più precisa su come costruire e vendere al meglio la propria identità online".
Non sfugge agli osservatori che i potenziali benefici generati da un tale investimento risiederebbero nell'advertising online. "About.me è molto di più di un aggregatore di profili sociali: permette alle persone di esprimersi facilmente all'interno di un ambiente sempre più rumoroso e ricco di esperienze sociali diverse tra loro", afferma Brad Garlinghouse, presidente del comparto applicazioni per AOL. "Creare identità online per i consumatori potrebbe avere un incredibile impatto positivo per la strategia pubblicitaria e per i contenuti veicolati da AOL poiché ci permetterebbe di individuare e fornire i messaggi più significativi e rilevanti per i consumatori", conclude Garlinghouse.
Le cifre dell'affare non sono state rese note, ma da TechCrunch sono pronti a scommettere che in ballo ci siano decine di milioni di dollari.
Attraverso una nota pubblicata sul proprio blog personale, Tony Conrad, co-fondatore di about.me, assicura che l'approccio al mercato della piattaforma non cambierà nonostante l'acquisizione. "Ci siamo uniti ad AOL nel momento opportuno", dice Conrad, sostenendo che about.me si prepara a diventare una parte importante della strategia dello storico colosso della rete.
Nonostante l'entusiasmo espresso da Conrad, c'è chi nota che la cessione della sua creatura avvenga in tempi sospettosamente prematuri. Nonostante Conrad sia un imprenditore "finanziariamente più che coperto", sostiene Michael Arrington di TechCruch, l'impazienza mostrata nel vendere about.me ad AOL coglie di sorpresa.
Al dubbio sollevato da molti risponde lo stesso Conrad, il quale ha spiegato che un accordo del genere è stato sicuramente positivo per gli altri membri del team del sito, i quali, spiega l'imprenditore, non godono delle sue stesse condizioni finanziarie. Inoltre, le numerose richieste di investimento provenienti da nomi importanti del mondo finanziario avrebbero aumentato la pressione e le aspettative sull'azienda. In una simile situazione, conclude, sarebbe stata necessaria "un'uscita di scena" ben più significativa.

description.hltext_display: UE, la Commissione inciampa sul copyright
description.content:
Una corte europea ha condannato Bruxelles: oggetto del contendere, un software di traduzione automatica. La Commissione non aveva alcun diritto di apportare modifiche al codice proprietario
Roma - La Commissione Europea ha infranto il copyright del software prodotto da SYSTRAN, e pertanto dovrà risarcire i danni provocati all'azienda con una somma di 12 milioni di euro. Lo ha deciso il Tribunale dell'Unione europea, secondo la cui opinione Bruxelles è colpevole di aver "aperto" codice proprietario alla concorrenza senza avere alcuna autorizzazione in tal senso.
Il motivo del contendere risiede nel rapporto tra SYSTRAN e la Commissione tra il 1997 e il 2002, periodo in cui la prima ha realizzato il software di traduzione automatica EC-Systran Unix per la seconda basandosi sul lavoro già fatto sul programma commerciale Systran Unix.
In seguito (2003) la Commissione ha pubblicato un bando per l'ulteriore sviluppo di EC-Systran Unix, assegnando il lavoro a un'azienda terza. A questo punto SYSTRAN ha deciso di denunciare Bruxelles per divulgazione non autorizzata del "know-how" aziendale, con lo scopo ben preciso di apportare "migliorie, adattamenti e aggiunte alle routine linguistiche", "migliorie specifiche ai programmi di analisi, trasferimento e sintesi" e "aggiornamenti di sistema" alla piattaforma di traduzione automatica usata dalla UE.
Ma quella piattaforma (EC-Systran Unix) contiene "sostanziali similarità, nel materiale base e in certe routine linguistiche" con Systran Unix, ha stabilito la Corte, e SYSTRAN ha provato che "contrariamente a quanto sostiene la Commissione" "le modifiche richieste dal bando di gara richiedono accesso a elementi di EC-Systran Unix presi dalla versione Systran Unix".

description.hltext_display: 以良好的作风服务地方经济发展
Febbre da tablet
description.content:
Roma - Nell'anno che sta per chiudersi, si sono piantati diversi semi in territorio tablet, anche se i veri frutti si vedranno solo nel corso del 2011. Le proposte in arrivo sul mercato, tra aspiranti anti-iPad e ibridi che strizzano l'occhio agli e-reader, sono davvero tante. A livello estetico, le tavolette "full-screen" si somigliano un po' tutte, eppure non è così facile scegliere il modello giusto. Come per gli smartphone, le differenze non si limitano ai chip interni ma includono le "possibilità" offerte dal sistema operativo e il supporto dello shop ufficiale.
Molti di questi nuovi tablet verranno presentati al CES 2011, tra il 6 e il 9 gennaio. Durante il tradeshow sarà possibile, ad esempio, ammirare la proposta NEC: uno slate a libretto, realizzato con due display touch LCD da 7 pollici, mosso dall'androide. Anche qui ritroveremo un ARM Cortex A8, come nel caso del Cloud Communicator LifeTouch, oltre alla possibilità di usare un pennino e di connettersi con WiFi, 3G, Bluetooth e GPS.
A prima vista, il tablet NEC appare come un incrocio tra la console Nintendo DSi XL e l'atteso Kno, con doppio schermo da 14,1 pollici. La startup di Osam Rashid (fondatore del sito che noleggia libri Chegg.com) ha appena iniziato a spedire il dispositivo, dedicato agli studenti del college che vogliono lasciare a casa lo zaino. In questo caso, il sistema operativo è basato su Ubuntu mentre il prezzo è fissato a 899 dollari.
Anche Motorola ha confermato la presenza del suo Motopad all'evento di Las Vegas. Il misterioso dispositivo, equipaggiato con Android HoneyComb, si era visto di sfuggita nel corso di un evento incentrato sul futuro degli OS mobile. L'azienda ha anche realizzato un ironico teaser, per introdurre a dovere il device: un filmato che mostra l'evoluzione delle "tavolette" e prende in giro iPad, considerato un semplice iPhone gigante.
Ovviamente, la tablet war ha già fatto le prime vittime tra pericolosi ritardi, progetti abortiti e passi falsi. Il Viewsonic G, ad esempio, è appena stato ritirato dai negozi della catena americana Staples, per un generico difetto di fabbricazione. Ma Viewsonic non si dà per vinta:
entro la fine della settimana promette un aggiornamento riparatore incentrato sui problemi di lag. Del resto, sulla pretenziosa tavoletta da 10 pollici sta girando il sistema operativo Android 2.2 (Froyo) sconsigliato dalla stessa Google.

description.hltext_display: 코레일 `앱`으로 열차 예약 편리하게
description.content:
코레일(사장 허준영)은 열차 예약 등을 위한 스마트폰 전용 어플리케이션인 '글로리 코레일'이 큰 인기를 끌고있다고 22일 밝혔다.
이 앱을 처음 선보인 지난 8일부터 지금까지 이 앱을 다운로드 한 사람은 21만8천여명으로, 이 가운데 14만8천여명이 실제로 이 앱을 통해 스마트폰 승차권을 구입했다.
이는 발매된 전체 승차권의 3%(누적) 수준으로, 홈티켓은 서비스 도입 이후 3년, SMS 티켓은 16개월 걸렸던 것을 보름만에 경신했다.코레일 관계자는 "글로리 코레일 앱은 한때 '인기 앱 2위'에 오를 정도로 큰 관심을 모으고 있다"며 "보다 다양하고 편리한 기능을 갖춘 앱을 내년에 새로 선보일 계획"이라고 말했다.'글로리 코레일'은 열차의 조회, 예약, 결제, 발권, 반환 등을 스마트폰을 통해 원스톱으로 서비스 받을 수 있는 스마트폰 전용 앱으로, 예매시 2%의 운임도 할인받을 수 있다.
[뉴스속보부]
