This is in essence GP architecture, specially created in earlier 1990th to provide Great Plains Dynamics ERP product some level of neutrality from those days computer platforms (such as MS Windows, Mac OS, Solaris, Unix to be examples) and database vendors (Oracle, Btrieve, earlier Microsoft SQL Server to name a few). Neutrality and its reasonable performance those days was typically achieved by programming so-called Shell in one of the cross-platforms programming languages (in the...

description.hltext_display: Egy tonna színaranyból készített volna könnycseppet
description.content: Az októberben véget ért 2010-es sanghaji világkiállítás cseh pavilonjának egyik legnagyobb látványosságaként csodált LacrimAu elnevezésű arany könnycseppből összesen hat másolat készül, amelyek a világ különböző országaiba kerülnek majd – mondta el a mű alkotója, Federico Diaz. A művész tervei szerint a másolatok Londonba, Párizsba, Moszkvába, New Yorkba, Sanghajba és Tokióba kerülnek majd, ám a pontos helyszínekről egyelőre még folynak a tárgyalások. Az eredeti műalkotás Prágában marad – mondta Diaz. A másolatok egyike csütörtökön érkezik meg Sanghajba. A könnycsepp árverését a CBN televíziós csatorna közvetíti majd. A kikiáltási ár 30 millió cseh korona (327 millió forint).

description.hltext_display: Horn-Bad Meinberg: Auferstanden aus Lindenholz
description.content:
85-jähriger Heinz Wessels baut eine Krippe und spendet sie der Kirche Heilig Kreuz in Horn
Neuer Anziehungspunkt: Rechtzeitig zum Weihnachtsfest ist eine große Krippe fertig geworden, die nun in der katholischen Kirche Heilig Kreuz in Horn steht. | Fotos: brinkmeier
Horn-Bad Meinberg (mab). Pfarrer Hans Günter Voß strahlt. Er hält eine 50 Zentimeter hohe Josef-Figur in seinen Händen und betrachtet sie ehrfurchtsvoll aus der Nähe. Er ist sehr zufrieden mit dem, was er da sieht. Die Figur ist Teil der neuen Krippe, die in der katholischen Kirche Heilig Kreuz in Horn steht.
Geschaffen wurde sie von Heinz Wessels. Der 85-jährige Leopoldstaler hat sich Anfang November ans Werk gemacht und nun die Krippe der Kirche gespendet. Neben Josef sind Maria, das Jesuskind, Ochse und Esel sowie ein Hirte, ein Schaf, der Gloria-Engel und der Stall mit kleiner Landschaft davor rechtzeitig fertig geworden zum Weihnachtsfest. Die Heiligen Drei Könige und ein Kamel mit Treiber sollen in den nächsten Monaten dazukommen.
Angefangen hat alles damit, dass der Seniorenkreis vor einigen Jahren einen Akkordeonspieler suchte. In der Person von Heinz Wessels wurde man fündig. Da kannte die Kirchengemeinde allerdings noch nicht das andere Talent des Leopolds­talers. Der 85-Jährige ist nämlich gelernter Bau- und Möbeltischler.
Heinz Wessels: Er hat die Krippe geschaffen und gespendet.
Groß geworden ist er zunächst in Essen. Nach dem Tod seiner Frau ist er vor 15 Jahren in die Pfalz gezogen. Wessels: "Auch als Rentner braucht man eine Beschäftigung. Und so habe ich in der Pfalz zwei Krippen für eine evangelische und eine katholische Kirche gebaut." Als dann auch seine neue Lebensgefährtin starb, ist er 2002 zu seinen Kindern nach Leopoldstal gezogen.
Wessels: "Bedingung war, dass ich hinter dem Haus eine eigene Werkstatt bekomme." Dort hat er dann Tiffany-Sachen (von Fensterbildern bis zu Lampenschirmen) und Schnitzereien (von Tierfiguren bis zu Madonnen) hergestellt. Viele Sachen davon hat er über die Jahre für wohltätige Zwecke zur Verfügung gestellt.
Heinz Wessels: "Am liebsten sehe ich strahlende Gesichter. Mein Bestreben ist es, anderen Leuten eine Freude zu machen. Da mir die katholische Kirchengemeinde mit der Zeit ans Herz gewachsen ist, bin ich auf die Idee mit der Krippe gekommen. Das Holz dafür stammt aus Oberbayern. Ich bevorzuge dabei Lindenholz, weil es sich wie Butter schneiden lässt. Die Figuren habe ich abschließend mit Wachsbeize behandelt, die den Glanz bringt."
Pfarrer Hans Günter Voß spricht von einem sehr stimmigen Werk. "Die Krippe passt wunderbar in unsere Kirche."

description.hltext_display: Wikileaks, cancellata anche da Apple
description.content:
E' stata rimossa dall'App Store un'applicazione dedicata al sito delle delazioni. Da Cupertino nessuna spiegazione
Roma - L'applicazione non ufficiale di Wikileaks per iPhone e iPad era disponibile da qualche giorno, esattamente dal 17 dicembre. Ora è stata invece rimossa.
I commenti non erano entusiastici: l'app serviva infatti semplicemente a mostrare i tweet dell'account ufficiale del sito e le sue più o meno scottanti rivelazioni. Insomma offriva un altro modo per navigarne i contenuti, che si andava ad affiancare ai mirror ora sparsi per la Rete.
Costando 1,99 dollari aveva lo svantaggio di offrire a pagamento un contenuto disponibile gratuitamente via browser. Lo sviluppatore Igor Barinov aveva specificato di accaparrarsi solo il 30 per cento: 60 centesimi rappresentavano la quota di Apple, mentre un dollaro andava in beneficenza a Wikileaks.
Dopo la cacciata da Amazon, PayPal, Mastercard, Visa e, da ultimo, Bank of America, il sito di delazioni aveva trovato in Cupertino un porto momentaneamente sicuro.
In mancanza di una spiegazione da parte di Apple, una delle possibili ipotesi di giustificazione della rimozione è legata alla natura non ufficiale dell'app e al fatto che essa sia a pagamento in contrapposizione alla natura non profit dell'organizzazione.
Per altril'app violerebbe invece le linee guida di Cupertino nella parte in cui prescrivono che le applicazioni che danno la possibilità di fare donazioni siano gratuite ed esse siano fatte tramite SMS o Safari.

description.hltext_display: Tulsa women's group home damaged by fire
description.author: JERRY WOFFORD
description.content: A women's group home was heavily damaged by fire Tuesday afternoon, causing a small bump on the path to recovery for the 10 women who lived there. None of the women was at the home when firefighters arrived about 3:30 p.m., Tulsa Fire Department Public Information Officer Tim Smallwood said. When firefighters arrived, they "saw flames lapping out of the window on the west side of the house," he said. The northwest corner of the house, in the 4800 block of East 35th Court, sustained the most damage, with the roof and much of the wall destroyed. Smallwood said the scene commander called two additional fire engines to assist with fighting the blaze. One firefighter suffered minor injuries, Smallwood said, but more specific information about the injuries was not released. EMSA Public Information Officer Chris Stevens said no one at the scene was treated by EMSA paramedics. Smallwood said the fire spread quickly into the attic with "a lot of flame, a lot of smoke." Firefighters had a difficult time extinguishing the blaze, he said, but they had it under control by about 3:50 p.m. Several of the women who lived in the house or in one of the other two sober-living homes in the same cul de sac looked on as crews battled the blaze. The house was operated by Courage 2. The group owns several homes that Amy Turner, Courage 2's director, said offer a "safe haven for women transitioning" into a better, more stable life." Turner said it is an intensive outpatient treatment program that is an alternative to jail. It provides basic shelter needs so that the women have a solid base from which to improve. Mimi Tarrasch, director of Women in Recovery at Family & Children's Services, which places the women in the homes, said part of the reason the program works so well is that it provides some stability for the women as they try to get their lives back on track. "Nothing is more critical than a safe, sober-living environment," she said. Having that stability damaged by fire - three days before Christmas - will create some hardships, but she said the women will recover and get back on track. The Tulsa Area Chapter of the American Red Cross is working to provide shelter, meals, clothes and other necessities for the women. The Red Cross will provide hotel rooms for two nights, and Turner said Courage 2 will work to find more permanent housing for the women, despite having full houses. The house was insured, but many of the women likely will lose their clothing and other possessions, she said. Tarrasch said people who wish to help the women can call Family & Children's Services at 991-6200. "Tulsa always rises to the occasion in a crisis, and this is no exception," she said. Smallwood said a fire investigator was at the house to determine what started the blaze, which appears to have begun in the northwest corner. The rest of the house sustained heavy smoke and water damage, he said. How you can help To help the women, call Family & Children's Services at 991-6200. Original Print Headline: Fire gutsgrouphome forwomen Jerry Wofford 581-8310 jerry.wofford@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Craigslist, addio servizi per adulti
description.content:
Accusato per anni di essere uno strumento di istigazione alla prostituzione, il portale chiude la sezione a luci rosse in tutto il mondo. E rifiuta di fornire dichiarazioni sull'accaduto
Roma - Craigslist, il popolare portale online di annunci, alla fine ha deciso di chiudere la sezione adult service in tutto il mondo.
All'inizio di quest'anno la società, a seguito delle varie pressioni esercitate dai media e alle denunce di diverse istituzioni che accusavano la sezione di commercio sessuale illegale, aveva bloccato temporaneamente la sezione negli Stati Uniti. Nella home page del sito fondato da Craig Newmark compariva un tag bianco su sfondo nero, che avvertiva tutti gli utenti che la sezione del sito era stata chiusa e non era più consultabile.
In questo caso, invece, la rimozione della sezione adulti, che fino a questa domenica ospitava in vetrina annunci di sesso palese corredati da prezzi e immagini esplicite, è avvenuta in silenzio, senza nessuna protesta ed alcun annuncio che informava della situazione i suoi 50 milioni di utenti.
Un epilogo abbastanza scontato per la sezione a luci rosse di Craigslist, visto che la polemica si trascinava avanti da già tre anni. Preoccupati che il portale con la sezione incriminata potesse facilitare reali gravi quali, in particolare, la tratta degli esseri umani e la prostituzione, nel 2008 alcuni procuratori generali degli USA avevano costretto il sito online di annunci a pagare una tassa di dieci dollari per ogni servizio di questo tipo e a fornire un numero di telefono per poter inserire annunci in quella sezione. Ancora, lo scorso agosto in una lettera pubblica 17 procuratori federali di Stato esortano il sito a prestare maggiore attenzione alla sezione per gli adulti, facendo notare che coloro i quali beneficiavano dei servizi proposti negli annunci commettevano un reato.
La società si è rifiutata di commentare l'accaduto.

description.hltext_display: Ruopolo, lesione al meniscostar fuori per 40 giorni
description.content:
starà fuori per 40 giorni
Francesco Ruopolo
Natale con sorpresa amara per Francesco Ruopolo. Una mazzata per l'Atalanta che ritroverà il suo centravanti soltanto tra 40 giorni. I tempi si allungano rispetto alle speranze più ottimistiche.
S'è scoperto durante l'intervento in artroscopia al ginocchio destro, eseguito martedì nel primo pomeriggio ai Riuniti di Bergamo dal dottor Aristide Cobelli: è stata infatti riscontrata una lesione al menisco esterno.
L'operazione è perfettamente riuscita e Ruopolo verrà dimesso, ma trattandosi di menisco esterno l'attaccante non rivedrà il campo prima di 40 giorni.
Già fissato il programma di recupero. Ruopolo dovrà restare per una settimana a riposo assoluto, quindi presumibilmente comincerà la riabilitazione mercoledì prossimo. Dovrà saltare come minimo quattro partite: l'ultima di andata in casa con il Grosseto il 10 gennaio e le prime tre giornate del girone di ritorno, a Vicenza il 15, in casa con il Varese il 22 e a Frosinone nel posticipo del 31. In teoria i 40 giorni scadrebbero proprio in coincidenza con la trasferta ciociara, ma difficilmente si forzerà il recupero.
Se i tempi saranno rispettati, Ruopolo potrebbe tornare in campo il 5 febbraio in casa con il Pescara alla quarta di ritorno, giusto in tempo per dare una mano nel tour de force con Siena, Reggina, Sassuolo, Torino e Novara.
L'infortunio di Ruopolo rischia di condizionare anche i programmi di mercato. Perché Ruopolo per caratteristiche è unico nella rosa dell'Atalanta. E ha finito per essere l'attaccante che meglio si è sposato con il gioco di Colantuono e che non a caso è stato impiegato di più: ha giocato 17 partite su 20, Tiribocchi e Ardemagni sono fermi a 16.

description.hltext_display: 丰东股份：热处理设备行业龙头企业
法国村庄被疑为UFO基地 2012末世论者蜂拥而至
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
这个村庄已经被末世论者挤爆了
北京时间12月22日消息，玛雅人的末世传说的威力有多大，看过电影《2012》的人肯定深有体会。如今，距离2012年仅剩下两年的时间，很多人开始为末日做各种相应的准备，甚至举家迁移到那些可能度过末日的地方。日前就有外媒报道，一个法国小村庄就成了他们的驻扎地。 Bugarach是法国南部的一个小村庄，这里风景宜人，此前当地的村民仅有189人。但目前这个村庄的人口暴增了10000人，至于原因则是和2012年的末日传说有关。据悉，很多2012党们相信这个村庄下面是外星人的基地，拥有飞船，届时将会帮助人类度过灾难。
事件的起因是村庄中的一位老人，他曾经宣称曾经在这里看到过外星人的飞船起降，自此这里变成了外星迷们经常光顾的区域，加上电影《2012》的影响，这里更成了2012党们经常提及的“圣地”。
以讹传讹，这里便聚集了各种各样的有钱人，富豪们卖光了村庄附近的房地产，当地的旅馆也是爆满，根本容纳不下新来的人，更为诡异的是每当夜幕降临时，这里将会进行各种各样的宗教仪式，“祭祀”们讲着关于末日将会来临的场景，让你觉得如同真的一般。
目前，该村庄所属的辖区开始有所行动，市长非常严肃的说：“这里仅能够容纳200人，但现在竟然有10000人，这太不可思议了，我认为2012年12月时应该派军队封锁这一区域。”（科学网）

description.hltext_display: Neve e disagi, i trasportatori:non siamo la causa ma le vittime
description.content:
Non si placa la polemica sulle strade impraticabili per colpa della neve. Ora scendono in campo gli autotrasportatori bergamaschi. Non siamo la causa dei disagi, dicono, ma le vittime dell'inefficienza: e annunciano di attendere risarcimenti.
«Gli autotrasportatori - si legge in una nota - vengono accusati di essere la causa dei problemi della circolazione. Invece, ancora una volta, i nostri imprenditori sono stati tra le ‘vittime' della scarsa capacità di gestire con misure preventive l'emergenza maltempo. In questo senso, anche gli autotrasportatori attendono i risarcimenti annunciati nei confronti degli automobilisti bloccati dal maltempo. Risarcimenti tanto più giustificati dai ritardi nelle consegne: se le merci non circolano i danni all'autotrasporto sono anche i danni al Paese».
Così Francesco Del Boca, presidente di Confartigianato Trasporti e di Unatras (Unione Nazionale delle Associazioni dell'Autotrasporto merci), risponde alle accuse della Società Autostrade e sottolinea «l'insufficienza degli interventi per evitare le situazioni di estremo disagio vissute dagli autotrasportatori e, in generale, dagli utenti delle strade».
Gli fa eco il presidente provinciale della categoria Trasporti di Confartigianato Bergamo, Dario Mongodi, che conferma che, nonostante si sapesse in anticipo dell'arrivo delle perturbazioni, le informazioni non sono state diffuse tempestivamente e le strade sono state pulite con grande ritardo rispetto alle esigenze della circolazione. Secondo Mongodi «i responsabili delle autostrade dovrebbero spiegare a migliaia di automobilisti e autotrasportatori perché non ci sono i mezzi sufficienti per coprire le emergenze, perché non ci sono depositi di sale pronti all'uso in quantità sufficiente, perché si aspetta fino all'ultimo momento nella speranza di non dover intervenire».
«La scusa è sempre quella – dice con una certa ironia -: “sono casi eccezionali, come si fa a fargli fronte?”. A parte che tanto eccezionali non sono, perché si ripetono tutti gli anni o quasi, va detto che anche le autopompe dei pompieri non vanno usate sempre, però ci sono; gli aerei da combattimento ci sono, anche se non sempre siamo in guerra (per fortuna). Così pure devono esserci i mezzi che le autostrade (e l'ANAS per la sua parte di competenza) non hanno».
Mongodi mette in risalto i costi di una giornata come quella di venerdì, sia per i privati che per i trasportatori, e allo stesso tempo denuncia la caccia alle streghe avviata contro i conducenti dei mezzi pesanti dalla società autostrade. «Con le loro affermazioni hanno messo gli automobilisti contro i trasportatori. Guardate sui Forum: c'è chi invoca il blocco totale dei TIR ai primi fiocchi, chi insulta i camionisti con gli epiteti più offensivi, chi vuole limitare alle sole ore notturne i “bestioni della strada”. Però poi a chi si darà la colpa se il supermercato sotto casa resta senza latte fresco, verdura, uova, carne, pannolini; il distributore senza gas, benzina, gasolio; il farmacista e l'ospedale senza medicinali, le case senza riscaldamento?».
Le soluzioni per il presidente provinciale dei trasportatori di Confartigianato ci sarebbero. «Si dovrebbero prevedere parcheggi attrezzati per permettere la sosta di camionisti e automobilisti fuori dai grandi svincoli di accesso, luoghi dove fermare i TIR e le autovetture sprovvisti di catene e permettere agli altri di montarle con calma ed in sicurezza per poi ripartire.
Oppure, come stavano proponendo alcuno comuni del Nord, obbligare tutti a montare gomme da neve da una certa data in poi. Non è poi così grave montare gomme da neve, in definitiva è vero che le pago, ma nel frattempo non consumo le altre gomme (per i TIR la faccenda è, un po' diversa, ma non è insuperabile)».
«Ma qualunque soluzione si cerchi – conclude Mongodi -, nulla potrà sostituire una pronta, veloce e preventiva manutenzione del fondo stradale, un dovere imprescindibile dell'ente gestore, che, a quanto pare, mentre è prontissimo nell'applicare salati aumenti tariffari, lo è molto meno nel rispettare i propri doveri e soprattutto i propri clienti».

description.hltext_display: [포토엔]인형미모 이민정 ‘신인상 너무 기뻐요’

description.hltext_display: Baby 'boy' with rare condition turns out to be a girl 1 month later
description.content:
Baby boy with rare condition turns out to be a girl 1 month later
A couple in South Africa celebrated the birth of their baby boy - only to find out a month later that she was actually a girl.
The baby appeared to have male genitals at birth and even doctors confirmed he was a boy.
Four week after the birth, mum Madeleshia and hubby Kenneth sensed that something was wrong and took their baby to hospital where after some tests it was confirmed that the baby was a female.
Toddler, Kenny Hiscock, had enlarged organs because of a rare enzyme deficiency, which causes abnormal hormone production.
The couple has now renamed Kenny as McKenzi and are considering surgery.
"The doctor told us McKenzi is not really male or female, but somewhere between," the Sun quoted the mother as saying.
"But we have a beautiful daughter, and we're both incredibly proud," she said.

event_or_fact.property: But we have a beautiful daughter, and we're both incredibly proud

description.hltext_display: Arbejdsgiverjul giver ekstra milliardbeløb
description.content:
Arbejdsgiverjulen i år giver en stor ekstraindtjening fra flere arbejdsdage, konstaterer Dansk Erhverv.
Alle glæder sig til jul, og i år kan især arbejdsgiverne glæde sig lidt ekstra, da juleaften falder på en fredag. Dermed er både 1. og 2. juledag blot en normal weekend. Det betyder at der kun er én julerelateret helligdag i 2010, som koster arbejdsgiverne.
Det vil i år medføre en ekstra værdiskabelse i omegnen af 3,7 milliarder kroner sammenlignet med 2012, som er den næste "medarbejdervenlige" jul, fremgår det af en beregning fra organisationen Dansk Erhverv.
Faktisk har hele 2010 været et arbejdsgiverår, da flere andre helligdage også uden for december er faldet i weekenden. Blandt andet faldt 1. maj og grundlovsdag på lørdage.
Det samme gør sig gældende for julen næste år, hvor juleaften er en lørdag. Helligdagenes placering har betydning for antallet af arbejdsdage et givent år.
Antallet af arbejdsdage lå i 2007 på 224, året efter på 226 og 225 i 2009. I år når vi op på 228 dage.
- Det er især månedslønnede medarbejdere, der mærker størst forskel fra år til år, da de får det samme udbetalt uanset antallet af fridage og helligdage, siger Mira Lie Nielsen, økonom i Dansk Erhverv.
For arbejdsgiverne og samfundet betyder de ekstra arbejdsdage ekstra dage med produktion og indtjening
Til forskel fra 2010 og 2011, kan arbejdstagerne glæde sig lidt mere til julen 2012. Da falder juleaften nemlig på en mandag, og der er derfor et maksimalt antal helligdage, som falder på hverdage. Dermed er der i 2012 tre julerelaterede fridage. To mere end i år.

description.hltext_display: Santa’s little helpers
description.content:
Arlington Knights host annual breakfast with St. Nick.
Dave Borowski | Catholic Herald
It’s a busy week for Santa Claus — what with making a list and checking it twice. But despite a hectic schedule, Santa, actually Edward Douglass White Knights of Columbus Grand Knight Thom Galvin in a Santa suit (no need for a phony beard), made his annual appearance at the Knights’ Breakfast with Santa in Arlington. Children lined up with parents and grandparents to help Santa make his list.
There were two types of children waiting to see the jolly elf, those very happy to see him, and those who would have rather stayed in mom’s protective embrace. But the happy ones far out-weighed the more reticent.
Santa listened to every child’s wish, being noncommittal about delivery of course, and gave each a little present to remember their adventure.
Megan Lawton brought her two daughters, Maura, 9, and Ellen, 4, to the breakfast. Lawton’s father is a Knight at the council.
“I grew up here,” she said.
Council Knights manned the buffet line doling out eggs, bacon, sausage and treats.
Knight Mike Bauer acted as the master of ceremony, deftly handed out door prizes with children at his feet begging him to pick their ticket.
It was the eighth year for the breakfast, and according to the Knights, was one of the best attended in years.

description.hltext_display: Could Redistricting Cost Kitsap a Congressman?
description.content:
Dec. 22--Washington picking up a 10th congressional district carries the possibility, however unlikely, that Kitsap County might lose one of its House members.
Census figures released Tuesday show Washington's population grew by more than 14 percent in the past decade, giving the state another congressional seat.
Most political observers think the new district will center on Olympia. If that's true, the new 10th District might include part of what is now the Sixth District, represented by U.S. Rep. Norm Dicks, D-Belfair.
Should that happen, Dicks' Sixth District probably would need to grow somewhere else.
A University of Washington emeritus professor of geography, Dick Morrill, wrote in the online publication Crosscut in November that Dicks could pick up "most" of Kitsap County. In parentheses, though, he included the words "or all," words that would have a particular bearing on Bainbridge Island, the home of the county's other member of Congress, Democrat Jay Inslee.
Contacted by e-mail Tuesday, Morrill confirmed that the First Congressional District could lose its presence in Kitsap, but probably will not. "The commission's first unwritten rule is to protect incumbents," Morrill wrote.
The commission he refers to is the Washington State Redistricting Commission, created in 1983 after the Legislature proved incapable of doing the job itself, according to information on the Washington Secretary of State's office website. The Republican and Democratic leaders in the state House and Senate each pick a person to be on the committee, and those four pick a non-voting chairman.
Next year, the commission will use precinct data to reconfigure the state's congressional and legislative boundaries. The Legislature can only change the commission's work with a two-thirds majority, but can't change any district's population by more than 2 percent. The governor cannot veto the new boundaries.
The commission is required to create districts of nearly equal population and are to observe city and county boundaries when possible.
George Behan, Dicks' chief of staff, agreed with Morrill's suggestion that Olympia is a likely focal point of a new district, separating it congressionally from Vancouver.
Also playing a big factor will be physical geography, such as mountains and bodies of water. The commission could decide, Behan said, that "having a district that jumps across the sound may be unwieldy."
Morrill, who oversaw the state's redistricting work in 1972, said he's heard speculation that Inslee's district might take in Island County. He believes the First District probably won't lose much of Kitsap and might pick up more from King County.
Behan said whatever the outcome, it is better to be in Washington than, say, Michigan, which is losing a member of Congress. "It's always preferable to be on the gaining side than on the losing side," he said. "It's nice to have one more vote at the table."
That is the same sentiment expressed by Kitsap County Commissioner Steve Bauer, who said having two members of the House to lobby rather than just one is to the county's benefit.
"I think the more members of Congress, (then) obviously the more people you can go to and they have a real stake in it," Bauer said.
The commissioner said he and the other commissioners routinely lobby both members of the House and Senate on issues like transportation and the ferries.
The yearlong redistricting process will include conversations with several stakeholders, including current legislators and members of Congress, Behan said.
That commission is unlikely to make changes considered too major. Of moving too many people into new congressional districts, Behan said, "that's a more radical change than would be recommended by a commission."
To see more of the Kitsap Sun or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.kitsapsun.com.
Copyright (c) 2010, Kitsap Sun, Bremerton, Wash.

description.hltext_display: UGT advierte de que los Presupuestos de 2011 obstaculizarán la recuperación económica
description.author: EP
description.content: UGT ha advertido de que los Presupuestos Generales del Estado (PGE) de 2011, aprobados ayer en el Congreso, consolidarán el retroceso social y obstaculizarán la recuperación económica y del empleo en España.

description.hltext_display: Vierde gsm-speler op komst in België
description.content:
BRUSSEL (AFN) - In Belgi komt er binnenkort meer concurrentie op de markt voor mobiele telefonie. In april of mei is er een veiling die beslist wie de vierde mobiele operator wordt naast Proximus, Mobistar en BASE. Dinsdag hebben de bevoegde regeringen hun handtekeningen gezet om dit mogelijk te maken. Dat heeft de Belgische zakenkrant De Tijd woensdag gemeld. De bedoeling is dat de komst van de nieuwe speler voor meer concurrentie en innovatie zal zorgen. ,,In penetratie van mobiel internet is ons land de op drie na zwakste van de 27 Europese landen en in prijs zijn we het duurste land'', aldus de Belgische minister van Telecom Vincent Van Quikenborne.
Er wordt een zogenoemde 3G-licentie geveild waarop ook mobiel internet mogelijk is. Volgens Van Quickenborne wordt een blok radiospectrum van 15 MHz geveild. ,,Dat brengt minimaal 75 miljoen euro op. Blijken er geen genteresseerde nieuwkomers op de markt, dan worden kleinere blokken geveild.'' Officieel is er nog geen enkele partij die gezegd heeft dat ze zal bieden op de licentie.
Aansluitend op de veiling voor de 3G-licenties volgt er nog een. Vier operatoren kunnen bieden op een 4G-licentie, de allernieuwste gsm-technologie die mobiel internet met zeer hoge snelheden toelaat.

description.hltext_display: จตุพรขึ้นเหนือร่วมพิธีสืบชะตา ไม่ฟันธงมีทีมสังหารเสื้อแดง
description.content:
"จตุพร" ขึ้นเหนือทำพิธีล้านนาโบราณสะเดาะเคราะห์ 9นพเคราะห์ ที่วัดศรุบุญเรือง นปช.แห่ร่วมงานเพียบ ไม่ฟันธงมีทีมสังหารคนเสื้อแดง ชี้ตราบใดที่ยังมีการตายเกิดขึ้น ก็คิดได้...ที่ จ.เชียงใหม่ ผู้สื่อข่าวรายงานว่า เมื่อเวลา 08.00 น. วันที่ 22 ธ.ค. นายจตุพร พรหมพันธุ์ แกนนำคนสำคัญของ นปช. พร้อมทั้ง พ.อ.อ� ิวันท์ วิริยะชัย รองประธานส� าฯ และนายวรวุฒิ วิชัยดิษฐ์ พร้อมคณะ ได้เดินทางมาที่วัดศรีบุญเรือง ต.หนองหอย อ.เมือง จ.เชียงใหม่ เข้ากราบนมัสการพระครูสุเทพสิทธิคุณ หรือ ครูบาพันเทวา เจ้าอาวาสและเป็นพระอาจารย์ของ พ.ต.ท.ทักษิณ ชินวัตร อดีตนายกรัฐมนตรี ซึ่งได้จัดพิธีสืบชะตาแบบล้านนา ในโอกาสครบรอบ 74 ปี ก่อนที่พระครูสุเทพสิทธิคุณ จะนำนายจตุพรพร้อมคณะ เข้าร่วมทำพิธีบวงสรวงสิ่งศักดิ์สิทธิ์ของวัดและเทวดาอารักษ์ เพื่อเป็นสิริมงคลแก่คณะ โดยมีเครื่องเซ่นอาหารหวานคาวและไก่ต้ม 1 คู่ หัวหมู 1 หัว ท่ามกลางกลุ่มคนเสื้อแดงที่มาร่วมงานเป็นจำนวนมาก
จากนั้นทางพระครูสุเทพสิทธิคุณ ได้นำนายจตุพร พร้อมคณะเข้าร่วมในพิธีสะเดาะเคราะห์ 9 นพเคราะห์ โดยมีการนำสะตวงใส่ดอกไม้ อาหารหวานคาว จำนวน 9 สะตวง ปักธงสีต่างๆไว้ ซึ่งพิธีนี้ถือว่าเป็นพิธีกรรมที่ถูกต้องตามหลักล้านนาโบราณ ผู้ที่ผ่านพิธีนี้จะพบแต่ความสิริมงคลในชีวิต เคราะห์หามยามร้ายจะหมดไป โดยมี อาจารย์สมหวัง กันธิยะ เป็นผู้ประกอบพิธีโบราณในครั้งนี้ ใช้เวลาทำพิธีร่วม 2 ชั่วโมงหลังจากเสร็จสิ้นการทำพิธี นายจตุพร ให้สัม� าษณ์กรณีที่แกนนำคนเสื้อแดงกลุ่มรักเชียงใหม่ 51 ถูกยิงเสียชีวิต ว่า ตนทราบเรื่องแล้ว เบื้องต้นต้องรอผลการสอบสวนของทางตำรวจก่อน ตนสอบถามทางผู้ประสานงานคนเสื้อแดงทราบว่า คนที่เสียชีวิตชื่อนายน้อย บรรจง หรือ แดง คชสาร เป็นดีเจอยู่วิทยุชุมชน และมีอาชีพขับรถตุ๊ก ตุ๊ก ก่อนเกิดเหตุพบว่าได้หายตัวไป ก่อนที่จะพบศพถูกฆ่าทิ้งในป่าในพื้นที่ อ.แม่ออน จ.เชียงใหม่ ถือว่าเป็นเรื่องที่เกิดขึ้นกับคนเสื้อแดงเป็นรายที่ 2 แล้ว ก่อนหน้านี้ก็มีการสังหารนายกฤษดา กล้าหาญ โดยใช้อาวุธสงคราม จึงขอให้เป็นหน้าที่ของเจ้าหน้าที่บ้านเมืองดำเนินการ ในตอนนี้ตนคงไม่ปรักปรำว่าเป็นฝีมือของใคร แต่เรื่องที่เกิดขึ้นจะเห็นว่าชะตากรรมของประชาชนที่มีความคิดเห็นแตกต่างไปจากรัฐบาลนั้น ไม่มีความปลอด� ัยเหลืออยู่เลย เพราะฉะนั้นจึงเป็นหน้าที่ของตำรวจที่จะต้องดำเนินการทำความจริงในเรื่องนี้ให้เกิดขึ้นและนำคนร้ายมาลงโทษตามกฎหมาย
เมื่อถามความเห็นต่อกระแสข่าวที่ว่ามีการตั้งทีมสังหารคนเสื้อแดง นายจตุพร กล่าวว่า ตนยังไม่สามารถพูดว่าเป็นจริงหรือไม่ แต่ตราบใดที่การตายยังเกิดขึ้น 1 ราย และทราบว่าสูญหายอีก 1 ราย คนเสื้อแดงก็กล้าคิดว่าเกิดอะไรขึ้น ตนได้แต่เตือนเจ้าหน้าที่ของรัฐว่าวิธีการเช่นนี้ไม่ใช่วิธีการที่จะแก้ปัญหาได้เลย แต่จะเป็นวิธีการที่สร้างปัญหาเพิ่มมากขึ้น การฆ่าไม่จบด้วยการฆ่า ตนบอกไว้แล้ว การที่จะตั้งทีมสังหารไล่ล่าคนเสื้อแดงขึ้นมานั้นก็เป็นเรื่องที่คนเสื้อแดงคิดเช่นนั้นได้ จึงขอให้ทางเจ้าหน้าที่รัฐคิดเรื่องนี้ให้ดีการทำเช่นนี้จะเป็นการเพิ่มปัญหาขึ้นมาอีก
ต่อข้อถามทางรัฐเกรงว่าการเพิ่มระดับการชุมนุมของกลุ่มคนเสื้อแดงจะมีปัญหาเกิดขึ้น นายจตุพร กล่าวว่า คนเสื้อแดงไม่ได้เพิ่มหรือยกระดับอะไร เพียงแค่เป็นการเดินจากผ่านฟ้าฯ มาราชประสงค์ก็แยกย้ายกันกลับ เป็นการใช้สิทธิและเสรี� าพ ตราบใดที่ยังไม่มีความยุติธรรมเกิดขึ้น พวกเราก็ยังคงถูกใส่ร้ายอยู่ พวกตนจึงต้องมีหน้าที่เอาความจริงออกมาปรากฏให้ได้ 91 ศพเป็นฝีมือของเจ้าหน้าที่ของรัฐ การคุมขังพี่น้องเราแต่ต้นเป็นการคุมขังโดยมิชอบ แม้พวกเขาจะใช้กฎหมายกี่ฉบับก็ตาม กฎหมายมันบังคับหัวใจคนไม่ได้ ความยุติธรรมต่างหากที่บังคับหัวใจคนได้เมื่อถามถึงความเห็นในการให้ประกันตัวแกนนำ นปช. ที่ถูกจับ นายจตุพร กล่าวว่า พวกเขาไม่ควรจะถูกขังมาตั้งแต่ต้น เพราะฉะนั้นการคุมขังเขาผิดกฎหมายทั้งนั้น ไม่ยอมชันสูตรพลิกศพแต่ฟ้องก่อน และมาชันสูตรพลิกศพตามหลัง เช่นนี้มันผิดกฎหมายชัดเจนอยู่แล้ว เพราะฉะนั้นทั้ง 7 คนที่อยู่ 7 เดือนนั้นควรได้รับการเยียวยา ได้รับการดูแล เพราะเขาเป็นผู้บริสุทธิ์มาเรียกร้องประชาธิปไตย
เมื่อถามถึงกระแสข่าวการแตกแยก� ายในกลุ่ม นปช. นายจตุพร กล่าวว่า นปช.ก็อยู่ตามปกติ มีความสามัคคีกัน แต่รัฐบาลฉวยโอกาสใส่ความ โดยเฉพาะเรื่องที่นายอ� ิสิทธิ์ เวชชาชีวะ นายกรัฐมนตรี ไปขอพบนางธิดา ถาวรเศรษฐ์ � รรยา นพ.เหวง โตจิราการ ซึ่งรักษาการประธาน นปช.อยู่ในขณะนี้ ที่ร้านกาแฟและให้บรรดาลูกหาบออกข่าวเสื้อแดงมีสายสันติวิธี สายฮาร์ดคอร์ ถือเป็นเล่ห์เพทุบายที่มีการนำเรื่องนี้ไปขยายผลในทางที่ชั่วร้าย มนุษย์ไม่ควรกระทำเช่นนี้ เสื้อแดงถือเป็นกลุ่มที่มีอุดมการณ์ไม่มีความคิดแตกต่าง จุดยืนไม่ทรยศกัน จึงอยู่ที่แนวทางเป็นกำหนดความรู้สึก ไม่ใช่ว่าใครมีความเห็นแตกต่าง ก็มีความแตกแยก. �

description.hltext_display: Police hunting for slain businessmanâs employees
description.content:
Police are hunting for three suspects in connection with a murder in Bree Street in central Johannesburg on Tuesday.
The 26-year-old business owner, Imraan Omar, was allegedly stabbed by three of his employees.
The policeâs John Maluleke said the suspects managed to escape with a number of items.
âThey sped off with in a silver VW Golf 5, a laptop and undisclosed amount of money,â he said.
âThe three suspects who are two males and a female are still at large.â

event_or_fact.property: . The three suspects who are two males and a female are still at large.

description.hltext_display: Daniela Lumbroso et ses patineurs aux prises avec le NCIS
description.content: Face au cinéma sur TF1 et France 2, et au mastodonte NCIS : enquêtes spéciales sur M6, France 3 proposait, pour sa part, ce mardi 21 décembre, de passer un Noël sous les étoiles. Dès 20h35, Daniela Lumbroso prenait ainsi les commandes de la chaîne publique, et entraînait les téléspectateurs au pied de la Tour Eiffel, où une patinoire était installée. Là, la troupe d?Holiday on Ice attendait les curieux, soit plus de trente patineurs en costume, dont Philippe Candeloro. Ces derniers proposaient leur spectacle avec, de plus, côté musique, les acteurs de , la troupe de Mamma Mia, Jenifer, Grégoire, Camélia Jordana ou encore Garou et Nolwen Leroy, ainsi que, côté humour, Stéphane Rousseau ou Chantal Ladesou. Un parterre d?artistes qui a rassemblé 3.85 millions de curieux, soit 14.2% du public présent devant son écran de télévision. France 3 se retrouve ainsi au coude-à-coude avec M6.

description.hltext_display: 羽泉个唱特约嘉宾现身 羽凡微博首度曝光爱子[组图]
description.content:
羽泉个唱“特约嘉宾”现身 羽凡微博首度曝光爱子
羽泉个唱“特约嘉宾”现身 羽凡微博首度曝光爱子
正在积极备战24号晚上北展演唱会的羽泉昨日在腾讯微博里曝光了排练花絮，特别值得一提的是，演唱会当天的神秘“嘉宾”突然现身排练现场。该“特约嘉宾”一来就立刻成为全场的焦点，胡海泉(微博)称：“特约嘉宾的气场和亲和力都够大，和谁都亲!”嘉宾与羽泉两人来了一个三人亲密拥抱。
这位“特约嘉宾”是谁呢?原来是陈羽凡(微博)的爱子，此次圣诞演唱会，陈羽凡还让爱子首度登台，成为个唱嘉宾，父子齐上阵，带给歌迷们惊喜。视羽凡爱子如亲生儿子的海泉立刻拿起话筒，现场歌唱一首两人的经典歌曲《最美》送给这位“特约嘉宾”。
羽泉演唱会圣诞狂欢夜进入倒计时，羽凡也在微博里对听众们说正在积极排练各种“劲歌热舞”，让大家拭目以待。
此外，羽•泉还在微博发出《寻找“X5-Girl”》的活动，他们告诉大家：“羽泉演唱会马上就要在平安夜上演了!现在邀请5位X5 Girl来现场和我们一起狂欢!如果你热爱音乐、迷恋色彩，那么你就是我们要找的X5-Girl!将自己和带有‘蓝.粉.黑’颜色物品的合照图片上传至微博，加上热门话题#羽泉演唱会#，同时@5位好友，你就有机会获得‘羽泉演唱会门票+诺基亚最新X5-01手机’双重大礼。”胡海泉还自曝“很适合女性的手机，大家行动起来吧!”
临近演唱会，羽泉还在微博里发出“点歌送手机”的活动，号召微博听众们来参与：“写下你选择的歌曲名字，并写下选择这首歌的原因，也有机会获得诺基亚最新X5-01手机。”线上线下多个微博活动，不仅给羽泉带来了高涨的人气，也让哥俩成为腾讯微博的焦点之星。

description.hltext_display: Avanza l’Internet con la museruola degli stati. E la “Costituzione” è un sogno…
description.author: zambardino
description.content:
Nella lista di discussione di Nexa, Fiorello Cortiana , già promotore per l’appello per un Internet Bill of Rights , interviene citando questo passo da Punto Informatico
“Il nuovo corso di Internet sorgerà presto per volontà degli stati membri dell’ONU. Le Nazioni Unite si preparano a regolamentare la rete delle reti come mai era stato fatto fino a ora, mentre la lista dei paesi promotori del nuovo gruppo di lavoro – Brasile, Cina, India e Arabia Saudita – lascia intendere che il modello di “controllo” sia molto meno libertario e democratico di quello attuale.”
Il commento di Cortiana: “Un Internet bill of Rights multilevel e multistakeholder se non ora quando?” Già, la “governance” e i relativi diritti della nuova rete sono nelle mani di Arabia e Cina. E la sollecitazione di Cortiana è quanto mai opportuna. Però…
Temo che senza – apro il lessico di un’epoca morta – una “mobilitazione” di idee, persone, situazioni non sarà possibile. I diritti si impongono. E mi piacerebbere chiedere a Cortiana come si immagina la strada per arrivarci. Condividi suFacebook Tweetalo! Condividi sudel.icio.us Condividi suLinkedIn Diggalo! Pubblicalo suMySpace Condividi suTechnorati

description.hltext_display: NCIS : L'histoire d'amour entre Ziva et Tony passionne
description.content:
La concurrence était rude ce mardi 21 décembre. En effet, TF1 et France 2 proposait toutes deux des films américains inédits, tandis que M6 bombardait son missil NCIS : Enquêtes spéciales, avec cinq épisodes tournant autour du « couple » Ziva / DiNozzo. Dans un premier temps, les fans retrouvaient le duo, qui enquêtait sur un couple de tueurs à gages, et prenait, pour ce faire, leur place. De quoi passionner 3.74 millions de curieux, soit 13% du public présent devant son écran de télévision. Par la suite, Tony et Ziva étaient pris dans une fusillade sur les quais de Norflok, une expérience traumatisante qui ne manquait pas de les rapprocher, sous les yeux de 3.62 millions de fans, soit 13.4% des téléspectateurs.
Après ces deux rediffusions de la saison 3, place à la saison 4, avec « Le monstre », au cours duquel le NCIS se penchait sur le cadavre d?un homme retrouvé dans une cheminée, et que Ducky avait quelques difficultés à examiner. 3.5 millions d?inconditionnels demeuraient au rendez-vous, soit 17.9% de part de marché.
Enfin, la soirée se clôturait avec le double épisode de fin de saison 6. « Poker menteur » tenait en haleine 2.51 millions de français (21.5%) tandis que dans l?ultime épisode de la soirée, les relations entre Ziva et Tony étaient tendues, ce dernier ayant abattu le petit ami de sa coéquipière. Près de 2 millions de fans assistaient à ce drame, pour 29.4% de part de marché.
Ainsi, si en première partie de soirée, NCIS : Enquêtes spéciales subit la loi de Patrick Dempsey, dès la fin d?Il était une fois sur TF1, M6 rafle le leadership des audiences.

description.hltext_display: Woman beaten by her husband
description.content:
Vishrantwadi police officials file FIR after making the complainant, who was allegedly assaulted by her husband, wait for six hours
Seema Lanke's long wait to file an FIR came to an end only after waiting at the Vishrantwadi police station for almost six hours. The FIR was finally registered against her husband Nanbhau Shankar Lanke alias Prakash, his ex-wife Deepali and his 12-year-old son from his previous marriage.
Seema had filed a written application with the Vishrantwadi police station against her husband for assaulting her regularly. He had allegedly beaten her and carved his name on her arm using a pocketknife. His ex-wife and his son from his previous marriage also allegedly helped him.
Seema told MiD DAY, "The police officials initially asked us to come on Wednesday to register a complaint. It was disturbing, as we had come such a long way from our village just to register a police complaint."
Seema said the police have registered a complaint against the trio under Sections 324, 342, 406, 494, 504, 506(1) and 34 of the IPC for causing hurt, wrongful confinement, breach of trust, bigamy, breach of peace, use of vulgar language, criminal intimidation, and criminal conspiracy.
Lenient charges
Some activists feel that the charges slapped against the trio are not stringent enough. "The police have lost their sensitivity. They should have applied stringent sections of the IPC, such as 307 for attempt to murder, and 326 for causing grievous hurt by dangerous weapons and means. It is shocking that they have ignored the motive behind this gruesome act," said Advocate Supriya Kothari of Bhaghini Helpline. "The person attacked the woman with an intention to kill her. He has also inflicted injuries all over her body 15 times. This reflects a cold-blooded attitude."
Commenting on the delay in filing the FIR, Kothari said, "It is sad that despite Commissioner Meeran Chadhdha Borwankar's initiative for free registration of complaints, police officials are yet to take their superior's orders seriously. It is sad that the victim had to come again and again for her complaint to be registered."
Injuries simple
DCP Sanjay Jadhav (Zone IV) said, "According to Sassoon hospital's medical report, the nature of injuries was simple. Hence, a case of attempt to murder cannot be applied here. The suspects will be arrested soon."

description.hltext_display: Cuatro provincias permanecen en alerta por nieve
description.author: EP
description.content:
Cuatro provincias estarán en alerta por nieve, para este miércoles, nueve por vientos y cinco por lluvias, según la predicción de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET).
Compartir en red
Enviar página por correo a:
Atención: Su petición no ha sido procesada correctamente. Compruebe que ha rellenado todos los campos y vuelva a intentarlo.
Datos de envío
Correo/s electrónico/s
Nombre/s
Tu correo
Tu nombre
Enviar también a tu correo
Comentario Tu comentario
Normas de uso
Sólo puedes enviar la página una vez. Si quieres mandarla a varias direcciones separalas con punto y coma ( ; ).
Muchas gracias
El artículo ha sido enviado correctamente a:
,
EP - Madrid - 22/12/2010
Concretamente, Lugo, Ourense, Zamora, León, Cantabria, registrarán alerta amarilla (riesgo) por nevadas, que será naranja (riesgo importante) en algunas zonas de Asturias. Mientras que las alertas por lluvia se esperan en Sevilla, Córdoba, Granada, con especial riesgo en Málaga y Cádiz. Además, las alertas por viento se registrarán en la totalidad de las Islas Canarias, así como en A Coruña y Pontevedra.
Así, en la Península y las Islas Baleares se producirán precipitaciones débiles o moderadas, que serán persistentes en el sur de Andalucía, donde irán acompañadas de tormentas, pudiendo ser localmente fuertes. También podrán ser localmente persistentes en el extremo noroeste peninsular y en Cataluña, tendiendo a ser mas débiles en el sudeste y Baleares. Además, en las Islas Canarias, se esperan cielos nubosos con lluvias débiles en el norte.
Por otro lado, la cota de nieve descenderá en el extremo noroeste peninsular entre 500 y 1.000 metros, mientras que en el resto de la mitad noroeste lo hará entre 1.000 y 1.500 y en el resto de la Península entre 1.300 y 1.800 metros. Además, se registrarán bancos de niebla matinales en la Comunidad Valenciana, Murcia, Aragón y Castilla-la Mancha.
Las temperaturas irán en descenso ligero a moderado en la mitad suroeste peninsular y en ascenso ligero a moderado en el nordeste y con pocos cambios en el resto. Los vientos serán de moderado a fuerte del norte en Galicia y Cantábrico, de componente este en Canarias y litoral de Andalucía, con intervalos de muy fuerte en el litoral oeste andaluz y de Galicia. Finalmente, serán moderados de componente sur en el resto de la Península, con intervalos de fuerte en zonas altas.

description.hltext_display: Ďalší americký športový príbeh
description.content:
Vysokoškoláčky v Connecticute prekonali rekord zo 70-tych rokov a neprehrali už 89 duelov. Poslednú prehru zaznamenali ešte v roku 2008.
HARTFORD. Deviaty najpútavejší príbeh amerického športu v končiacom sa kalendárnom roku pokračuje, basketbalistky univerzitného tímu z Connecticutu dosiahli už 89. víťazstvo bez prerušenia.
Huskies v utorok zdolali súperky z Florida State University suverénne 93:62 a prekonali absolútny rekord univerzitných súťaží.
V rokoch 1971 - 1974 vyhrali vysokoškoláci z University of California Los Angeles (UCLA) pod vedením legendárneho trénera Johna Woodena 88 stretnutí v rade a stanovili akýsi "zlatý štandard" univerzitného športu.
Posledná prehra dva a pol roka dozadu
Dievčatá z Connecticutu naposledy prehrali 6. apríla 2008 v semifinále záverečného turnaja NCAA. Nižším ako desaťbodovým rozdielom im počas obdivuhodnej šnúry podľahol iba Stanford vo vlaňajšom finále NCAA a Baylor v novembri tohto roku.
V utorok v drese Huskies úradovala tretia najlepšia športovkyňa USA v roku 2010 podľa agentúry The Associated Press (AP) Maya Moorová, ktorá nastrieľala 41 bodov a pridala 10 doskokov. Ďalších 21 bodov zaznamenala Bria Hartleyová.
Tvorca prvého rekordu ten nový nevidel
Tvorca doterajšieho rekordu John Wooden zomrel 4. júna v požehnanom veku 99 rokov. Utorňajšie stretnutie si však nenechal ujsť jeho vnuk Greg Wooden, podľa ktorého by bol starý otec nadšený z výkonu vysokoškoláčok z Connecticutu. Práve Huskies vraj John Wooden označil za nositeľky jeho basketbalovej filozofie, v ktorej tímová práca stojí nad výkonmi jednotlivcov.
"Páčil sa mu spôsob, akým si prihrávajú loptu. Že majú v tíme pár hviezd, ktoré dokážu nastrieľať veľa bodov, ale sú ochotné sa obetovať pre úspech celého kolektívu," prezradil Greg Wooden.
Basketbalistky Connecticut Huskies už od roku 1985 trénersky vedie Talian Geno Auriemma, šesťnásobný držiteľ ocenenia pre najlepšieho univerzitného kouča roka. Pod jeho taktovkou tím získal sedem titulov v NCAA.
"Nechcem, aby moje družstvo porovnávali s nejakým iným. Ja nie som John Wooden a netrénujem UCLA. Toto je Connecticut a viac netreba dodávať," povedal 56-ročný kouč, ktorému v utorok telefonicky blahoželal aj prezident USA a známy basketbalový nadšenec Barack Obama.
Séria Connecticutu vzbudzuje v USA veľkú pozornosť, v rebríčku najvýznamnejších športových príbehov roka 2010 podľa agentúry AP sa zaradila na deviate miesto.

description.hltext_display: Bonnie Terry Makes Learning Writing Skills Easy with Graphic Organizers
description.content:
Posted by Erik Iwanicki
Tuesday, 21 December 2010
For Immediate Release
Auburn, California, December 22, 2010. Recent studies reveal that kids can be coached how to learn. This is the principle behind the creation of Ten Minutes to Better Study Skills. The techniques used in this study skills book teach the student to apply what they have learned.
This study skills graphic organizer workbook provides activities that can be reproduced. It contains examples of how a student should take notes, put bits and pieces of information into an organized whole, compare and contrast data, and compose essays. According to Bonnie Terry, the author of this study skills book, the ten-minute graphic organizer exercises are easy and practical and will help students not only improve their writing but also improve their grades on exams.
This graphic organizer study skills book has been developed because many children have trouble learning writing skills, and basic education requires a student to have good writing skills throughout their years in school. A third grader is expected to learn to write a basic paragraph. By the time a child is in middle school they are expected to write essays. Without proper instruction, children struggle in putting their ideas on paper in a cohesive manner.
Bonnie Terry understands learning writing skills and has found a solution. She says, “I’ve been teaching students from first grade through high school and even adults over the last thirty-seven years. When I designed these graphic organizer forms, I designed them with those grades in mind. So my first and second graders use some of the graphic organizer fill-in-the-blank forms, my third to fifth graders use more of them, and my sixth and above students use all of the graphic organizer forms.”
Many individuals have expressed satisfaction with the product. Kim Roundtree, of Learning Magazine, states,”I liked the “Nitty Gritty” section the best. There were lots of pages to use here. It has good ideas to apply in the classroom. Mastery teaching. I really liked the forms provided.”
“These study materials are worth much more than the cost in currency; they are priceless when utilized to help a child learn and gain confidence in themselves,” explain Auburn residents Wyla and John Beatty.
Another Auburn resident, Corinne Lalanne, expresses her appreciation, “By using the skills and worksheets in Ten Minutes to Better Study Skills, my fourth-grade daughter was able to regain her self-confidence. She began to understand the contents, organize the information, and study effectively, which resulted in improved grades and gave her back her self-esteem. Thank you.”
Learn more about graphic organizers at http://www.bonnieterrylearning.com/products/Ten-Minutes-to-Better-Study-Skills.html.
Auburn, CA, USA

description.hltext_display: Özerk Kürdistan'a çifte inceleme
description.content:
DEMOKRATİK Özerk Kürdistan açıklamalarına yargı el koydu. Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı ve Diyarbakır Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı, Demokratik Toplum Kongresi'nin iki gün süren ve 'Demokratik Özerk Kürdistan Taslağı'nın tartışıldığı toplantıya ilişkin inceleme başlattı.
PARTİYLE BAĞ VAR MI?
Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı'ndan yapılan açıklamada, ''Demokratik Toplum Kongresi ile herhangi bir siyasi parti arasında organik bir bağ olup olmadığı hususu Siyasi Partiler Yasası'nın 78, 80, 81, 82 ve 98 maddeleri gereğince incelemeye alınmıştır'' denildi.
SAVCI DAVA AÇILABİLİR
Diyarbakır'daki çalıştayda tartışılan 17 sayfalık 'Demokratik Özerk Kürdistan' taslağını inceleyen Diyarbakır Cumhuriyet Başsavcıyığı da, gerekli bilgileri topladıktan sonra dava açılıp açılmayacağına karar verecek. Taslakta, ayrı bayrak, ayrı dil, ayrı polis teşkilatı ve yerel meclisler gündeme getirilmişti. Taslak üniter bir devlet yerine federatif bir yönetimi öngörüyor.
Kurultay sonucuna itiraz eden CHP'lilere YSK da 'hayır' dedi
YÜKSEK Seçim Kurulu (YSK) Başkanvekili Kırdar Özsoylu, CHP Parti Meclisi'nde kadın kotasının doldurulmadığı gerekçesiyle yapılan itirazın reddedildiğini açıkladı. Eski Genel Sekreter Önder Sav yanlısı olduğu bildirilen bazı CHP delegeleri, partinin 15. Olağanüstü Kurultayı'nda Parti Meclisi'nin kadın kotasının hesaplanma yöntemine ilişkin itirazını dün Yüksek Seçim Kurulu'na (YSK) da yaptı. Partililerin, daha önce Çankaya İlçe Seçim Kurulu'na yaptıkları itiraz reddedilmişti. Dünkü toplantısında yapılan itirazı ele alan YSK, itirazı reddetti. Başkanvekili Özsoylu, Çankaya İlçe Seçim Kurulu Hakimi’nin verdiği ret kararının hukuka uygun olduğunu belirtti. Özsoylu, kendilerine yapılan itirazın sadece kadın kotasıyla ilgili olduğunu da sözlerine ekledi.

description.hltext_display: Study on the Speech/swallowing Problems Post Treatment of Head and Neck Cancers
description.content:
Researchers at the Duke Cancer Institute said that most victims of locally advanced head and neck cancers successfully complete treatment without losing the ability to speak or swallow.
"This is good news," said Joseph K. Salama, MD, an assistant professor of radiation oncology at Duke and the corresponding author of the study. "I hope it brings some comfort to newly-diagnosed patients who are understandably worried about what long-term effects treatment might involve." The study findings appear in the Dec. 20 issue of the Archives of Otolaryngology & Head and Neck Surgery.
The American Cancer Society estimates that more than 70,000 people will develop some form of head and neck cancer in the coming year. The malignancies are regarded as some of the most burdensome because they can be so disruptive to normal pleasures of life such as talking and eating. In addition, surgical treatment can dramatically alter facial structure, striking at the most visible aspect of identity.
"Surprisingly, there are few studies of this size and duration that have followed these patients and documented in detail factors that alter their functional status after organ preserving therapy," said Salama.
Working with colleagues at the University of Chicago, Salama conducted a retrospective study of 184 patients with advanced but treatable head or neck cancers enrolled in a phase II trial. All received about two months of chemotherapy with carboplatin and paclitaxel and then additional chemotherapy along with radiation over a ten-week period. Some of the patients also underwent minor surgery to remove simple tumors or lymph nodes in their necks.

description.hltext_display: State OK’s national education standards
description.author: State House News Service
description.content: The state Board of Education unanimously signed off yesterday on efforts to incorporate national Common Core standards into the state?s public education curriculums, with plans to fully implement the standards into testing by 2013. ?My sense of talking to folks around the state . . . is, overall, a lot of excitement, a lot of energy around the step forward these new standards represent,?? Education Commissioner Mitchell Chester said at a board meeting in Malden. Several board members described the vote as momentous and historic.

description.hltext_display: Bamburullstolar till japanskt flyg
description.content:
Japan Airlines (JAL) har kommit på ett sätt för rullstolsburna flygpassagerare att slippa tidsödande extrakontroller - rullstolar av bambu.
"Med en rullstol i bambu kan fysiskt utsatta passagerare färdas snabbt till gaten, de förblir sittande genom säkerhetskontrollen", heter det i ett pressmeddelande från JAL.
De sofistikerade fordonen går loss på 600 000 yen (50 000 kronor) styck, och införs på japanska flygplatser under 2011.

description.hltext_display: HTML5 and new tablet devices have increased mobile video viewing
description.content:
and this is your first early morning digital briefing. If you would like to read this or any other Cynopsis edition online, click here.
The FCC voted along party lines to approve a set of regulations to preserve the open nature of the internet. The rules, which are set to be published later this week and will take effect in early 2011 (the FCC provided key excerpts on Tues.), will prohibit fixed lined ISPs from blocking access to sites and applications they are not affiliated with, including bandwidth-hungry services like Netflix or other over-the-top providers seen as palpable threats to existing pay TV models. But they offer fewer protections for wireless broadband customers. Comcast, the nation's largest cable MSO, welcomed the rules as a "workable balance" between marketplace and individual users' needs. Consumer interest groups and industry guilds such as Public Knowledge and the WGA, East were less receptive. Verizon released a statement suggesting the FCC has overreached its authority, opening the door for a legal challenge.
Hulu has decided to put off its plan for an IPO and may pursue other options to raise additional cash including hitting up its existing network partners, according to the WSJ. The entertainment video site is also considering additional subscription options after rolling out the $8/mo. Hulu Plus service. The company has said it expects to clear $260 million in revenue for 2010.
Foursquare introduced a new feature to its iPhone app that allows users to add photos and comments from the restaurants and shops they check into. The push notification option will alert you when friends leave comments. An Android version of the update is due out later this week while a BlackBerry version is coming in Jan.
~ DIGITAL ADVERTISING ~
The Mobile Marketing Association announced it is developing a series of mobile privacy guidelines to help marketers maintain transparency and adhere to industry accepted standards and practices with their ads. The MMA is forming a Privacy Committee to address the issues and is inviting media companies, mobile carriers, marketers, agencies and media technology providers to participate.
Overall online ad spending will top (print and online) newspaper ad spending in 2010 for the first time and the gap will widen even further next year, according to eMarketer. Total newspaper spending, including ads in print and online editions, will fall to $25.7 billion in 2010, a decline of 6.6%. A rise of 13.9% will push US online ad spending up to $25.8 billion by year's end.
The recently formed Mobile Content Venture plans to upgrade stations to deliver mobile digital TV signals in a total of 20 markets during the second half of 2011 covering 40% of the U.S. population, including LA, Chicago and Orlando, reports the Chicago Tribune. The service is delivered via digital broadcast signals instead of wireless broadband and is currently offered by some 70 stations.
The advent of significantly, increasing mobile video traffic by 60% overall in 2010, according to new research released by multimedia search engine MeFeedia. iPhone & Android led all mobile platforms in delivering mobile video with a 26% and 21% share, respectively, of the global market. Apple's iOS accounted for around 52% of overall mobile traffic (including the iPod traffic, which was excluded from the rankings,) down from 64% in April. iPad traffic has increased 325% since April.
Video Usage by Mobile Device - Dec. 2010
Platform % of video traffic
iPhone 26%
Android 21%
iPad 17%
Symbian OS 16%
Blackberry 9%
Nokia 4%
Samsung 4%
Sony 2%
Windows 1%
Source: MeFeedia
Although DVR penetration has now reached 38% of U.S. homes, viewers do continue to watch commercials on their DVRs, lifting commercial ratings by 44% among 18-49 year olds when tracking viewing 3 days out, according to a new DVR usage report from Nielsen. DVR playback after 7 days added 2.29 rating points to total day usage levels during the '09-'10 season. Most DVR playback occurs in primetime (34%), peaking at 9p (12%) and 10p (13%). The top ranked time shifted programming genre this season was Sci Fi, receiving a 1.3 ratings lift from +7 day viewing. Predictably, DVR homes are more likely to be upper income and under the age of 45.
~ GADGETS & APPS ~
Look ma, no glasses. Toshiba is planning to launch a 12" screen 3D TV in Japan this week which require no glasses and the company will come out with a 40" model as early as next April, reports the WSJ. A U.S. launch of the TVs, which will be demoed at CES in Jan., are expected later next year.
The newly revamped, hard-drive free Apple TV device will top 1 million units in sales this week, Apple announced. The company recently introduced an update to the iOS operating system that integrates iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch content with the device.
Mobile content provider HipLogic is launching a new real-time personalized mobile portal dubbed "Spark" for Android and Symbian smartphones that aggregates real time content from multiple partners including CBS News, Twitter, Facebook, Sky (UK), Weatherbug and Groupon. The module is currently available for free in 8 languages in beta format at sparkmyphone.com.
Watercolor painting on the iPad is now possible with a new Auryn Ink app that is being offered for free through the holidays. Pigment blending simulates the way wet pigments mix together and separates dry layers from glaze effects. The app also allows you to control the amount of water on the brush, which influences flow effects.
Keep up with the super rich with the new Forbes Lists iPad app, offering access to the magazine's annual ranking of the 400 richest Americans.
History has launched a new Facebook app that allows fans of American Pickers to choose among 3 T-shirt designs to be created and made available for sale exclusively on Facebook. Fans vote by clicking on the "shop" tab on the original series' fan page.
Michael Montgomery has been promoted to VP/Ad Sales for REVShare, the performance-based TV technology company owned by the Carlyle Group. He is based in the company's Temecula, CA headquarters and reports to Brendan Condon, CEO.
As Hulu struggles to come up with a business model that makes sense, its network partners continue to rely on their own websites to help maintain fans' interest in shows when they're on hiatus. NBC.com, which is likely to soon come under the management of Comcast, has done a great job of utilizing clips such as skits from Saturday Night Live to drive traffic but has always limited full episode catch-up viewing to 5 episodes for current shows. For the holiday break once again, season-to-date episodes are being offered for a number of newer shows including "The Event," "Parenthood," "Outsourced" and "Law & Order Los Angeles." (Supporting programming for "The Event" will also include exclusive Deleted Scenes and Commentary from Show Creator Nick Wauters.) The move makes sense, given how tough it is to maintain viewer loyalty after a show goes off the air for weeks. But it would make even more sense if these shows were available on multiple platforms, like a full episode iPad app that NBC once seemed interested in but has since stepped back from. (A source at NBC says there will be a couple of iPad-related announcements after Christmas, so stay tuned.) Maintaining viewer interest means offering access via whatever platform users are most likely to use.
Later -
Wayne Karrfalt for Cynopsis Digital
12.22.10

黄晓明绯闻女友Angelababy在微博放上难得的素颜照，虽然不少粉丝认为她胭脂未施也很美，但更多粉丝觉得“怎么那么像黄晓明”。

description.hltext_display: الغارديان: أسانج باع مذكراته
La prima de riesgo de la deuda española abre en 257 puntos básicos
description.author: Efe
description.content:
La prima de riesgo de la deuda soberana española -que depende de la diferencia entre la rentabilidad del bono español a diez años y la del alemán del mismo plazo- inició hoy la jornada en el mercado secundario de deuda en 257 puntos básicos, sin cambios respecto al cierre de ayer.
Compartir en red
Enviar página por correo a:

El artículo ha sido enviado correctamente a:
,
Temas relacionados:
También te puede interesar
Efe - Madrid - 22/12/2010
El interés que tiene que pagar el bono español a diez años a los inversores se situó en el 5,563%, por encima del 5,560% en que quedó situado ayer tras los ajustes que siempre se producen al cierre de los mercados, en tanto que su precio -que evoluciona en sentido contrario al rendimiento-, bajaba hasta el 94,670%, desde el 94,690% de ayer.
La rentabilidad del bono alemán a diez años, que funciona como referencia y refugio para todos los demás al ser considerado el más seguro de Europa, permanecía casi invariable en la apertura de la sesión, en el 2,989%, frente al 2,988% de la víspera, con un precio del 95,815%, idéntico al de ayer.
En cuanto a otros países periféricos de la zona del euro, la prima de riesgo de Grecia se anotaba un punto básico al comienzo del día y alcanzaba los 898 en tanto que la irlandesa perdía un punto básico y quedaba en 588.
Los seguros de impagos de deuda (CDS) de España se situaban en los primeros minutos de la sesión en 341.000 dólares anuales para cubrir la posibilidad de impago de 10 millones de dólares en bonos españoles a 10 años, ligeramente por encima de los 340.000 euros de ayer.
En cuanto a los futuros, los contratos que se negocian sobre la deuda alemana bajaban hasta el 125,08%, desde el 125,17% de la víspera, mientras los que predicen el comportamiento de la deuda estadounidense partirán hoy desde el 120,05%.

description.hltext_display: Tar farväl med "Drottningoffret"
description.content:
Det är sex år sedan tv-tittarna för första gången fick stifta bekantskap med den unga, idealistiska miljöministern Charlotte Ekeblad och hennes kollegor och politiska fiender. "Kronprinsessan" innebar ett genombrott för den danska regissören Kathrine Windfeld, liksom skådespelaren Alexandra Rapaport. I "Drottningoffret", som börjar sändas den 27 december, är det dags att knyta ihop trådarna och ta farväl av Charlotte Ekeblad och de andra karaktärerna.
- Jag kommer inte att sakna min Charlotte-roll. Den har jag gjort nu - men jag kommer att sakna sammanhanget och mina kollegor. Det här har varit ren lyx att jobba med, säger Alexandra Rapaport.
Ordet "lyxproduktion" nämns ofta under mötet med Alexandra Rapaport, skådespelarkollegan Suzanne Reuter och regissören Kathrine Windfeld. SVT har satsat ordentligt på filmatiseringen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts tre romaner och inte prutat på kvaliteten.
Alzheimersjuk
I "Drottningoffret" är det Elizabeth Meyer, socialdemokraternas partiordförande, som står i centrum. Suzanne Reuters rollfigur får mitt under brinnande valrörelse veta att hon lider av Alzheimers sjukdom. Hon bestämmer sig dock för att dölja sin sjukdom och genomföra valrörelsen.
För de allra flesta är Suzanne Reuter mest känd för sina komiska roller. I "Drottningoffret" ger hon visserligen prov på sin komiska tajming, men får också spela ut hela sitt dramatiska register i en ångestladdad skildring av begynnande demens.
- Jag har träffat folk som har fått diagnosen alzheimer, det är alltid intressant att göra sådan research. Men mestadels har jag använt mig av texten och jag vet inte, lurats och härmats, säger Suzanne Reuter.
Reuters mamma
Tv-serien innebar också att Suzanne Reuter för första gången fick spela mot sin egen mamma, 84-åriga skådespelerskan Bojan Westin som gör rollen som Elisabeth Meyers moster. En upplevelse, inte minst för tv-tittarna, hävdar Kathrine Windfeld.
- När de står i bild tillsammans uppstår en magi som är obetalbar. Deras relation har ju varat i nästan 60 år - thank you! säger hon.
Även om det är svårt att skiljas från Hanne Vibeke Holst-trilogin gläder sig teamet åt det beröm som tv-filmatiseringen fått under årens lopp. Lovorden har kommit ända från Rosenbad.
- När Göran Persson fick frågan vilken som var den bästa film han sett under året svarade han "Kronprinsessan". Det var väldigt roligt, säger Kathrine Windfeld.
Sara Ullberg/TT Spektra sara.ullberg@ttspektra.se
Publicerad 09:07

Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content: TOKIO (AFN) - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt. De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creren.

description.hltext_display: Eurofrank szuka dna
description.content:
W notowaniach eurofranka mamy kryzys zadłużenia strefy euro w pełni, na rynkach akcji i surowców ? cały czas bardzo dobre nastroje.
Wydaje się, iż do rozstrzygnięcia tego rozdwojenia jaźni potrzebna będzie większa aktywność inwestorów, na którą poczekamy do nowego roku. var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Inwestorzy na parze EURCHF nie czekali na ?hiszpańską? fazę kryzysu zadłużenia w strefie euro. Wrześniowe historyczne minima na parze EURCHF zostały poddane już w zeszłym tygodniu, zaś obecnie schodzimy niżej podczas gdy rynek szuka dna spadków. Sytuacja przypomina nieco niedawne szukanie dna parę walutową USDJPY, która jednak wykorzystała wzrost rentowności w USA i 25-letnie minima do ? jak na razie ? zauważalnego odbicia. W przypadku EURCHF takich sprzyjających zwrotowi okoliczności nie widać ? na wykresie już dawno nie ma punktów odniesienia, a najbardziej oczywisty czynnik o charakterze fundamentalnym ? rozwiązanie kryzysu zadłużenia w strefie ? wydaje się odległy.
Warto jednak zwrócić uwagę, iż obecne notowania EURCHF mogą mieć znacznie silniejsze implikacje makroekonomiczne niż w przypadku USDJPY. Szwajcarska gospodarka w relatywnie dużym stopniu opiera swój rozwój na eksporcie do krajów strefy. Historycznie czyniła to przy kursie mieszczącym się w przedziale 1,45-1,80, zaś najczęściej w wąskim przedziale 1,55-1,70. Pytanie jak notowania poniżej 1,30 przełożą się na wzrost gospodarczy i inflację (deflację?).
Jak na razie szwajcarska gospodarka radzi sobie dobrze i to jest jeden z powodów zachęcających rynek do kupowania franka względem euro. Wzrost PKB w drugim i trzecim kwartale przekroczył 3% (w skali roku), zaś wskaźnik aktywności PMI pozostaje bardzo wysoki (w okolicach 60 pkt.), sugerując, iż odbicie w globalnym popycie zrównoważyło negatywny wpływ silniejszego franka, choć w drugim kwartale średni kurs EURCHF wynosił ok. 1,40, a w trzecim jego negatywny wpływ mógł jeszcze nie być odczuwalny (choćby poprzez efekt zabezpieczeń walutowych). Ewidentnie negatywne sygnały dają za to dane o inflacji. Ceny konsumenta w październiku i listopadzie wzrosły o 0,2% R/R, ale w ujęciu bazowym spadały (o 0,15% R/R w październiku i 0,03% w listopadzie). Indeks KOF (będący pewnego rodzaju odpowiednikiem niemieckiego Ifo) w listopadzie znalazł się najniżej od maja.
Podsumowując, wydaje się, iż szwajcarskiej gospodarce trudno będzie funkcjonować przy obecnym kursie i wzrost choćby w okolice 1,35-1,40 wydawałby się fundamentalnie uzasadniony. W krótkim terminie jednak, o trajektorii notowań EURCHF przesądzą przede wszystkim nastroje związane z kryzysem zadłużenia w strefie euro oraz ewentualne kroki podjęte przez Bank Szwajcarii (tych ostatnio brakowało).
Chiny podnoszą ceny paliw
Wydarzeniem dzisiejszej sesji azjatyckiej jest decyzja chińskich władz o podniesieniu lokalnych cen paliw (które są regulowane) o ok. 4%. Podwyżka jest dostosowaniem do rosnących (ostatnio dość szybko) cen ropy, natomiast w świetle rosnącej inflacji w Chinach, budzi na rynku zrozumiałe emocje. Po tej decyzji pojawiły się głosy, iż chińskie władze czują się względnie komfortowo z rosnącą inflacją i nie będą się spieszyć z zacieśnieniem monetarnym (co byłoby pozytywne dla rynków akcji i surowców). Wydaje się to mocno życzeniowym myśleniem. Natomiast w krótkim okresie decyzja jest pozytywna dla rynku ropy.
Notowania Brenta znajdują się w okolicach górnego ograniczenia dość regularnego kanału wzrostowego, który obowiązuje już od półtora roku. Najbliższym wsparciem jest poziom 89,50 USD, z kolei celem byków może być poziom 97,25 USD (wyższe górne ograniczenie kanału). W kalendarzu ? PKB na Wyspach i w USA
Dziś w USA i Wielkiej Brytanii poznamy dane o PKB za trzeci kwartał. W obydwu przypadkach będą to jednak trzecie, finalne odczyty (na Wyspach 10.30, konsensus +0,8% q/q, w USA 14.30, konsensus +2,8% annualizowany) i ich wpływ na rynek powinien być niewielki. Dla funta ważniejszy może być publikowany jednocześnie protokół z ostatniego posiedzenia Banku Anglii, zaś w USA ważniejsze mogą okazać się dane o sprzedaży domów na rynku wtórnym (16.00, konsensus 4,71 mln). Dla notowań ropy istotne mogą okazać się dane o zapasach paliw w USA ? ostra zima po obydwu stronach Atlantyku i silny spadek zapasów w ostatnich tygodniach pomagały notowaniom ropy (16.30, oczekiwany jest spadek zapasów ropy o 1,1 mln baryłek). W Polsce posiedzenie RPP, jednak rynek nie oczekuje jakichkolwiek zmian w polityce monetarnej i decyzja powinna przejść niezauważona na rynku złotego.

description.hltext_display: Mobile MLS listings in Cloverdale
description.content:
5:26 PM
HomeLife Benchmark Realty in Cloverdale launched a new, mobile MLS search service last week.
Prices, photos and property info for MLS listings are now available on mobile devices by texting 4Sale to 65656 on a Smartphone.
It’s a free service that will change the way real estate agents and home buyers connect, says Colton Hope, promoter for HomeLife’s new service.
“Say you’re driving by a home with a ‘For Sale’ sign out front,” Hope said. “You can use this tool to find the details you need to know.”
The mobile site offers GPS locators, keyword searches and property searches for as detailed an area as a .5 km radius for MLS properties.
TEXT

Korszerűstette olvasótermeit a Kolozs megyei könyvtár
description.content: A kolozsvári Octavia Goga Megyei Könyvtár ma felavatta és átadta a közönségnek új, korszerű felszereléssel ellátott termeit. A könyvtár az elmúlt másfél évben korszerűsítette olvasótermeit az európai elvárásoknak megfelelően. A pénzt a megyei tanács biztosította.

description.hltext_display: 率性王石：我和金钱有点距离
TANSIYONU DUŞURDULER
description.content:
Görüşlerimiz büyük bir ölçüde örtüştü
TBMM Başkanı Mehmet Ali Şahin ile BDP Genel Başkanı Selahattin Demirtaş'ın dünkü buluşmasının ardından bir gün önceki sert sözlere göre daha yumuşak açıklamalar geldi. Şahin, Demirtaş'ın, ''Meclis Genel Kurulu'nda, Türkçe dışında bir dille hitap etme şeklinde bir düşüncemiz yoktur, arkadaşlarımı da bu konuda uyardım'' sözünü önemsediğini belirterek, bu sözünün arkasında durulmasını temenni etti.
Görüşmenin'faydalı' olduğunu belirten Şahin, her sorunun çözüm yerinin TBMM olduğunu ifade ettiğini, Demirtaş ve arkadaşlarına da aynı şeyi söylediğini kaydetti.
Şahin, 'Onlar da 'farklı bir düşünce taşımadıklarını, kendilerinin de TBMM'de görev yaptıklarını, bu düşüncelerle burada bulunduklarını' ifade ettiler. Değişiklik düşünceleriniz olabilir, bunları da görüşeceğimiz, gerekirse değiştireceğimiz yer de TBMM'dir' dedik. Bu konularda büyük ölçüde fikirlerimizin örtüştüğünü gördüm. O nedenle verimli bir ziyaret oldu'' diye konuştu.
Çözüm Türkiye'nin birliği içinde olacak
BDP Genel Başkanı Selahattin Demirtaş, Şahin'le görüşmesinin ardından ''TBMM'de 'iki dil' gibi bir talebimiz yok. Kürtçe ile ilgili sorunların çözülmesi konusunda dikkati çekme adına arkadaşlarımız birkaç cümle Kürtçe konuştular'' dedi.
Görüşmede, Türkiye'nin temel sorunlarının çözüm yerinin TBMM olduğunu ve çözümün Türkiye'nin birliği temelinde olması gerektiğini ifade eden Demirtaş, şöyle devam etti: ''Sayın Meclis Başkanı'na şunu da ifade ettik: Bizim 'Genel Kurulda Kürtçe konuşma yapacağız veya başka dillerde konuşma yapacağız' diye bir talebimiz, dayatmamız, meydana okuma ya da böyle bir tavrımız yok. Evet, bu ülkede Türkçe resmi dildir, ancak bütün ana diller de özgürce kullanılmalı, konuşulmalı, kamusal alanda kullanılmalı, sosyal, kültür ve basın yayın alanında özgürce kullanılmalı.
''Demokratik özerklik konusunu, yerinden yönetim modeli olarak önerdiklerini kaydeden Demirtaş, bunun, partilerinin programının bir parçası olduğunu ve bunda ısrarcı olduklarını söyledi.

description.hltext_display: Docs blame high levels of stress
description.content:
Doctors claim the high levels of stress induced during nuptials is the cause of heart attacks in the city
While marriages are a time of celebration and frolic, it's also the time when stress levels go through the roof as the bride is worried about her trousseau and hair and the parents are worried about the chairs, food and other management details.
Health experts suggest that parents of the bride and groom should not overburden themselves with work
Venkatesh Deshpande (50) learnt this the hard way when he suffered a heart attack just as his daughter Medha had started taking the pheras around the sacred fire.
He had to be rushed to a hospital from the mandap. The baby boomer had to undergo an angioplasty in order to avoid a near fatal situation.
"The patient had no medical history of a heart ailment. In his case, the frenzy of wedding preparations must have caused the stress, which resulted in the heart attack.
We conducted an angiography on him and he is doing better," said Dr Hasmukh Ravat, cardiologist, Fortis Hospital, Mulund.
After four days of hospitalisation, Deshpande originally a resident of Sawant Wadi in Malvan was fit to return home.
"The groom's family wanted the marriage to take place in the city and thus we had to bring all our relatives from Sawant Wadi to Mumbai.
From their accommodation to the marriage rituals everything had to be finalised and this running around might have taken a toll on my health," Deshpande recalls.
However, doctors say that there is nothing shocking about the news, as stress is one of the most common reasons for triggering a heart attack.
Experts state that stress induced heart attacks are a well-known phenomenon. Dr Samuel Mathew, cardiologist, Lilavati Hospital, said, "Usually every individual's stress levels differ.
Marriages in India tend to make parents go bald, as there are so many rituals and minute details to look at. The stress levels go through the roof causing heart attacks."
In fact, Dr Ravat who treated Deshpande has first hand knowledge of how marriages can affect the health.
"My sister's daughter was set to get married in December and for the last three months she was inviting people personally. Owing to the running around, she too had to undergo an angioplasty two days back.
A lot of happiness and physical activity can increase the secretion of the adrenaline hormone, which can cause a heart attack," he said.
Even medical literature suggests that couples and people involved in the marriage (parents) suffer from a lack of sleep and palpitation resulting in stress.
The couple is young and thus the chances of them falling prey to the stress is lesser than their parents. Also recommendations from relatives, financial constraints cause stress.
Ravat added, "I just treated a young man, who suffered from a massive heart attack just a day before his marriage."
Health experts suggest that parents of the bride and groom should not overload themselves with work.
Apart from this relaxing before the marriage, and time management are essential. Additionally, one should free them from physical and mental stress and divide the work among others.
Risk Factors
You are at risk if you suffer from:
Blood pressure
Diabetes
Cholesterol
Sugar
Smoking
Obesity
Art imitates life
In the movie Father of the Bride, Steve Martin, the protagonist also faces a similar situation when his daughter decided to get married. The movie mirrors the stress and funny incidents that occur during the preparations of his beloved daughter's wedding.
How to deal with pre-marriage stress
Start the wedding plans early enough
Hire a wedding planner
Do not turn into a bridezilla
