description.hltext_display: La solution en Afghanistan est d'ordre stratégique
description.author: Général Vincent Desportes
description.content:
Nous ne trouverons pas de martingale tactique en Afghanistan : la solution est d'ordre stratégique. Chez les Alliés, les plus optimistes sont obligés de reconnaître que la situation est difficile : la coalition enregistre des pertes croissantes tandis que l'adversaire témoigne d'une étonnante capacité de résistance, renforcée encore par l'annonce des calendriers de retrait. La manoeuvre de 'conquête des coeurs et des esprits', les théories de contre-insurrection, aussi intelligentes soient-elles, ne peuvent suffire à régler les problèmes essentiels. Ceux-ci sont, en effet, de nature politique et géopolitique. Sauf à s'enferrer dans des logiques qui, après neuf années de guerre, n'ont toujours pas prouvé leur efficacité, il faut désormais rechercher des solutions de niveau régional. Et revenir aux objectifs originels. Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées Agrandir la photo Le messianisme occidental, dérive des buts initiaux de guerre, s'est essoufflé face aux réalités. Heureusement. Les coalisés n'ont plus ni le temps, ni les moyens de réaliser leurs déraisonnables ambitions de démocratisation, de moralisation et d'organisation de l'Etat, voire d'évolutions sociétales. Le temps de la reconstruction est révolu ; c'est dès le début qu'il fallait investir massivement. Les moyens financiers nécessaires ont d'ailleurs été absurdement engloutis en Irak. Il faut donc s'en tenir désormais au seul objectif réalisable : l'établissement d'une stabilité propre à empêcher l'Afghanistan de redevenir un foyer de terrorisme.
Cette stabilité passe par une triple exigence : le pouvoir laissé à Kaboul devra être acceptable par les Afghans ; il devra l'être aussi par ses grands voisins ; et il devra, enfin, disposer d'un système de sécurité lui permettant de survivre à sa fragile maturation.
Un pouvoir acceptable à Kaboul suppose de prendre en compte plusieurs réalités. L'Afghanistan est une nation multi-ethnique aux communautés très intriquées : imaginer une partition, qui relancerait les conflits internes, serait folie. Le pouvoir devra cependant s'appuyer sur les puissants locaux dont la 'stratégie minimaliste' initiale des Américains a favorisé le renforcement, celui des 'seigneurs de la guerre' et des chefs de milices dont sont d'ailleurs issus la majorité des gouverneurs de province. Le pouvoir sera donc forcément partagé, décentralisé, fédéral avec des systèmes juridiques hétérogènes. En raison de la nature de la société afghane, la légitimité du pouvoir sera tribale plus que démocratique. Enfin, pour calmer la contre-insurrection, le pouvoir sera ethniquement réparti mais plutôt pachtoune, et non tadjik comme il l'est majoritairement aujourd'hui.... lire la suite de l'article sur Le Monde.frFaut-il encore aider l'autocrate de Biélorussie ?Jean-Pierre Raffarin : 'Nicolas Sarkozy a un souhait d'ouverture'

description.hltext_display: Allegro Nuevo Vallarta undergoes renovation
description.content:
Occidental Hotels & Resorts' Allegro Nuevo Vallarta on the Riviera Nayarit north of Puerto Vallarta closed in November for a $15 million renovation. The property is scheduled to reopen as the 266-room Occidental Grand Nuevo Vallarta in July. It will become the sixth property in the all-inclusive, four-star Occidental Grand brand.
The renovation includes an additional pool, three new restaurants, a swim-up bar and additional meetings space. The resort will feature the Royal Club, a boutique-style resort within each Occidental Grand property.
Royal Club accommodations provide personalized services and VIP amenities, including extra-spacious suites, personal concierge, private check-in and checkout services, hydromassage bathtubs, luxurious linens and pillows (including a pillow menu), upgraded toiletries, evening turndown service, fruit basket and bathrobes.
Other properties in the brand are Occidental Grand Xcaret and Occidental Grand Cozumel in Mexico; Occidental Grand Aruba; Occidental Grand Papagayo in Costa Rica; and Occidental Grand Punta Cana in the Dominican Republic.
Occidental Grand resorts include unlimited meals and snacks, drinks, a fitness center, kayaking, pool volleyball, water aerobics and water polo. The Occidental Grand Nuevo Vallarta will include a weekly manager's cocktail party, daily Spanish lessons, snorkeling, sailing, windsurfing and tennis on its lighted court. Supervised Kids Club and entertainment will be available.
Occidental Hotels & Resorts has more than 20 properties under the Allegro, Occidental Grand and Royal Hideaway brands. Visit www.occidentalhotels.com/grand.

description.hltext_display: Mexico Property Taxes Saved in Cancun Pioneering LED Lighting
description.content:
Cancun has proposed a project which would replace conventional city lighting with high-efficiency LED lighting; the move would also present considerable savings and increased efficiency to tax payers in the area.
As host of the recent Summit for Climate Change, Cancun and the state in which it is located has begun to carry out its own commitments to decreasing greenhouse gas emissions. Specifically a project has been proposed which would replace conventional city lighting with high-efficiency LED lighting; the move would also present considerable savings and increased efficiency to tax payers in the area.
On December 9, the State Governor, Felix Gonzalez Canto, led the presentation of the proposed replacement of conventional lights with highly efficient LED technology, capable of generating energy savings of 51 percent. The initiative will apply both to the state capital, Chetumal, and Cancun, offering direct benefits to buyers. In the context of the 16th Conference of the United Nations Convention on Climate Change (COP-16), the Governor of Quintana Roo reiterated his commitment to the environment by announcing the replacement of a total of over 25,500 street lights, or a total of almost 30 trillion watts per year; in terms of greenhouse gas emissions, that means the municipality will reduce a quantity of carbon dioxide equivalent to withdrawing nearly 40 thousand cars from circulation.
This pioneering project represents the largest installation of LED lighting for roads in Latin America. "At a time when many countries began to walk toward their environmental goals," said the governor, "Mexico and Quintana Roo, provide leadership through concrete examples, including the transition to LED lighting that will be implemented in all municipalities in the state." In addition to the commitment to international climate change, this large project will also provide direct benefits to Americans and Canadians . The state and various municipalities have already largely modernized their budgets and expenditure habits, offering concrete projects, services and infrastructure improvements while maintaining a very reasonable level of property and other taxes.
On the whole, Americans and Canadians residing in Mexico often feel they see comparable, or even better results for tax and public funds than back home. Other large-scale infrastructure projects include new highway bridges on the Cancun-Tulum highway, making the trip along this world-famous tourist strip very quick and comfortable, while also reducing traffic in the towns along the way, such as Playa del Carmen.
Balance between development and care for the environment has been a key focus for recent governments.
TOPMexicoRealEstate.com; Mexico's Leading Network of Specialists for Finding and Purchasing Mexican Properties Safely

description.hltext_display: Two Canadians among latest Carnegie hero award recipients
description.author: The Canadian Press
description.content:
PITTSBURGH, Pa. - One battled roaring flames, another fought off a stabbing attack — both risked their own lives to save strangers.
Michael Sharpe of Spruce Grove, Alta., and Gheorghita Rusu of Ottawa are the two Canadians among 21 people to receive the latest Carnegie medals for heroism.
In September last year, Sharpe braved roaring flames and suffered a third degree burn to save a man from a burning tractor-trailer that rolled over on an Alberta highway.
Sharpe saw the accident happen and rushed to pull driver Marc Bissonnette from the cab of the flaming tractor .
In November last year, 25-year-old Rusu fought a knife wielding assailant — and was stabbed in the chest — as he helped rescue a female letter carrier who was being stabbed repeatedly.
Forty-six-year-old letter carrier Brenda Van Leyen was approaching the rear of a pharmacy on her route when a man forced her to the ground and began to stab her repeatedly.
Rusu, the pharmacy's assistant manager, heard her screams, rushed to the scene and grabbed her attacker from behind and pushed him against a wall. The man then struck out at Rusu, stabbing him in the chest.
Both Rusu and Van Leyen required hospital treatment, but recovered.
The Pittsburgh-based Carnegie Heroes Fund was started in 1904 by steel baron Andrew Carnegie, who was inspired after hearing rescue stories from a mine disaster that killed 181 people. Since then, more than US$32.9 million has been awarded to 9,412 people.

description.hltext_display: Prized piece: Revamped trophy befitting of big matchup
description.content:
Bernie Olivas, executive director of the Hyundai Sun Bowl sits with three versions of the Sun Bowl trophy. At left is the trophy that has been given to the bowl game's winning team for the last 31 years. At right is the new trophy, which is touted as more modern and one that Olivas says "will be a showpiece for the Hyundai Sun Bowl game and the city of El Paso." At center is the trophy that will be on display at El Paso International Airport.
The newest version of the Hyundai Sun Bowl trophy is stately, classy -- one befitting possibly the best matchup in the bowl's fascinating 77-year history.
Miami and Notre Dame, a pair of storied football programs with 16 national championships between them and a bit of competitive history between them as well, will start trying to knock each other on their backsides at high noon, Dec. 31.
And everyone is excited.
The new trophy has replaced the bronze casting of the Sun Bowl. It is a silver-washed replica of the stadium, one originally designed by Henry Martinez and Richard Pearson in 1979. The new edition was redesigned by R.S. Owens Company of Chicago, a company that also manufactures the AT&T Cotton Bowl trophy, the Allstate Sugar
Bowl trophy, the Oscar and the Emmy, to name just a few.
"We are really excited to take our championship trophy to a new level," said Bernie Olivas, executive director of the Sun Bowl Association. "Our old trophy served as our centerpiece for the game for 31 years. What we tried to do is modernize it to make it a showpiece for our game and our city."
Tickets for this bowl game vanished 21 hours after the matchup was announced. Now fans are eagerly awaiting the arrival of the two teams Dec. 26, looking forward to all the hoopla building up to that moment when foot meets ball on the final day of 2010.
Is this the best matchup ever?
"I think so," Olivas said. "It was all pretty exciting leading up to that moment. We knew we might get a
Pac-10 school, but we also knew Notre Dame was out there. Once it all fell into place, I think this has given us the best matchup in the 77-year history of the Sun Bowl. Two or three weeks before we were able to select the teams, tickets were going pretty briskly. So I think our game would have sold out anyway; just not as fast. But Notre Dame and Miami ... just their names are attractive. The fact they are both 7-5 is attractive. A lot of people are coming into the city for this, which is a win-win for us and for the city of El Paso."
Olivas has been involved with the bowl for just over 25 years. Even those who have been involved longer agree with his sentiments.
"I think this is the most exciting one ever," said Jimmy Rogers Jr., who has been involved with the bowl for 50 years. "Just the reaction of the public tells you that. It sold out so fast. I don't know what to do when I don't have four or five calls a day trying to get tickets. Last year's game between Stanford and Oklahoma might have been the best matchup until then. Both teams are in a BCS bowl this year. The year we had Michigan State and USC (1990) was very special. And, of course, the 1963 game between SMU and Oregon was huge because it was our first game in the new (Sun Bowl) stadium. That launched a new era for the Sun Bowl. But I definitely think this year's matchup is our best ever."
Sam Jenkins, who began with the Sun Bowl in 1970, said, "I certainly think this is No. 1 in the history of our bowl. We have had so many great ones. Certainly, I will always remember a great matchup between West Virginia and Oklahoma State. That one was really good. And it snowed on Christmas Day (1987). Really, you meet so many nice people, so many nice coaches and assistant coaches and players, it just all kind of melts into one good experience. But there is no question this year's is the best matchup."
John Folmer, who has been with the bowl for more than 40 years, also called this the best matchup ever. "The stars finally aligned and we got this dream matchup," he said.
Amen Ayoub, president of the Sun Bowl Association, pointed to some national notice on ESPN.
"This matchup is the best in the 77 year history of our bowl," Ayoub said. "It certainly is on paper. Let's hope the game lives up to the hype. ESPN ranked our game the No. 1 bowl to watch after the BCS bowls. That's really good because we are one of only two bowl games they do not televise -- us and the Cotton Bowl (the Hyundai Sun Bowl will be televised on CBS for the 43rd consecutive year; the Cotton Bowl is televised by FOX) are the only two of the 35 that the ESPN family does not televise. Yet they still named us the top matchup. I think that says a lot."
Both Ayoub and Olivas said they think last year's Stanford-Oklahoma game was the second best. That game sold out 10 days after the matchup was announced.
And now there are two versions of the new trophy waiting. One goes to the winner of the Miami-Notre Dame game. The other, with a huge base that displays the scores of all 76 previous Sun Bowl games, will be on display at El Paso International Airport.
There is a huge game in town. There is a new trophy in town. Now, with excitement bubbling all around, we wait for someone to claim it.
Bill Knight may be reached at bknight@elpasotimes.com; 546-6171.
College football
Matchup: Notre Dame Fighting Irish (7-5) vs. Miami Hurricanes (7-5).
When, where: Noon Dec. 31, Sun Bowl Stadium.
On TV: CBS.
Tickets: Game is sold out.

description.hltext_display: 'Varlığım Erdoğan'ın varlığına armağan olsun'
description.content:
CHP'li İnce, Bakan Nimet Çubukçu'ya 'Sürekli andımızla uğraşıyorsunuz, bu size 10 numara bol gelir' dedi
CHP Grup Başkanvekili Muharrem İnce, Milli Eğitim Bakanı Nimet Çubukçu'ya, '(Bu andı ben bile yazarım) dediniz. Bu size bol gelir. Siz gidin derslik yapın, büyük işlere 'devrim yapacağım' diye karışmayın' dedi. TBMM Genel Kurulu'nda dün, Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı, YÖK, ÖSYM ve 94 üniversitenin 2011 yılı bütçeleri görüşüldü.
İnce, MEB bütçesinden 2002'de yatırıma yüzde 17.2 pay ayrılırken, şimdi yüzde 5.8 pay ayrıldığını söyledi. Genel bütçeden Milli Eğitim yatırımlarına ayrılan payın da yüzde 140 azaldığını savunan İnce, ilköğretim çağındaki çocukların yüzde 1.9'unun eğitimden yoksun olduğunu iddia etti. İnce, Bakan Çubukçu'nun, bütün liselerin Anadolu Lisesi yapılacağını söylediğini ifade ederek, 'Yakında mega liseler, ultra liseler görürsek hiç şaşırmayalım' diye konuştu.
İNCE'NİN YAZDIĞI AND
İnce konuşmasını şöyle sürdürdü: Sayın Bakan, sürekli andımızla uğraşıyorsunuz. 'Bu andı ben bile yazarım' dediniz. Bu size bol gelir. Ben sizin adınıza yazdım:
'Doğruyum, çalışkanım, yasam, haksızlıkları paklamak, haklıyı paylamak, milletimi bölmek, parçalamak; ülküm yükselmek, geriye gitmektir. Varlığım Recep Tayyip Erdoğan'ın varlığına armağan olsun.' Andımızla, İstiklal Marşı ile uğraşmayın, bunlar size 10 numara büyük gelir. Siz gidin derslik yapın, ikili eğitimi bitirin, büyük işlere 'devrim yapacağım' diye karışmayın.

description.hltext_display: Ingram Micro Now Offering HP 3PAR Technologies
description.content:
Broadening its enterprise solutions portfolio, Ingram Micro Inc. has expanded its relationship with HP and is now authorised to market, sell and support enterprise-class HP 3PAR Storage Systems.
Ingram Micro is one of the first distributors to offer HP 3PAR Storage Systems and solutions to the IT channel. HP acquired 3PAR in September 2010.
"The availability of HP 3PAR technologies from Ingram Micro is significant news for the VAR community and opens up the playing field for channel partners addressing the storage needs of enterprise-class public and private cloud computing environments," said Mark Maisano, Senior Director, Advanced Computing Division and HP Business Unit, Ingram Micro U.S.
"HP sees tremendous business value in the IT channel and is pleased to make our new 3PAR storage solutions available from Ingram Micro," said Frank Rauch, Vice President, Channels, HP. "With the support of Ingram Micro's HP Business Unit and new Advanced Computing Division, we are able to accelerate and execute against our converged infrastructure strategy. Together we offer HP channel partners the enablement resources, support and technology they need to build and grow a profitable practice around HP storage solutions."
HP 3PAR Storage Systems, including the T-Class and F-Class systems, are designed to help channel partners deliver the efficiencies of consolidation while maximising flexibility, a combination critical for virtualisation and cloud computing environments.

description.hltext_display: 秦岚露肩粉裙惊艳红毯 夺年度风尚魅力红人[组图]
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 14:20:00 来源：雅虎娱乐
昨晚，由2010年BQ红人榜颁奖礼在京隆重举行，文化界、娱乐界百位名人齐齐亮相典礼红毯，可谓星光闪耀，2010年在演艺圈有不俗表现的秦岚以一身淡粉色曳地长礼服亮相红毯，高贵典雅似女神艳惊四座，并凭借其在2010年的时尚表现勇夺年度风尚魅力红人大奖。
当晚，秦岚身着TADASHI高级定制粉色纱质长裙亮相红毯，在一众深色礼服中显得格外亮眼，镂空露肩小露性感，合体的剪裁和垂感十足的面料都将其曼妙的身材显露无遗。

description.hltext_display: Herkes ayağını denk atmalıdır
description.content:
Bahçeli, Türkiye'yi bölme projelerinin fiilen hayata geçirilmek istendiğini, Başbakan Erdoğan ve AKP hükümetinin de baş sorumlu olduğunu söyledi
MHP Genel Başkanı Devlet Bahçeli, ''Son dönemde PKK terör örgütü ve uzantılarının başlattığı Türkiye'yi bölme projelerinin fiilen hayata geçirilmesi girişimleri ve dayatmaları, anayasa ve kanunlara meydan okuyan bir ayaklanma hazırlığıdır. Türkiye'nin içinden geçmekte olduğu bu karanlık dönemde herkes aklını başına almalı, ayağını denk atmalıdır'' dedi. Bahçeli, olayların bu noktaya gelmesinde Başbakan Erdoğan ve AKP hükümetinin de baş sorumlu olduğunu söyledi.
EYALET SİSTEMİNE GEÇİŞ
Bahçeli, bu girişimlerin temeli ve ortak amacının, ''PKK'nın Türk milletinin dışında ayrı bir Kürt milletinin varlığının kabul edilmesi ve bunun devletin kurucu ortağı olarak Anayasa'da tescil edilmesi'', ''Kürtçe'nin kamusal alanda ve eğitim sisteminde siyasi statü kazanması'' ve ''İlk aşama olarak demokratik özerklik adı altında ayrı bayrağı, Parlamentosu ve savunma gücü olacak eyaletler sistemine geçilmesi'' olduğunu öne sürdü. Bahçeli, şöyle devam etti:
SON KÖPRÜ BAŞI TUTULURSA
''Bu son köprü başı tutulabilirse, sıra nihai hedef olan Türkiye, İran, Irak ve Suriye'yi kapsayacak birleşik ve bağımsız Kürdistan devletinin kurulması gelecektir.
PKK'nın milli kimlik, dil ve yönetim hakkı taleplerinin hayata geçilmesi halinde Türkiye Cumhuriyeti'nin kuruluşundan 87 yıl sonra tek millet-tek devlet esasına dayanan üniter yapıdaki milli devlet yıkılacaktır. Bunun yerine etnik temelde ayrıştırılmış çok milletli, çok kimlikli, çok dilli ve coğrafi temelde özerk bölgelere ayrılmış parçalı bir ortaklık devleti kurulacaktır. İmralı canisinin 'demokratik cumhuriyet' projesinin ve Başbakan Erdoğan'ın 'demokratik açılım' ambalajına sarılı PKK açılımının anlamı ve sonucu bu olacaktır.'
CESARETİN KAYNAĞI AKP
Terör örgütü ve etnik bölücülerin en büyük cüret ve cesaret kaynağının Başbakan Erdoğan ve AKP hükümeti olduğunu iddia eden Bahçeli, ''Siyasi gündeme taşınan bölünme reçeteleri ve hız kazanan hayasız tahrikler Başbakan Erdoğan'ın başlattığı PKK açılımının ilk meyveleri ve sonuçlarıdır.
Terörle mücadeleyi zaafa uğratan, İmralı canisi ile pazarlık yapan, PKK açılımı ile etnik bölücülerin taleplerine sahip çıkan ve 2011 seçimleri sonrası Anayasa'nın PKK taleplerini kapsayacak şekilde değiştirileceği konusunda bölücülere vadeli çek veren Başbakan ve hükümeti bu noktaya gelinmesinin baş sorumlusu ve suç ortağıdır'' dedi. Bahçeli, CHP Genel Başkanı Kılıçdaroğlu'nun da gelişmeler karşısında sessiz kaldığını ifade ederek, 'Şimdilik not ediyoruz' dedi.

description.hltext_display: 송새벽 "올해 뭔 일들이..좋은 광대 되겠다"
description.content: ⓒ임성� 기자`올해의 발견` 송새벽이 감독들이 주는 올해의 � 인 연기자상을 받� 감격해했다.송새벽은 22일 오후 5시 서울 압구� � CGV에서 열린 � � 13회 디� �터스컷 시상식에서 `방자� �`으로 올해의 � 인 연기자상을 받았다.올해 각종 시상식을 통틀어 무� � 5개의 트로피를 거머쥐게 된 송새벽은 "올해 이거 뭔 일들이…"라며 "이래도 되지 싶습니다"라는 인사말로 좌중을 웃겼다.그는 "이왕 주시는거 받� , 송구스럽지만 받� 앞으로도 열심히 하� 습니다"라며 "감독님이 주� 상이라 더 송구스럽� 감개무량합니다"라� 밝혔다.이어 "현장에서 살아가는 배우가 되� 습니다"라며 "좋은 광대가 되도록 노� �하� 습니다"라� 덧붙였다.디� �터스컷 시상식은 한국영화감독네트워크 300여명의 영화감독들이 주최가 돼 한 해의 영화를 결산하는 행사다. 올해는 2010년 개봉작 106편을 대상으로 투표를 통해 올해의 감독상, 연기상, � 인감독상, � 인연기자상, � �작자상, 독립영화감독상 등 총 6개 부문을 시상했다.[김현록기자 roky@mtstarnews.com]머니투데이가 만드는 리얼타임 연예뉴스� �보 및 보도자료 star@mtstarnews.com� �작권자 ⓒ 머니투데이 스타뉴스

description.hltext_display: Inquiry in doubt after parly prorogued
description.content:
Critics have vowed to push ahead with a parliamentary inquiry into NSW's $5.3 billion electricity sale despite government attempts to kill it off by shutting down parliament.
The future of the inquiry was thrown into doubt on Wednesday morning when Premier Kristina Keneally announced Governor Marie Bashir had prorogued parliament.
The shock move, which came two months earlier than expected, means the parliamentary session has now officially been brought to a close.
Opposition Leader Barry O'Farrell immediately accused the government of trying to derail the upper house inquiry ahead of the state election in March.
But Christian Democratic Party MP Fred Nile and the Greens later obtained advice from the clerk of the upper house that the inquiry could go ahead.
Mr Nile, the chair of the upper house committee that will investigate the controversial sell-off, announced hearings would begin the week of January 17.
He said the parliamentary committee would meet as planned at 2pm (AEDT) on Thursday, to set the terms of reference.
'I think it was a bit like a poker game, a bluff, they thought by doing that, everybody said that's it, no committee inquiry',' he said.
'But I've made inquiries and advice from the clerks. There is nothing to stop the committee meeting.'
While Labor MPs Greg Donnelly, Luke Foley and Kayee Griffin will attend Thursday's meeting, the government pointed to Crown Solicitor's advice that committees can't sit once parliament has been prorogued.
A spokeswoman for Ms Keneally would not say if the government will challenge the legality of the inquiry, which could see the dispute dragged through the courts.
Mr Nile said Treasurer Eric Roozendaal, who is in the US on government business, had called him on Tuesday to express his concerns the inquiry might jeopardise the second tranche of the sale.
The so-called gentrader rights of Macquarie Generation and Delta's NSW central coast power stations will be completed early in the new year.
The first tranche of the sale was controversially announced by media release just before midnight on Tuesday last week.
The resignation of eight board members from Eraring Energy and Delta Electricity, in a last-minute protest over the deal, further soured the sale.
Under the power sell-off TRUenergy has paid $2.035 billion for retailer EnergyAustralia and the right to trade the output generated by Delta West.
Origin Energy paid $3.25 billion for smaller retailers Integral Energy and Country Energy, together with the trading rights for Eraring Energy.
The opposition, Greens and business lobby have criticised the partial privatisation, saying the government hasn't realised the full value of the assets, and that the sale would lead to less competition.
Both Ms Keneally and Mr Roozendaal have defended the sell-off, saying the assets sold for 'well above' their retention value.
They have also dismissed opposition calls for a judicial inquiry into the sale, but said they would welcome the scrutiny of the state's auditor-general.

description.hltext_display: 邹晓春等入董事会有利国美“正常化”
Dziś poznamy istotne dane z USA
description.content:
Dolar dalej ma lekką przewagę Wspólna waluta nadal pozostaje słaba. W trakcie wczorajszej sesji niedźwiedzie podejmowały kolejne próby sprowadzenia kursu EUR/USD jeszcze niżej, ale ostatecznie w sesji europejskiej główna para pozostawała w dość wąskim przedziale. Z kolei ponownie w sesji amerykańskiej kurs spadł poniżej poziomu 1,31, ale również i tym razem bykom udało się podnieść kurs z powrotem w okolice 1,3130. Im bliżej Świąt tym aktywność inwestorów jest mniejsza, ale warto pamiętać, że to może się zmienić ze względu na zaplanowane publikacje makro z USA. var _r = document.referrer ? encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) : ''; var _w = encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); var _e = document.inputEncoding ? document.inputEncoding : document.charset; document.write('\/script'); Ciekawie zachowywały się wczoraj pary złotowe. Mimo osłabienia apetytu na ryzyko na świecie, przez co spadki notowała główna para walutowa, wartość polskiej waluty pozostawała mniej więcej na tym samym poziomie. Działo się tak ze względu na transakcje Banku Gospodarstwa Krajowego, który wymieniał na rynku euro na złote. Wspierało to do pewnego stopnia polską walutę, choć transakcje te nie były bardzo duże, a złoty ostatecznie i tak nieco stracił do dolara. Kurs USD/PLN znajduje się dziś rano na poziomie 3,0430, a kurs EUR/PLN na 3,9960.
Dynamika PKB z USA
Dziś na inwestorów czekają trzy istotne publikacje. Pierwsza z nich pojawi się dopiero o godzinie 14:30 i będzie dotyczyła ostatecznego odczytu dynamiki PKB za III kw. w USA. Rynek oczekuje, że zostanie ona po raz kolejny zrewidowana w górę, tym razem z 2,5% r/r do 2,8%. Następnie o 16:00 poznamy wielkość sprzedaży domów na rynku wtórnym za oceanem. Spodziewany odczyt to 4,71 mln, czyli wyraźnie więcej niż poprzednie 4,43 mln. Ponadto dziś po południu swoją decyzję w sprawie stóp procentowych ogłosi Rada Polityki Pieniężnej. Jednak nie należy spodziewać się w tej kwestii żadnych zmian, ponieważ stopy najprawdopodobniej pozostaną na poziomie 3,5%.

description.hltext_display: Danskar rekordnegativa till euron
description.content:
Danskarna har aldrig varit så negativa till euron som nu, enligt Danske Banks kvartalsvisa opinionsmätningar. På ett kvartal har gapet mellan nej och ja vuxit från 5 till 13 procentenheter.
Nu säger 42 procent av danskarna ja eller kanske ja till att införa EU-valutan, medan 55 procent säger nej.
Mätningen gjordes under de två första veckorna i december.
